Reviews.Content: Great buy it has everything I wanted. Size Picture quality and plenty of options and ports. Its not as thin at some of the other models out but its almost 1/2 the cost.

Reviews.Title: A Great first smart TV
Reviews.Author: Mitchel L Stewart
Reviews.Content: I Love this TV, I have always love the Vizio brand as back in 2009 that I brought my first HDTV from Vizio. That TV still works wonders today. I have no complaints so far about this TV except for one minor thing: The HULU plus app that comes installed with this TV is the older version which loads slower and doesn't have the "recent watched" catergory as the newest version have. Other than that though, this TV is great and if you want a cheap but great quaility smart-TV then you will not go wrong with this TV vizio.

Reviews.Title: vizio
Reviews.Author: H E KLINGER
Reviews.Content: Wife says it has a high pitch scream but I don't hear it and its to much trouble to return at this point.

Reviews.Title: These t.v.s just get better and better
Reviews.Author: Kefoodle
Reviews.Content: Replaced our old t.v. in the living area with this one and love the features and the picture.  The cable guy who installed our service said he used to sell t.v.s and recommended the Vizio, so I was happy with my choice.  I love the one-click over to Amazon Prime video.  The only thing is, I saw my neighbor's 60" and thought I might have gone bigger.  My husband says I'm nuts...

Reviews.Title: Product review
Reviews.Author: Rehman Merchant
Reviews.Content: A very good unit, fits perfectly on the kitchen counter under cabinets. 2 HDMI ports make the life easier. Oicture clear and crisp. My only regrets is that it does not have browser capability.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and a Great price.
Reviews.Author: ZechariahB
Reviews.Content: This Smart LED TV does everything it says it should.  The refresh rates and color are outstanding.  The price at the time of purchase was very reasonable as well.

Reviews.Title: Nice display
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Got this tv for my husband for football season and he just loves it!  The picture is super clear and there's no traces of the screen blurring or anything. The kids also love it for the video games very nice picture.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal value for the price, even if it had cost 50% more.
Reviews.Author: E. Heinrich "CDBurnguy13"
Reviews.Content: We wanted a smaller TV for our kids' playroom but we like to watch movies off our other media devices as well as from Amazon Prime Video.  This LED TV has great picture, good sound (for small built-in speakers), and plenty of input options.  my ONLY complaint is that it does take more time than most TV's to power ON.  At first, we frequently pressed POWER more than once while waiting for it to start, but were turning it back off by accident.  Now we know to just wait 8-10 seconds and it comes on.  Everything else responds normally.  We are very happy with this purchase and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: J. Thacker "JT"
Reviews.Content: Great color, really amazing Hi Def, plus Internet availability.  Picture is best I've seen on any TV of this size.  Sound can be tailored to your liking, but may be somewhat limited at some frequencies.

Reviews.Title: Good but not Great
Reviews.Author: Jay Meeks
Reviews.Content: Only had the TV for two months but so far I have been satisfied with this product. Keep in mind you get what you pay for. The picture on this TV will not be what you get on a Samsung that is twice the price. Depending on what I am watching I may have to adjust the picture. My settings for watching football is different than watching Big Bang Theory. I would still recommend this TV to the low cost consumer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome quality television!
Reviews.Author: Brittany Steed
Reviews.Content: Works awesome is the biggest bang for your buck! Clear picture that is awesome for watching NFL games, movies and playing video games.

Reviews.Title: Wifi Would not Work!
Reviews.Author: Paul A Sisco
Reviews.Content: I hooked up the TV and connected to my cable box.  Started to activation process and the wifi would not work.  I plugged the TV into my LAN and TV worked great.  Ran filmware update, still no luck on the wifi.  I repeatedly tried to restore default settings and could not get the WIFI to work.  Good picture on the TV, but I returned the item due to it's defect.  I'm sure I just got a bad unit, but I can't go back to Vizio.  Also, the remote control would not work for a few minutes at a time and then suddenly start up again.  Too many issues from the start.

Reviews.Title: vizio 39 inch
Reviews.Author: Adam Bethea
Reviews.Content: vizio is the only way to go. i love the apps and the easy set up. i have a 42 inch lcd and a 39 led. once the colors are adjusted the tv has a superior color. some people complain about the remote.  i love the remote. it's small and simple.

Reviews.Title: App doesn't support Watchlist on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Paul C
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv since the width would just fit into my cabinet. I also wanted to use Amazon instant video service. The lack of the watchlist feature with Amazon means I won't be using be using the TV smart app. The picture is OK, not as good as my similarly sized Sony from several years back. I could have saved some money and got the non smart app version.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: John Smothermon
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!  I have 7 Vizio's and they are the are a great value for the money!  Never buy any other brand.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv
Reviews.Author: Ami Dougherty "Ami"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son's room. He is VERY happy. It's a great little light weight tv that doesn't take up too much room. Great picture quality. We got it hooked up to the wifi easily and he was watching Netflix and streaming Rhapsody in no time. (Those are paid services we had existing accounts with.) The sound leaves a little to be desired. A little weak and tinny. We hooked up an mp3 JBL speaker we had lying around and it sounds great now. Very happy with the value and the product.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Jerry L. Price
Reviews.Content: This is a great Smart TV for the price (paid less than $700).  The picture quality is very good, viewing angle is good and the sound is decent.  I added my own sound bar to get even better sound.  Since this TV recently was installed in a mountain condo that we get to once every couple of months, I have not had a chance to fine tune the picture or to use the Smart features that much, but I don't anticipate problems in these areas from others' reviews that I have read.  Obviously, I can't speak to the reliability of this TV, but I have had good luck in that regard with my previous Vizio 37-inch non-Smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV
Reviews.Author: Justin Schaefer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our bedroom and wanted Netflix and network streaming. The interface is a little slow, but functional. If you try to stream from your network and it says something like incompatible file type, you can just transfer them to a thumb drive or external HDD and plug them into the USB on the side of the tv and it will play them just fine.

Reviews.Title: Like this a lot
Reviews.Author: Chari
Reviews.Content: The reviews on this were spot on - I purchased the 42" for a friend but the 32" is perfect for my bedroom the only issue is that it  not  pick up my wireless network while other devices do - that's why it lost a star.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV, very good value
Reviews.Author: EMTP EJ "EJ"
Reviews.Content: This TV has 4 HDMI ports,one component (shared with the composite input)Digital TV / TV coax - either cable or antenna1 USBEthernet or wifias well as L & R RCA audio out and optical audio out.The remote uses a 4-way pointer, like you would see on a cellphone or other device, in addition to the usual remote control buttons.Since it is a smart TV, it can use on-board apps.It also has the standard VESA mounting system.

Reviews.Title: Fantasic TV & monitor
Reviews.Author: A. Dightam
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV.I use just about every option available. I have my Google Chromebox in one HDMI and use the Vizio as a monitor for several hours a day for work. I have my Windows 7 PC in the other HDMI input and can use the DVD player on the PC to play movies over the Vizio, or stream anything I want. I also have an antenna for my over-the-air TV reception. I've run a movie in the USB slot off a 4GB thumb drive. Everything works really well.HDTV via my indoor antenna is excellent. I live in a city in a valley with TV towers 7-miles from my house. The picture is crisp (sometimes breathtaking depending on the program source).720 & 60 is just fine for a 32" screen. I was watching Braquo on Hulu the other day and could see the finest detail on one of the female character's colorful costume - it wouldn't have been any better with 1080 & 120. Refresh is good enough; I get some artifacts on over the air progs with fast moving content but kind of expect it with a TV that costs less than 300-bucks.The apps are great - I use Netflix (excellent), Amazon Prime (excellent), Hulu (excellent), YouTube (very good), Pandora (vg), Tune-in (buggy - some stations don't work), IHeartRadio (same as Tune-in - buggy). Warning to all: don't install the Weather4us app unless you want a constant siren alert when your area has a weather emergency (like a flash flood warning). The alert also takes over the Vizio completely shutting down all operations. Obviously, I uninstalled it.I wired in my internet in which is recommended. The wifi works fine but I get much faster speed over Ethernet which is better for Amazon, Hulu, Netflix, etc.Highly recommended. Go get yourself one.

Reviews.Title: Younger generation "Know How"
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: I was surprised to discover how light weight the unit was.  It came much sooner than was predicted. I was unable to sync it with my cable provider . I am so not techy. My son and daughter came over one evening and set it all up for me.  Can fully enjoy it now. It was a good purchase experience.

Reviews.Title: Good as a smart tv, not as a PC display
Reviews.Author: Abraham
Reviews.Content: I hoped this would be good as a pc display and tv, but was not fast enough as a pc display. Returned it.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 47" LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: As advertised.  Great quality and functionality.  Wish it had more component/HDMI plug-ins, but for the price, I can't complain.  As advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great selection of TV
Reviews.Author: Kenan J. Kern
Reviews.Content: A superior TV with all the bells and whistles.  I would recommend this television to anyone looking to upgrade or replace an older unit.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Tyson
Reviews.Content: I watch a lot of you tube tutorials and it is great having this on the big screen sitting in the comfort of your living room. Also if you are entertained by music videos, this has several great sources.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Eileen Levesque
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!  Great picture quality easy to set up!Great TV for the money I would but it again!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Land Shark
Reviews.Content: Great Picture... Apps are fantastic with quick load times.  For the money this TV can not be beat.  As always, Amazon delivery was quick and painless.

Reviews.Title: Mostly Ok
Reviews.Author: Robert Heaton
Reviews.Content: Almost a great TV. All the features works well, and the apps much faster than on the Samsung products.Only problem is that from time to time screen brightness varies intermittently. Viewing normal TV it is not noticeable - but on apps, which have a constant brightness background, it is irritating.So one has the difficult decision weather to put up with it, or go through the whole business of getting a replacement.Either way, this is a unit that should not have got through QA. In retrospect, paying $50 or $100 more would be a better deal.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Pat Choate
Reviews.Content: The TV is very easy to set-up.  The picture is superb, as advertised and verified by many buyers.  Really a great value and Vizio service is as good as Apple.  Lightening struck the house and knocked out the TV, which was in warranty.  Vizio made it good instantly.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected!
Reviews.Author: WoodWorker "Willym47"
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical after some of the negative reviews that I have read, but based on my past experience with VIZIO products I kept them in balance with what I knew. After tweaking the picture settings and turning of the ambient sensor and the some of the other sensors, I found that the picture was quite pleasing and realistic. The blackness level is really good and even in a very bright room the picture is great. I would not hesitate to recommend this TV to anyone, especially if they can take the time to adjust a few settings and not accept the factory settings. Who drives a new car where the factory last left there seat position?

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Picture, Slow menus
Reviews.Author: t0astm0nkey
Reviews.Content: I selected this TV over comparable Samsung and Sony televisions based on the reduced price and slimmer profile.  The picture IS wonderful, and the SmartTv functions are incredibly easy to use.  My only complaint, is that it takes 5-6 seconds for the TV to respond upon pressing the Netflix button on the remote, not a deal breaker, just kind of a nuisance, as others who use my tv will press the button a second time, thinking the TV didn't get the signal, which will cause it to cancel out of the Netflix start-up.

Reviews.Title: I'm Enjoying it.
Reviews.Author: Atom K
Reviews.Content: Great TvFor the Price can't beat it.Solid Quality, Wi/Smart tv feature was easy to learn,I have the tv talking to my router and playing movies from my external harddrive hooked to my computer.It seemed easyer for the tv to find stuff on my external.The Menu system on the search/harddrive feature is a little rough, But i think it just need to play with it more.Have a 25Ft HMDI cable coming so i can run it straight from the comp to the tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: J. Edgar Mihelic "Iconoclast"
Reviews.Content: For what I paid for this thing, and comparing it to other brands at the same size for twice the price, this thing is a steal.  I can watch netflix and Amazon streaming, as well as YouTube videos.  When I just want to relax and listen some music, Pandora streaming is available.The only issue is that the input for alphabetical entries is harder than necessary.  A qwerty remote is available, but it costs extra.  Otherwise, an awesome buy.

Reviews.Title: Good tv, as advertised
Reviews.Author: J. Wolken
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my Grandpa, he likes it because it has a good picture and good sound. Quickly shipped was a nice bonus.

Reviews.Title: A really nice smart TV
Reviews.Author: randy
Reviews.Content: Very easy to understand and use. The setup was very simple.  I have used a memory stick in the USB port several times to play movies, it will play the most common formats.

Reviews.Title: 24" Vizio excellent buy for $200
Reviews.Author: jarco61
Reviews.Content: First off, spend the extra $20 and get the wireless version.  Sure it isn't perfect and doesn't have the strongest signal, but it works and works well.  Great set, great picture, easy set up.  Enjoy that Amazon and Netflix have one button access (as does M-GO, but it isn't available yet).  When the "off" brands first hit the market, I stayed clear, but the quality has improved tremendously and is definitely work a closer look.I liked this so much, I bought 2!

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Page H
Reviews.Content: I chose this television for its size.  We use it in a small bedroom that is used as a guest room and a second tv viewing room.The quality seems good and it works well.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Ernst
Reviews.Content: Nice lottle room tv, great picture and sound for agreat price. It was quite a deal. Love this tv. Yes

Reviews.Title: 32inch vizio smart tv
Reviews.Author: moto91
Reviews.Content: Decent tv for the money like the smart features plus it is an led tv  which saves on electricity ,picture quality could be better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Spiritgirl
Reviews.Content: IThis tv works great without an antenna. The wifi setup was not difficult. For internet access it is best to connect your tv by hdmi and the internet is easily accessible. The picture is vibrant and clear, the sound is good and I am really happy about the purchase. If this vizio does well, we will certainly purchase another. Thanks much!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture
Reviews.Author: JaredL
Reviews.Content: Small things that I like:* When you mute the TV you can turn down the volume, without turning the sound back on. I know many times I'll cut the TV on in the morning or while my kid is sleeping on the couch and I mute it because it's so loud, but it's still going to be loud when I turn it down, but with this TV I don't have that problem.* The apps pop up on the side when you select them and you can size your screen to where it doesn't cut it off while you're looking for something.* The slim frame makes it seem as if it's floating in the dark, you feel like you're at the theater.Picture:The quality is extremely good with HDMI, the streaming through WI-FI, and an antenna. With sports there is a big difference in this and the 60 hz, plus it has settings to make it even better. It takes a while for it to come on (compared to other TV's) as others have said, but honestly, why is everyone in such a hurry for their TV to come on? Are you really that impatient to where you can't wait 60 secs for TV when you're probably going to watch at least 30 mins?Apps:The only ones I really use are the Netflix and Amazon. Netflix is laid out the same as my PS3 and I like that, but it does seem to buffer slower and takes a while to get a clear  picture. The Amazon app, doesn't have a place to select your watchlist (that I've found) so you have to search or dig for anything you want to watch. I'll probably use my PS3 more for Amazon, but it is convenient to not have to turn on a separate device. Youtube works good playing from the phone most of the time and I really like that feature. I'll update on other apps once I've used more, but haven't had a chance or need yet.Antenna:It was easy to set up and scan for channels and the picture quality was amazing, not to mention I get better reception with it. It actually tells you what is on local channels, how long it will be on, and gives a short description, just like cable or satellite would.Sound:This is one spot where the TV doesn't hold up well against others. The sound isn't terrible it's just not great. I will definitely invest in a sound bar as soon as I can. The speakers are on the bottom BTW. UPDATE: If you change the sound from Surround to standard it sounds much less distorted and is still plenty loud enough.Stand:I used a wall mount, but the stand seemed very solid and was very heavy so I think it would have done just fine.Remote:I like the convenience of the Netflix button and Amazon Prime button and the buttons are easy to read and it's laid out fairly well. It's small and light and points very easily. You can have it facing any where near the TV and it will work.Hook ups:The hook ups are easy to get to on the side (which is good if you want to plug something in temporarily like a phone or computer) and even though the ones that are facing downward are hard to reach it makes it where if you're mounting to the wall you can get it very flush. There are more than enough hook ups to fit just about anyone's needs.Overall, I couldn't find a TV that beat this one for the features and price and I couldn't be happier. I just hope it last longer than my Sharp did.

Reviews.Title: Does the job for a decent price.
Reviews.Author: P. Miller "Chucklehead"
Reviews.Content: Not bad. Decent picture. Easy to set up. Bought for my parents who are in their 70s and needed a good TV, but are not comfortable with complicated technology and don't care that much about the quality of the picture. That having been said- the picture is solid, and there's little to complain about so far with this TV. Some of the content provider apps are decent (Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc.), though a bit clumsy to navigate. If you really want those, Roku is a better answer, not the built-in apps. Good secondary TV for a guest room, or other use- not for your main.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: William H Hall Jr
Reviews.Content: I ordered this via Amazon in late afternoon on July 15.  It arrived at my door before 3pm the very next day delivered with free shipping via Amazon Prime.  Less than 24 hours, ordered and running in my home.  Amazing Amazon.  Great picture, easy setup, just as advertised.  Had to upgrade cable box for HDMI output to get HD.  Again, newly installed, but as of today, everything is great and I would recommend it.  I would also recommend buying the two sided remote fro the keyboard aspect.  ish i had paid the extra $13 bucks and ordered it, but I didn't know what kind of remote came wuith TV and I couldn't find out on internet before I ordered it.  Buy this, a deal at less than $400 for 39" Smart TV 1080p 120Hz

Reviews.Title: Works great as a monitor too!
Reviews.Author: Anton Suhy
Reviews.Content: Bought this to use as the primary extended display for my wife's 15" Mac Book Pro which is also our primary media center.Connected over HDMI and running at 1080p, this screen look brilliant! Much brighter than our old TV which was hard to see when movies had dark scenes. Can't comment much on the "smart" side of the TV as we don't currently subscribe to any of the services (living overseas at the moment) but the picture quality is excellent!For the price, this IS the best 24" TV on Amazon right now.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, size and features at a best value price
Reviews.Author: Bob Carroll : Gooplusplus•com "multi-search, ...
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: What the BLEEP ???  Why is Amazon now combining all kinds of different size and model Vizio TVs in this single review thread? This is a disservice to users. It is confusing and inefficient.===========================================================================This 29 inch Vizio TV is the perfect size for viewing when the TV is sitting just beyond the foot-of-the-bed. The slim profile and light weight makes it easy to fit into tighter spaces without sacrificing quality or comfortable viewing.The TV is capable of remarkable color and clarity. However, it did take me a while to customize the settings for optimal color and picture quality. The default setup does not reflect the picture potential that is available with careful tweaking.My personal preference (your mileage/taste may vary):Advanced Picture -> Color Enhancement -> GM/BlueAdvanced Picture -> Luma -> MediumAdvanced Picture -> Backlight Control -> OffColor Temperature -> CoolPicture Mode -> Custom-- backlight -> 41-- brightness -> 37-- contrast -> 42-- color -> 51-- tint -> -2-- sharpness -> 10The remote control (RC-29") took some getting used to. I often like to control with "feel" instead of sight. Since the RC-29" thickness is uniform and the top and bottom are both rounded, it is easy to grab the remote in the dark and not know immediately whether you are holding it from the top or bottom. In contrast, the RC from my other Vizio 16" TV is, in most respects, more ergonomic. The RC-16" was longer so buttons were more spread out and easier to locate in the dark. The RC-16" also had a smooth battery bump on the back, making it much easier to determine top and bottom in the dark. I would have just used the old RC-16" to control my 29" Vizio except that the RC-29" had channel numbers at the very bottom, making it easier to select channels by "feel" than via the RC-16".I also use a tiny $60 Android/TV box about the size of a fat harmonica that connects to one of the two Vizio HDMI ports. It gives me full internet web access (via wi-fi) and access to plenty of great apps, essentially a small Android 4.2.2 computer using the TV as a 1280x720 pixel monitor. Although this box is capable of being powered by the Vizio USB port, I prefer to use an external powered USB hub. My favorite app is the XBMC media player allowing me to easily access, via wi-fi, my notebook's USB hard drive's 1TB of movies, MP3s, and various other media files.LINK: hypercube.us/forum/index.php?topic=1202.0The Vizio E291i-A1 29 inch HDTV would be a great deal even without its wi-fi capabilities. However, why would anyone buy a non-internet capable model when any savings would amount to just a few dollars?

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: Bought to replace my 7 year old 42 Vizio, this was almost half the price and a fantastic picture, you can't beat this for the price and it arrived in 2 days, ordered it on July 3rd and it was here by 10am July 5th

Reviews.Title: 39" smart tv is ruining my life! /s
Reviews.Author: RBR
Reviews.Content: This 39" smart tv is ruining my life! The picture is really great, and the netflix feature is making me stay indoors during these heat spells and watch a lot more tv than I would ever watch before. All kidding aside, the vizio is a great tv at a more than reasonable price. I have it in my smallish mancave and it is about 12' away. At this distance the picture is great and the size feels like a much bigger screen. The narrow frame means that this unit took up only a couple of inches more than the 32" tv it replaced. Setup was very easy, though there were minimal instructions on remote use. I ordered a qwerty remote to make searches on netflix easier. I would recommend this to my friends and would buy an other.Please note that the 4 stars instead of 5 is I only rate 5 for spectacular. This unit does what it is supposed to do and well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: yarid
Reviews.Content: I am grateful to them whoever make this TV. Its cheap in price but the picture quality is great like a expensive TV. It looks good, real slim. I just love this TV.

Reviews.Title: What a great TV!
Reviews.Author: shamrock reader
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV for my son.  It was a great value at $198 with free shipping.  He is able to easily stream Netflix, access his Facebook.  It does so much we haven't been able to browse all of the cool things it does.  Thinking of buying a second one.

Reviews.Title: A super good deal!
Reviews.Author: veritablevintage
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd Vizio tv that I have bought. They are very easy to set up and a very nice picture on all of my sets. This one is a smart tv which is AWESOME! No need for an extra device to watch Netflix and other media! My sister has a Samsung tv and Vizio beats them hands down!

Reviews.Title: TV works but WIFI does not
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: The TV itself seems to work fine, however, we have not been able to watch Netflix on it which is part of the reason we bought this TV.  It plays the movie for 5 minutes at the most then it says it's "Loading" constantly and just will not work.  It is impossible to watch anything on Netflix on this TV.  We thought at first it was our internet but it is not. We even connected an ethernet cord directly into the TV to see if that would work and it still didn't.  Our internet is plenty fast enough and Netflix works on our other TV through the Wii just fine.  When we run netflix on the Wii it never says it's loading except for in the beginning and will play the movie entirely.  We called Vizio and they said it must be that our internet isn't fast enough.  I really don't think that is the case though because why would netflix work on the Wii just fine?  I will update this post if/when we find a solution to the problem but at this point I am very disappointed in this “smart” TV.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Value: Feature packed, good quality, cheap
Reviews.Author: Edward Barnett
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a second TV, for the family room / play room.  I selected this model based on the Amazon reviews, then bounced over to Conzumer Reportz and found that it was one of the top rated models in this size.  Based on my first week's use, I have to agree with both the Amazon and CR reviewers.  The TV is super light weight, and therefore a breeze to mount on a wall (it also comes with a plastic "foot" that lets you set it on a cabinet or table if you want).  Setup was very simple -- it connected to my router through the built-in WiFi connection, and registering the TV to my online media accounts (e.g., Amazon Prime for TV/movies) took a matter of seconds.  The picture quality is very good -- better than I expected for this price.  The sound is OK -- good for a second TV, but if I planned to watch a lot of movies on this set I'd probably hook it up to better speakers.  The web content apps (Amazon Prime, YouTube, Netflix, etc.) work well and easily, but the load times are significantly slower than on my PC, and typing on the on-screen soft keyboard is slow.  The TV does not have a general purpose browser, so you're limited to the apps Vizio supports.  The Sony Blu-ray player I hooked up the Vizio TV has a browser, so the lack of a browser in the TV set itself wasn't a big deal for me, but I wish it were clearer in the product description (references to Internet and WiFi led me to assume I could get onto the Internet from the TV).Bottom line:  A very good quality picture, OK sound, with built-in wifi and easy-to-use apps, all for around two fifty make this an exceptional value.  An excellent choice in this size class.

Reviews.Title: Solid, Low-Cost TV
Reviews.Author: Craig B. Kaminsky "ImageAid"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice Television. The built-in apps are handy for me since I use Netflix, Hulu Plus and Amazon. This allowed me to move a DVD/Blue-Ray player to another television and free up space around this TV, which was in a more crowded spot.It's nice looking, and I particularly like how the stand is constructed.My only complaint, thus far, is that the volume/speakers is mediocre at best. As with many of these low-cost TVs, sound quality is at a minimum.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Wilson
Reviews.Content: I chose this unit over slightly larger and slightly cheaper Samsung models because it has a 120Hz refresh rate and seemed like the most appealing option in my $400 range. I wasn't expecting to use any of the built in apps but I decided to signup for a Netflix free trial because it was so convenient (it has its own button on the remote! Along with Amazon Instant Video and M-GO.)

Reviews.Title: nice flat screen
Reviews.Author: Serafin D. Arce
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good flat screen for the money.  I have two complaints.  The picture is not bright enough to avoid distortion from the glare coming in from the windows.  The sound quality leaves a lot to be desired but since I have it hooked up to my amplifier it is o.k.

Reviews.Title: Quick set-up
Reviews.Author: Randall Laws
Reviews.Content: Worked as advertised right out of the box.  I was amazed with how light it is.  I'm using it mainly as a second computer monitor connected to a laptop, and so far everything is working great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: William Tucker
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with this product. It was delivered as expected in perfect order. I have no negative issues, and will most likely order another, maybe larger!

Reviews.Title: Great deal on an AWESOME LED
Reviews.Author: A. Saunders "als10point"
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and a breeze to set up!  Replaced an older Samsung 42" plasma and, wow, what a difference in picture quality!

Reviews.Title: Awsome picture! I
Reviews.Author: jeffrey p. kidd
Reviews.Content: I just watched OZ the Powerful & It looked like it was 3D. Setup was a breeze. You can't find a better TV for the money.

Reviews.Title: The TV is a masterful piece
Reviews.Author: greeneink
Reviews.Content: As a Prime member, I got $10 off, but it is well worth the price and works well with a wifi hub. I have six items connected to my hub and two of these TVs are part of it and outside of the fact that it hangs up from time to time and I have to tell it I'm still watching a show when it wants to shut itself down, it's a helluva buy. I love the fact that they work so well with Hulu, Youtube, Netflix, et al and the remotes are easy to operate. The instructions for how to set it up are very easy and almost self-explanatory if you have any technological ability whatsoever. Instructions come in layperson's language and are not confusing at all.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and great price
Reviews.Author: Bob's Computer Service
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear picture and great sound. The smart tv works great. I will be buy a couple for my kids. Well worth the 200.

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware ... get THIS model and not a "similar" one
Reviews.Author: T&S; Enterprises "th"
Reviews.Content: This TV is super!But... leave out the little bitty " i " after the E241 and you won't get Wi-Fi (and IEEE) and it won't be "smart."  You'll probably get it cheaper, but the tears will flow.Likewise, don't go for the smaller 22" screen at the cheaper price... you'll again be disappointed and may miss the change in product model definition that follows clicking on the BOX for that item.  RTP  ... read the picture (problem)!Interesting also is the remote.  Since there's no more Bluetooth in the Vizio Corral, one may expect pointing directly at the TV.  Not so, this remote seems to have side-lights (IR)... works however.  No keyboard is not terrible, the menu has a logical keypad built in.  The smart part works like you'd expect, only better.  Our Wi-Fi router is not extra special but the HD picture flows through with no noticeable difference in that and the wired connect... also built into the TV.  Put the wire in and the Wi-Fi switches automatically off and the wired connect comes up.  Vice versa as well, once the setup is complete.Finally a small screen with ALL the bells and whistles.  (Good work, Vizio ...Six stars!)

Reviews.Title: A Tale of 2 Televisions
Reviews.Author: William Hitchcock "Tech savvy old man"
Reviews.Content: I chose this particular television (Vizio E320i-AO) because of the review it received at CNET and also my son recommended Vizio since he has 3 of them. The tv arrived quickly (thanks Amazon Prime), package was undamaged and I waiting a couple days before I installed it. I set it up and it seemed as if all was fine. A couples days later I noticed a stuck pixel towards the upper left corner. I was hoping it would go away after a few on off cycles, but several days later it was still stuck in the purple mode. Then one night while watching a program, I went to adjust the volume but it didn't work, I then tried the channel up/down button and got no response. I tried to turn it off and could not...even tried the off button on the side. I had to unplug the tv and reconnect power before things would work again. I notified Amazon and it was an amazingly painless process to return the tv and get a replacement. The new Vizio E320i-AO arrived in 2 days and I removed the first one from the wall and set up the second. Now, this is where I noticed a difference. Even though both televisions had the exact same model numbers on the back, there were differences between the 2. The first was lighter, had buttons on the upper left side and the energy sticker said $6 a year average cost to operate. The second was a bit heavier, had a thicker plastic back (I had to buy longer M4 screws to attach to the same wall mount brackets). The buttons on the second tv were on the lower left side and the energy sticker indicated $8 per year average to operate. I decided to look at images of the Vizio E320i-AO online and all that I could find were the same as the second tv that I got. Even the box for the second tv was different than the first one. I don't understand, unless Amazon was trying to get rid of old stock??? Amazon, can you answer that one? Amazon also offered me $30 credit if I would keep the  defective first tv...which I declined.Now for the review of the second set. It works perfectly, the colors are great, the remote never fails and the Vizio apps are pretty good. CNET's review was spot on for the TV, I suggest you watch it. The backlit LED is nice, but it does make the TV a bit thicker....but who watches from the side? Hanging it the wall is easy as the tv is less than 20lbs. Viewing angles are decent and I haven't noticed and blurring or tearing, but really haven't watched anything that would really test it either. The wireless connection works extremely well for me, but I also connected a wireless router to my LAN just to serve the tv. The sound is adequate, but I would like to get a sound bar with a wireless sub...that would make this tv a 10 out of 10.Overall, I am quite pleased with the television and would indeed recommend this set to others who want a 32" tv in a smaller room or perhaps a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: great tv...loving it....;we like the wi-fi access and the size is great for watching sports, etc....good sound.....would make the purchase again....

Reviews.Title: Audio...ummm
Reviews.Author: Ruthie
Reviews.Content: *This review is for the 24" tv*As far as visual goes, this is an awesome tv. I love the connectivity with NetFlix, Yahoo, Amazon, etc. The one thing that drove me crazy until I pulled out an old set of pc speakers was the sound. I found that the "standard" sound, set to "rock" was better than the "surround." We're getting a sound bar soon, but until then, these pc speakers are it...but if we didn't have them, I'd be really irritated.So, lesson is...if you don't have some kind of external sound system (it has digital and analogue connections), you're going to grind your teeth...that is if audio is an issue for you at all.Other than that though, it's an awesome tv.

Reviews.Title: excellent tv.
Reviews.Author: SueMo
Reviews.Content: Installed in kitchen.Perfect size, clean design. Works great with awesome sound and pic quality.Took only seconds to set up smart tv and wireless.

Reviews.Title: High Quality at a Great Value
Reviews.Author: Chassica Kirchhoff
Reviews.Content: The features of this tv, the first my husband and I have purchased in many years, are comparable to much more expensive products at a fraction of the price. In addition, its design is attractive and the display is crisp. My only complaint is that the packaging appeared to have been opened when we received it via fedex, although all the components were included.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: session62
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived within 2 days. It was easy to set up and we had scanned in the channels, all within 15 minutes. We love all the apps that came preloaded. We are thinking about purchasing another one for the office.

Reviews.Title: Very clear picture
Reviews.Author: Rick Perkins
Reviews.Content: This TV is great!  I like the fact that the black plastic around the edge is very thin and the picture is very clear.  Great buy.

Reviews.Title: TV for sewing room
Reviews.Author: B. DENTON "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: Great purchase!  Now I can sew and watch golf tournaments at the same time.Great picture, easy to use, great price.  Might purchase another!

Reviews.Title: best bedroom tv on the market
Reviews.Author: Andrew Glinski
Reviews.Content: i only own vizio products.  just got this lil smart tv for my bedroom. its the perfect price, size and does everything.  I cut the cord back in 2009.  just wifi tv for me. i own the vizio costar too .  love it

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good size
Reviews.Author: Jay Bingham
Reviews.Content: Needed something perfect for my bedroom and this TV fit the bill.  The picture quality is solid and it has all the smart tv functions you'll need.

Reviews.Title: Good tv at a good price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd vizio tv that we have purchased and used.  The picture is very good and the installation was very easy.  Everything has worked as it was intended.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Victoria Klein
Reviews.Content: Just the TV for my boys' rooms, easy to set up and to regulate time-of-use when accessed thru my AirPort Extreme!

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: kw
Reviews.Content: This model met all that I expected.  I was looking at Samsung's SmartTV, but I have a lot of those extra features in my XBOX.  This was the right price, the right features and the quality of the picture is excellent.  Only downside is the start up seems a bit long.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is great, smart tv is very chunky and laggy
Reviews.Author: DANI
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for $700 on amazon, and its beautiful, clean design,with really nice sound for in unit speakers. My only qualm with the tv is the smart tv software is very laggy and slow. It does work fine and you can watch hulu netflix etc, but it just doesnt feel very nice to use. I would highly recommend buying the qwerty remote for this TV its only like 20 bucks on amazon and it helps when logging into your streaming accounts, or using the facebook app. unfortunately no HBO Go on here yet. All around for the price this is a great buy compared to the competitors whose prices are significantly higher.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the money
Reviews.Author: santajp
Reviews.Content: I'm no tech snob, but after getting burned by my last bargain TV purchase, I researched this time, and I'm happy to report that this one lives up to the great reviews! It was easy to set up and easy to use. Picture, color, sound quality and TV interface are high quality. My only complaints are minor: the remote is small, with small, hard-to-read and -feel buttons. It's handy to have a smart TV, but this TV's built-in interface for Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, etc., is not as complete or as easy to use as the Roku Box interface.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: DWB
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new VIZIO tv. The picture and sound are quite acceptable. It comes with lots of great features. I had to return my first one due to a purple haze that covered part of the screen...almost like someone ran a magnet over it or something. Other than that, the wireless connectivity seems to be a bit weaker than some other devices I have had in the same place. But when the Internet connects, it is extremely fast. Netflix starts a movie in about a second. I'd recommend this tv to anyone despite a couple minor limitations.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, great value, meets expectations
Reviews.Author: Seattle Reviewer
Reviews.Content: Needed a small TV for a bedroom & wanted it to have network access for content streaming.  Though the specs say it is not DLNA certified it did come pre-loaded with a Media app which easily & immediately accessed my content server software on our home network (via hardwire Ethernet).  Everything was fast & easy to get going, and it allowed Internet access even though I skipped the registration info during initial first-time setup.  Picture is good, remote is competent though most button labels are hard-to-read tiny, and on-screen browsing of menus is reasonable.  Only thing I don't like is the easy-access buttons on the remote for pay services labeled Amazon, Netflix, etc.  We don't use those services, and don't really care for that sort of corporate collusion. Having those apps pre-loaded in the TV is more than enough.

Reviews.Title: White balance
Reviews.Author: DanT "Dan"
Reviews.Content: I really like the TV. It's actually replacing a old 25 yo tv that is in my bathroom.Sound is OK for a LED tv. Not much bass, but very clear sound. The only thing I haven't been able to do yet is get a good balance of light and the balance of things with a lot of white on the screen. I'm still adjusting. I haven't noticed the same problem with my 55" Panasonic 3-d TV. I wish there were an adjustment for white balance! I've been using it a week now and am happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Everett Daviage
Reviews.Content: I'm not an expert, but the TV was exactly what I needed. It fit the budget and the room and has a crisp picture. Not too overly complicated to use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for price
Reviews.Author: Max A. Geyer
Reviews.Content: I've only had the TV for about a week, but am very impressed with its performance. Excellent price for the picture size and the many state-of-the-art features it offers. High quality video and sound, which makes it excellent for movie viewing. I love the internet features (Wi-Fi, ethernet connections), since my wife and I watch many Netflix movies.

Reviews.Title: Use THX Setup
Reviews.Author: Richard Tomei
Reviews.Content: Use the THX Video Setup.  You will get a GREAT picture.  The remote control is worthless but, good enough to set up your universal remote.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a bedroom/office/den
Reviews.Author: Larry Clever
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for an HDTV for a bedroom/office/den then this is a great choice. It has great video quality and is all you need in terms of resolution for this size television. The availability of apps on this TV puts it well ahead of other tvs at this size and price range.

Reviews.Title: beginning to wonder if it's really worth it...
Reviews.Author: Caitlin M Daniel
Reviews.Content: Initially, i ordered this from Amazon and received a broken TV. I had to immediately return it. I bought a new one from a local retailer instead; however, it's already had picture issues and has to be replaced by Vizio since i no longer have a picture. When it does work, it's awesome, but with the initial shipping issues and now the functionality issues, I'm beginning to wonder if it's really worth it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Vizio E500
Reviews.Author: William Brian Huskey
Reviews.Content: I bought an RCA 46" just before Christmas of last year.  What a mistake.  Went bad just after the warranty ran out (1 yr.)  Got the Vizio 50" from Amazon.  Beautiful colors and clarity.  Great Sound.  Linked it to internet for Netflix and emails.  I finally came into the 21st Century.  Highly recommend this Vizio product.

Reviews.Title: Great for Internet services.
Reviews.Author: Walter Carow
Reviews.Content: Use for Pandora, Netflix and others.Analog audio nice to stereo in place of just digital since speakers have no bass.Fits perfectly in existing cabinet.Wide angle viewing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV - Great Value
Reviews.Author: jobiemac
Reviews.Content: Nothing negative to say about this TV. It has all the features I wanted/needed. The only problem I have is that it turned out to be too small for the I had for it. Yes, I measured first. The slime frame is great and the features are easy to use.  Sound was pretty good and the picture very clear and crisp. The remote is clunky. BEWARE IT DOES NOT COME WITH A QWERTY KEYBOARD REMOTE. Amazon may have updated the description, but when I purchased it the description said it was included. If you are on the fence, buy it. You won't find a better TV for $700.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever.
Reviews.Author: Elisa
Reviews.Content: UPS just delivered my new purchase VIZIO E320i-A0 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV. Talk about happy. Setup was a breeze.  After comparing pricing at all the store that sells this product, Amazon was the best choice.  Not only was the price in my budget I also got a $10.00 promo discount.  I purchased on Saturday and got on Monday.  It took on longer than 25 minutes to open the box to viewing. I'm a very happy customer. Thank you again Amazon.E.Pagan

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 32-inch Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Eva
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for bedroom.  Picture quality is excellent.  Easy set up.  It's super light-weight, like a PC monitor rather than a TV.

Reviews.Title: Really GREAT for the price.....
Reviews.Author: R. Jones "Retired&LovingIT;"
Reviews.Content: I love VIZIO TVs. First, the price is right. The setup, even with the Smart APPs is really easy. Be sure and have your login codes for your router, Netflix, Amazon, and other online services you have.Picture is bright and clear. Power savings is unreal......$6.00 a year to operate!.....

Reviews.Title: Excellent 32" TV at good value
Reviews.Author: Mr. Shopper
Reviews.Content: Purchased this set few weeks ago to use in a small sitting room.  Set up was a breeze and this being our first LED TV, the picture is outstanding!  This set is connected to Verizon Fios service without a set top box and it picked up over 100 channels in our location - very impressed.Features are excellent and some of the apps are rather handy.  About the only complaint is like many others expressed - remote buttons are simply too small.  (That cost the overall evaluation 1 star.)  But I ended up buying a universal remote and that took care of the issue.  We've since moved the set to a bedroom - a location much more suited for this type of use.  In its place we just purchased the exact same set but in a larger 42" and that should arrive soon.  We expect the same excellent experience and quality as shown by this so far.I'm very impressed with the Vizio brand.  The product seems well made, offers excellent value and makes a fine alternative to equally impressive but more costly brands (i.e. Samsung).  Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Picture was as nice as expected, wireless connection is strong (stronger than my iPad and my Galaxy S2), Netflix, Amazon and apps work smoothly.  I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: Nice bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Todd Goldberg
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for a bedroom and for this use it's the perfect size, nice picture, adequate sound.  For a living room or den would need a bigger screen and a sound bar or surround sound stereo system.  As other reviewers state the remote is a little small and the TV is a little slow to respond and start.  And the smart tv interface is not the smoothest.  But for the price it works great and has an excellent selection of online channels (Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, etc).  The remote has buttons for Netflix and Amazon but would like to see one for Hulu as well.  It also has a button for a new/upcoming service called MGo that doesn't even seem to exist yet.  Has plenty of inputs for BluRay player, computer, Ipod/Apple TV/Roku or whatever else you need.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Sometimes sound doesn't work...
Reviews.Author: DeAnn Cowman "Iowa Beach Dreamer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv. Really like having Netflix and Amazon Prime Videos available through the tv. Picture is great, sound is great ... when it turns on.  I've had this tv for about 3 months now and maybe 6 times so far - at random times - the sound won't come on when I turn on the tv.  Turn the tv off, wait a few seconds and turn back on, the sound is fine. Will need to contact Vizio to see what's going on.  But overall happy with the purchase. Would've given 5 stars without the sound issue.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: I replaced an older 32 inch lcd which was actually larger. This product came on time and left on my front porch with vizio box for all to see (security?). TV was easy to install (square mount) and plug into cable. Awesome picture. Better than my samsung plasma 63 inch (2012). It took awhile for wi-fi to connect. I think it is my router, not the tv.Highly recommended and well worth the price. I should have selected the 39 inch because it is the size of my old 32 inch (larger border). Don't pass this one up!

Reviews.Title: smart tv, smart purchase
Reviews.Author: LJ
Reviews.Content: After quite a bit of time researching smart tvs, I decided to go with this Vizio. Amazon reviews helped me make my final decision.I ordered it on Monday and I had it on Wednesday, I didn't expect it to arrive that soon!  I'm amazed at how happy I am with this tv, especially for a tv well under $300.00. It comes with the basic instructions for setting up, which are ample. If you need more detailed instructions, you need to go the the Vizio web site and print the instructions for the specific model.That is my only minor complaint.The picture is great, so 720p is enough for me. The sounds is ok. I know some complained about the sound quality but it's fine. I did decide to connect the tv to my stereo system which very easy to do. The basic instructions clearly indicate how to make all your connections. I had a couple of questions when I set up Hulu, tech support is there 24/7 and I found them to be very helpful.I definately recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i-AO LED Smart TV
Reviews.Author: D. W. Shirey
Reviews.Content: This is a nice TV. It is lightweight, compact, and the LED screen makes the operation extremely cost efficient.The picture is very good for a 720p, good color and sharp focus. The only problem I have had is connecting to the wifi. Occasionally it won't connect unless I use the network menu to locate the wi-fi signal, and test the connection. At first this was annoying,  but now is only a minor inconvenience. This is the only reason for the 4 stars, otherwise I would have given it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for my Needs
Reviews.Author: Glory
Reviews.Content: This tv is perfect for my apartment! Its just the right size for our small living room. I was worried that I would have to connect it through ethernet to my network but wifi works great! It probably helps that my router is in the same room no more than 10 feet away from the tv itself.I also saw a few reviews about the sound not being so great, but I've found it to be pretty good and it can definitely get loud. I've only had it up to about 25 which I think is about 1/4 if not only 1/3 of how loud it can actually be.Set up was simple and the apps work well. The only thing I don't like is that the Amazon Instant video app only shows up as a side bar so its kind of hard to see and navigate.If you're looking for a 32" smart tv, this is certainly the one.

Reviews.Title: One of the best 32" HDTVs on the market.
Reviews.Author: C. Andew Currie
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting an HDTV for some time now, but the prices weren't in my budget. Up until this point we had a small tube style TV with built in DVD player we occasionally used, but I wanted something more. I did a lot of research on HDTVs in the 32" range. I was originally tempted by a TCL slim profile TV, but the price shot up over $100 before I took the plunge. I had looked into a Sceptre TV and a a Vizio too.I decided on Vizio because their TVs seem to have universally good reviews, with good build quality and good picture quality. This particular TV is one of Cnet's top picks for the 32" class. I chose to spend a little more on this Smart TV because I was interested in the built-in apps and wifi connectivity. We don't have cable so being able to use apps to watch the things we want VS paying more for a bunch of channels I don't want sounded appealing. I got mine on sale here for $289. It took about a week to arrive with Super Saver shipping (I didn't have prime yet), but arrived undamaged.I'm very happy I made this purchase. First of all, the picture quality is terrific. Really sharp, great colors and shadows, no distortion in fast action sequences (I watched the Avengers and Transformers to put it to the test). At may be 720p but at this size you can't tell the difference between 720p and 1080p. I can't at least.Build quality is very good to. It seems nice and sturdy and even managed to survive being knocked over by a cat without a scratch (thank goodness, that was day 2 of ownership!). I also like the slim frame, it makes it look more elegant.Sound quality is good I think. Much less tinny than the Sceptre I was looking at. I'll probably buy some dedicated speakers at some point (I was thinking maybe the Sony SSF-5000), but its perfectly adequate.We still don't have cable, but I its not a problem. I got Netflix which has been great. Most of the shows I want to watch are available. I also just got Prime, which works well, but doesn't have as much selection that you don't have to pay rental fees for. For example, Futurama costs $1 per episode with Prime, but happily Netflix has all 9 seasons and all 4 movies. But I digress. It has a nice selection of apps including Youtube and hulu. Wireless streaming with Youtube doesn't work well in HD (takes forever to load), but Netflix and Prime are well optimized for streaming. The video quality is great most of the time and they adjust to keep the video from stopping to buffer most of the time.I ordered the tv with a couple AmazonBasics HDMI cables and Sony BDPS185 blu-ray player. Haven't actually played a blu-ray yet, but boy my DVDs never looked so good. The difference between composite and HDMI connection is profound.I've had the TV for about a month now and couldn't be happier. It fits perfectly in our small apartment and movie night is much more enjoyable, plus catching up on all the shows I've missed is awesome. Assuming it holds up, I'll definitely buy Vizio again.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E500i-A1
Reviews.Author: debbie
Reviews.Content: I really can't describe this television.  It is simply the best.  No cons about it..  I would absouteley recommend this set to anyone looking to spend their hard earned money on an HDTV.

Reviews.Title: So So Satisfied!!!
Reviews.Author: ChasnDrmz
Reviews.Content: VIZIO knocked it out of the ballpark yet again!!!! This is an AWESOME TV for any tech savy person (being this is a SMART TV), especially if it's for a bedroom due to the size. I always do my research before making any hasty decisions and I am so glad I purchased this tv. It was a breeze to set up and we were even checking out a Netflix movie within 30 minutes out of the box.Also just to clear up a previous review.....this tv DOES have a sleep timer setting.If you are wondering should I or shouldn't I buy this tv definitely go for it!!! You won't be sorry!I am looking already at purchasing the same tv just a larger size for my livingroom!!! Sooo YES I would buy this tv again!!! Keep up the good work VIZIO!!!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E500i-A1 50-inch 120Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Clarence McCallum
Reviews.Content: My rating for this TV is short and sweet; and  I love the picture and the set up was very easy!Clarence

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This is my second Vizio and am so far very happy with it an the first one.  NIce and crisp, bright and great sounds.  Much more affordable than Samsung which seems to get really good reviews too. But for the price difference, check out Vizio too.  Good luck! Bill, Salem, Oregon

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Martin J. Sinclair
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV after looking for several weeks and I am writting this because of the previous reviews.  For the price we are very satisfied with picture quality, sound, internet availability, etc.  Very satisified with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: vizio 500i
Reviews.Author: 49kazmo
Reviews.Content: The tv is great. had to wait for the back order to come in but it arrived shortly after x-mas undamaged.

Reviews.Title: So much better than expected
Reviews.Author: srq Ev
Reviews.Content: The delivery was right on time and the set up was very easy.  The picture quality is outstanding.  We added a sound bar and that makes it even better.  It was a great choice

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: M. Wright
Reviews.Content: We give this 5 stars for picture quality, ease of use and set up, sound quality and it's so light in weight!  We have a wireless LAN in the house and the TV connects easily and streams 98% of the time with no hesitation or lag.  We really enjoy watching our favorite shows via Neflix streaming or Hulu Plus, with few or no commercials for a minor additional cost!  Much more bang for your buck this way vs. cable.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E320i-AO 32-inch LED Smart TV
Reviews.Author: R. King
Reviews.Content: Great color,easy to set-up,just the right size for an small bedroom.Can go right to netflix and Amazon with the remote.Only negative comment is the buttons on the remote are very close togeather,could be improved.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: JOHN W. BLEICH
Reviews.Content: Bought the smart tv and glad I did. I am very impressed with how easy everything was to set up and how quickly it found my wifi. The picture is excellent and I'm quite pleased with everything overall.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Donald Greenwell "Red Bandit"
Reviews.Content: It has good color, you have to set the settings yourself to get the best picture or sound it is a great tv

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E320i-A0 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Frank B
Reviews.Content: Look at many TV's. I liked this one for the features compared to price. Only downside so far is can't get many channels without a cable box from Comcast. Otherwise need an antenna. TV Setup and use are easy. THe picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Luv the remote
Reviews.Author: Mary107
Reviews.Content: A nice size smart TV for our bedroom. Luv the netflix button right on the remote. A little slow on start up but understandable as it has to link to the wireless. The TV is clear and a quick response in loading my Queue.

Reviews.Title: Greatest deal ever
Reviews.Author: Marc Fisher
Reviews.Content: I was allowed to purchase a 50 inch tv but had to stick within a budget. I found this tv on amazon and waited for a long time for it to come in stock so i could purchase it.I am not disappointed at all. The tv is easy to use, great picture and the 120hz is a rare find in this price. The tv looks great due to its thin bezel. I also wanted a tv that gets amazon instant since i am a prime member. This tv works very well and I like that the show stays on while i browse amazon titles.I could not be happier with this tv- unless my wife lets me buy the 60 inch version!!!The only downside is that i have a lot of videos in my amazon watchlist and this tv does not show the watchlist when i connect to amazon. Maybe that'll be fixed in an update.Great tv. Vizio has really come through with a great tv.***update 01/07/13*** Shortly after setting the tv up my wife began to complain the tv had an odor to it. I noticed after a little bit that the tv had an electrical, plastic smell. We contacted customer service through vizio and they were great to work with. Vizio will be replacing our tv. Hopefully that one wont smell because my wife and i really like this tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice product for the money
Reviews.Author: ABK
Reviews.Content: VIZIO E320i-A0 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV is worth the money so fardisplay is ok and sound not so

Reviews.Title: Great Economical TV
Reviews.Author: R. Hickox
Reviews.Content: Purchased for guest bedroom.  Works and looks great.  Easy step-by-step internet TV setup once connected to internet.  I had originally used the built in wifi to connect to my wireless router that was 60 ft. away through 5-walls into my office where the router is.  Although this worked and I was able to make an internet connection, the playback of on-line video from Netflix, Amazon, and HULU was slow and caused pauses in playback.  Once I hooked up to my available wired coax cable already in this room from my router, all internet video playback became normal.  I don't blame the built in wifi.  I think the distance and number of walls the signal had to travel though from my wireless router was the issue in my case.

Reviews.Title: Good picture for price
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a 6 year old 20" Magnavox in the bedroom that was on its last leg. My first surprise was that this TV was noticeably lighter than the smaller unit it was replacing. Very nice. Mounting and connection was straight forward and hassle free,although it might be a pain to get it hung on the wall if I were trying to do it alone,but that is true of all TV's this size. Picture is as good as the Samsung that resides in the living room,so no complaints on that front. I would rate the sound of the unit as acceptable,especially for a bedroom application. Not all is rosy however. On two separate occasions,I have turned it on and the sound has been absent. Both times turning it off and back on has solved the problem,and I'm hoping it doesn't become a frequent occurrence. Now on to the biggest problem that I'm having with the unit. Netflix! The TV only connects to Netflix every 10th attempt or so. I've tried every fix recommended on the Internet to no avail. I've even tried connecting via Ethernet cable,but the result was the same. It should be mentioned that the TV has no problem connecting to wifi,I just tried the cable out of desperation. We use Netflix via the Wii in another room without issue,so the problem definitely lies with the TV. Hulu+ also refused to connect the one time that I tried it,but we don't use that service,so I've not experimented farther with that one. All of the other apps seem to work well. I enjoy watching full size HD YouTube videos. All in all I'm happy with the unit for the price paid($299) and would recommend it for regular TV viewing. The "smart" features of the unit could use a little work. If that was sorted out,I would give it 5 stars. As it stands,4 is the best I can give.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality, good price
Reviews.Author: Longhorn
Reviews.Content: I'm just a few weeks into my new purchase, but so far this TV is great.  The picture quality is very clear, and the built-in WiFi allows for quick and easy access to Amazon Instant Video and Netflix. I would recommend buying this TV.

Reviews.Title: Far beyond our expectations!
Reviews.Author: Carrie Campbell
Reviews.Content: This was so easy to set up even for us "50" somethings!!! It puts everything on one remote! High quality product and so glad we purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!  Built in Wifi!  Simple to setup and use.
Reviews.Author: M. Dunning "fedexav8r"
Reviews.Content: Nice picture easy set up and the remote has a Netflix, Hulu and Amazon buttons make it super easy to access these services.  This is my first smart TV (built in wifi).  I bought it to replace our old kitchen TV and the whole family loves it.

Reviews.Title: TV never worked properly and Customer Support was frustrating and of no help
Reviews.Author: R. Hiemforth
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, I had trouble connecting wirelessly.  Streaming devices located adjacent to the TV worked well but the TV connection was always poor quality and frequently failed completely.  I called customer support and was told that, of course, it was all my fault (my router was too far from the set).  I relocated the router closer to the set - same problem and same response from customer support.  After more calls to customer support, I gave-up on trying to use the wireless functions.Then the audio ceased to function when using either of the two HDMI inputs.  After several more calls to customer support, I was told that the problem was, most likely, a faulty circuit board and that a technician would have to come out to replace it,  However - before they would do that, I had to hook-up to the internet for a few days so they could download the latest firmware.  I relocated the TV and connected it directly, by wire, to the router.  I kept it connected to the internet by wire and logged the TV onto the internet several times over the next few days because customer support said it might help trigger the firmware update.  No luck, after six days of wired internet connection, the firmware did not update.When I called customer support, it was back to square one - as though I had never called before.  The customer service agents seem to have been drilled to blame, delay and sidestep the customer.  My experience with this TV has been that it has poor build quality and that customer service amounts only to repeated lengthy waits on the phone that result in no support at all.I recommend against the purchase of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised with a few hiccups
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: The only two things I have complaints about are the wifi connectivity and the remote.  It would be great if the remote had a slide out keyboard or something.  The way you input words into the tv is really unimpressive.  Pretty much the only option is to use the multi directional pad and select each letter one by one.  My sony tv lets you dial in letters with a system that is similar to the way that text messaging works on phones without full qwerty keyboard.  Secondly, sometimes that wifi mysteriously needs to be reconnected through the settings menu.  I also forgot to mention that sometimes it takes more then one click of the remote to power up the tv.  I don't know if that is a problem with my remote or the tv.  Other then that, this tv works as advertised.  I actually have 2 of these so that should tell you that the aforementioned issues that aren't deal breakers.  Great tv overall.

Reviews.Title: THIS SMART TV HAS NETWORKING ISSUES!  DON'T BUY FOR STREAMING!
Reviews.Author: J. Russell Fruhwirth "Russ"
Reviews.Content: TV picture quality is average/normal for these newer HDTV's.  I shelled out $50 extra for this 'smart' version of this TV, and Netflix streaming works only about 15% of the time.  Yes, I've contacted Vizio support, they just had me reset the TV, reboot my router, reconfigure my TV, that's it.  Yes, I have a 40Mb/20Mb very good Internet connection, and a 802.11n home wifi network.  Neither of these are problem, since none of our other devices in the house have any problem streaming from Netflix whatsoever.  As a matter of fact, whenever I have Netflix problems on this Vizio TV, I just plug in my laptop and stream through that without any kind of problem at all.  I'd call Vizio and have them send a replacement, but the truth is that I just don't have the time.  So, just dropped $35 for another Chromecast and we'll call it good.  Cheers!

Reviews.Title: Bought four sets, no problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was my first Vizio TV.  I have since bought  three more in various sizes from Amazon.  They are indeed very Smart!

Reviews.Title: Screen finish shiny
Reviews.Author: amalia litos
Reviews.Content: Although the TV is described as LED, the screen finish is almost as shiny as a plasma.  This is an issue for high light rooms.Also, after the wireless internet features did not connect, I contacted Vizio about the issue and I was told that unless your modem is within 30' of the TV, it will probably not connect and there is nothing that can be done about it.  This should have been stated in the description.Lastly, when the TV did not connect to my DVR for programming, I was told by Vizio that I needed to take it off the wall bracket and connect it to another DVR to test whether it was my DVR which was the issue or the TV itself, and that Vizio would not send a tech out until I did as they instructed!!  As I found this demand to be unacceptable, I asked for a supervisor who directed me through a few steps to get the programming up and running.Positives are that the TV has a compact, streamlined look.

Reviews.Title: Easy TV for my mom to set up and use with no fuss and all the features
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for my mom who has not had a new tv since 1998 or so - she gets VERY frustrated by anything that is new technology and difficult to set up. I was really worried that this TV would scare her off from a flat screen.However, I literally removed this TV from the box for her, added the piece for a stand, and stood it up immediately. It is lightweight and you can set it up anywhere in the house. It was just the right size by about 4 inches that she could fit it in her old TV cabinet from the 1990's! We plugged it in and plugged her cable into it - within 10 mins of downloading channels, we were all watching it. The remote is easy to understand and use - not complicated. Last, but not least, my sister helped her setup the wifi and watch Netflix. She is now officially in 2013 with her smart tv!The price was right through amazon as we chose one that said it had slight cosmetic damage (we could not find it anywhere.) I am considering buying another for myself just to use in the office or kitchen. A+++

Reviews.Title: After a week, still happy
Reviews.Author: J. Swartz
Reviews.Content: Built in wireless access to your router? Kindof has a built in "roku" media box inside of it that handles all the stuff roku does. Picture quality is very good, the remote buttons are small. My only beef is this tv comes with no STAND that holds it up. Its designed with this little plastic piece in the back that keeps it from falling over but because of this the tv is angled slightly up which prevents you from watching it head on. If it had a proper stand like most leds I' give it a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Dont bother if you want to use netflix
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "erik"
Reviews.Content: Tried everything to get netflix to work. It would work for 5 mins, then cut out. So annoying. Lots of Internet research came up with vizio is falsely advertising netflix as being supported. Each company blames the other. Sent this TV back and bought a Samsung instead. Miraculously netflix works now! Probably will never try a vizio again.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: traveler
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised, senior mother has no problem in using it. Good picture, easy set up, works with my wireless. I would recommended it.

Reviews.Title: Slow Internet Apps and Netflix App does not work
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: Very excited when I received the tv. I primarily bought the tv for the Amazon Instant Videos and Netflix App. Unfortunately, once I powered the tv on and connected it to the internet, all of the apps EXCEPT the Amazon Instant Videos and Netflix app were not connecting to the internet/working. Luckily, the next day the Amazon app began to work.  The apps on the tv and loading takes awhile. I have called customer service for Netflix and Vizio to resolve the Netflix problem and both companies point the finger that it is not their system. So since we couldn't get my Netflix working for over a week, then it makes more sense to return the product and try out Samsung. Such a nice looking tv, yet the apps were pretty basic, (except youtube) and Netflix doesn't work. I would not recommend this TV if you plan on using it primarily for Netflix. But if you don't mind that part, then the tv is cool.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: CAB601
Reviews.Content: TV has a great picture. And the Netflix and Amazon Prime work great. Price was very reasonable. I would recommend this TV to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Good picture during bright scenes, OK color after calibration
Reviews.Author: brian_in_charlotte "brian_in_charlotte"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box the picture is washed out and colors seem off.  Using the Disney blu-ray calibration disk helped, but colors are still not as rich as other options.  Clarity of picture is excellent during normal or bright scenes.  Has trouble during dark scenes though.  Side viewing is OK, but quickly washes out the colors even more.Audio through built-in speakers is rather weak.It is a good looking TV with very small bezel and slight matte screen (rare these days).Takes 20 seconds to fully turn on which is annoying until you get used to it.Wifi connected quickly and easily, but seems to be limited to about 6 Mbps when my router is sending out 16 Mbps.  Confusingly, running an ethernet cable (Cat 5e or Cat 6 - I tried them both) limits speeds to about 3 Mbps when they should be higher with a direct connection.  A laptop connected to the same cable shows 16 Mbps download speeds.  Either Vizio is throttling the speeds or their internal speed test is off.  Either way, it does take a few seconds before Netflix will buffer enough to be able to show in HD.One annoying thing is the inability to disable unused inputs in the input selection menu.  So if you only have a cable box and DVD player connected, you still have to cycle through 7-8 inputs to switch between the 2 and you can't do this very quickly as it tends to pause at each input.  Not a big deal, but something Vizio could have easily fixed.Rhapsody doesn't work well - from what I hear from Rhapsody this is a problem between Vizio and Rhapsody.  Pandora works just fine, and while it's not included out of the box, it's easily added (for free) from the Vizio app store.For the price I paid, it's a pretty good TV, but if you're looking for rich colors and good black level performance, there are probably better options out there for a couple hundred bucks more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: LTC
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to be used as a computer monitor. It surpasses what I was expecting for a monitor as well as an excellent TV.Delivery was before the expected date. I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: TV for Bedroom.
Reviews.Author: Dexter
Reviews.Content: This TV is fantastic! I love the wireless connectivity Netflix and USB capability. I haven't tried the Amazon Video function yet, but I am sure it will work just fine.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP AND BEST!
Reviews.Author: Daljit Singh
Reviews.Content: What a TV! I love it, it is made so simple, remote control and the options are so easy to maneuver, though holds a BIG punch. Really made well for the price, really well. Only thing I would let all the buyers know is that if you are switching from LCD you might want to go to little bigger size than you think of, All  LED's don't have the edge like older TV's though screen might be what we look for, though tv looks smaller, just fyi.Updated: August 31, 2013: I really love this TV, still going strong and works beautifully. Only regret i have is that i should have bought bigger tv than 47". As these tv's do not have any waste on edges in actual the tv looks smaller. Still 05 stars.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice but..
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Tom"
Reviews.Content: They say it supports DLNA (which it does) and MP4 (which it does) but NOT MP4 over DLNA. Seems like that's a pretty important thing to mention, especially since most of your customers are PROBABLY buying the TV to play media that they've spent a LOT of time converting from some old disc to one of these spiffy codecs.So I get to RE-RIP my DVDs to MPEG. If you're a fan of advanced codecs, make sure you request a list of DLNA supported codecs before ordering. Just sayin'....

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: aspurlock "Angie"
Reviews.Content: This is the best TV I have ever owned. The cost was great and the features are perfect for what I was looking for. It has great sound and picture quality and I love the apps for Netflix and amazon. It took no time to set up and I would deffinately recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great color, screen, wifi, but horrible stand
Reviews.Author: Tom
