It's also very smart in that it keeps the tv setting for which ever mode it's in.  I watch Seinfeld every night and need the tv on a wider setting.  However, for my satellite it stays normal.  Also, going to Netflix is effortless.

Reviews.Title: Nice little TV for a bedroom
Reviews.Author: Desert Rose "Desert Rose"
Reviews.Content: I have the Vizio "smart" TV in my living room so that I can easily watch Netflix, Hula, amazon.com or youtube videos.  I have this little TV in my bedroom so I could watch Neflix, etc. in bed if I so desired.  The picture is as good as the one in the living room and both TVs share a lot of features.  The only thing I don't like about it is that the wireless in my building sometimes goes out and this TV does not have a place to hook up an ethernet cord (the "smart" model does.) So, when the wireless is not working, I find myself back in the living room watching the other TV.  Nice little TV and I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Good TV...pretty marginal Sound
Reviews.Author: R. Ross "Engineer"
Reviews.Content: We looked for a 24" TV to hang on our dining room wall to watch the evening news while eating.  It's replacing an old 19" RCA tube-style TV that's worked great for nearly 30 years, has great near-HiFi sound, BUT looked very dated in this time of flat-screens.Well, the new Vizio works great as a replacement TV of about the right size, and has good color and resolution...very happy with the picture.  BUT the sound is no where near a good as our previous 1980s TV.  With its tiny speakers, the VIZIO sounds tinny...like listening to the news through a tin can and sting.  The VISIO TV's audio controls include a frequency equalizer, and after tweaking them, I think it helped a bit, but the end result still irritates me continually when listening.  I'm now looking to replace the TV if I can find one with better sound.  We don't have room for an additional sound bar etc...we want the speakers in the TV. BTW...the TV is hooked up via an HDMI splitter to our cable box, along with our Sony big-screen living-room TV (which sounds great), so the audio is digital, directly from the cable box, which also does the channel selection.

Reviews.Title: owned for 6 months
Reviews.Author: Daniel Horande "Daniel Horande"
Reviews.Content: So far so good.. Excellent. I love  this TV. It is an OLD version, but it works like a charm. Only issue is Looking up for soemthing can be a pain, since you have to move the cursor on the TV with the Arrows in the TV remote to select letters. New model has a Keyboard on Remote control. I Really dont care much about this.I maybe look up for something on pandora, or youtube, or netflix, thats it. I am very happy so far...

Reviews.Title: I Am Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Shotty
Reviews.Content: The package is what the description mentioned, plus more. I was not sure if I would need to purchase a stand and/or remote,fortunately they came with the television.The product works, now I must figure how to work it.

Reviews.Title: A little clunky
Reviews.Author: person
Reviews.Content: We don't have cable so we got this purely for streaming, and it works faultlessly with Netflix, but the Amazon Prime interface is not remotely user-friendly and the short-cut button on the remote works about 5% of the time. Poor show.

Reviews.Title: Use as computer monitor.
Reviews.Author: Valerie McGilvrey "-Valerie McGilvrey"
Reviews.Content: I got this for a computer monitor and it's perfect. Great quality, nice smart TV features. Am looking at a larger screen for my living room and may get another Vizio tv since I've had such good luck with this one. The only one drawback is that it doesn't have a stand that lifts it up higher. It has a little elbow attatchment that goes in the back that the tv leans on. But, I may hang it on the wall in front of my desk so that even if I move the desk the little room will have a tv on the wall. :) That would be killing two birds with one stone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Dave Bujold
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Great picture, good wi-fi speed, no problems setting it up. Perfect bedroom TV, maybe I don't need cable?

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: Works good. The only thing I don't like about it is the apps. They suck. Very limited in what they can do. the Amazon App really sucks. I should have known better since I have a larger Vizio TV downstairs. Other than that I would recommend to but it.

Reviews.Title: my new tv
Reviews.Author: Mary M. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I like this tv. It was easy to set up and its real light and movable. I wish the screen was 24 inches instead of 20 1/2 inches.  The width from edge to edge is 24 inches. The remote is a little small to me but it's bigger than some.  This tv enabled me to get off cable and thru the Ethernet cable and hdmi cable that I purchased on amazon, all I pay is for Netflix . This is a lot cheaper for me.

Reviews.Title: My second Vizio
Reviews.Author: reader1947
Reviews.Content: I needed to fit a TV to my entertainment center and this Vizio fit perfectly...with a half inch to spare! I thought I was purchasing a 1080p, but still happy with the picture and the "smart" capabilities.

Reviews.Title: It works fine
Reviews.Author: Scott Vittum
Reviews.Content: I like the product.  There is nothing more to add.  UPS did a fine job.  The seller pack it up very well, I am still try to get rid of the cardboard.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: lizl
Reviews.Content: 6 months down the road and I still love it. My friends are very jealous when they find out I only paid 450$ for it ;)

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.  Works very well outdoors.
Reviews.Author: Allerion
Reviews.Content: The instructions/documentation that came with the television were incomplete and did not cover many of the televisions features including the wi-fi but it wasn't too difficult to get set up if you've put other items on your wi-fi network.  It is loud enough and bright enough to watch outdoors on a screened porch in Florida sun as long as you place it somewhere without glare.  I've been pleasantly surprised with it and it is very simple and quick to pull up netflix,  The netflix interface on this television allows you to browse your netflix homepage and make selections for new movies, unlike televisions I have that only allow you to browse your playlist after you've set it up on another device.  The television is also very light, so I wouldn't hesitate to use it on an overhead mount.  This would work great in a tiki bar or even near a pool.

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: David Hess
Reviews.Content: It's a TV like any other TV you plug a source in and out comes a picture. Works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: good tv, the volume is the handycap
Reviews.Author: Enigma Dominicano
Reviews.Content: this tv is excellent, but Vizio have to check the volume, in my equipmemt it's not working fine.the company have to check it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: Alyssa Rogalla
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my new TV.  Literally the only negative thing about it is that I do not have a simple web browser (although there are facebook and twitter apps, which amazes me).  Crystal clear picture, wonderful sound, easy and simple remote.  5/5.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: B Ko
Reviews.Content: this is a geat TV, easy to hook up and easy to use.I can switch back and forth from cable to wifi (amazon prime or netflix) with easethinking of cutting the cable off

Reviews.Title: Good TV, Poor Service
Reviews.Author: J. Ronthi "TheGreatSwindle"
Reviews.Content: The Nerds messed up my order, taking over a week from the estimated arrival time. On top of that, they were neither responsive nor very helpful.The TV on the the other hand, is great. For the money, it's a dream. It does everything. Picture is rather decent for the price. Highly customizable.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E3901-A1 39"  120hz Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Kay Tygard
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  So many features.  Have had no problems at all.  Would buy again.  Have had TV for over a year and would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 50" TV
Reviews.Author: KP
Reviews.Content: Came in a timely manner and it was packaged really well.So far, it is great for viewing shows and movies. Also the graphics looks great when playing video games.

Reviews.Title: love Vizio products - this is a great TV - my mom was in rehab and we needed a larger screen for her to enjoy sports
Reviews.Author: samjms
Reviews.Content: we have 2 large screen Vizio TV's in our house...this is a perfect size for Den or small bedroom great picture

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: gah
Reviews.Content: For the price of this television, I got a great buy.  I replaced an  old set with a VCR in it.  Nice picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: refurbished model
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I have not had any problems so far.picture quality is awesome.not too big not to smallI had no issues setting up the wifi.the amazon prime app is pretty annoying to use, the rest are awesome.I thought that they forgot my remote, they sent me a replacement one promptly, no questions asked, turns out it was just hiding in the box.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24"
Reviews.Author: Ray Hirschuber
Reviews.Content: picture is great but when changing from one channel to another there is to much time delay. sound is very good.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Angelo Aresco
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace my aged plasma tv, it is good quality, good price, and the smart tv part is fun to play around with, for the money you can't beat it

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Heidi Glosser
Reviews.Content: After seeing a 3D Vizio recently, we decided to get a smart HDTV, and because 3D TV's are over our budget, decided to purchase the Vizio 47-inch 1080p 120 Hz LED Smart HDTV.  While images on the TV don't jump out at you like a 3D HDTV, it is extremely sharp, and a pleasure to watch.  We love it.  We are still finding out everything this HDTV can do, which is kind of fun.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It's a great tv no volume issues and great picture just be sure to have it hooked up to hdmi

Reviews.Title: Package Came Way Early
Reviews.Author: Christopher Randazzo
Reviews.Content: Not a bad thing but it came directly 2 days after i ordered it, and i didnt even pay for shipping. Great quality tv even if its only 24" i passed up on a cheaper bigger one to get this because the name vizio out stands every other company

Reviews.Title: great buy, fast processing, works great!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer C.
Reviews.Content: i love this tv! we put it in our bedroom and it is so great to have everything handy without having another box - wifi, netflix, hulu, amazon, etc. tv has lots of settings features and additional timers and personalization.we love this tv! great buy!

Reviews.Title: This is beter than the Samsung
Reviews.Author: eddie morgado
Reviews.Content: I had thought about buying a Samsung but couldn't use my apple products. But Glad I found this Tv. Plus I saved a couple of hundred dollars

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Carlucho
Reviews.Content: Work perfect, GREAT deal for me, I love this tv, great image great sound, no more to say, no regrets

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: jose baez
Reviews.Content: Im so happy with this that its left me speechless and I hope to those of you future buyers with any doubts in your mind that it'll just completely change your mind completely

Reviews.Title: Love the  picture
Reviews.Author: Talisa Bush
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, easy to use.  Love watching You Tube videos from this. Buy it, it's worth it!  :)

Reviews.Title: We LOVE this TV!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought one for each of my children. We love the streamline design & the easy access to Amazon & Netflix apps.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Emris Rogers
Reviews.Content: Wanted a small tv for my bed room and one that I can go on youtube and facebook. This is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Ismail Khan
Reviews.Content: Great value. We have it installed in our gym the apps are sufficient no need for cable. Reception and sound are both very good.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Smart TV
Reviews.Author: P. Nelson "AV Lady"
Reviews.Content: I bought this television for my kitchen but it's way too good for that. If you have an Amazon account, you can access all of your digital orders from the pre-loaded Amazon icon. The same is true for Netflix. This is a great TV and a heck of a bargain. I set it up in under 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Vizio is a Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lavonda S Chavis
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Vizio TV a few years ago and I have loved Vizio since.  It was time to upgrade to a bigger and better Vizio TV.  I came across this one and for the price and size, it's a great deal.  Got the TV, hooked it up, and now my family is enjoying the clear picture and the Smart TV!

Reviews.Title: I will buy it again when I have more $
Reviews.Author: Maximiliano S.
Reviews.Content: I think, it is very nice TV, Smart TV, Internet TV in 29inch (size), and it has WiFiso, price/value is high for me

Reviews.Title: Good tv at a good price
Reviews.Author: Mary Garroutte
Reviews.Content: Have another Vizo 55" that we like, but have had problems with.  I was a little apprehensive in buying this brand again, but you can't beat the price.  All things equal, the price in electronics is the only gauge.  So far this has been a great tv.  It's used 3-4 times a week so should last a while.

Reviews.Title: Best tv for the money!
Reviews.Author: Shops,alot!!!! ";) Who doesn't love to shop!"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv on March 13th 2014 it arrived earlier than the delivery date said and that was awesome! We have purchased vizio before and it is a great brand so this was an amazing find 50inch tv for under 700 bucks who can pass that up. We have had the tv now about two weeks and its great never had a smart TV before and I love it! I would totally refer this to a friend. The kids love that we can watch Netflix rite there no need for a roku box or xbox live card to watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: DAVID MONNOT
Reviews.Content: Works very well.  Sometimes I have to hit the power switch more than once and that is scary because I threw the packaging away.  The picture is great and the smart part is nice to have.

Reviews.Title: Hoping for better picture quality. Ok to good purchase.
Reviews.Author: MaryAnne Moore
Reviews.Content: Was expecting a little bit better picture quality but the price was right. Over all this tv Is pretty good not great!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: cheryl ward
Reviews.Content: I received my Vizio well packaged and protected,  I couldn't wait to open the box, it was everything and more than what I expected it fit perfectly over my mantle.  As always I was not disappointed,  the only Smart TV I allow in my home.  The picture was great and sound was outstanding, great for movie night.  The apps on this Vizio was even better that my last Smart TV,The remote control was small and had this annoying clicking sound like a toy.  Come on this wonderful TV with a toy remote?  What were you thinking?  The remote I received for my 32 inch was grand and perfect,  so I took the remote from the 32 in and replaced with the new one, and gave the toy remote to my 4 year old grand daughter.  So she uses it to watch Netflix for Kids perfect.Still I would recommend this product to my family and friends.  Thanks for everything.

Reviews.Title: Love the tv, practically sets itself up, however the design of the cable and Hdmi ports is criminal
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Just picked this tv up at a steal. Picture is amazing even with standard definition cable. Connects and streams beautifully, zero issues and the 1080 is beautiful with bluray and Netflix. Sound is superb for a flat panel as well. That being said, with over 50" of space on the back side of the tv, why do they design all the inputs in little caves at blind right angles? Simply plugging in an Hdmi cable elevated my stress levels and I had to surgically remove some plastic from the coax end to screw it onto the cable in jack. A cat was nearly punched in the face over this ordeal. Even to make it easier to hang flush on a wall, the wire port locations are foolish, cruel and unusual unless you have tiny, elvish hands.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: ca2va21
Reviews.Content: Love my new TV. For the price I couldn't ask for more. Just the right size for the room I have it. Color is crisp and works with all my devices.

Reviews.Title: 50in LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Patricia Lopez
Reviews.Content: We had purchased a 60 inch for the conference room at a very reasonable price so when I was asked to purchase another TV for the training room, I went with the same brand. It was priced very low because it was a 2013 model. Great quality of TV at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Good picture! Good Sound! Easy Setup!
Reviews.Author: Geekazoid "Larry"
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a great little TV. I use it for my XBOX One and am very impressed. It could use another HDMI Input but, what the hey! it's pretty cheap! Well made. Good value.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied So Far
Reviews.Author: Catherine Lambeth
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this product so far. The Smart TV is a little complicated, but I think they all are at this point. Typing must be done by moving from letter to letter in a square. It is really time consuming!

Reviews.Title: it's great
Reviews.Author: Annette GM "Annette GM"
Reviews.Content: enjoying the tv - have know received the router to create the 'smart' features and look forward to more enjoyment as soon as I learn how to hook it up.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Sharon Fredericks "sharon fredericks"
Reviews.Content: Love this tv! The picture is fantastic. I'm hoping to learn how to do all the fancy stuff.  Ii have another vizio and it's also fantastic. If your in the. Market for a new tv these are great!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Picture & Sound!
Reviews.Author: John A. Clare "jac"
Reviews.Content: GREAT picture and sound.  I purchased a Vizio soundbar, (the inexpensive one, at the same time and find both together to be a TERRIFIC deal as well as great on the eyes and the ears!

Reviews.Title: As advertised, fast delivery.
Reviews.Author: Rafael Torrealba
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture once calibrated. USB port plays AVI & MP4 video files, which is one of the main reasons I wanted a "smart" TV. Overall ease of use is wonderful. Great TV, great price. Arrived on first day of 4 day window shown upon purchase.

Reviews.Title: First HDTV
Reviews.Author: I. Slonin
Reviews.Content: Bought it to replace my SD television in the bedroom. Needed something to fit the dimensions of my amoire, and the Vizio 32-inch fit the bill. Easy to set up. Didn't have a standard coax cable port, so I did have to run out and get an hdmi cable. Great picture. I actually prefer watching it to my large screen SD television in the family room, even though it has a bigger screen.

Reviews.Title: PerfectPic
Reviews.Author: Patricia Briggs
Reviews.Content: This is the best money I every spent. The smart tv part is great I love getting amazon and netflix right on the tv would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS TV
Reviews.Author: Sasha
Reviews.Content: great little tv!!! got it for my sons room. perfect picture quality easy to use and very convenient. love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: L. Pagan
Reviews.Content: Great tv. Sound quality is impressive for a smaller flat screen. I love the smart tv features - having access to Netflix and Youtube with a click of a button is great. The only app missing is HBOGo, but I'll just Chromecast it.The youtube app is also very clunky - even though I am signed in, there's no way to see my subscribed channels, and the videos on the home screen don't seem at all relevant to my likes or subscriptions. And the search is incredibly slow and not very effective (returns videos in seemingly random order instead of by post date). It works, but honestly I'd probably end up chromecasting youtube as well.The netflix app is great though. Works just like my PS3 one.I also love that the tv doesn't have a stand - it sits flush with the surface. That was part of my choice in buying it - since it wouldn't be mounted, I hate the skinny wobbly tv stands that come with most. This just makes it look really sleek. Might not be for everyone though depending on where it's placed.Overall love the tv picture and sound quality. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated...
Reviews.Author: Glenn Salata
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is ok but should be better with a HDMI Cable.  We've been having a terrible time connecting to the internet.  The instruction have not been very helpful.  It worked for 1 week then  sporadically after that.  Called the tech number 3 times.  They spent time trying to help but became very frustrated.  We are still trying to work out our issues.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Anthony Ferguson
Reviews.Content: purchase the TV for my life she loves it could TV only downfall I thought we would have an app that would allow us to serve the net flix isn'twould allow us to surf the net and it does not

Reviews.Title: Keeps locking up
Reviews.Author: Tagbo F Emejulu, Jr.
Reviews.Content: Got this TV based on the rates. Within a few days of setting it up the remote control (and sometimes the controls on the TV too) starts freezing up intermittently. I contacted Vizio and we spent hours going over options to fix it...the bottom line, according to the rep, is that the wifi connection is interfering with the TV and freeing it.The fix worked for a few days and went back to the same issue, I called back and the rep I got told me that there is not much that they could do, I need to figure out what is interfering with the TV. I told her that I have a Panasonic that I have used for years, in the same house and have not had similar issues with it. She said that it must be the difference in configuration...and wasn't willing to offer additional help.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO SMART TV
Reviews.Author: Steven Dyarman
Reviews.Content: Very nice Tv great picture also like the all the internet options. Put this tv in my bedroom worked out great.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with our TV
Reviews.Author: MemphisMom
Reviews.Content: My husband and I ordered this tv for our bedroom and couldn't be happier. Arrived within the estimated arrival time. Love the smart TV option, has an excellent picture as well as sound.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: gh008
Reviews.Content: Very nice size. College student here who is a big netflix user. Great to finally have a smart tv. Ordered a hdmi cable for my laptop to hook up.

Reviews.Title: great clear tv
Reviews.Author: Matthew Gehrman
Reviews.Content: I mainly got this tv for watching porn unbelievable how clear it is. Wish I would have gotten this bad boy along time ago, remote has small buttons and could be a little easier to clean maybe water proof or something.

Reviews.Title: So far the Vizio works great the only smart apps I've used so far is ...
Reviews.Author: Tom Windish
Reviews.Content: So far the Vizio works great the only smart apps I've used so far is Netflix and Amazon instant video and revision3 as well as Yahoo screen and the Yahoo weather app, the only problem I'm have with the smart app is You tube sometimes it works just fine other times if buffets, right now it seems to be working fine.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little TV
Reviews.Author: William I. Kipp "Bill"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for occasional viewing in a small den/office in our home. We are very happy with it at this point.  The "easel" stand is perfect for our application and is a big reason we bought this particular model.Of course the screen is small, but we sit close to it, so that's what we wanted.  The picture quality is quite good.  The sound is also "small", but at close range it's fine.We like the "smart" TV features.The only drawback we've encountered is that the unit has just one (1) HDMI port.  Many sets these days have 2 or more.  We wanted to connect both a cable box and a Roku streaming stick, so had to buy an HDMI switch.  Not a big issue, but it's an extra $10-$20 and an extra "appendage".  It would be better if the set had multiple ports.

Reviews.Title: Finally upgraded
Reviews.Author: Sheek003 "sheek003"
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Great picture and audio.  I don't need cable TV, the apps are enough for me. The energy savings are a plus.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mike Rogers
Reviews.Content: Great tv. It's nicer than my 55" LCD I bought last year. And the Netflix is even better. THANKS AGAIN

Reviews.Title: Great tv at good price
Reviews.Author: Rajendra Kanuru
Reviews.Content: Great picture and simple controls. Nice and simple remote. Very happy with the purchase.  The built in apps work very easily and streams wifi content no problem.

Reviews.Title: Sound and brigtness
Reviews.Author: Blia
Reviews.Content: The tv I bought was 29inch came with power cord.2 screws, and a triangle stance ish..the tv works great but I can't find YouTube app I also notice that some channels the tv sound does to loud then low but not really loud ....I used the tv to play games and is ok ..watched movies on my ps3 internet browser and I seem to notice that the brightness would go dark then light odd... Update-5/17/14 I measure my tv with a measuring tape its only 26 inches odd I thought I bought a 29inch tv measure your tv just to be sure

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: medic0681
Reviews.Content: I have been impressed with this TV so far. I wish vizio would have included a keyboard remote instead of making it an upgrade

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Everett Rudluff
Reviews.Content: TV works very good right out of the box.  Was easy to set up and get Netflix's working.  I am please with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good price.. Delivery ..?
Reviews.Author: Catherine Warden
Reviews.Content: I ordered from Amazon to save me lugging a TV from a store.  Needless to say, didn't know they used Fed Ex to ship - who gives you no time-table as to when your item is coming..  they also require a signature so i HAD to be home.  Missed the first two attempts (they only make three, then you have to go get it yourself, which for me, was quite a ways from home).Good thing i wasn't working the 3rd and final attempt.  Good picture, great sound.  Happy

Reviews.Title: vizio tv
Reviews.Author: rondis
Reviews.Content: luv this tv I would recommend this for anyone you have all your movies music facebook twitter and more right on your tv

Reviews.Title: Works really good.
Reviews.Author: krista
Reviews.Content: This tv is so easy to use and it works really good. The only problem is I had to ship back the first one I order because it wasn't hooking up to my wifi. But I called tech support and they where wonderful. They walked me threw the steps to fix it and it end up being a broken tv. But they set up someone to pick up the tv and shipped me a new one with free over night shipping. Which was awesome. It's a really good tv. Trust me.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price - but not great
Reviews.Author: Josh S
Reviews.Content: For the price, this TV is good. $380 for a 39 inch 1080p LED TV.However, the WiFi receiver is terrible, to the point it does not even work. A speed test on my iPhone will pull in 15 MBPS standing right next to the TV, and then the TV will get 200 KBPS (about 2% of the iPhone) which isn't enough to stream Netflix.After looking at the poor return policy from my seller (15% restocking fee + Shipping costs), It was cheaper to buy a Roku, which has a strong enough receiver for me to use the TV.So, all in all, I bought it for the WiFi capability, which it is not capable, so, there's where you get the bad rating.However, big picture, it's a 39 inch TV and I spent less than $400, so I can't complain too much.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: the tv has a clear picturethe tv has good soundthe tv was delivered ahead of scheduelwe are happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Problems with Netflix
Reviews.Author: kindleFan "JavasBrewin"
Reviews.Content: I have to use the Roku to watch Netflix.  I bought this TV so I would not have to do that!If your TV is far from your router and you watch Netflix this TV is not for you.  The Roku works with it, as do the other widgets...just not Netflix.  Went through all the troubleshooting too.Otherwise, TV is good.

Reviews.Title: vizio tv
Reviews.Author: DIANA MORROW
Reviews.Content: THIS TV WAS A VERY REASONABLE PRICE FOR WHAT WE GOT, WE ARE VERY HAPPY WITH IT, I WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS TO OTHERS

Reviews.Title: Nice spare TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff Polus
Reviews.Content: Got it in a work out room, great for watching Amazon prime while running on the tread mill. Works perfect for what I wanted!

Reviews.Title: Power company surge blew up my old one
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: And paid for this replacement... have a ROKU, but nice to have smart built in too.The slim frame is nice and picture/sound are good. Only dislike is no manual controls, so remote dies or lost no operating it.

Reviews.Title: Thumbs up on the TV, but BUYER BEWARE of The Warehouse!
Reviews.Author: prepgal
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, good price. I bought this from Amazon Warehouse Deals, and though it was supposed to be LIKE NEW, it was missing the mounting screws for the stand and there was a rattle inside (loose screw??) that concerned me, but the TV booted up just fine and I dug up some replacement screw from my toolbox, so it's all good.  Next time I would buy a new one though, not a Warehouse Deal.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV for the price. Picture needs a little tweaking out of the box to brighten it up, but the picture looks great.  You really can't go wrong with the price and quality of a Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: CRW
Reviews.Content: Product was as described . No causes for concern . I bought 2 of the TVs and one had a white line on top , however , upon contact they were very cooperative with an easy return/refund, they promptly did a return without questions . I would buy from again. The other tv was fine and I kept .

Reviews.Title: Love the picture quality!!
Reviews.Author: Kellie Stevens
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price!! I love the picture quality and Smart TV features. I'd highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: TV is a good starter or spare room tv
Reviews.Author: ExpertReviewer
Reviews.Content: The tv itself is of high quality. If there is anything in front of the tv it blocks the wifi signal. I enjoy the YouTube app so that you can play it through your phone and it goes on he screen. The YouTube app doesn't work all the time and it takes awhile to load and recognize your phone even if its already set up. The screen size and quality is good.There is also a lack of apps. There is no HBO Go or a streaming app from all your devices to the tv such as Google Chrome. It's basically a semi smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Picture great! Ease of use fine! Buttons on remote too small.
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Ann Zick
Reviews.Content: Picture great! Ease of use fine! Buttons on remote too small. Otherwise I would give it 5 stars. Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Love this television
Reviews.Author: lorikroberts
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our son and he absolutely loves it. The picture quality is fantastic and we can't wait to purchase a Smart TV for all the rooms in our house.

Reviews.Title: This is good
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Orellana
Reviews.Content: Good tv, nice size and a nice adquisition. And it was a replacement for one that arrived broken. Thanks for reading

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Richard White
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a 26" TV in the livingroom.  So far it works great.  My one complaint would be the Amazon ap, as it lists all Amazon Prime videos and doesn't allow a search by genre for them, but I don't use it enough to take away a star for it.  Interestingly it's supposed to be a 720p TV but when you switch it to one of the HDMI inputs it says it's 1080p.  I don't know if this is an error or if it's listed wrong in the description.  The fact that it says 1080p on the features chart on the item's Amazon page only adds to the confusion.  Again that is not enough to take away a star as again the TV works great.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good but the apps crash sometimes
Reviews.Author: A. R. Hanford
Reviews.Content: Quality is good with only a few dead pixels out of the box.  Displays standard TV pretty well and Netflix looks great.  The apps do crash somewhat often which is a bit irritating.  Good TV overall and certainly at the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: WIGirl
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a bedroom and it is perfect. Great picture and easy to navigate too. Would recommend this TV if you need a smaller one.

Reviews.Title: It's good.
Reviews.Author: Bri
Reviews.Content: It's to small,but I suppose that's my fault. Not to hard to work though. Word word word word word word.

Reviews.Title: happy with my vizio smart tv
Reviews.Author: cfloyd516
Reviews.Content: Pretty quality for the price.cant really tell the difference in hdtv vs reg when watching dvd or streaming itfrom prime. Maybe it the setting and I just havent figured it out.  Can get my samsung 3tab to connect as a remote. Maybe my tablet ???? Ot tv???. Otherwise everyone is happy 3 hdmi ports to connect our game consoles all the web apps you could think of an more!

Reviews.Title: Really BAD service
Reviews.Author: Harold E
Reviews.Content: tv performs okay.....remote went bad after 6 months...called service, went through some tech stuff....still NG...gave them all asked for data and was advised they would send replacement...next day vizio calls and advises that replacement is canceled because they need proof of purchase....which i have just faxed to them.....we'll see how quick this is resolved....one thing for sure...their service is very erratic.problem solved....the TV was bad....vizio exchanged original for new one....everything works now....still had to jump through hoops tho to get the exchange (no cost)......still not real happy with level of  service......but i added a star.  harold

Reviews.Title: Sooooo nice!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ann Winans
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from my 4 year old 32" Vizio ....Makes a big difference!  Delivery was fast...it was very well packaged, as well...It is up on the wall and looks great!

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture, smart feature setup is painless
Reviews.Author: Domhnall O'Donnchadha "Domhnall"
Reviews.Content: It does everything you want for a small tv in a small room. In a perfect world, I wish the Vizio apps were more diverse (HBO Go, PBS, etc.) and the interface a little "snappier" to respond though you can't beat the price. If I'd held out buying another month, the Roku Streaming Stick and a "dumb tv" might have been a more compelling offer but overall I'm happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: My fiancé and I were looking for a TV for our living room, which is fairly large. We were worried the room may dwarf the TV, but it is actually a great fit. The picture is great and altogether it's a great TV!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Heather Parnell
Reviews.Content: I chose 5 stars because this TV is great.  I love the built in features: facebook, netflix, hulu, crackle, etc.  The WIFI works great, has plenty of ports and functions great.

Reviews.Title: Great from you Sony
Reviews.Author: Jose Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Thanks dad. This was a gift for my daughter so far she is enjoying her tv."the colors and features are super great".

Reviews.Title: I am really impressed with the features and the picture.
Reviews.Author: Derf
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with the features and the picture.  The sound is not as high fidelity as I am accustomed to.

Reviews.Title: verry good product
Reviews.Author: Marc orel exantus
Reviews.Content: i love it its really great for the price im able to do anything with it good job verry nice tv

Reviews.Title: Awesome but...
Reviews.Author: Testrak
Reviews.Content: It is pretty cool, stand is really impressive but this would do better for someone in a small room. The features are over the board since there are a few that serve the same purpose Netflix, huluplus, amazon instant view or something. I would recommend this tv to anyone with a budget and small house. Had to return it but only because of the misunderstanding I had.

Reviews.Title: Still using Roku...
Reviews.Author: Janet W. Hall
Reviews.Content: Has brightness problems.....will not use Time-Warner app, so our smart tv is still hooked up to a Roku 2.  Should have spent $50. more for the Samsung

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: NYCHRIS
Reviews.Content: The TV was more than what I expected.Very light, very easy to mount and set up.Online I've used netflix and amazon prime, and they work great!.I would highly recommend this product as a great suplementary TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: I think this TV met all my expectations. I see no issues with it at all so far and I really like that it's a smart TV.

Reviews.Title: TV is great
Reviews.Author: Liz k-j
Reviews.Content: This is a great little TV.  I bought it for my sewing room so I didn't want a big one.  Easy set-up and connected to the internet without too much trouble.  I get tons of channels so I won't need anything more than an antennae.  Great!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: This was my first venture into the world of smart TV's so I have nothing to compare it to.  We have it mounted above our fireplace mantle and it has worked very well for 2 monhs so far.  I use our cable company for our internet service and have there least expensive cable modem and service so occasionally we get some buffering or interruptions of service when streaming but that is not the TV's fault. Our wireless router is very close  so that has not been an issue.  We absolutely love the quality of the picture.  Nothing negative to report at this time.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we wanted
Reviews.Author: K. Frazier
Reviews.Content: Great TV, crisp, clear picture.  Enjoy having the Smart HDTV.  Easy to set up and connect to wifi.  Only having a problem with directv remote.

Reviews.Title: No issues. Quality product thus far.
Reviews.Author: jlarocco
Reviews.Content: Nice picture.  Interface easy to navigate. Definitely better looking than my other (1080p 60hz) for Blu Ray and other HD content.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Grant "shopper"
Reviews.Content: This is in the kitchen and is working great-the person with advanced glaucoma can now see the picture with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Parker
Reviews.Content: This was the tv I was looking for. it has some of the best features. Smart TV is the new thing.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great features, great price
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: We couldn't be happier with this TV. The picture is great and it was super easy to set everything up. No issues at all. As advertised. This is our first smart tv, but our third VIZIO brand tv. Definitely a brand to stick with. Much better than tvs much more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Bathroom TV
Reviews.Author: Cathie "KateJonze"
Reviews.Content: It takes me some time in the morning to get ready to face the world, so I love that I can watch Netflix, Amazon, Hulu+ while I'm getting ready. We did have to get a range extender for wi-fi because this TV is so far from the router.

Reviews.Title: Nice set, merely clever.
Reviews.Author: King Kole
Reviews.Content: Great picture great value. The 'smart' functions are a little clunky and a bit slow. It does do netflix and amazon, but sometimes I have to exit and restart to get a video to play. Web browser - no. YouTube search possible but difficult. Mild annoyances, happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: great picture !
Reviews.Author: edward hay
Reviews.Content: i was disappointed that walmart had this tv on there site for the SAME price .......i always figure AMaZON would have the BEST PRICE !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: reset?
Reviews.Author: JEFF ALBERT
Reviews.Content: after using it for a few months, i have too unplug it sometimes for it to reset it'self.it will get to a point were it locks up an you can't change anything on tv

Reviews.Title: This Works Well And Is A Pleasure To Watch
Reviews.Author: Ernest Stokes
Reviews.Content: This was the right price and the right size at the right time. I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A Great Buy
Reviews.Author: John In Arlington Va.
Reviews.Content: Wonderful picture quality; terrific sound; controls are easy to use and very versatile.  Connection to wireless internet is easy, and it works great.  This is a one great TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Size and Picture
Reviews.Author: M. Reynolds "Michelle"
Reviews.Content: We got rid of the 400 lb tv and got this one. This is our 3rd Visio TV and we love the picture. Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24-inch Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Cariecre "Cariecre"
Reviews.Content: Vizio 24-inch Smart HDTV reviewSound is good. Picture is good. Connected to my router no problem. Has apps like Netflix and Amazon and YouTube and a 'store' to choose other apps. My biggest complaint is the power plug does not stay in the TV (which is located on the back of the tv.) The plug just falls right off and the tv powered off on me once already because the plug is too loose. It wasn't anything I did. I noticed it was a loose fit right away. So I might take it back and trade for a different one and see if it's any better.That is the only reason I gave 3 star rating instead of 4. Also, I did not buy this via Amazon, I got it from Best Buy for $199.00 and a two year warranty for $24.99. There is a 5 year warranty available too but I can't remember the price for that one. Comes with remote, batteries for remote, power cord and bracket and screws for the bracket to hold the tv up. Oh, and the tv takes about 12 seconds to turn on after I press the power button on the remote.

Reviews.Title: Vizeo 29" as performed as expected.
Reviews.Author: denise oblak
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to place in front of my elliptical machine in the garage. The wifi system streams NetFlix as promised, color and sound are great. Guess I'll have to add Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gracie
Reviews.Content: It has all the features I want, was a little frustrating to set up but I did Thank You! :)

Reviews.Title: vizio smart tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this tv as a gift last year. I love that I can watch Netflix in bed. I love that it has buttons programmed already for the things I wanted like Netflix and Yahoo. The only thing I don't like is being able to use the internet itself on it is a bit harder than I thought it would be.

Reviews.Title: Picture
Reviews.Author: warren
Reviews.Content: Picture not as sharp and clear as my old TV. Somewhat disappointed. I may have had it too long for a return

Reviews.Title: Speakers are questionable
Reviews.Author: Leigh
Reviews.Content: The viewing is good, and I like the size.  The speakers are questionable.  They start to vibrate at around 50.  Some programs are a challenge to hear and if I try to turn it up, it sounds worse.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our bedroom
Reviews.Author: Nicole Kelly "Austen Addict"
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to buy another "smart" tv because the interface always seems to miss the mark, but Vizio has made it easy. I mainly use Netflix on this set, and it is very quick to load and easy to search/select shows. I'm considering getting one of the keyboard style remotes to search/login a bit quicker, but so far I haven't had to do too much typing since it saves your login information on set up. The set is very slim and easily sits on top of our dresser; it would also be great on a wall mount.

Reviews.Title: Just OK - Not Great
Reviews.Author: Darrell J Guenin
Reviews.Content: I have a Sony plasma TV, so this may be an unfair comparison, but the picture quality is only about 70% as good as my Somy. When you watch it straight on the color is fine, but if viewed from a side angle the color fades and is distorted. It's a second TV and in the bedroom - so it's just- OK - not great.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: orchidlady
Reviews.Content: This was an easy TV to set up nothing special required. Hooked up to outdoor antenna and wireless hook up to wifi. Great picture quaility and no sound bar reauired to hear it. 24" is perfect for bedroom. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my Son's Room
Reviews.Author: Frank J Maglietti
Reviews.Content: This television is good for a bedroom.  The picture is great.  Interface with Internet is a little Clunky if you are going to use it.  Great TV though

Reviews.Title: Excellent set.
Reviews.Author: Thumper
Reviews.Content: The only problem I've discovered is with the installation instructions.  It left out a couple of steps...A quick call to the help line and Ashley in Utah quickly walked me thru it.  Nice little set, does all sorts of neat tricks.  Excellent picture and sound.  The screen is about 85 or 90% of the front of the set, resulting in no wasted space.  Light weight.  It's an excellent size for the home office as it can also be used as a monitor

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous
Reviews.Author: kristin Bel
Reviews.Content: Very good team, design and support is very functional.The definition is very good.Thanks for a good product design

Reviews.Title: Best value I've seen for this size!
Reviews.Author: Scubanut
Reviews.Content: I wanted the biggest screen that would fit in our entertainment center to replace a Vizio 32" we moved to another room.  Funny thing is that I could've gotten a 46" to 50" model cheaper, but there are few choices in a 42" 120hz TV.  The sound is decent, and the built in WiFi is handy for using with the built in Netflix & Amazon!  The fine 1080 picture & 42" beats 720p & 32" by a lot...My biggest issue is the very small remote that has over 40 tiny buttons with poor markings!  Other than the three big buttons at top for Amazon Netflix & MG0 the remote is very annoying.  The new remote is HALF the size of the Vizio remote from our old TV, that had large, color coded buttons with plenty of room between them.  That made it easy to find the right button and NOT hit the wrong one...

Reviews.Title: Great picture, great value
Reviews.Author: John Hinchman
Reviews.Content: Good size, but light weight. I can easily move it around with my U-Verse wireless receiver. Colors are vivid and picture (HD) is sharp. Wi-Fi and Internet-ready. Great value. This is my second Vizio (have a smaller Wi-Fi model) and I am very satisfied with both.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: A-Tan
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for my brother to use at work for his iPad where he can use his auto mechanic applications to display to the TV. It does the job.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful t.v.
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: This t.v. is exactly as advertised. I am in love with this television. I want another one but even bigger.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Nancy Peasley
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy for the price and it made having PRIME from Amazon something that we were able to do.  The only thing I do not like and this may be an internet problem, is that the movies occasionally have to reload once they have been started.  I am sure it is an Amazon or internet problem.  This TV has a great picture and it is super light.  Glad we invested in it.  Great buy

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: MT Guy
Reviews.Content: I like this TV a lot---it was a replacement for a 20 year old CRT in the bedroom and it has a great picture and I really like the Smart TV capability--as with most flat screen TVs I had to modify the tilt so it would be at the right angle for the bed, but once that was accomplished the view is fine.

Reviews.Title: Great little Tv but can be controlled by LG remote
Reviews.Author: J. Wilson "outdoor dad"
Reviews.Content: This Tv works great for our kitchen.  The wi-fi is seamless with Netflix and youtube and pandora.  The Hd is good quality, although net that big of a deal in a tv this size.  The only problem we have is that the remote for our LG 3d tv in the living room will turn this tv on and off as well, which gets a little annoying at times.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: E. Polly
Reviews.Content: The price is right, the display looks good, sound is typical (get a sound bar and sub if you want theater sound) for a flatscreen, and I've had zero problems with Netflix or Amazon Prime.  Screen does fade out quicker than expected if viewed from a severe angle.  I'd buy again.

Reviews.Title: E241i-A1 Review.  Terrible Viewing Angles.
Reviews.Author: jz
Reviews.Content: TV is two stars for quality.  It gets an extra star for being 1080p and under $200.Got this TV because it was small, slim, cheap, and 1080p.  My major complaint is the poor viewing angles.  Unless the TV is at eye level or tilted perfectly in your direction (which is tricky since the stand has a tilted design) you can't enjoy the images.  The colors get lost...almost like the screen has a privacy cover.  Additionally, the backlight glows around the screen's edges.  This becomes apparent when watching movies in the dark.The apps and wireless connection work great...and I like the remote's buttons that launch Netflix and Amazon Prime with one click.  TV is great when viewed straight on at eye level.In hindsight, I wish I had paid an extra $200 for a similar size 1080p Samsung (or other brand) with higher quality.  But, at under $200 for this Vizio, I can't be too upset.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Walter K Fritzler
Reviews.Content: Got it for morning news in the kitchen/living room so we could move the big set downstairs to the family room. It's loaded with features and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: power cord problems
Reviews.Author: Meg in Michigan
Reviews.Content: The tv worked great the first six months. We love how well it uses WiFi and it has several buttons for Netflix and Amazon. But now it turns itself off randomly and won't turn back on. Sometimes after unplugging the power cord from the tv and then plugging it back in it works, but that's only about ten percent of the time. And it is only returnable for the first month, that's pretty bad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: franedwards76
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Mother N Law on Christmas because she had a old 19 inch and her eyesight is getting worse. She LOVES this TV and has it on 24/7. Great picture quality, easy set up & WIFI connected with no hassles at all. Running smooth and we got the Square Trade Warranty on it & that is by far the BEST WARRANTY to get on anything you own that it covers. Been using them for 2 years now and had 2 claims with 1 resulting in a payout.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: debra Brown
Reviews.Content: Exceeded my expectations. Excellent picture, sound, and seamless streaming especially for the reasonable cost. Love the wireless function to stream content over wifi.

Reviews.Title: One very happy winner
Reviews.Author: Ruth V
Reviews.Content: We used this as an incentive for an employee sales contest---It was a very popular choice!  Ordering was easy and the TV was exactly as described.

Reviews.Title: Good entry-level smart tv
Reviews.Author: Marisa D. Demaya "Modsurfr75"
Reviews.Content: The picture is pretty GOOD. I'm not going to say great but it's pretty good for the price. I did some extensive homework before I bought this as I was looking for a smart tv that offered an alternative to hooking it up to several components for a guest bedroom. Instead I liked it so much that I ended up putting this in my bedroom and switching it out with a slightly older Sylvania flat screen I had (great picture) for the guest room. The slim, sleekness of it takes a little getting used to in terms of the screen- you have a thinner frame and more screen to look at if that makes sense. The apps and streaming are pretty good for what you get and Vizio is constantly updating to add more apps. There is a slight learning curve when trying to link it up with your wifi however I found that by turning it off & on after the initial info is entered helped in terms of getting the tv to connect. It took two tries for me but afterwards it was smooth sailing. Again the Netflix, Hulu and other apps are good. There's some interesting freebie channel apps where you can watch old tv shows in there too at no cost so that's kind of nice to have. My favorite feature of this television hands down is the ability to plug in a usb drive and play multiple types of video files automatically without having to hook it up to a PC or DVD player. You can also play mp3 files and look at photos, etc. but I was really impressed by the number of files it would play without too much of a problem. The remote that comes with the TV is a sore spot here and I'll tell you why. They provide you with a smart tv that allows you to access online streaming and other applications yet you get this remote that is more for a basic TV with no buttons such as for launching Netflix or other hotkeys for the streaming apps it offers. This is where Vizio literally Cheapens out this model. The remote is also small, lengthy and complicated in terms of a million tiny keys. There is also no keyboard. You would think that a smart tv would come equipped with a remote that offered a keyboard yet it does not. I realized this is part of the reason why this tv is a bit of a bargain compared to other smart TVs out there. At any rate, I resolved this by replacing the remote with the VIZIO XRV1TV Qwerty keyboard remote (bought here on Amazon for about $12). I know this is not ideal for some because the idea is that you get a brand new tv and you shouldn't have to spend extra $$ on an additional remote however I recommend it in this case as the little cheap universal that comes with this set will drive you mad. You really do want a remote with a Qwerty Keyboard on the back as this will come in handy if/when you do a search on youtube or Netflix or Hulu--you won't be there forever trying to navigate letters on-screen with the up/down remote toggle keys (eyes rolling). Now for the rest of this thing- it's got great picture and some pretty good choice settings for gaming, etc. You just have to get in there and explore it. Some people have complained that the picture looks dimmer than when they saw it on the showroom floor however I just found that I adjusted the controls and it seems to be fine. I believe also that this set has an automatic sensor built-in that adjusts the brightness of the screen depending on the level of light in the room. I have not played with it enough to find out for sure whether or not this is something you can turn off or adjust. There are only two HDMI connections and that can be bothersome to some. For me this wasn't an issue as I don't always hook this up to a PC however it was good to have it hooked up to my cable box but honestly two connections was fine for me. Gamers and PC enthusiasts may get irritated at this small amount of HDMI connections so buyer beware there. Again, this was one of the cheapest smart tv models out there with good reviews that I found so i'm not too surprised it lacks a few things. Some folks have complained at the slowness of the TV to power on and I will say it takes about 20-30 seconds which can get on your nerves. All I can say there is to just have some patience and resist the urge to keep hitting the power switch as I learned the hard way you might actually activate a hard-reset of the television by doing that. That brings me to mention a safety feature the tv has built-in in the event of a power surge or storm. I came home one evening after a wicked rain storm to find the tv buzzing at me every few seconds after I'd turned it on. It kept making a noise similar to those you hear when a weather bulletin flashes on your screen from your local news, etc. I couldn't get the TV to stop doing this so after trying to adjust the settings for a good half hour and finding no solution to this I did some research on the net and found this was a result of a built in sensor that is designed to protect the TV from shorting out if an electrical surge occurs (which apparently did). So the solution to this was to power it off and unplug it from the power source for a good 20 minutes. Once we did this, it came right back on and adjusted to normal as if nothing had happened. Overall it's a very interesting unit with good picture and a fairly good amount of "smart" apps for an entry level smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Steve R. Fesperman
Reviews.Content: Replaced an older 37" 780P with the Vizio 42". 1080p.  Fit in the same space and love the sleek design (frame).The picture is excellent.  The Smart function connected and worked instantly.  We can now move the Blue Ray to another room.  Our neighbors saw the new TV and purchased the same unit for their home.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Sarah Otto
Reviews.Content: TV works great and sounds great. I would buy from this company again and will look out for any more TVs in the future.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E470i-A0 47-inch 1080p 120Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: D. Sanderson
Reviews.Content: A very nice unit. Good picture. Clean and good looking unit. Easy to operate, even if you don't read the instructions. Internet ready for Netflix and others. Now let's see if it can last as long as my first TV...27 years.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Debra Perry
Reviews.Content: This item was ordered and donated to a non-profit organization as a raffle item.  They were thrilled with the tv and I'm sure the winner is too.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: OCreviewer
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio set i bought.  the first was a 60."  the only question for me was whether to buy another larger set.  the 42" picture is surprisingly large.  Picture is as good as it gets as far as i am concerned and i cant figure out why anyone would pay more money for this size TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture!
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift for our daughter who is going off to college later this year. The picture quality and extra features of this television make it well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but....
Reviews.Author: Paul Hoeberling
Reviews.Content: The TV is a great TV, but have been unable to get the wireless to work fast enough to make it function properly.  There is a "Fix" for the problem, but that has not worked either.  Without a direct ethernet wire to the TV, the functions that should be wireless are slow.

Reviews.Title: Great TV great value.
Reviews.Author: REN
Reviews.Content: It works well in a small room. Great picture and features. The remote feels cheap and clicks too much. Definitely worth the price

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations.
Reviews.Author: R. Foster
Reviews.Content: With all the good reviews here, I was still skeptical about this TV -- until it arrived.  The picture quality is top notch, it's a snap to get wireless configured, and Netflix looks great. The sound quality is very good (not great, but very good). There's not much to complain about.  I have an HD antenna and this TV gets more channels than any other in the house. I'm about to order a second one...

Reviews.Title: Good Value for the money
Reviews.Author: M. Salfai
Reviews.Content: This TV has a sharp, clear picture and seems to be a good value for the money.  I would recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Andrea M Dorries
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV and functions just  exactly like it was represented.  I am a tv aholic and it did just what i need

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Comic Book Creator"
Reviews.Content: I have had two 46 inch Samsung LCDs in the past four years that died strange deaths so I decided to give Vizio a try after reading great reviews and hearing from friends who own them.  I have to say that I was impressed with the quality of this TV given the low price.  The 120hz feature is great for action and video games.  The Smart TV features are, for the most part, easy to use with only an exception or two.  The only downside I can give it is that the sound is nowhere near as rich as on my Samsungs, but I was planning on buying a soundbar anyway so this was not a dealbreaker.Pros:Fantastic pictureGreat priceLightweightEasy to use Smart TV appsCons:Weak soundAmazon Prime app is too basic and difficult to use (I still use the PS3 one, which is far better)Overall I am very happy with my purchase :-)

Reviews.Title: right size for the space
Reviews.Author: Bill Rodgers "Dancinwill"
Reviews.Content: I like it because it is the right size for the space ,,and also it has netflix  ability without using my computer or other device

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Critterdawn
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv for our daughters room. It is a smaller version that she had and it is a little more difficult to see than we had hoped. Setting it up took a long time and trying to get it to work with the screen ratio on our satellite provider took some effort. We are pleased with its performance over all.

Reviews.Title: Just fits in
Reviews.Author: Robert B Franke
Reviews.Content: I have a 26 inch model in the dining area, liked it very much, and decided a 24 inch model would be perfect for the bedroom. I am beyond being satisfied with both units.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: L. Hess
Reviews.Content: Wanted the smart technology to use in a setting where there is no cable service but use it with streaming of Netflix and other services.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, easy set-up, nice features
Reviews.Author: ILuvGoldDogs "Amazon fan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to go in my home office.  It was incredibly easy to set up and the Smart features are a real plus--Amazon Prime, Netflix and MGo at the push of a button on the remote.  My only complaint about the product itself is the sound which reminds me of a cheap radio.I am thankful to have Amazon Prime where I could order this product and schedule delivery on my day off.  This product was shipped in the retail box which displayed to the world what it contained in brightly colored pictures and descriptions of the contents. No signature required.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth W. "Elizabeth"
Reviews.Content: I'm not an avid movie or television viewer, but really enjoy the ease and size of this unit. Good price too.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the money
Reviews.Author: J.McK
Reviews.Content: We have really enjoyed the television.  The only complaint is that the sound is sub-par.  We will fix it by purchasing a sound bar, but we were disappointed with that.  Other than the sound being somewhat less than, we are very happy with our purchase and would recommend it with the knowledge that you'll need to get a sound bar as well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Bill E.
Reviews.Content: Great smart TV. This is our first Smart TV and really surprised us with what it does. Great picture too.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV works great
Reviews.Author: Janice "Janice Mezier"
Reviews.Content: This is my first SMART TV. I was concerned that it would not be easy to set up so I had my Tech savvy daughter do that. Not much of a problem, but I may have had some trouble. TV is a great price for a great TV. Worth the price and hope it lasts as long as my old SONY(17 years and still working). This is a third TV  for the house and although it is small the picture is good and I do like the SMART features.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Hank Willig
Reviews.Content: Satisfied again.  Picture and sound quality better than I had expected.  This is my third Vizio and all work fine.  If I need another I would buy another Vizio.  Service and tec support also excellent.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the money
Reviews.Author: kaileypete "danopete"
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound.  Installed on wall mount in my studio.  Picture looks good from any angle.  Have not used the internet features yet, but glad to have that capability.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: kathy cope
Reviews.Content: I'm impressed with the picture and sound quality.I expected the the better picture but was very happy about the sound.ILove it.

Reviews.Title: Good 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: M. Rochell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for our spare bedroom.  Mounted it with a wall hanging swivel bracket and couldn't be more pleased.  The picture is good and with the smart functions make our Netflix viewing seamless.  It was easy to set up functions aren't hard to figure out.  In this price range, I'd recommend this TV to anyone searching for one in this size.

Reviews.Title: picture is great but wifi is not
Reviews.Author: RYAN A NOWAK
Reviews.Content: Picture is sharp and contrast very good.The Wi-Fi app that is built in is slow.  It loses connection with my router and there is no option to try to reconnect.  I need to turn my router on and off to reestablish connection.  I'm comparing Wi-Fi performance against the Roku I own and the Roku is superior.

Reviews.Title: Confused
Reviews.Author: faztang
Reviews.Content: I just go this tv and the jury is still out if I like it or not. One thing I noticed is that my picture setting menu is WAY different than what the manual shows.  I don't have half the settings that the manual mentions.  I called VIZIO and they said that this is because a few different versions of the TV has come out.  Pretty weird to me that the manual doesn't line up with the TV.  Anyone else have this going on with their set?

Reviews.Title: Great for Watching Movies
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "babzee11131960"
Reviews.Content: I bought it to replace my TV in my bedroom. I only have basic cable in that room so this allows me to watch my Netflix, Amazon, YouTube and Pandora apps without the need for a Xbox or something else. I just use the wireless coming from my living room.  For the price it's great.

Reviews.Title: Good product...could be better.
Reviews.Author: Cale
Reviews.Content: The 2 reasons I didn't give it 5 stars is that while the picture is good it could be better.  Also when loading netflix or amazon prime there is a delay that makes u believe that it isn't even loading it takes so long sometimes.  All in all its a very compact lightweight television that get the job done like I wanted it too.  The wifi has never disconnected and streams video just fine. This is a spare teleivision that we use in our office when working.  For a primary tv that u use all the time..I would probably go for a better product.  As a spare tv that is used sparingly its great.

Reviews.Title: From Here or Best Buy?
Reviews.Author: Andre Simmons
Reviews.Content: I would like to rate, as I'd love to help my fellow consumers, but my set was broken upon arrival. I can say, that Amazon made it easy to return. They just sent the UPS man back and he brought the label with him and picked the tv up from our doorstep.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Enrique V. Melena
Reviews.Content: This tv is just the right size! not too small or too big for my bedroom. I like the resolution too.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: clark bolton
Reviews.Content: Its definately a nice TV. The photos made it look like it had more screen size than it actually did but overall, it was nice. Amazon Prime WILL NOT work with this TV. Google it for more info.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great value
Reviews.Author: Wilkinsonjk
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV a couple months ago and have been completely satisfied.  Great picture, sound, and features, and easy to set up.  Would definitely recommend picking up two HDMI cables with your purchase.  I didn't do this, and had to order them right away anyway a couple days later (Amazon has the best price I could find), as there aren't many hookups for the more outdated input cables.

Reviews.Title: smart tv good picture but missing wifi component
Reviews.Author: John Keller
Reviews.Content: Had to run ethernet cable  not really wi-fi capable . It has worked out for the price , but not a fully SMART TV.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: KathyB
Reviews.Content: Just as described and definitely worth the price! Great display for Netflix and other SMART activities. Daughter and her family love it

Reviews.Title: Our new Vizio television.
Reviews.Author: Daniel A. O'Leary
Reviews.Content: The perfect size for our great room.  Sharp picture. Very satisfied with it.  I talked someone else into buying one. Missed the two day delivery however.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Vizio 50in smart tv!
Reviews.Author: WB "Wanda Beiber"
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with my new Vizio 50 in. smart tv.  The picture has so much depth and with the push of a button I have available the internet, Amazon's vast selection of movies and programs, and Netflix movies and programs.  There are other features I haven't even tried.  I purchased this television in December knowing I would have a houseful of family for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Everthing I expected.
Reviews.Author: Ian Gordon
Reviews.Content: I found Vizio to be the lowest priced TV on the market and as attractive as the rest. Some may think this makes it cheap and prone to malfunction with a short life. I would like to think this new entry into the TV market uses the latest technology and the most effiecient manufacturing production line to make it the new star on the block.However, I recently  ordered Amazon Prime for free movie streaming and found one of the two HMDI plugs in the back is non functional. I am now looking into getting it fixed. I googled Vizio TV quality. The information I researched indicates there are Visio problems with breakdowns within 6 months to a year, customer response and  warranty coverage difficulties.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E-Series E241i-A 24-inch 1080p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV (tilted base)
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L. Himes
Reviews.Content: I love my tv. The picture is beautiful especially when you play blue-ray movies. I use it every day since I got it. I have hooked up my computer and Xbox to it. Game look amazing. It has lots of features also and Netflix and Vudu apps. I'm having a great time with my tv.Have a blessed day

Reviews.Title: One Beautiful Television
Reviews.Author: franktheman
Reviews.Content: I did some research about the best 32" television around, and all the fingers pointed to this little puppy. After connecting it to thr power and turning it on, it found my wifi, went on line and had me regiser the product. Netflix works great each and everytime i turn on this tv. I could not have been any happier with a television for this price, and cannot see myself not ever getting a smart tv again. With this tv 720p is unnoticable however the sound could use some base.It is a little too high pitch but that is the only con i can write about this purchase. However time will tell if it develops any problems.

Reviews.Title: Review of VIZIO E420i-Ao 42-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Marylin Henry
Reviews.Content: It turns on - we like that.  We were disappointed that it had blinking lines in a black area across the top of the picture.  A technician came out and fixed it (we hope).  So far it is working ok.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: S. L. Scott
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. It has such a clear, crisp picture. I LOVE the internet apps that came with it and there is the ability to download more apps as well. You can't beat the price either. Definitely worth the money! I would recommend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is very average - Lot's of glare and poor coloring
Reviews.Author: A. S. "A Starr"
Reviews.Content: I used to really like Vizo TVs many years ago, but it seems like they haven't made any advancements in their technology. This might be why they are so cheap, or less expensive than others. The screen on the TV shows a lot of glare, so anything around the TV shows up on the screen. The coloring looks faded so it's not rich in color, no matter how you play with the settings ....  it still looks bad compared to today's new tvs.  I returned this TV and purchased a Samsung for about $50 more. This TV...  the picture was clearer and the screen was 100% non-glare with a much better picture. So, if you are looking for an "average" picture and don't mind a screen that shows every glare in front of the tv screen, this is for you. Do not use this outside since the screen shows every glare.Bottom line... this TV is not good.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Patrick A. Meehan
Reviews.Content: I feel that w TV marketed as a Smart TV should have an internet browser. If this one does it is so well concealed that it is impossible to find. YouTube not a problem, but no way to stream Pandora . Also user manual left a lot to be desired. Television is very slow to turn on and find HDMI source so don't plan on turning on TV and catching some breaking news story. Otherwise the TV is a very good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture
Reviews.Author: Taryn Lynell Lindquist
Reviews.Content: I chose only 4 stars because I have been noticing the sound dropping off and back on again many times.  At the moment I don't know if it's the tv or the cable, so have to watch other tvs to figure that out. I have read other reviews saying people were having problems with the audio, too.  It hasn't been bad enough to actually be a problem, but if it gets any worse, I will not be satisfied.  Wish I had a hard copy of the manual so I wouldn't have to interrupt others while trying to learn how to use this thing...

Reviews.Title: Perfect 10/10 but the best is to come
Reviews.Author: F T. A.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my office... Everything is perfect! The Smart TV is awesome!However, if you want more from a Smart TV wait til the fall of 2014.At that time two TV makers will be coming out wit Roku Ready Smart TV's.I have Roku, I have a Smart TV but put them both together and you will have the future.I am holding off on that Large Family Room TV until Roku Ready TV is available.

Reviews.Title: Bigger TV
Reviews.Author: reknirb "bj84711"
Reviews.Content: Wanted a larger TV for basement rec room.  42" seemed perfect size.Well satisfied....our 5th Vizio......excellent picture and  very good sound.

Reviews.Title: Has everything!
Reviews.Author: Kalin Castle
Reviews.Content: From HDMI X4, USB, Ethernet. I love this TV. I guess the wifi capable isn't bad either. Now my biggest problem is figuring out wether to watch netflix on my xbox or directly on the tv. The packagong this tv comes in is second to none. It could probably survive a fall from and airplane..... We'll not exactly but you get my meaning

Reviews.Title: Bitter sweet
Reviews.Author: Randy Scaggs
Reviews.Content: The backlight is visible through black on the left side of screen in two places. Amazon credited 25% and I accepted."Bad Idea" it has gotten worse after 3wks. of use. Guess I gotta live with it now.

Reviews.Title: Not the best but not the worst
Reviews.Author: shaun mcgue
Reviews.Content: Ok I got this tv for my dad he needed something to have in his bed room so I looked around and need up with this one and so far this is what we think about it1. Picture Quality is great2.if your looking for a smart tv this is a good pick3.sound is not all that great however we hooked up a little speaker so we worked around that little problem So all in all for the price this tv is a pretty good deal just wish it had better sound

Reviews.Title: Poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Camwill
Reviews.Content: The 720p picture is not really sharp but I guess that should've been expected. The sound quality is also poor. It has a muffled sound and I have figured out how to program it to get rid of the sound. The cable guy wasn't able to do so either and we just had to turn up the volume on the cable box and reduce the volume on the tv for clearer sound. Disappointed in the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: very easy to navigate
Reviews.Author: Jerrod Kowalski "Jerrod Kowalski"
Reviews.Content: i have a 50" version and i bought a 24" for work to use at an expo. the remote was easy to navigate, more so than the one for my 50" Vizio. it was really easy fast to go to thru the input and other functions. fast for a smart TV, i find it frustrating to navigate my big Vizio, but this one was faster and more intuitive.i also liked the stand feature but it may not be for everyone. it's very simple, there is a 90 degree plastic bar that screws in at the base in the back. it works as a rest. simple and ingenious but it will mean the Tv stands out by about 6". it the table it sits on is a few inches from the wall it will be that much farther from the wall. so it's not ideal for a small desk and maybe not for any desk. i like the design but there are limited places to set this up due to the unique base stand design.it does have a USB input and it identified content as soon as i plugged in the thumb drive, but it the drive was plugged in before you turn on the TV it would not recognize it and USB is not an input selection option like HDMI or cable. very odd, but i have encountered this on a Samsung TV too. it did play videos off the drive, not all TVs do, but it would not allow loop/repeat or constant repeat shuffle of videos so it was no good as a trade show TV without  buying a video input player which i did not want.there are mixed reviews on this set, could be based on size or setting or whatever, i do suggest going to Consumer Reports or other source for finding the best setting for this model, it could make all the difference. if you want a smart TV this is pretty easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Awesome HDTV QUALITY RECEPTION
Reviews.Author: OLU
Reviews.Content: Great value and very good quality product!! Works perfectly fine with no hassles. The apps makes it much more interactive.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth Z Meyers
Reviews.Content: I love my TV. I use it to watch netflix mainly, as I don't have cable. It's totally great. Only knocking off one star because it's hard to search things with the remote, and connecting to my phone can be a bit of a hassle. Also the netflix app doesn't show you all the categories, so you have to look online for full selection. Other than that- I can't complain. The picture is really nice. No problems with wifi at all. Yes, I lose signal or disconnect, however, that is NOT the TV's fault, but rather my horrible internet company.

Reviews.Title: Has been great with this TV
Reviews.Author: Vijay Rajendran
