Reviews.Content: Everythings perfect with the vizio tv i ordered. Would not say the same about their soundbar though. Anybody can set it up, the sounds are great and picture quality is good as well. The netflix and amazon buttons on the tv are a big help.... in fact they are the ONLY buttons we seem to be using :-)

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Sheila Lamkin "Lump"
Reviews.Content: great picture, love the smart TV features. This is a great TV for the money. HD picture quality is just as good as I have seen around.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic out of the box
Reviews.Author: Christopher Randolph
Reviews.Content: This was to replace a five year old Toshiba that is no longer usable due to what will be referred to as the "incident".  Packed very well and it's a good thing because delivery guy single handedly dragged it up the stairs and left it standing upright on the porch, then disappeared before I could corral the dog and open the door.  Great picture out of the box.  Easy to connect with receiver and gaming console and recognized home network right away.  Good deal, would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: daycare_mom
Reviews.Content: My family and I love this TV. Great HD and easy to use. Price is just right too.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A very good first purchase
Reviews.Author: Samrat
Reviews.Content: Pro's -Price - Bought it for $450 on a thanksgiving deal, cheapest 50" trusted brand I could find (compared to LG,Sony,Samsung,Sharp).Apps - Never hang, run finePicture and Sound Quality - Very goodThin frame , very sleek designCons -Remote control - small buttons, not backlit, no qwerty keyboardSearching videos on netflix and youtube - typing characters using arrow keys takes forever, very frustratingYou can connect the Youtube app on TV with your smart phone/laptop by entering a key, searching for videos and playing on tv. Though this is a two or three step process, it is a lot better than typing using the remote control.HDMI and Coax slots are placed very close to the back plane of the TV, you have to struggle to connect especially if the cable connectors are big/wide. Took me 30 mins to connect the Insignia HDMI cable and the comcast Coax cable, I still think I was not able to make a secure connection but somehow held the cables in place and got it to work.Takes a lot of time to boot up - frustrating sometimes, but can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Overall Excellence
Reviews.Author: W. Hinds "realist"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my girls' rooms.  They are 3 and 5 years old respectively.  The TV is quite easy to use for the 5 year old, while I keep the remote to myself for the 3 year old.  They love the integrated Netflix.  I wish Amazon Prime had a better app, but I'm not entirely sure who is more at fault in that departments, Amazon or Vizio.  While Netflix will automatically play the next episode in a series, Amazon Prime is quite an ordeal to back up from the currently selected video, select the next episode in the series, then press a button on screen to play the video.  This sounds trivial, but the menu and buttons are pretty convoluted in my opinion, and the default focus from one screen to the next is terrible.  The Play button is never focused on after selecting a video you always have to press down to change the focus to that button.  That's a lot of griping about something that isn't necessarily related to the TV but worth noting for prospective buyers, in my opinion.  I wouldn't trade the TV in or anything, but when I'm next in the market if I heard that a specific TV had a better experience it would weigh on my decision.Aside from all that, the picture is excellent, the integrated speakers are clear and strong (for integrated speakers), and the remote is easy enough to use.  Those are my most significant demands from a sub $250 TV.  I should note that I wall mounted these TVs about six feet up to prevent the TVs being damaged in anyway, grubby hands or accidentally being knocked over.  This really makes the remote easier to use since it's effectively overhead.I need to mess with the DLNA though my expectations are low.  I have Synology NAS with a DLNA server application that I need to test out.  I don't expect to update these review, but you may inquire in the future if you are interested with whatever comes out of that experiment.Overall, I would buy this TV again for my own room if I needed another TV, it works and it has a clear image, it may not be a theater ready set, but it's good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Seek
Reviews.Content: Love the smart TV features especially the built in NETFLEXs. Controller works very well. I bought this TV because i own other VIZIO TVs and like them.

Reviews.Title: Great TV However
Reviews.Author: Misty "marjoy"
Reviews.Content: Indeed this is a great TV at a very good price.  One negative issue is that the Smart function is not so smart.  I offers minimal apps, very few of which interest me.  Vizio stated that the app menu is provided by Google and I would have to contact them for additional information.  Too bad!  I would have given it five stars except for this issue.

Reviews.Title: This was just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Lindsey "Linda's things"
Reviews.Content: A good tv with everything I need now and in the future at  a very reasonable price  Just the right size.  I love it

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality Television for the Price
Reviews.Author: Kimberly S.
Reviews.Content: Me and the sweetie love it!  Made her happy for Christmas, now I can get some a lot  of work done!  Steve

Reviews.Title: Bought this TV for my Grandson
Reviews.Author: Retired Bubbe
Reviews.Content: My grandson is disabled and this TV is great for him to use.  He can now get on the internet and has access to netflex.  I highly recommend this TV for everyone as it was easy to hook up.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my daughters Room!
Reviews.Author: leslie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my daughters bedroom.  It is the perfect size, great picture and love how easy it is to hook up.  For $200 this is the best deal around!

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture but....
Reviews.Author: Capt'n George "AKA Spike"
Reviews.Content: This review is for the 29" Vizio E291i-A1The Good:  Great picture quality, easy to set up the smart TV apps and I LOVE having access to Amazon Prime videos.The Bad: First there is the stand.  I know some reviewers like not having the TV mounted on a pedestal, but I find that the back brace "stand" is somewhat unstable. It also forces the screen itself to point slightly upward.  I am probably going to need to buy something to elevate the TV half a foot or so above the table top it sits on since I didn't anticipate not having that extra 6" that a pedestal stand would have given me.  I did find a couple of inexpensive table top stands for small flat screens, but the ones that mount the TV to vertical rails are probably out of the question since directly below the mounting screw holes in the TV are the HDMI and component video inputs. These sockets would be blocked by the rails.Then there is the sound.  In a word, awful. It sounds as bad as any tinny set of PC speakers built into a 20" monitor.Finally (and this is minor I'll admit) is the time it takes the TV to start showing broadcast TV when it is first turned on (at least 15 seconds) and the time it takes to display the previous channel when switching back and forth (around 3 seconds).

Reviews.Title: Another Great Vizio
Reviews.Author: GrapevineGrammie
Reviews.Content: Our family has 10 vizio's of different sizes among us (3 families) and no disappointments yet.  This one i was able to install all by myself and it looks great!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: DP
Reviews.Content: The TV was delivered on time and in good condition.  I have been using it for a few months and it has a really good picture/color/clarity.  I use a home theatre system so I cannot comment on its sound quality.  I have used the internet connection a few times and it is cumbersome trying to use the remote control as the "keyboard" so it takes a while.  I have had no issues watching You Tube videos or connecting my laptop to it in order to watch other videos.  Overall I am very happy with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Shaffer "Little May"
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase that replaced a really old portable tv with a built in dvd player, so the update alone was a great improvement. I've been pretty happy with my purchase. There a few things I don't like, but overall, it is a pretty good bargain. For less than $200 I was able to get an HD TV that has built in Netflix and Amazon Prime. This saved me having to buy a Roku or similar device just for these two features. The quality of the picture I get with Netflix is excellent. The quality of the picture I get with my Dish Network receiver is not quite so good, but then again, my Dish receiver set up remotely to the primary tv and only the first tv gets HD, the second is in SD, which is a whole separate issue. I'd have to add a Hopper to get HD on the second set. The screen size for normal viewing is not 24" and while you can select three other settings, I find this feature really annoying. I leave it in the "normal" viewing size because the "wide" "panoramic" and "zoom" settings add slight distortions to the picture. Netflix comes up in full screen size, so I'm really not sure what the deal is with that. The other thing I'm not too crazy about is the matte finish (versus glossy) picture screen. I thought I might like it, but when I compare it to my Samsung 50" I realize that I guess I really do prefer a glossy picture. However, the bottom line is that I still feel like it was a good deal for the money. I really didn't want to spend more for a second tv that gets limited use anyway. If I could afford to spend twice as much money, I would get something else, but I'm really happy with the tv and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO screwed up on the Amazon Application
Reviews.Author: Kaylee Brown
Reviews.Content: I just purchased TV and am happy with it as a whole, except one thing.  Having the Amazon Instant Video application relegated to a small portion of the left hand screen is horrible.  Plus I can't get to my watch list what a waste.  Considering returning the TV if they don't update the application soon.  The application should be full screen just as HuluPlus, Netflix, MGO, etc. are.  I understand that the way it is set up allows for continued viewing of video content while you browse, but the text and pictures are way to small especially for a 32 inch TV.  Some of the other applications are better suited for dual action, but Amazon Instant Video is definitely not one of them.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E291i-A1 Smart TV from Amazon
Reviews.Author: WV Elaine
Reviews.Content: We bought this Vizio E291i-A1 Smart TV from Amazon for use in front of our treadmill. It was easy to setup and works as expected. We use this smart TV to connect thru our dual band router to Netflix and other streaming sources. We also have it connected to DirecTV. As I recall, to attached the TV base/stand to the TV you need a Phillips screwdriver with a #1 blade/tip and a shank of over one inch (to fit thru the opening in the base). I started the two screws in the TV to condition the threads, unscrewed them, snapped the base into the TV, stood the TV on edge on a bed (mattress), and put in the screws. With this approach it was easy. We used free shipping from Amazon, but the TV arrived at least a week before the original estimate. The TV comes with a Quick Start Guide which is adequate. We downloaded the manual from Vizio. We had tried first to buy this Vizio model from a big box store, and they sold us a TV in a box that looked unopened. Turns out the big box store TV we bought was not a smart TV and the model and serial # of the TV in the box did not match the model or serial number on the label or receipt. We got a full refund from the big box store and ordered the TV from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: great set
Reviews.Author: philip braschler
Reviews.Content: Great TV and easy to set up.  I guess.  Son had it going with his box on it before I ever got home.  Didn't even get to unrap my own present.  Apps are good and come in handy.  Picture is awesome except for border if I could just get everybody to leave it on normal.  Now for a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: OVERALL SATISFACTORY !
Reviews.Author: Richard T. Bender
Reviews.Content: PICTURE IS WONDERFUL.  AUDIO COULD BE A LITTLE BETTER. DELIVERY WAS  EARLY AND MADE US HAPPY SINCE WE WERE ABLE TO ENJOY THE TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my mother as a replacement for a super old CRT in her bedroom.  The smart features work great with netflix/pandora and was super easy to sertup to her home wfi.  Price was very reasonable and you cannot beat Amazon Prime shipping.

Reviews.Title: ExcellentTV but slow to boot up
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Bequette
Reviews.Content: We would like to know how you get this TV  to start quick like out other TV's.  I have read instructions we downloaded and find nothing about this.  On the positive side, it is not wasting electricity when turned off.  Robert Bequette

Reviews.Title: Took awhile to get smart
Reviews.Author: berkeleybart
Reviews.Content: Original review, 2/8/14: Good picture, easy to set up and use, but not smart enough to connect reliably to my wi-fi network. Won't even work via Ethernet -- tells me to upgrade my router, which has been more than adequate for streaming movies and TV over my Roku box (along with a wireless desktop computer, two wireless printers, a couple of laptops, a couple of smartphones, etc.). I bought this set to replace a dying Sony, which was hooked up to Roku -- the same Roku I'm now having to use to watch streaming video on my "smart" Vizio. (BTW and FWIW, the Roku's Amazon interface is far superior to Vizio's app, which doesn't allow you to maintain a watchlist, even if you can use the app.)That said, nice picture. And it works swell with a Roku box (not included)...Update, 2/9/14: After being totally uselsess as a smart TV for 24 hours, the set miraculously connected to my wi-fi network this morning. All the apps work, everything's good.I'm leaving my rating at 3 stars until I'm convinced this is a permanent fix. If I've upgraded to 4 stars, that means it works, and I'd recommend the set.

Reviews.Title: I love it, perfect for any room (not living room which needs bigger)
Reviews.Author: Chuck Walker
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is awesome, tons of input plugs, so many apps that makes it awesome. I love using my pandora.. the video stream thru house network is not good and very limited on what it plays (i still use my ps3 for this).. note it works fine with divix and xvid files but the rest are hit and miss.. and xvid/divix are not HD enough for me... I find this with most tv's even at friends houses...picture quality is very HD, love it.. well worth the $250... and 29" vs 32" is not noticable at all, so dont spent the other $50 on 32"..

Reviews.Title: Absolute Garbage
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this TV. Has a particularly horrible problem with netflix and has become worse and worse. Had to send the first TV back after having someone from Vizio come and replace a part only to put the original part back in. Second TV worked better in terms of the wireless signal and it's ability to connect to the apps which it has ie amazon, netflix, etc. Over a few months it has basically become non functional and a total waste of money since this is the reason it was purchased. Very disappointed with purchase and would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Calli Williams
Reviews.Content: Great tv! Perfect for watching netflix....for sure a great value for the price.  This was the most inexpensive Smart tv I could find and it exceeded my expectations!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Kristina Riley
Reviews.Content: My hubby is the techie in our house and he has confirmed this smart TV has all the bells and whistles that other TV's twice the cost have.  The LED screen really makes a difference as we have a lot of windows in our living room and the glare is greatly reduced.  We still need to tweek the color a bit as out of the box it is not good, but overall - great purchase, very happy.

Reviews.Title: vizio smart tv
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: this itiem is ok, the remote does not turn on the tv, it trys to turn it on when I push the power button and the light turns on. on the tv but it just doesn't turn on. also you cannot surf the web with this tv all you can do is have a very limited number of apps, and I mean very limited, but it has good quality picture when hdmi is hooked up!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Michael donajkowski "FollowerofGod"
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying this product. Amazon's price was way better than average. The only negatives are no specific audio adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Carol M. Jones "CMJ4164"
Reviews.Content: I love the TV.  It's great in the bedroom and I love the wi-fi access.  The picture is sharp and clear.  I can even read the cc from across the room.

Reviews.Title: Big, Plastic, and seemingly fragile
Reviews.Author: J Ponder
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I returned this device.  It was big and clunky.  I did not like the VIZIO Smart interface.  Maybe I got spoiled by LG, Samsung, and Sony.  It could not could to my PC to stream movie files (and if you could, I could not find anywhere to see the networked PCs).  Just pulling it out the box  you could feel components insides shaking. I could not get beyond the user interface and the clunky, fragile, plastic feel.I can't say anything about the picture quality that made me dislike.  It seemed fine.  However, that was overshadowed by items mentioned above.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Manchester
Reviews.Content: To keep it simple; Amazing price, quality, and size. Definitely hard to find a competitor that can beat Vizio in these 3 aspects, and I will always be a fan.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Walesch
Reviews.Content: Went shopping for a TV and found this Visio. We wanted a 42 inch . We looked at department stores and saw this Visio and loved the picture and price so we came home and ordered it at Amazon. Amazon's price was even better. They shipped it right away and had it in three days. This is a great TV with all the features.

Reviews.Title: Vizio e500i
Reviews.Author: Alan Haimowitz
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv as a present and was not pleased with the sharpness of the picture should have returned it but did not have the box.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: michael c novak
Reviews.Content: What a nice t.v.! For e money you can't go wrong. So glad I choose this one. Will allow me to watch t.v. Outside at our gazebo. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Gayle Joseph-McClorin
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before I bought this TV and I love it. The sound is great and even got the sound bar before I got the TV and it just enhances the sound but its not needed. I give this product a great review because although I was worried about the sound I am very much pleased with this product. I also bought the remote with the keyboard on the back and that works great with the apps on the TV.

Reviews.Title: remote device
Reviews.Author: ted
Reviews.Content: the remote  is too small for all the functions and did not like the Neftlix  Amazon etc buttons. otherwise set is good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV & value
Reviews.Author: Richard S. Butwin
Reviews.Content: Between home and office I have purchased 6 Vizio TVs in the past year (3x70", 1x42", 2x32"). They all work great. It is also nice having all the same brand for the remotes and settings. My fancier friends have Samsung. I consider myself reasonably savvy with this kind of stuff and I cannot tell the difference. I think Vizio is a no-brainer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Mark Lincoln
Reviews.Content: Sound and picture quality is good. Easy to setup with my wireless network. Wife and I have enjoyed watching the streaming video and movies available on Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding little tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: Douglas K Secreast
Reviews.Content: Worked great right out of the box. Very easy to setup. Great picture and fair sound, but it is for the bedroom so i am not that picky about the sound.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: David Albright
Reviews.Content: I have a 30 inch wide TV armoire. This is the only 32 inch TV that would fit inside. Terrific picture and perfect size 32 incher.Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E241i-A1 24 " smart tv
Reviews.Author: Arns
Reviews.Content: This is my second Visio TV and I still have and use the first. The picture on this one is perfectly sharp and clear after about a week of adjusting. (I was just learning how as this has about 500 adjustment possibilities, that is good point except if you are not technically oriented) The only bad point is the angle of viewing is very very narrow. I don't think that my 4 year old Vizio has that problem. I think that one is pure LCD where this new one is LED and LCD.  Sound is good, not great but acceptable. I'm keeping it which means that I like it and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Adam J. Erickson
Reviews.Content: Even though I received it used and damaged, on the cabinet, it still works as if it was bought new.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Deborah Holden
Reviews.Content: I really love it. It has great color and sound and is very easy to get around and program. It was at a great price and was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying watching and smart TV is great.
Reviews.Author: Maureen Stuchal
Reviews.Content: I wish the instructions came in a printed form.  I am not a technical person so I found it clumsy trying to set up the TV without having the instructions in front of me to make sure I did the step by step correctly.  Having the instructions in the menu is good so you always know where they are and can be accessed.

Reviews.Title: This is a beautiful tv
Reviews.Author: Marla M
Reviews.Content: We got this for our Christmas present 3 months ago.  I found it on a big discount at Best Buy with free delivery and set up.  I have been enjoying it, the picture quality is wonderful.  I find the Amazon app not as nice or easy to use as on my Panasonic downstairs, on Vizio it is a split screen and involves a lot more scrolling, but I have become adept at using it,

Reviews.Title: Fantastic value for the price
Reviews.Author: Joshua Bardwell
Reviews.Content: It speaks to how good display technology is getting that you can buy a TV this good looking for the price of this one. No, it doesn't come close to higher end models in terms of color, brightness, or contrast. But it is still really good looking. We use this as a portable screen for our son to watch Netflix and YouTube on. It's easy to plug it in anywhere in the house, set it down, and fire it up. It connects over WiFi so there's nothing else to do. It has the ability to sync with your Netflix and YouTube apps on your phone, so you can even queue up programming on the phone, vs. having to search for it using the on-screen keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic.
Reviews.Author: Shirley Billick
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Delivered right to the door.  Easy set up, great price.  Would recommend for anyone wanting a good TV with a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely beautiful
Reviews.Author: Barely Legal Tattoo "Eric Ruff"
Reviews.Content: We have bought 2 of these tv's. The picture is breathtaking, with deep blacks. The sound is amazing, so crisp and clean. We love the channels and how easy it is to navigate through. When you buy the tv you get a year of vizio tech support for free. We love this tv so much that we are buying the 60in next.

Reviews.Title: So Far so Good
Reviews.Author: KSJ
Reviews.Content: Great picture and features. I use this on the Actiontec HDMI wireless transmission system with no problems or issues to report.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Lee H
Reviews.Content: I really adore my new smart tv.  My son put it on the wall for me and after I picked up dish again, I could spend all day parked in front of the lovely television.

Reviews.Title: Basic Smart TV, worth value
Reviews.Author: Hans
Reviews.Content: Great product, but not 100% perfect, worth it's price, and works for daily use. Very basic smart TV.Pros:-Very Cheap-Smart TV with the most popular apps-1080p-Powered USB to play videos, music and photos with external HDD, or USB Flash.Contras:-Angle vision very poor-Apps market (yahoo) very limited-No support for mkv, avi, and other very basic formats in a smart tv-No support for .srt files-The multimedia file browser is very limited and poor.In general, its a great product, a smart tv in this price is really good for this money.I have a LG Smart TV, and it's hudge the difference, but the Vizio Smart TV meets expectations for this price.

Reviews.Title: Good TV & Value For Many-E420i-A0 4-inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED TV
Reviews.Author: OutOfMany/IAmOne
Reviews.Content: Mostly loving this TV so far.Not being a videophile, technically inclined, nor having ever owned more than a 32 in. TV in my lifetime, I'm really enjoying this TV, especially after having gone without one for a year.Delivery & packaging were excellent. My son assembled base and had it up & running w/in 15 min. Was pleased with out-of-box settings & after having experimented with settings available online via a national tech publication, may switch back to original settings, as they seemed more agreeable to my untrained eyes.Only negatives thus far are lack of a recurring sleep timer, limited "expanded" apps via Yahoo App Store (terrible, terrible joke which should be replaced by Vizio with a more relevant, capable provider), and my post-first, full firmware update which has now caused the TV's pre-loaded apps (Amazon, Netflix, YouTube, Weather, etc.) to perpetually display as "loading" in the bottom scroll bar accessible via the Vizio apps remote button.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: donna lowery
Reviews.Content: My son uses the TV we just bought.  This is our second one.  We all like the picture, sound and features.Alan uses the netflix feature the most and it comes in very well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Chad Haas
Reviews.Content: I have loved this TV. I use it in my bedroom and it is the perfect size for me and is mounted in the corner. I like the smart features like netflix and use that a lot.I gave it one less star because it doesn't have a dedicated sleep time button on the remote, it works but not ideal to have to go through the settings menu.

Reviews.Title: Good TV. Terrible stand.
Reviews.Author: Michael Westbrook
Reviews.Content: The stand doesn't seem very stable. The TV will rock a bit if bumped but doesn't seem like it will fall over. Other then this seems like a good buy.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Amanda V. "mother of 3"
Reviews.Content: Love it! Internet features are great. Love the Netflix button and YouTube app. Pandora is a favorite of mine too. Color and clarity are awesome. Plan to buy another TV but bigger sometime down the road. The 32" is a great size but hubby wants the 46" too. Would and have recommended vizio for TV's. Can't wait to try their PC out. This seems to be the next up and coming company in the mid price range but with high quality! Love it! Defintatly competes with our 32" Sony but that one wasn't internet capable so its not fair to say I love my vizio more.

Reviews.Title: Great customer service
Reviews.Author: Barbara Sneddon
Reviews.Content: Due to a very knowledgable young man with good customer care means a lot to me.  We don't find enough people like him these days.  Kudos to Amazon for hiring good caring as well as knowledgable people.  He made me feel "special"!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for little money
Reviews.Author: Maria Gonzales
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my bedroom and I absolutely love it. The picture is very clear and the extras are perfect for lazy days..

Reviews.Title: Bang for the bucks
Reviews.Author: Luden
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Very easy to setup. Can't expect more for that price. The smart TV options are few but includes the most important things.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: JGR
Reviews.Content: Very good picture. Wi Fi capability is not as good as expected. Has to buffer frequently pausing the video during streaming.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome. I have had no problems with it. The setup is very, very simple and the picture quality is better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Bigger TV in the Same Space for Less $
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Happy with the the VIZIO for its great picture, bigger size in its slim bezel design, easy to use smart TV apps and we spent less than we did for a much smaller TV just 4 years ago! Go VIZIO!

Reviews.Title: No trouble so far
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Norton
Reviews.Content: Over a month and no problems so far, is meeting my needs. I t also came in one piece. no Scratches

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Jodi D. Gilroy
Reviews.Content: This TV has a nice clear picture no matter where you stand. Sharp clean lines. Easy to use remote. Like the fact that the user manual is in the TV itself so you don't have to go looking for it.

Reviews.Title: Absolutey Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Jasmine
Reviews.Content: I owned a 32" Vizio Smart video before I got this one and have had a great experience. I'm very happy I now own another one of their products.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Charles Pelsue
Reviews.Content: Purchased at two thirds the cost of anything I could find locally - it was gift to my daughter for Xmas and she loves it.  Easy to set up, wifi works like a champ and it has great picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Earth Tribe
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture and GREAT Surround sound.  We had bought the sound bar too but returned it when we heard the sound coming from the TV, didn't need it.  Our last Vizio's sound wasn't this good.

Reviews.Title: Not a problem found
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Good T.V, everything is perfect, the TV does everything you need it to do audio is good picture is good.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Steve Johnson
Reviews.Content: This item was exactley as it was supposed to be and so far has preformed very well in the application that it was purchased for.

Reviews.Title: Loved It
Reviews.Author: ARDT
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv. Right away we noticed the sound quality was great.We were disappointed, however, to see pressure cracks and artifacts once we plugged it in. My son had noticed the Styrofoam inside the box that holds the tv in place was cracked and broken on the right hand side of the box, both top and bottom pieces. We can not say if it was Amazon or UPS. I was very pleased that the representative I spoke to at Amazon had offered to replace the tv, set it up with UPS to come and pick up the damaged tv, and have the replacement delivered within 2 days. I am very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my daughter's room. It is a really good size...it has a good picture. She loves the Smart TV features. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV.
Reviews.Author: Kelly Taylor
Reviews.Content: I needed a new TV for my room.  I'd never bought a smart TV before.  This one was so easy to set up, even I could do it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Condition. Fast Shipping. Why Pay more?
Reviews.Author: Donald Rosenwinkel
Reviews.Content: Perfect Condition. Fast Shipping. Why Pay more?If you put the picture in Movie mode it looks great.Otherwise it s very saturated.

Reviews.Title: Better than Expected
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "JSM"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up. Picture quality and sound were very good! Not much different from my 32" 1080p. I'm still rusty in using all the available apps.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jerome F Sah
Reviews.Content: Excellent value and easy setup! The picture could be better but youcan't beat this for price. Good connectivity and buffering for video streaming

Reviews.Title: best tv i've ever had
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: olympic tryouts at Breckenridge were great to see, and even tired old westerns have a whole new level of detail.  I only had a little, ghosty, B&W; tv in the seventies, so its a surprise to see what the seventies looked like at their best.the stand is as inflexible as a chastity belt - it would be nice if it would be as smart as the tv - but that's a very small point about a great tv/wifi/media player

Reviews.Title: Glad I waited for price to stabilize
Reviews.Author: Steve M
Reviews.Content: I was going to order this tv mid January but the price went from $448 to $618 a week or so before the super bowl.Hmmmmmmmmm.  I was not happy so I decided to go get it in tax free New Hampshire. Same price. $448It's a great tv. Just right for a 12x12 den.  But to jack the price before the super bowl?  Cost you a sale.

Reviews.Title: Once I received a working one it was great
Reviews.Author: Faye
Reviews.Content: First one I received would power up but could not program.  After returning it I waited much longer than anticipated for the replacement.  Which is on Amazon not Vizio.  The picture quality is good, sound good.  Easy to set up as long as you have the factory remote.  Can't program it with a universal fresh out of the box but once you have the initial set up done my universal works fine.....If it weren't for the disappointment of waiting so long for a working TV (did I mention it was a Christmas gift to the kids since our old one quit?.  No TV over Christmas holiday is not a good thing when kids receive a lot of video games and movies for gifts.

Reviews.Title: great size
Reviews.Author: DeeLila Murray
Reviews.Content: Even in the family room were our space is limited, it fit great.  I love it.  I wasn't looking for a Smart TV but someday I may check it out.  I just wanted something big enough to be able to read the closed captioning across the room.  My kitchen and family room are all in one, so I have it on a turntable to watch even if I am cooking.

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: Great picture and easy to set up. Wish I could have gotten a bigger one really user friendly I'll enjoy it.v

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Simba4runner
Reviews.Content: I have replaced all my Sony TV's as they wear out with Vizio TV's in my home.  This particular one has been placed in my bedroom.It's the perfect wide screen size.  My only issue which I need to call Vizio or my provider is that I have to run a channel scan to get a non fuzzy picture.  I think that is just a minor tweak and then it will be fine.

Reviews.Title: set up was confusing
Reviews.Author: eddie castleberry
Reviews.Content: however, support was excellent and i talked to a real person.  i would recommend this product to someone.  great deal.

Reviews.Title: A great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Jonathan loop
Reviews.Content: The new kitchen I'm putting in the house has a niche for a tv to watch news, cooking shows etc. after readingReviews and comparing products the Visio was the best choice and a great price. I have never purchasedSomething like a tv over the Internet, but it arrived in two days, no problems and frankly quite painless.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E390i-A1 39-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Frank Stadulis
Reviews.Content: Good TV.Enjoy smart functionality. Easy setup and install. Running in minutes. Picture quality very good but not excellent. Would definitely recommend this TV at the Amazon prime price paid.

Reviews.Title: Visio 50 Inch Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Greg Lawrenson
Reviews.Content: This TV has been great since the first day. The picture is fantastic. I am very happy with the TV and would recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Updated 03/2014: Not so Great
Reviews.Author: ema
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I wants to upgrade to a smart tv but couldn't afford a huge one. I've been very happy with this, both in terms of picture quality and also the features. The editors at consumer reviews also gave it a good rating. I'd definitely recommend this.Update 03/2014:My tv suddenly disconnected from wifi in the middle of a show. I checked, and the signal strength is excellent according to the tv itself when I checked the connection. In fact, all my other devices have no problem. It's never happened before. I've tried to reconnect several items, but it's still "unable to connect", even after entering my password a million times. I've heard other people have had similar issues with this model.  Plus I scanned for local channels and it's finding nothing. That's impossible. Customer service is unavailable after 6 because it's a weekend, so it's going to be a long wait. I'm starting to regret getting this.....

Reviews.Title: 42 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Chet allen
Reviews.Content: A wonderful smart tv it was a good buy i will always buy vizio tv i own three so far great tv thanks

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture - great family room TV!
Reviews.Author: DSchroe260 "dschroe260"
Reviews.Content: I searched for several months trying to decide which TV to buy - but when our old TV gave out - I had to made a decision...and I truly believe I made the right choice! This TV has an awesome picture and is a great family room TV - easy to use and great to watch all our favorites on!

Reviews.Title: Not a true 120hz
Reviews.Author: unhappy custumer
Reviews.Content: Great TV so far except that it doesn't have 120hz refresh rate as they advertise and if it does it doesn't have software installed to use it.I was hoping for a TV that would make blue rays look like a soap opera or like you were right there on the set, I know some people don't like that feel but most 120hz TVs come with the option to turn it on or off this TV is turned to off permanently. If you don't believe me look this tv up on CNET. I still decided to keep it though since it's the best for your buck and samsungs are just to much for me.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Donald B.
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a smaller size to fit between kitchen counter and upper wall cabinets.  Fits perfect!  The stand on this TV is on the back instead of under it so I could have purchased a slightly larger size but I am completely satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Impressive Little TV
Reviews.Author: Eric S
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for my daughter's room and she's been extremely happy with it. Further, it was a plug and play experience to set it up so I was quite pleased as well. Plugged it in, connected it to wi-fi, explored all the apps, never a glitch. The picture quality is really very good right out of the box so I have not tinkered with it as yet and streaming Netflix or Amazon Video is a snap. Happy, happy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sweeby "Sweeby"
Reviews.Content: This is a phenomenal tv especially for the price.  I couldn't be happier with this TV.  I did buy a different remote that included a keyboard on the back to go with it instead of the stock remote, but other than that it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: performs well is easy to set up
Reviews.Author: hugh b.
Reviews.Content: The TV was easy to set up and connect to the internet. The only issue was the WiFi signal needs to be close and strong. I placed a signal enhancer and the issue cleared up.Picture and sound are excellent

Reviews.Title: great T.V.
Reviews.Author: Christopher McVay
Reviews.Content: I love it! Easy to assemble, Easy to set up, Wonderful bright picture. I do have a few complaints, one is that the base is not as steady as I would like and the Remote does not have a keyboard. But other than that I love it :)

Reviews.Title: Basic TV
Reviews.Author: Jones
Reviews.Content: I guess for the money, it's ok.  Not as sharp a picture as my comparable Samsung.  Has a narrow viewing angle, basic case, no swivel stand, and I don't really consider it a "smart" TV as it does not come with a browser.  Apps that come with it are ok, but when you select an app, it only comes up on the left third of the screen.  I would definitely prefer the app to fill the screen.  Makes going thru Amazon Prime very tedious.  I usually give up and load Amazon Prime thru my game console.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Mac n  cheese
Reviews.Content: I got this TV and for the money expected much less quality. Great tv, I recommend this as a option to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Big Bang For The Buck
Reviews.Author: Zizerzazz
Reviews.Content: This is my first Vizio.  Picture, sound, controls are excellent and set up was a breeze. Based on my experience with this so far, IF IT LASTS, I would definitely consider a larger Vizio for my family room.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv at a Low Price
Reviews.Author: Mike Ciocco
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical when I purchased this tv based on reviews saying that the built in apps lag and that it takes forever for the tv to turn on.  I personally don't think it takes that long for the TV to power on.. I mean come on.. you can't wait a few seconds for it?  The picture is beautiful and I never have any frustration when watching netflix.. works just as good as it does on my PS4 and computer.. but even better bc its a push of a button on the remote away from activating.. opposed to having to turn on my ps4 or navigate from my computer.  I also use this a a computer monitor sometimes as well and can't even tell the difference of it being 720p.. still looks great and was an upgrade from my last Panasonic viera 32 inch.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Awesome !!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Willimson
Reviews.Content: I love this tv.It was easy to set up, the picture is clear and the sound is medium / loud.

Reviews.Title: 4th Vizio
Reviews.Author: Michael McGill "EmTwo"
Reviews.Content: Decision to buy this model a no brainer, I have 3 other Viziio's in the house, with plans to buy a 5th. Ease of setup, feature set, and performance top notch.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: benjamin bird
Reviews.Content: We love our TV we have had it for a couple of weeks now and could not be happier with it! I read that some people were having issues with the volume be we have not had any issues. The picture quality is fantastic, and it has proven to be a great tv. I have not really used the internet on it yet, I just have it hooked up to my Genie box for Directv.

Reviews.Title: New to Smart TV's, this works
Reviews.Author: Bradley
Reviews.Content: The features advertised for Smart HDTV have all been accurate with internet compatibility, without trying an Apple TV or other similar type model the Vizio has worked up to our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Vizio means the best.
Reviews.Author: Louis Senerson
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product. One small complaint.. Numbers in top right corner are hard to see from a slight distance away., however, I am on the senior side of the clock so I can live with it. Shipping also great.I would recommend Vizio to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: James Derek Griggs
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfect for the bedroom. The picture is clear and the fact it has Apps is an added bonus. It also has an App Store to get more apps at too. If I'm not watching TV on it I'm playing pandora through it....NICE!

Reviews.Title: Clear picture with many features
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: The Vizio 29" TV was easy to set up, has a great picture and is a smart TV.  I like being able to access Amazon, Netflix etc.  I would recommend Vizio highly.

Reviews.Title: Good for its price.  Ideal for a small guest room or office.
Reviews.Author: Moo "Cow"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replaced an old tube tv in the guest room.  Definitely an upgrade from the old tube, but still has its drawbacks.  May return...Pro:Picture quality is very good for the priceAmazon and Netflix AppAble to watch stuff on USBCon:No continuous play on USB.  So if you're watching like a TV series, its quite annoying because you have to select the next episode.  The process is tedious in the beginning... You have to select the USB then choose from Music (Default), Photos, or Video.  If you select the wrong one (and EVERY SINGLE GUEST SELECTS THE WRONG ONE! which is music) you will see an empty flash drive.  You have to return to the main option and select the correct one.I've had this TV for two weeks and I'm still debating whether to keep it or not.  Love not having a separate media device and having only one remote to deal with, but very frustrating to deal with the non-autoplay option.

Reviews.Title: Could have been a 5 star rating.
Reviews.Author: Peter Goldstein
Reviews.Content: TV is excellent - great reception, great look.  The one objection I have is the assembly of the "legs".  It is impossible to screw the gismo they provide as the support into the base.  It's a major flaw.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Tad
Reviews.Content: This is the first TV I've bought for myself. I love it. I connected it to wifi and watch YouTube, Hulu, etc... This is a very neat smart TV. The only problem I have is that I notice the brightness of the picture fluctuates a little while watching TV. Overall, it's a pretty good TV.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Geiger
Reviews.Content: I got this for my craft room and haven't been using it a lot yet, but it is a little unclear unless you are looking straight on.  I read some had trouble with the WiFi if it wasn't close enough, but mine is two rooms away, and I have no problem.  I think this was a Great deal for the price!

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my workshop and was pleased at how well it worked. The wireless connectivity is a little slow but still good enough for 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Second Vizio purchase in 5 years
Reviews.Author: flora k strickland
Reviews.Content: My son purchased our first Vizio TV 5 years ago and we decided to purchase this TV to get the smart option. The first Vizio is in the bedroom my grandchildren sleep in when visiting. We have never had any problems and I would recommend to anyone a Vizio product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Rebecca B.
Reviews.Content: Great product. Internet at your fingertips. Very easy to navigate through the applications. Super slim. Looks great on the wall.

Reviews.Title: reply

Reviews.Content: the tv is smarter than me. has a great picture my old still is fine, it takes two of us to move it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Rodriguez "rir9005"
Reviews.Content: Great picture and ease of use. Great price and awesome features. I like the fact that you could play your phone's youtube app on the TV.

Reviews.Title: This is my 2nd one
Reviews.Author: T. Nathe
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my kids bed rooms.  They can stream their movies and shows so I can watch mine.  No issues hooking up the dvd players to it using composite / rca cables or if yours has a hdmi output even better.  Pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: OK Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: C. Rothwell
Reviews.Content: I'm using this for a computer monitor. It works just fine as a monitor out of the box. I read some reviews about things you have to do to make them work but none of that was necessary. I don't have television but I do stream some programs on it. I wish I had gotten 1080p but I was thinking more about size and location, in a hurry and wasn't thinking about that. It's fine for computer, could be better for streaming.

Reviews.Title: 19 Year Old
Reviews.Author: Carter
Reviews.Content: I purchase this product for my lazy 19 yr. old son. He loves this smart T.V. He is up almost all night watching movies or playing X-Box. Great picture for a good price. I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Son loves it
Reviews.Author: Rita Fox
Reviews.Content: Got this tv for my son for Xmas and he loves it. He wants a bigger one and put this one in his bedroom. He likes that he can get all his movies right there with a push of a button. Easy set up for him also.

Reviews.Title: Everything TV
Reviews.Author: Sheepfreak "WoolTales"
Reviews.Content: The TV is in a room with only WiFi so the fact that it's a smart TV is everything.  I can get my Hulu and Netflix.  I held out for the 120Hz.  Great price, too!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, sound disappointing
Reviews.Author: Nan Gilbert
Reviews.Content: The extra services this tv provides, such as direct connection to Netflix and Amazon, as well as clear picture, are plusses. However, the tinny quality of the sound is disappointing and somewhat annoying, and buying a sound bar for it would cost as much as the tv did! I would recommend it for someone who is looking for a smart tv at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Very Clear
Reviews.Author: Ms. Real "Keeping It Real"
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a Vizio. I was scared to find out if it was really clear or not. It is 2months old with a crystal clear picture. I can recommend this company for a Smart TV at least. I think it was priced nice. It was a house warming gift for my son. Oh and the customer service for this TV was awesome. The man walked me through the wi-fi connection patiently. The Tv instructions are on the TV screen instead of a paper book that use to come with TV's.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: it as to satisfy the streaming of most quality tv/movie programs, it would be more costly with other models todate

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift For Daughter
Reviews.Author: bocephus
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. She seems very pleased with it so far. She loves being able to the internet especially NetFlix.

Reviews.Title: My Teenage Daughter Loves this TV

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Vyolet
Reviews.Content: This TV was very easy to set up and I am no techie. Great picture. Very nice for the price.

Reviews.Title: Fits the bill
Reviews.Author: Heide Aguirre
Reviews.Content: Needed a tv to fit a limited space. This tv seemed to have the best bang for the buck. This tv had multiple HDMI inputs and WI-FI. Got the TV Labor Day weekend so had a fun weekend learning about it. Did adjust the the color. Wish the audio was better, seems a little low. Thats where it gets a 4-star rating. WI-FI was easy to set up. Mostly I use Netflix. 99% it works well. Bought the remote with QWERT keyboard on back from Amazon for $12. Bought the tv at Costco for extra warranty. I am a little-aholic, would recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great product, Great price
Reviews.Author: JLCB "JLCB"
Reviews.Content: I bought the 24" TV for my kitchen which fit perfectly under the cabinet.  It replaced a 19" that I had for years.  I like the slim design and that is was flush to the counter with no visible stand.  Set up was relative easy but the remote is small with very small buttons that were hard to maneuver without touching other buttons (my only complaint).This is a "Smart TV" which came with Netflix, Youtube, Hulu+ and Yahoo News apps plus a bunch of others.  Since I hooked up my Roku to it, I don't use the installed apps, although this was a nice feature.It connects with either your home antenna, cable, Wifi or Ethernet.  But don't confuse this with a computer....THERE IS NO INTERNET BROWSER!  Sound and screen are great and didn't need tuningAll-in-all, I am very pleased with this TV and recommend it.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: jeremy ian simms
Reviews.Content: The tv was fine but the WIFI apps didn't work so i had to return it.  I did get another Vizio though, a 40 Inch E series that works great.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price

Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and has a really good clear picture. I like to have Netflix on it. Also allows you to play youtube videos from your cell phone through its wireless access point.

Reviews.Title: because I read the reviews to base my decision

Reviews.Title: 42inch TV
Reviews.Author: Brenda Tyler
Reviews.Content: I have a 24 inch Visio that I love also. They are great TV's. It's the right size for a cabinet that I had built.

Reviews.Title: SMART Features
Reviews.Author: Anthony Hubert
Reviews.Content: It was a good picture, the 32 inch was a tad small for our bedroom.  The USB video would just stop playing for no reason ever so often.  The SMART feature was the real problem.  It would not load a program 9 times out of ten (Amazon or Netflix), it would just get stuck, or it would take for ever to load, show a segment of the program and then pause to buffer and then get stuck.  Memory was cleared as suggested by tech support - no resolution.  All other systems in the house worked perfectly (Roku etc.). It looks like we will go for a non SMART TV and get another Roku.

Reviews.Title: This purchase was to replave the TV in our RV

Reviews.Content: GREAT TV!!!  Very pleased with ease of set-up. Picture, color, and sound was great right out of the box. Considering another one of these for our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous television

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter, a critical television consumer, and she is thrilled.  Beautiful bright colors and sharp images.

Reviews.Title: Great T.v
Reviews.Author: Richard Slater
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv. Color,sound and picture is great and the wifi work really good and easy to use,

Reviews.Title: Keeping up with the changiing times.
Reviews.Author: kbar64
Reviews.Content: I love this new tv.I found it reasonly priced on Amazon.I reseached other tvs on other sites and also read the reviews and found this one l thought would best suit me.l was not disapointed.Picture is great and I really love all the apps you can chose from.I would have given it a 5 star rating if the sound system was good, but it's really not.The treable and midrange are crystal clear however there is no bass what so ever.I should have realized this being a flat screen right?No depth for woofers.I ordered a 38 inch vizio soundbar with bass built in and l'm hopeful this will fix my very minor problem.l ordered through Amazon and will arrive tuesday.I will update my review then when I have it hooked up.

Reviews.Content: I'm so happy with this purchase the Apps are excellent and work great on this TV and the picture is perfect love the sound.  Hell I love everything about this TV.  Great buy you'll be happy and overwhelmed once it's in your home and hooked up.  Love it!

It will connect but the signal is weak, causing some of the streaming services to not work like they should. I just use my ps3 for streaming. Overall still a good value

Reviews.Title: An Inconvenient Experience
Reviews.Author: Winola Denny-Smith
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the TV. My problem was the first one sent was,only in its own box and not an outside box with packing material. The screen was cracked so after hiring someone to install, I had to pay him anyway and then find the nearest store to return the damaged TV. The store employee almost did not take it because he said he needed the packing and outside box it was sent in. I showed him the mailing stickers on the box to show. That was how it was mailed. It was also left on my porch without me signing for it and with a picture of a TV showing it was soooo fortunate it wasn't stolen. the store clerk also said I should call you and request I sign for it. You have NO contact phone so again I had to wait for another to be mailed and stay home all day to make sure it was not stolen. How much easier to just go to a nearby store and purchase one to avoid ALL the inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Title: VIZIO and me

Reviews.Content: Just what I needed for my home office (24") with internet apps.  Picture is really nice and very good sound.  Set up in about 10 minutes and I'm still surfing the internet apps.  One small con, doesn't have Watch ESPN and I don't have this TV connected to my Dish.  I have 2 other 1080p HDTVs but this picture may be the best.  For the price, you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Needs sound bar.

Reviews.Content: The tv has a nice picture but it's speakers leave a little to be desired. A sound bar would be a nice accessory

Reviews.Title: Good TV, significant feature absent
Reviews.Author: justin caudill
Reviews.Content: The television I recieved came with a broken wifi adapter. I cant detect wifi anywhere and have to connect it with an ethernet cable. Which is a $40 eyesore I didnt anticipate buying.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice !!
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture , perfect for gaming , movies , day time TV . I would buy one , if I wasn't already satisfied w/ the one I have ;)

Reviews.Title: Good value

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: SJ
Reviews.Content: I have it in my guest room and the picture is very clear, the apps are easy to use. It is definitely good enough for what I am using it for.

Reviews.Title: it was a great tv and I felt it worked exactly hiw I wanted it to work
Reviews.Author: bryan halterman
Reviews.Content: It works really good and it is definatly something I would recomend for someone to get even if it is just a first tv.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 32" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: SR
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up -- watched Netflix within 10 minutes - great picture sound would recommend it for sure

Reviews.Title: A great tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: Mary Wesley
Reviews.Content: Great reasonably priced smart tv. Easy to navigate with bright colors. The easy setup was done quickly. Joined immediately to my wifi and was ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Milky, Flooded Quality -- How much is your time worth?
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: My family and I are taking this back and ordering a higher-end from a different brand.  For $100-200 more, you can easily get a much better non-smart TV and a BluRay w/wifi or a Nintendo Wii to play Netflix/Amazon.I know this is only 720p and that it's a low model, but it shouldn't be this difficult to get a decent picture for 250 bucks.  Blacks are often gray, and in dark movie scenes, it's as if someone is shining a flashlight from the top & bottom of the screen.  My family has fiddled with all options (except "backlight"--see below), and though we managed to get an OK picture, there's a milky, light-flooded quality that just can't be overcome.  We also tried the calibration suggested by a previous 5-star review, but the picture actually seems worse than what we managed to get!BACKLIGHT OPTIONEven after turning "backlight control" from "off," the TV would not allow for adusting the backlight, which is frozen.  Even if I'm missing something here, it shouldn't be so difficult to figure out how to adjust this.  Some may call me tech illiterate (though I'd disagree).  But assuming that's true, if the whole purpose of not permitting us to adjust the backlight is so that the tech-illiterate won't accidentally distort the image, then the default should be such that the image is acceptable to us imbeciles.LOAD TIMEAnother minor flaw is that the load times are quite slow for apps and even for the monitor's boot-up.  Netflix sometimes takes 20 seconds, and it's hard to tell whether the app is actually loading or not.  TV boot-up time varies.  My advice: don't let this be the deciding factor.SOME PROSThe smart app buttons on the TV are convenient, but I attribute this more to the convenience of smart tvs as a whole and less to this particular incarnation.  The sharpness of the image is not bad.  My issues with the picture concern the light, not the sharpness.  Obviously, if you're looking for true HD, you should be looking for 1080 (so this is not a factor in my low rating).OVERALL--PAY MORE FOR SOMETHING BETTERThis TV has caused a lot of headache for a family that wasn't looking for perfection.  I'm giving it 2 stars not because it's unbearable but because I value my time, and it wasn't worth the time dealing with the picture.  It'd be OK in a dorm or if you want cheap smart tv functions for occasional wifi streaming.  If you're a TV expert, maybe you can figure out the calibrations quickly or point out the errors of my actions (which I would welcome!), but most of us aren't wanting a course on television functions. We just want a nice picture, which we should get for this price point.  My advice: upgrade.

Reviews.Title: E390i-A1 Review
Reviews.Author: Cygnus X-1
Reviews.Content: Not a bad TV but not a great TV. I bought this for my son for Xmas and I spent a lot of time setting it up and playing with it.I waited until it was less than $400 here on Amazon which is a decent price. Sometimes it's a lot higher than that and the TV is not worth it.Some good things:The picture is good, really sharp. The sound is OK. There are a ton of adjustments so you can spend a lot of time playing with it. There are plenty of inputs and you can actually give each source it's own custom name which is nice. Each source can also have it's own mode settings (example, Game Mode for the Wii U input). Setting up the ethernet connection was simple. I use a wire though, not wireless. The web apps are cool, once you get them to load. Youtube works great once it loads. The TV is ultra light so it's easy to setup or move.Some bad things:The web apps are slow to load and the TV quite often locks up. That's really annoying and you have to turn it off to reboot it. You can't upgrade the firmware manually, I guess it's done automatically. Once the apps load though they seem to work well. Also, mine had a weird effect where the screen would slowly brighten then dim then brighten then dim etc. I thought it was a defect but turning off the Smart Dimming feature solved it. That feature is defaulted to "ON" which doesn't make sense since it's annoying.I hope they update the firmware soon to make the apps load faster and quit locking up. I question whether I should have paid the extra for the Smart features and instead just went for a basic Samsung TV? Other than that, time will tell if this thing is reliable.

Reviews.Title: 39-inch - Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: William Dickerson
Reviews.Content: I bought some LG 42" LED TV about a year ago and returned it due to horrible sound quality and back-light bleed.  So in purchasing this TV, I was worried I might experience some of the same issues which seem to consistently plague LED's.  Not the case!  Couldn't be more pleased with the picture quality, and the sound quality for an LED TV is outstanding.  No need for a soundbar if you're in a normal sized living room.The smart TV interface is also great.  Before setting up the TV I had assumed we would continue using the XBox for our Netflix/Hulu/etc needs due to the speedy interface and controls.  No way.  Now the XBox only gets fired up for games.  I actually prefer the Vizio interface over the XBox 360's.Setting up the picture took some significant effort, as the picture was very washed out at first, the colors very dull. But now we got it to a place that makes this TV rival my previous CCFL LCD that I had for about 7 years and loved.  If I get the chance, I'll update this review with my settings.Couldn't be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Would Have Been A Five
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Monica
Reviews.Content: AS stated but can not let cat's in bedroom because I am afraid thy will knock TV over. Stand is way too unstable. Great features if I ever learn apps, Good picture and sound. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Love it...
Reviews.Author: Michael Wellington
Reviews.Content: I have three of these and I really like this TV....It's light weight, and easy to set up.. The TV has a great picture and sound..

Reviews.Author: Catherine Black
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my dorm room and really loved it at first. Somebody else in the building near me had one and the signals tend to get mixed which made my volume go up or down or my netflix close out randomly but since I've had it home I've had none of those problems. I really really love all the things this tv can do and the picture is outstanding!! I would definitely buy this again if I needed to.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy the freedom this tv allows.
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Waldie "washbasin"
Reviews.Content: The remote could use some improving but overall I am very satisfied with this purchase. It is worth the purchase.

Reviews.Author: Cow
Reviews.Content: Great TV with an easy to navigate smart menu.  This is my second Vizio in 3 years and I will continue to buy this brand until I can afford the more prestigious Samsungs!

Reviews.Title: Great picture in a small package.
Reviews.Author: aemininger
Reviews.Content: Great price, purchased for my 1 1/2yr old grandson for his bedroom so he can watch Disney channel and Netflix for kids.  The stand is different and is mounted on the back, but this TV will be mounted on the wall so the stand is not a critical item for this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: Its a good little television. We use it in our bedroom where it is mounted to the wall. Nice picture and decent sound for TV speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: M. Allen
Reviews.Content: I didn't buy this TV through Amazon, but at Target so my review is of the TV itself. It's a great TV, but here are a couple of recommendations. For the best picture, I would suggest setting the picture mode to "game", has the sharpest and brightest colors without washing out which the "vivid" setting seems to do. Also, set the color temperature to "computer". FYI, it takes about 20 seconds to connect to your cable box (may be the cable box and nothing to do with the TV) before the picture appears. The Twitter, Amazon and Facebook apps are pretty cool. I prefer Netflix through my Apple TV, so I can't comment on that app. Overall, once you get the picture/color settings adjusted to your liking, it's a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Great but the remore will drive you a littel crazy.
Reviews.Author: HB
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for a reasonable price.  I have had it about a month now.  I'm not what you would call tech savvy and I was able to set this up fairly easily. I purchased the 29in version. I was worried as a film person about such a "small" size, but i must say I am content with it. The picture is good. It faces away from windows so I can't speak as to glare. I don't have cable. I havent in several years actually. So, I needed to be able to watch hulu and netflix with out my PS3 which is in storage in a different state. This tv does that very easily. There is even a netflix button (unnecessary but there none the less). The one issue I have with the TV is that the remote is not very easy to use. The buttons are hard to press and I honestly think that a QWERTY would be a very good addition and make set up easier. I never thought my WIFI pw was long until I had to use this remote to put it in and messed up a few times.

Reviews.Title: vizio

Reviews.Content: Second Vizio and great TV. Good price and they do stand behind product. I recommend it for anyone any time.

Reviews.Title: may have gotten a lemon
Reviews.Author: Anthony B.
Reviews.Content: The TV was great for 3 months, then one evening I noticed 1 dead pixel in the middle of the screen.  3 tv's, 2 months and multiple phone calls to vizio later we have a new working tv.Our first tv was replaced with a refurb that had 5 dead pixels as soon as i took it out of the box, the next tv they tried to say was damaged in shipping the third was sent through a white glove shipping company and finally seems to be working. I bought this TV based on vizios reputation and I have to say I was disappointed with my experience, but they did eventually do the right thing and get me a working TV.

Reviews.Title: Front facing speakers - good sound
Reviews.Author: Robert S
Reviews.Content: I needed a 29" TV that would fit into an entertainment unit so I originally bought an LG 29LN4510. However I couldn't get past the awful sound from the downward facing speakers when placed in a recess.  I just wanted voices to be clear but they were not despite tweaking the numerous audio settings available.  I bought the Vizio E291i-A1 because it had front facing speakers and these proved far superior - not a home theater but plenty of volume and crisp clear voice.  After tweaking settings on both I was also able to get a noticeably better picture on the Vizio in terms of color, contrast, and detail. I'm very pleased with the picture.  The LG does have a wider viewing angle but fine detail seems slightly soft - and it's just not as life-like.  I didn't originally care about smart TV features but I've found they're a big plus for the Vizio - the Netflix app is a pleasure to use. The Vizio has an unusual stand which tips the TV back slightly - perfect for me but  might not work well if the TV is placed above eye level.

Reviews.Title: Caveat emptor! This TV looks nothing like the pictures shown!
Reviews.Author: Alexander Boudreau
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a few days after Christmas. I was looking for a slightly bigger TV then the one I had and this one seemed perfect. Due to the pictures on the website I was lead to believe all the HDMI ports were all on the side and that it had a stereo audio out port for a 3.5 mm audio device (headphones or the cord similar to the end of headphones). As I opened the product and began to hook it up I noticed that the side of the TV looked nothing like what was pictured. Only one HDMI port was on the side, the other was on the bottom. Also there was no stereo audio out only an optical and a red and white left and right audio out. The TV you receive when you order this product looks like the pictures shown on the VIZIO E320-B0E 32-Inch model. I was not happy since I have computer speakers and a subwoofer that were now not compatible with this TV because they had a 3.5 mm cord and the TV does not have one as shown on the website. I called Amazon and they kindly shipped me a new one that came in 2 days. I was annoyed again to see that they had sent me the exact same model as the first one I received. Clearly VIZIO updated the model without updating their pictures of the device because if you look on the official website and the instruction manual that is given to you they do not match so beware. Other then that I really like the TV. The size is nice for my room, the picture is great and the Netflix ability is nice. Sound is not great, but I bought a VIZIO sound bar and connected it to the TV through the optical port and it sounds great. If you plan to buy this TV beware that the pictures look nothing like what is shown on the TV. If you want a more accurate picture of it look at the  VIZIO E320-B0E 32-Inch model because those pictures are what the TV you receive will look like!

Reviews.Author: W. Solis
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a month now.  It works great, easy to install, and it works well with a comcast box and a sony receiver + speakers.  Tech support is decent and they make an honest effort to help you.  The TVs apps (Netflix, etc) work great but you will need an additional optical cable or RCA if your receiver is not HDMI-ARC compatible... otherwise no sounds comes out.  This TV is for  my living room and replaced an old Sony Bravia 40 inch.  The picture is sharper and the colors more vivid.  We mainly watch some network tv shows, but stream most of the time from netflix or hulu ---great picture and sound through wired ethernet connection; I yet have to try the wi-fi connection.  Overall, I'm happy with the purchase and the main attributes are easy installation, good picture, and not expensive compared to other 46/47-inch TVs.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV - great value
Reviews.Author: R. G. Phipps "rphipps124"
Reviews.Content: My reference point for comparing this tv is a five year old 37" Vizio LED TV.  Let's start of by noting that it is thin and relatively light. We were able to take it put of the box and place it on the stand with no trouble. When we powered it up, the tv led me through a guided setup, got it on the network, and registered the TV. I really liked this.The picture was excellent.  My mother in law, (it's her tv) noted how crisp and clear it was for her, and started to chuckle at how much detail it revealed of the local tv anchors.  I was impressed at how bright the tv was.  We both very much liked the on screen controls. She particularly liked the ability to label the inputs with user friendly names (Cable, Roku, Blu Ray) which had bedeviled her on her older tv.  The remote was friendly, and the tv played nice with her Verizon Fios cable box.The only minor criticism I have is the wireless seemed a bit flaky.  I could not get the Amazon app to load. This wasn't a big deal, and is something we will play with over time.  She generally prefers the Roku box and we didn't dwell on troubleshooting.The four hdmi ports are generous.  I was a little iffy about having two on the side, but was pleasantly surprised how well positioned they were and hid the hdmi cable I plugged into port 3.Overall, a gorgeous picture, relatively light weight, small bezel came together in a great package.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: PS
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV! The only thing I was disappointed with was that it does not have a browser. To me Smart meant - connect to the internet and be online! I have to give it 5 stars because this information is available I just did not do my research and assumed it should work with any web content. Turns out it only works with apps that have been developed for that specific tv... The Netflix app is perfect - I have access to my list, recommended shows separated into categories displayed on the full screen! I love the new feature where Netflix automatically plays Series episodes one after the other. With the Amazon app on the other hand, I have to click 6 times back and forth, up and down until i get to the next episode, and I have not figured out a way to save my streaming included with membership shows in a list, so I have to search for a show - type its name - every time I turn on the tv... Very disappointing. Netflix is the leader - I will not give it up! Otherwise, the TV is great - this is my first flat screen but I can compare the picture to my friends TVs and I like mine better :) Good contrast and easy access to multiple picture adjustments - for example I lowered the saturation :)

The only thing I'm not happy with is that the remote control is way to little and buttons are pressed to close together; however, it is something that you can easily overlook!

Reviews.Title: Great for viewing
Reviews.Author: Shyam
Reviews.Content: I bought the 39 inch and it is absolutely great for viewing. Youtube and netflix is superb on this one. For my xbox this is perfect. Good for an apartment. I wud definitely recommend this one !!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E320i-A0 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: 808soljahz
Reviews.Content: i chose this rating because i totally love my new tv:) it was what i wanted now having this tv i would love to order another one for my parents and i would love to have the size bigger as well!! :)

Reviews.Title: Pretty Damn Good
Reviews.Author: R. Graner
Reviews.Content: Very good product. I can't remember if I bought a refurbished one or not because there is a small cloudy spot the size of a silver dollar (for those who remember what size that is) It's not irritating but is noticeable in brighter scenes. Hook-up was so simple and my netflix works flawlessly. I also have the new chromecast wifi hook-up for all my other computer streaming, this is different from the TV but it works without any other wires or complications. Overall I am extremely satisfied with this purchase and recommend it to you others.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Alexandria Jones
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for in a tv! Love that it's a smart tv in such a small size

Reviews.Title: great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Matt R Bier
Reviews.Content: all around good tv. connects to computer through hdmi with no problems. easy to set up. good quality picture. pretty much like any other vizio...

Reviews.Title: Love my Vizio!
Reviews.Author: EnidT
Reviews.Content: I chose this Tv after doing research on several models in this class. It seemed this model was given thumbs up every where I looked. It took a little to get used to the size since it was replacing a 23" tube Tv. It seemed tiny in comparison but the convenience of having all the apps I use on screen and the clear picture and sound won me over. Also, it uses about $6 in electricity per year. I was sold!

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Speakers are so-so
Reviews.Author: Scott Beauchemin
Reviews.Content: This TV has loads of options.  The reason I went with this TV is the internet apps.  We use Pandora, netflix and Hulu and there are tons and tons of other apps and even games.The 2 negatives I have are the speaker and the remote.  The speaker is pretty cheap.  Don't expect movie theater sound quality out of the speakers.  You could get a sound bar as a alternative. The remote works fine, but the buttons feel cheap.  No big deal.  I do wish you could program special buttons. Example:  There is a button on the remote for Netflix and it takes you to netflix, but if you want to go directly in to pandora, there is no button and you can't program one of the buttons for pandora.  Again, not a big deal, but would be a nice to have feature.So if you are looking for a decent TV with a ton of internet options, this is a great buy.  Would be great for a kids room or a workout room or even in a dorm room.  Would not be a great TV to use as your main TV.

Reviews.Title: Visio E470i-AO TV
Reviews.Author: nancy jacomella "bigg010"
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV !!!Bigger than I intended to buy, but, the price was right from amazon.Easy to set up, even for grandmas'.Great picture and sound.Fast delivery, right into my living room !!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Brian Saltos
Reviews.Content: Love the tv. Have had no problems with it so far. Image is clear sound is great. I would recommend others to buy.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E390i-A1
Reviews.Author: Larry Burns
Reviews.Content: Met all my needs.  Mounted it in my RV and it fits perfect, lighter weight than it's predecessor and the picture is great just like on my other 3 Vizio TVs.  Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Simplify and De-Clutter with this all-in-one solution.
Reviews.Author: Bumbler
Reviews.Content: I bought this Digital Ready, Wi-Fi ready, HDTV to replace an old 19 inch TV, Tuning adapter and Roku box that was cluttering up the kids room.
