I got rid of the boxes, wires and extra remotes. Now the room looks Fantastic and with the one remote we can turn on the TV, Amazon Prime and let Dora the Explorer and other kids shows babysit. Mounted on wall with VideoSecu TV Wall Mount Articulating Arm Bracket for VESA 100 LCD LED Flat Panel Screen TV and Monitor ML10B 1E9, outdoor antenna  Winegard HD7694P High Definition VHF/UHF Antenna both from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: i just made another great purchase on amazon , i am very happy
Reviews.Author: rdv
Reviews.Content: my first new tv in 15 years , it took 2 people to carry the old tv out , once I got it plugged in I was amazed at how nice the picture was,after about 2 hours I realized I had not tried a hd channel , wow I am hooked

Reviews.Title: One Mishap, but a Great TV
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth Paurazas
Reviews.Content: My family only buys Vizio, so naturally, when the time came to upgrade my TV, I got a Vizio. Great TV, picture, price, etc.I do a lot of gaming, and this TV is great for it! Picture is super clear, refresh rate is great, etc.The only reason this didn't get 5 stars from me was because the FIRST TV I received had a cracked panel... meaning when I turned the TV on, the screen itself was fine... however the actual picture was "broken"After calling VIzio, they explained to me this was an issue to take up with Amazon because after it left their warehouse (in working condition) it was Amazon's responsibility. However they did inform me that the panel being broken was due to it either being dropped or having pressure applied to it.You would think with a TV in a marked Vizio box, they would think to handle it carefully.However, that aside, after a quick phone call to Amazon customer service, they sent me shipping label to send the new one back and had a new TV shipped to my house within three days.A little bit of an inconvenience and a let down. But overall, great customer service & a great TV.Thank you Amazon & Vizio :)

Reviews.Title: Love Vizio
Reviews.Author: M.E.
Reviews.Content: Great TV. However, on the "normal" screen setting, along the top, the picture is cracky (is that a word? Lol). All other setting shows a great pic. If I hadn't tossed out the box, I would've returned it for another.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price....no problem with netflix
Reviews.Author: Susan Castaldi "suzi1967"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv after quite a bit if research and suggestions.  I love it...no problem at all with netflix loading and/or staying connected.  I absolutely recommend VIZIO

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Danielle Wiggins
Reviews.Content: I love this television.  I purchased it for my 5 year old and I mounted it on the wall.  The picture is amazing and my son loves that he can easily access Netflix with the touch on one button.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 50" FLAT SCREEN TV
Reviews.Author: Bill Kurps
Reviews.Content: The VIZIO TV is our first flat screen, we love the picture and sound quality. It was very easy to set up and watch. The VIZIO seems to be good quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good TV purchase but there is always a "BUT"!
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Lorenzo "HFH Builder"
Reviews.Content: This TV had exactly what we were looking for in a "smarter" TV. The picture quality is quite good, the size and weight are just perfect for our use (bed room unit). We especially like the capability to download movies via Amazon or Netflix. I would add that the navigation for these internet sites is a bit clumsy when searching titles and is in part due to the limited smarts of the TV/remote and the sites. We have not hooked up "hard wire"  to the internet yet and as a result the picture quality is a bit lacking. Hoping for a better level via a hard wire option which we will do soon. Sound level/quality is quite acceptable,  My biggest negative is the remote. It is too small for one handed operation. Button pushing, especially the extensions of the channel, e.g. 12.1, is really has to be managed two handed to make consistent changes. One other complaint and "it is a start up out of the box issue". Your instructions for the TV are embedded in the software stored on the TV. There is just a short leaflet to get you started. So when you bring the unit up if it doesn't default to the right/logical point you are stuck. I had to call the hot line for help. They don't even tell you there is an ON/OF button on the TV. I had to unplug the unit for 30 seconds from the wall, shut the power off (it is in a very inconspicuous place).and then reverse the process to get back to the correct default screen.

Reviews.Title: Research wifi issues with smart tv's. Be prepared and then enjoy!
Reviews.Author: Heather M.
Reviews.Content: LOVE this TV!!It is beautiful to watch, high quality picture, love the smart tv functions, and so worth the money.Having said that, be aware that the wifi signal is not strong. After many phone calls to Netflix, Vizio, etc... we just gave up and ran a internet cable to the tv. No problems since. If you research this issue, you'll find that this is common with all smart tv's and there are so many forums and blogs about how to fix this problem. We tried everything under the moon and still... Netflix would constantly buffer even though it said I had a strong signal. Netflix blamed Vizio, Vizio blamed Netflix. We then had our internet provider come out to the house just to check things on our end... our wifi was not the problem. After connecting internet directly to the tv.. the buffering stopped and the tv works great.

Reviews.Title: Amazing value.
Reviews.Author: nknknnk
Reviews.Content: I really feel sorry for those who didn't receive a working unit. This TV is an absolute bargain.I purchased the 50" model, mainly use it for gaming and streaming HD contents from Amazon and Netflix.The apps that come with the TV work fine enough, slightly laggy, but it's really minor.The picture is very good. Nothing otherworldly, but for a $650 product, it's exceptionally good.The "gaming mode" is great also, as it improves response time and is pretty much essential for all gamers.---------------------------------------------------I don't like my videos too dark, and I've always like a blueish hue in my pictures, so here are the settings that work for me.Picture Mode: MovieBacklight: 71Brightness: 52Contrast: 49Color: 40Tint: 0Sharpness: 2Color Temperature: CustomRed Gain: 38Green Gain: 44Blue Gain: 54Red Offset: 53Green Offset: 48Blue Offset: 51Noise Reduction: OffMPEG NR: OffColor Enhancement: Rich ColorAdaptive Luma: MediumFilm Mode: AutoSmart Dimming: OffAmbient Light Sensor: Off

Reviews.Title: Nice apps with good size for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Charlene E. Ellis
Reviews.Content: Chose this because of the price over a preferred Samsung model.  After seeing both models in a local WALMART, I have to say the picture is a little dull compared to the crispness of the Samsung. The smart tv apps are okay as long as you get a strong signal from cable/satelite internet carrier.Was very disappointed with delivery which came to me 4 days instead of the 2 day guaranteed delivery. Had to arrange for someone to be here due to me being disabled.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Anthony Arroyo
Reviews.Content: I'm in love. I was stuck with a 26' television I've owned since 2000, so an upgrade was needed for sure. Could not get rid of the Kool Aid smile during the installation. Took about two days to configure everything where I wanted it to be (Apps, color, location, etc.). It's still early, but yes, I am in love.

Reviews.Title: Vizio... happily surprised
Reviews.Author: W. C.
Reviews.Content: Vizio has definitely stepped their game up since they first started making TV's! The picture is beautiful. I don't feel like I'm losing any quality when I go from my LARGE samsung in the living room to this Vizio in my bedroom.Two things stop me from giving it 5 stars.1. It looks great but it can tip over if whatever it is sitting on is given a pretty good bump(tested it out a few times). I doubt my 2 year old could hit it with enough force but it may be possible. I wish it came with something to help secure it. I ended up threading the cable wire through the back of the back to catch it if it falls.2. No HBOGo!?!?!? I didn't realize that Vizio hadn't worked that out yet. That needs to be done ASAP.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E420i-A0 42-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Adam Hammmond
Reviews.Content: I bought this 42'' tv back in April. I LOVE IT. Only issues I've had is the speakers aren't the best for music but not by much. The Internet apps are awesome, even though I only use Youtube and Netflix. Amazing tv for an amazing price

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV at an Even Better Price!
Reviews.Author: Justin N
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome. I got it for only $449 on Amazon a couple of weeks ago. The picture is crystal clear, bright, and looks great. I bought this TV mainly for watching sports, and I have not seen any motion blur or weird picture problems when watching basketball or football since I got the TV. I could not be happier with the price, or the way it worked out. The only minor problem is that I don't think the WiFi antenna in the TV is super strong. I tried watching Amazon instant video on it, but the signal can be a bit sketchy from time to time. Overall, a 50 inch led 120hz TV for $449 is incredible. It has a super slim bezel around the edge, and looks great in my living room. I would buy it again!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E500i-A1 50-inch 1080P 120Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: BKR
Reviews.Content: Got 50 inch version for $449 prior to black friday from a major (BB) store.For that money, it's an outstanding tv.  For $650, it's a very good tv.Sound is fair so get a soundbar.  It's good enough for my bedroom though.Picture is great with recommended settings from cnet.Again, 50 inches of beauty for $450!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Great deal

Reviews.Title: Need bigger remote
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Foss
Reviews.Content: The remote is SMALL with the channel numbers near the bottom so hard to use with one hand.  The sound leaves a lot to be desired, otherwise pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for my situation
Reviews.Author: Larry W. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to fit in my Sunnybrook fifth wheel travel trailer to replace the dinosaur CRT that weighs a ton.  I bought the largest flat screen that would fit in the existing opening.  I had a special mount made for it so that it would be stabilized while traveling.  It does good as a mobile unit.  I had some trouble with the brightness control to start with, but after calling customer service, that seems to be fixed, after turning off some of the automatic room ambient light adjustments.  This is the first VIZIO I've owned, and so far, it is providing a great picture and color.

Reviews.Title: Good tv. Good price. It's worth it.
Reviews.Author: Tt71
Reviews.Content: Just got it today and it seems to have a great picture. I was prepared to have to get a sound bar based on other reviews but I don't think it's needed.  I'll have to wait and see.  The picture is clear, with vibrant colors and it is easily adjusted.  It isn't as easy to set up with cables as I had thought, especially since I was using my old ones and the customer support was only mildly helpful. I had a picture but no sound, them sound but a grey scale image.  Once I stepped back and thought about it I was able to set it up again without a problem.  Sounds good, looks good, Internet connection was simple and only took a minute to do. I have the router about 80 feet away and two rooms down so i was pleasantly surprised. I can't get the stand to be completely level though and the tv is tilting slightly to the right.  No one else seems to be bothered by this though. One suggestion for anyone looking to buy this tv though... Set up with a hdmi (hmdi?) cable would be much easier.  It's worth buying it at the same time.  I'll be stopping off to pick one up on my way home tomorrow. I'm also going to be looking for a Visio all in one remote so I can control the cable box and still access the Visio features. Not sure if the make one though. I have to say the SMART thing might be over rated.  I'll have to play with it more though. But since I have Verizon the features it has were already options on my 10 year old set through Fios. I wasn't overly impressed. Bottom line... Very good tv especially for the features and the price. Especially with free 2 day shipping from Amazon prime. That was a definite plus.

Reviews.Title: Already dead after 3 months
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Thomas Bengel
Reviews.Content: Sadly, I bought this tv on August 31, 2013 and it has already crashed. Vizio says it will take 4 days to schedule a return date plus shipping to repair is paid by me; extra days tv is sent away and return. Not sure the reason the power ended on it; a little disappointed.On the plus side: It is a beautiful tv with spectacular views.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Michelle Waldroupe
Reviews.Content: Absolutely PERFECT!!!!! I now see what I have been missing all this time!! The quality and crystal picture of the screen is absolutely amazing!!

Reviews.Title: Audio setting Issue
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: Great tv.  Had some issues with no audio after channel 101.  Two Verizon techs came and could not repair.  After searching set up info online, it was determined to be an internal setting that the average customer would not know.  All is well and now working.  Set is a little shaky on its base but nothing major if placed on TV table correctly.  All in all, a good buy.  TV came with good reviews.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price
Reviews.Author: weeniemobile
Reviews.Content: The UPS delivery ensured that the box was not damaged.  One of the delivery personnel brought the TV box into my house.  The TV was in excellent condition, and it was easy to install.  The Amazon movie streaming was a plus; I did not know I would get that option.  Since I am a prime member, I can get some movies for free.  Even though thie size may be a little off (39 inches), it was perfect for our space.  Vizio is an excellent product.

Reviews.Title: Good small and low priced TV.
Reviews.Author: howard
Reviews.Content: Good small and low priced TV. It's not 1080 but for this size and it's intended purpose of a second TV in a small space the resolution was a minimal compromise especially taken with the low price. Our main TV is 55". WiFi and Internet access round it out as being almost full featured. Recommended for second TV.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I've owned
Reviews.Author: judi
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome! Im a big geek with TV's and this vizio is amazing! Picture is crisp clear and love watching football and blu ray dads on it. Good deal!

Reviews.Title: Will purchase Vizio again
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I have had the Vizio E470i-A0 for 2 months and so far no problems. Vizio makes a great product and should be seen as a respected brand in televisions.Starting with the basics, this tv has 4 HDMI ports which is important to me... not to mention the other ports as well. This leaves me room to hook up game systems, cable box, computer, and dvd/blu-ray player if I wanted. It's thin, light, and easy to move. The setup is a breeze. People often talk about the speakers on these thin televisions and how they're "too quiet" but I've never had to turn it up past 30/100 (I usually keep it around 15-20).The most interesting feature I found was that each input stores it's own settings. You can have 9 custom sound and picture settings for each input. The volume even stays the same on one if you change it on another.I haven't played around with the "smart features" much but I didn't buy the tv for that reason. I've tried using youtube a few times and it works fine. It would be easier with the keyboard remote though.The only "bad" thing I can think of is that it doesn't have a favorite channel list like my previous tv but no big deal.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: G. Braunn
Reviews.Content: This TV is what was promised.  easy to set up and get access to internet.  great picture and sound.  light weight

Reviews.Title: Dark spots
Reviews.Author: S. C.
Reviews.Content: Dark spots in corners. Not super noticeable  but noticeable but enough to see it every time the screen is supposed to be uniform.  Returning to amazon for replacement.

Reviews.Title: Big HDTV Picture
Reviews.Author: greg clements
Reviews.Content: Great big picture. Great apps. Really like this t.v. Fits perfectly in the space I needed it to. The remote works just as well. Easy setup. No issues to date. I've had this since october 2013. Would recommend this 39 inch to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture - Perfect size for mid size room
Reviews.Author: Busy Guy
Reviews.Content: This TV screen size is perfect for a medium sized living area where a 32 would be too small and a 50 would be too large.  The picture is great with many choices for adjustment.  The sound is okay, better than the 32 we have but still lacks any bass notes.  This is somewhat disappointing when music playing in what you are watching is important.  I suggest external speakers - they don't need to be expensive ones if a full range of highs and lows are important to you. I give it a 4 because of the lack of low range sounds when music is playing.  The picture is great though.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: terie
Reviews.Content: perfect size and picture is great!  What more could you ask for in a smart TV?  I watch Netflix all the time!

Reviews.Title: Great picture.
Reviews.Author: Ron G.
Reviews.Content: We're very happy with this TV. It's just what we needed to fill the space of our built in entertainment center. The picture is very good and the sound is adequate.

Reviews.Title: Good deal, good savings
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: Thumbs up so far.  I like this TV for a good bedroom TV, it has Netflix and Amazon Prime buttons on the remote. I can't say much else other than it was a good deal and probably just as good if not better than any other LED in this size. I haven't even bothered trying to calibrate the settings because I haven't found any settings for this particular model on Hi def junkies website but it is what it is, as expected.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Anty and Jess' mom
Reviews.Content: I love this tv! The sound is a little "tinny" but you can somewhat adjust it, but overall, the tv is great!

Reviews.Title: Awesome HDTV!
Reviews.Author: Frustrated Mom
Reviews.Content: We've had this HDTV for about 6 months now and it has worked perfectly without a blink!  This is our 3rd Vizio and I highly recommend this brand!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Stephen Quisenberry
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price.  Very easy setup, smart TV apps are great.  4stars due to aspect ratio seems a bit off and sound is a bit weak.

Reviews.Title: Nice Led TV
Reviews.Author: M. Carter
Reviews.Content: This Led tv is by far the best I have owned. Picture is great with DirecTV. Would have give it 5 stars if not for the internet part being slow better off with regular TV and get Roku.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E470i-A0  47- Inch 1080  120 HZ Led Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Laurent J. Dubois "Happy Fishing"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, Real clear picture,the functions are easy to use,good sound as well.Works perfectly,this is our second refurbished set we have purchased within the past two years and wouldn't hesitate to purchase and other in the future,

Reviews.Title: Fantastic picture and sound.
Reviews.Author: PattRows "Patt Rose"
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful tv.  Crystal clear picture and the sound isn't bad either.  It turned out to be a good investment for us.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amy Joseph
Reviews.Content: I was surprised when I bought this tv on sale. Not only is the picture great, the sound is great! It's hard to find a flat screen with good sounds these says. But I highly recommend this tv. I've had it for 9 months and still not a single problem.

Reviews.Title: Top Notch
Reviews.Author: David E. Alexander
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture, my 2nd Vizio and just as happy as I was with my first purchase, no need to look at anything else, buy a Vizio now !!

Reviews.Title: still a vizio fan
Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: this was a very nice tv i had the 55 inch model of this product and it seemed to be a little better quality, the image on the 39'' wasnt very impressing it was blurry . but still a good tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Bill Novi
Reviews.Content: Great product & great price delivered quickly. Will look to purchase other items just this way. Will also look to set up recurring purchases.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: David Ingram
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  It is a bit thicker than some of the newer TVs, but has good color and is led lit.  Has isolated dimming and a thin, probably half inch bezel all around.Not impressed with the Vizio apps.  They seem slow to respond and laggy. I did not buy the TV for them, however.

Reviews.Title: HELP!  I will explain that outburst in a moment.
Reviews.Author: E Trexler "Elaine"
Reviews.Content: The E390i-A1 smart TV has a beautiful picture and is so easy to set up....the WIFI signal picked up as soon as I put the modem password in.  Now, as far as the HELP!  I have bought two wall mounts to attach the TV to the wall; the Ematic that promised "compatible with most hole patterns, including VESA......" and the TILT TV WALL MOUNT BRACKET For VIZIO E390-A1 39" INCH LED HDTV TELEVISION by VPEmnt  sold here on Amazon.  However, it isn't the bracket problem I am having; it is the size of the screws that attach the brackets to the TV....they are too large.  So, has anyone here mounted their  39" Vizio E390i-A1 smart TV?  If so, can you direct me to where to get the mount you used?  This pertains ONLY to the 39"........not the 40-55"  JUST the 39" Vizio.  Your help will be very much appreciated!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Patterson
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, excellent features. Love it.  Set up was easy, Internet features are easy to use, customize and enjoy. You can also add Internet packages easily.

Reviews.Title: Slim, simple, clean and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: TheWolfTc
Reviews.Content: Great looking tv...very slim and the wi-fi and apps are easy to use and setup. I ordered 2 of these for my boat and 1 for my kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, needs a HD box.
Reviews.Author: Arco
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great.  The built in HD receiver is not operational with Cox HD without another HD box.  So close.

Reviews.Title: Love Vizio
Reviews.Author: Mark W. Murray
Reviews.Content: Great quality of picture (but i guess that is subjective) Im used to watching a very small screen. so this is like having a theater in my living room. Set up was pretty easy. for me it has enough ports to attach everything i need.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: SusieQ
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with our new Vizio TV. It is lightweight and easy to hook up and it fits nicely into the TV cabinet we already have.

Reviews.Title: Great buy.
Reviews.Author: D. Overbeck
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Easy to set up. Color is good. Blacks are just OK, but I am a video producer so I look at video all day long. The bezel is fantastically small, the set looks great. There isn't much glare on the screen. I would say for the money this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: I love my Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great looking and sounding TV. It was easy to set up and program. I am working on figuring out the WiFi part to get the Apps

Reviews.Title: Vivid colors
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: It seems a good value for the price.  Colors look very good.  There was no problem linking to wireless and viewing wireless videos.  I do miss the ability to rotate the TV on the stand but no big deal.

Reviews.Title: very good smart TV, cheap
Reviews.Author: molly
Reviews.Content: We moved to a new appartment, and really want to buy a new TV. this is the best one!!!!! very good quality and the images are very clearly and color is beautiful on the screen. It is smart TV, cheaper and I do not think we can find another good one as this.

Reviews.Title: Easy Set up, very nice picture quality
Reviews.Author: Jack_238
Reviews.Content: I have not had this Smart HDTV for too long but I like everything about it. The setup was easy. The hardest and longest part was typing in my needlessly long wireless security code. I like that the entire manual for the TV is included in the on screen help.The thin border is nice. This base which is very rigid went together better than any other set or monitor I put together.  Most TV speakers range from horrible to adequate with these being on the high end of adequate. I have noticed that these speakers are incredibly good at the high tones.

Reviews.Title: 24 ich vizio smart tv
Reviews.Author: Michael Vega
Reviews.Content: Tv is great mounted on wall nice picture netflex good no complain yer i recommend this tv.for the price cant beat it

Reviews.Title: Completely satisfied
Reviews.Author: Dawn M. Williams
Reviews.Content: I like the size, weight and all that this TV can do. The menu is easy to understand and follow when setting up the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Nice Picture, Awesome Price!!!
Reviews.Author: Ruben Lopez
Reviews.Content: I've always been a big fan of Vizio... Great TV, Nice Picture, Awesome Price & to top it all... FAST SHIPPING!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I would buy again.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name "Love, Pen Name"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, expecially when you don't have cable to it. As long as you still have a wireless internet connection you're all set. I have a hard time reading the descriptions on Amazon though because the print is so small on the TV. I have to get up pretty close.The TV is easy to set up, and the picture looks just fine eventhough it isn't 1080.

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear picture
Reviews.Author: J. Hanneman
Reviews.Content: The HD picture is crystal clear. Great stereo sound. The ability to connect directly to Netflix is great, but other options such as Hulu Plus should be offered. Overall this set is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Good Bang for buck
Reviews.Author: Melissa Restoule
Reviews.Content: Birthday gift for our daughter. Works great, has great picture and sound. Not too terribly big for a bedroom but still can see detail from across the room.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Bonita L. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Difficult installation - sound is terrible. No adjustment on the stand so we have a very bad glare problem.Wish we hadn't given our old Samsung away!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, light weight
Reviews.Author: URSOB "Senior Geek"
Reviews.Content: The biggest issue is with the remote control. It is slow to respond sometimes and pressure required to press a button seems too hard.

Reviews.Title: SMART BUY!
Reviews.Author: L. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Love the price.  Love the product.  Smart TV is the way to go.  Eliminates having to use another device to access Netflix, Hulu, and other services.

Reviews.Title: Works well, good picture.
Reviews.Author: Janice Farrell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my husband to have in his office.  Works well, good picture.  I don't like the base, no flexibility, you can't tip it, but it works ok.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a college dorm
Reviews.Author: Jorge X.
Reviews.Content: My daughter needed a tv for her dorm room as her brother borrowed her's. She wasn't looking for anything special but I thought the SMART TV feature would come in handy. She loved the concept and loves her tv. No issues with it yet.Very good price.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO SMART
Reviews.Author: Jace
Reviews.Content: I love the t.v.  The only worry I have is when it was delivered, I could hear a loose piece rattling around inside.  I decided since it worked, it must be a screw or something, so I didn't send it back.  It works great, so I am hoping that it doesn't affect it someday.  The picture and sound are phenomenal.

Reviews.Title: Good bang for the $$
Reviews.Author: AaronInWY
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my new apartment because I couldn't afford a larger screen or "high end" brand. Vizio is actually very comparable to the LG's and Samsungs of the world and I would highly recommend this set for low budget buyers.

Reviews.Title: No Regrets.
Reviews.Author: Craig Grall
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a pretty good TV, sound is decent, the picture is good, VUDU and Netflix apps are good as well. The Amazon Prime and YouTube apps are pretty weak. Most of the time if you are in the YouTube app it will play the video off center and when you exit it the TV picture is that way as well. Simply turn it off and back on and it’s back to normal. Once in the two months since purchase, the TV wouldn’t turn on, had to unplug from wall and plug back in and it works just fine. If those are the only problems I will have, then I have no regrets about the purchase

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Mandy Pearson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to upgrade the one in my living room.  I wanted something that would fit above my fireplace and this was the perfect size.  The picture is very clear and I've not had to make any adjustments to the color settings.  I've already set up my Netflix on it as well.  Great TV for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Couch
Reviews.Content: This TV is quite amazing. So amazing, in fact, that I will probably get my dad one to replace his buzzy, obnoxious standard. I use this as a computer monitor, a PS3 screen, and a regular TV set. The picture and sound are amazing- very little to none of that "tinny" sound.As for the Smart functions, they can be handy, but I only use them as needed. The TV is great on it's own.

Reviews.Title: GREAT television, fast set up, great price
Reviews.Author: Christina V. Noland
Reviews.Content: This is our second Vizio...no problems with either, great picture, easy set up and very good price. Don't hesitate on this one!

Reviews.Title: We love our new TV!
Reviews.Author: Leanna
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv ever! It has everything on it! And the remote already has a netflix button on iy which comes real handy! The kids think its great! It was our early Christmas present and we had looked around everywhere and found amazon had the best deal! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Pari Baron
Reviews.Content: This is our third Vizio TV. This TV has an excellent picture and because of the light weight, it was easy to mount on the wall. We are very pleased with the image quality and all of the inclusive features.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Jensen Senat
Reviews.Content: After following some of the settings by older comments the tv works greatPro: Picture quality/sound/outputs/Smart tv's diverse amount of applications!Cons: On scree keyboard could be thousands of times better. remote seems kinda of blah

Reviews.Title: already had one that was great
Reviews.Author: Jim M
Reviews.Content: I have a smaller one that is 4 years old and I love it -- so I bought the bigger one.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular
Reviews.Author: Zodthegnarliest
Reviews.Content: I love this tv I can watch tv shows that I've downloaded from the internet or movies that are stored on my external hard drive straight from the hard drive with no go between devices, The picture is also amazing.

Reviews.Title: Good LED TV
Reviews.Author: MGBMike "MGBMike"
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV for the price.  It does take longer to come on than my other LED TV's, but that's not really an issue for me.  Sound quality is good, but not great.  Overall good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality tv
Reviews.Author: yvonne elliott
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this t.v. the picture is brilliant the best purchase of a tv I've made I'm very happy with this purchase!!!!!

Reviews.Title: A Win
Reviews.Author: Tim Hamilton
Reviews.Content: It works well, weight is practically nothing, and the picture is a thumbs up.  I wish it cam with an internet browser.  But it does well with what it offers.

Reviews.Title: Store purchase vs Online purchase
Reviews.Author: Anthony Napoli
Reviews.Content: We were happy with the TV and liked its quality until the 3rd day we had it.  At that point the horizontal and vertical hold on the picture went bad.  We contacted VIZIO to notify them of the problem.  At first they tried to put the problem on the satellite, then the cable connection, then the DVR, etc.  We submitted pictures of the screen via Smart Phone etc. and after 3 days of back and forth they finally conceded that the TV was bad.  They were going to send us a refurbished TV but then realized that their product was still under the 90 day warranty.  So, they sent a new TV.  Problem was, it took 2 weeks to arrive at our house.  If we had bought the TV at a store instead of online, we could have simply returned it to the store and gotten a new TV.  That is something we will consider the next time we buy an electronic product.  Our new TV arrived on the 22nd of Oct.  The picture is really great and we are enjoying it.  Hope it stays that way.

Reviews.Title: A good choice
Reviews.Author: mjmanish
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen and first smart tv.  My wife and I are completely satisfied with our decision to purchase this Vizio.  The color, size, HD quality led us to making this purchase,  and this Vizio has not disappointed us.

Reviews.Title: Vizio a Fine TV
Reviews.Author: Martin W. Schwartz
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up.  Excellent customer service from US, English Speaking Representatives.  So far no problems. Great picture, easy connectivity to WiFI, with a multitude of apps.

Reviews.Title: Happy with new Vizio!
Reviews.Author: Gregg J. Nelson "greggorio"
Reviews.Content: I bought this after I dropped my brand new $1900 Samsung 51" HD3D Smart Plasma while pulling it out of the box. It has a great HD picture with many adjustments available. I am also using it as a computer monitor. The Samsung will cost $1200 to repair. So SAD!

Reviews.Title: Quite the steal
Reviews.Author: Valdyr Gramr Ulfr-Tyr "-Hold the Heathen Hamm...
Reviews.Content: 720P is great for a 32" as 1080p doesn't appear till like 40"+.  Even then most people can't tell the difference.  288 and free 2-day shipping is great.No more need for cable now that I have this seeing as I have a strong internet connection...amazon prime, and will be getting Hulu Plus+Netflix which is 16 a month vs hundreds.  The picture, colors, and all are great, but there are somethings to consider.  This model only has 2 HDMI ports, the APPs can lag a little when you first turn on, and sometimes searches can be slow..but, come on it is only 288 for great everything else...it doesn't slow down the videos...just browsing at times.  Inputting data with the rather smooth/slick remote is great/easy.  The tv does take awhile to get use to.  Oh, and before I forget this tv doesn't have the yellow video in port...and, I don't know yet if the designed it so you put it in one of the others, or not...so I'd say possibly unless you have the RF in adapter for older devices...you're out of luck.

Reviews.Title: 24" Smart HD TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Westfall
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to use as a bedroom TV.  It is a good deal at $189.00.  The only 2 problems i have are the stand and the wireless connection.  The stand has no way to tilt and if it is on my dresser (slightly elevated) the picture gets washed out and there is no way tilt down to avoid it.  I am currently looking for a table top VESA mount to resolve this.  The other thing is the wireless networking, It would not connect to my roommates Super G gamelounge router, So i added a D-Lind N router and it connects but the internet doesnt seem to want to work.  I am gonna mess with it more and call support which i called the first time and they were OK.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Allen Goldstein
Reviews.Content: great picture love the TV one caveat since i did dot put it on the w wall  the stand for it is a bit flimsy

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E3201-ao 32in
Reviews.Author: Just Carol
Reviews.Content: This T V is the greatest. I enjoy the large picture. And having Amazon Prime is the icing on the cake. This beats Dish, and Comcast for me. Of course I don't like the T V shows they have today. The movie selection that comes with Amazon Prime is fantastic . I must say they make my day. or evenings I should say.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jay Doria "Jay"
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for two days now and I actually love it. You will have to assemble the stand and place the TV on the stand which takes about 15 minutes and is easy to do.The setup is a bit long if you don't have a Vizio QWERTY keyboard and setting up your apps takes a while. After doing all the preliminary setup, it is smooth sailing. The picture quality is excellent; it uses power efficiently; and if you are using the TV speakers the sound coming from them is good.I recommend this TV for an apartment or secondary room.

Reviews.Title: Good Seller
Reviews.Author: Blake Baxter
Reviews.Content: It was at the price I wanted, had a warranty on it, size of screen I needed and had the features I wanted also.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Debra Childress
Reviews.Content: It was what I expected - glad I purchased this tv - still need to hook it up to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Hello - Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this TV on many different sites.I compared brands on 42" 120 hz and decided to buy the Visio from Amazon.I am no super expert like I read on the other reviews. All I know is that this replaced a 32" Samsung.The picture is perfect, no issues at all (so far).The sound, for a flat screen is great, actual full range.Not a speck of buyers remorse.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Jimcool"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV to use on our sailboat. Based on initial short testing on land, it was easy to set up and has a beautiful picture. Sound from the front-firing speakers is good too, although I may consider getting a small sound bar.Update: I have now installed it on our boat using a swivel wall mount, and it's doing great. Super picture and very good sound. Will not need the sound bar after all.

Reviews.Title: Visio 39' Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Arthur J. Obrien
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about 2 weeks ago. It shipped and arrived at my home very fast. The support system from Visio is the best. They helped me get set up and also iron on some kinks, that turned out to me a piece of cake.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: maureen hummel
Reviews.Content: Easy set up picture has good quality: I really enjoy being able to use my amazon prime account to stream movies on my tv directly

Reviews.Title: Comparable to Samsung but $150 less.
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Functions perfectly and picture is top notch. The remote is a little wimpy but I use the Directv remote only.  I thingI the samsung has a superior picture but I saved $150 on this unit for near samsung quality.

Reviews.Title: Pleased but noticed the audio issue when using cable box
Reviews.Author: Chris S.
Reviews.Content: Using in bedroom and NOT part of primary entertainment system.Great features for price.  Many streaming options including Amazon Prime, after firmware/software update.Easy set up.  Running latest firmware.  However, when hooked to cable box via HDMI cable, noticed the audio issues wrote about in other reviews.  Cable straight to TV without box did not produce same issue.  So, this is how I'm running it right now and I guess we are fine until cable provider encrypts everything and requires a box.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture Quality, Poorer Wifi Connection
Reviews.Author: JBVeradale "JJ&S;"
Reviews.Content: To replace the three-year-old Vizio Smart TV that our three-year-old semi-smart kid broke doing living room gymnastics, we went with the Vizio E390i-A1 39-inch Smart TV.  No brainer, right?  I really, really wanted to like this TV.  I set it up and spent hours trying to find a picture quality setting that was anything other than dull and vaguely fuzzy.  I couldn't do it.  No matter what I tried, there were always three distinct zones in the picture (laterally) and the images lacked sharpness. As disappointed as I was with the picture, it was the TV's poor Wifi connection that was its fatal flaw.  Unlike my previous Vizio TV (and several other devices in our home) which stream content flawlessly via Wifi connection, the Vizio E390i-A1 struggled to connect and was unable to maintain a Wifi connection for any length of time.  Movies and music coughed, sputtered, and froze. This TV is on its way back to Amazon and I'm on my way to a showroom to see what manufacturers other than Vizio have to offer.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Wendelyn
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price! It is light weight and a perfect size for my kitchen counter! Exactly what I hoped for.

Reviews.Title: TV picture quality is great, SMART features lacking
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Netflix and Pandora work okay.  However, the App Library is lacking and this is not compatible with Plex.  I couldn't get the built-in DLNA client to work with Plex.When starting up the SMART features, sometimes it takes a second or two to "wake up" the TV into SMART mode.  Then it appears to launch the app too quickly, without giving the Wifi signal time to connect, then the app starts up and gives you an error.  Simple work-around is turn the TV on, wait 10 seconds, then hit the Netflix button.All in all an awesome purchase for the price.Oh and this product is ridiculously light.  I can't believe it, but I think my 3 year old laptop weighs more than this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: E. Cornell "Ridgeback lover"
Reviews.Content: Bought for my husband for his 70th birthday. Exceeds all expectations. Stunning picture, a welcome replacement to its predecessor. Highly recommend this one!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Price
Reviews.Author: L. Mengucci "LVM"
Reviews.Content: GREAT TV!  For the price, I love this tv.  Great picture, sound not so hot but most TVs don;t have great sound.  I purchased a sound bar to take care of that.  You can display icons across bottom of TV like Pandora, Facebook, Yahoo, You Tube, etc. Vizio made a great product for an incredible price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value and Good Quality
Reviews.Author: John Saephanh
Reviews.Content: I bought this television to mount on a wall in front of my thread mill at home.  The viewing distance is roughly 4 feet from the television and it is mounted at eye level.I really bought this because it was one of the smaller "Smart TV" available on Amazon and that was a feature I really wanted since I have both Amazon Prime Video and Netflix in my home.Pros:  Size, Cost, Picture QualityCons: Remote Control, Downloading Applications, Vizio has some kind of content partnership with Yahoo which attempts to "force/trick" you into thinking you need a Yahoo account.

Reviews.Title: A great Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: William A. Morant Sr.
Reviews.Content: This item exceeded my expectations and I really like the WIFI and many other bells a whistles. The size generates a perfect picture and is not overwhelming and blends in well.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Amy M Payne
Reviews.Content: We've been very pleased with our tv. We were aware the speakers were not great, but our living room has a sound system set up already, so we were not super concerned. The picture is great. The options are great for accessing other web-based systems as well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent & must buy
Reviews.Author: Amit
Reviews.Content: Excellent, first time with smart tv and I must say its a great buy..........best for bed rooms... . . .

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Using it for DVD playback, so I can't rate the HD picture quality. I did get one over the air HD signal and that looked ok. Many internet options: Huluplus, Youtube, etc. Works great as a second TV in the house

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Stream.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Mussatti
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not as clear as Samsung products I have purchased in the past.  The steaming feature of the TV does not work well when using Wi-Fi.  I have no other streaming problems with other products using Wi-Fi. It starts and stops making watching YouTube impossible.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24" T.V.
Reviews.Author: Gale Morris
Reviews.Content: We got this for our daughters birthday and she loves it, the picture is perfect and she loves the wifi for streaming movies. We have all our televisions from Visio and are very happy!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ethics consultant 247
Reviews.Content: Great picture and clarity.  Easy set-up.  Syncs to my wireless provider with the push of a button.  I was watching Netflix within 5 minutes of removing it from the packaging.  I use it as a smaller TV in the bedroom and it sits nicely on top of the dresser.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this TV after returning a defective Philips Smart TV and I am so much happier now. The picture is bright and clear. The sound is more than acceptable, especially considering the depth of the casing. but where this TV really stands out is the user interface. The apps are very fast. and you can access many options without leaving what you are viewing. Got it for 598.00 shipped free with Prime and couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Philippe H. Elie
Reviews.Content: Images on this TV are crisp. I couldn't get a better value at such a price for an Internet TV.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very happy !
Reviews.Author: GPS
Reviews.Content: Wifi works great watched netflix on it without the movie stopping ! And watching tv online without having the tv connected to a cable is great !

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Donna Marlowe
Reviews.Content: I am female and older and wanted something simple to operate and assemble.  If I can do it, anyone can.  Easy to assemble and to use remote.  I compared TV's in consumer reports and this was rated very good...it said it didn't have such good side visions, but I find it is perfect w/o distortion.

Reviews.Title: excellant led TV
Reviews.Author: Joyce E. Stoesser
Reviews.Content: really nice crisp picture, easy to setup ( it tells you what to do for setup) has it's own manual built in. Sound is good for this size tv  29"I would buy again. My wife has it in front of the treadmill so she can use facebook while working out

Reviews.Title: Short standing height was what I need
Reviews.Author: D. E. Floyd
Reviews.Content: I was able to get a larger screen because of the short height.  This is what I needed.  I like having speakers and a TV as bonuses.  I bought this to replace my computer monitor.  The color seems more realistic out of the box than most TVs.

Reviews.Title: Sound and picture problems.
Reviews.Author: josephus
Reviews.Content: It's a beautiful TV. The menu is simple and easy to work with. But just after a few weeks, we were having sound problems. The sound didn't come on at all for a couple of minutes, and then cut in and out every few seconds after that. We are going to research and try and find if anyone has found a solution to the problem; if not,we will have to start the process of getting it corrected or replaced,if Vizio backs up their product.Very disappointed.Also now it has developed a new problem. After it has been playing for a long time, the picture starts fading as if it is going to go out, and then comes back in over and over again.I contacted Vizio. They were very easy to get hold of. They suggested turning off a couple of settings in the menu to try and fix the problems. Hope they work. We love the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great for watching Netflix
Reviews.Author: Mary S
Reviews.Content: We purchased this HDTV to give to our son for his bedroom as he likes to watch Netflix which is has the option.  He loves the HDTV.  The right size for on the top of his chest of drawers.

Reviews.Title: Smart vizio <3
Reviews.Author: Dorothy L. Ryan
Reviews.Content: I love the color and all the apps I can get/have. Vizio setup staff were patient with me. Just wonder went they will come out with a wireless key board as the remote is difficult for elderly hands. Thank you Amazon for great service and dependability. I will return. :-)

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: K. B. Tipton "libber48"
Reviews.Content: good pic, i bought it for DVD player, a bluray one, and my old tv did not have the right plug.  i enjoy learning  about the internet features on the tv

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: This tv is great! I love being able to conne t to wifi on it and it has a great picture quality as well.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Frederick B. Hall
Reviews.Content: The picture on the VIZIO is excellent. A 29" screen is perfect for me.  I watch football, the Weather Channel and Animal Planet.  That's all I'm interested in.  The delivery was right on time.  The cable man came about an hour after the delivery of the VIZIO.  It's great being able to buy a TV online.  I love Amazon.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: sian hutson "Target addict"
Reviews.Content: Well we have four of these so we must like them!  Great TV, does everything it says it will and the price is great!  The huge benefit buying on Amazon is the shipping was free (premium, have to love that!) and no taxes.  I will say that two of them were damaged when they arrived, the outside of the box was not so I think the original packers had to much pressure on the TV within the packing, but Amazon was amazing, sent replacements overnight and had the broken ones picked up.  Great TV!

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: Deanna Feringa
Reviews.Content: I like the TV, I have a little problem with the volume though, could be because I am deaf in my left ear, seems like it has to be turned up to high

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Wicks
Reviews.Content: Love the entire quality of this product, its everything I thought it was. This product gives you exactly what you want.

Reviews.Title: AWESOMENESS
Reviews.Author: Joseph G Thibault
Reviews.Content: it's huge, it's light, it's smart, it's WIFI enabled.What could be better? If you sit only a few feet away it looks even bigger!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jaclynn Gaddis
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this purchase.  It is extremely lightweight and easy to learn to operate.  Wish I had bought something bigger now but it serves its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Nogui Fernandez
Reviews.Content: Good tv exceeded my expectations, the image is pretty clear, have used the netflix feature and the youtube. The thing I love about it is that you can lookup the videos in your phone and watch them in your tv

Reviews.Title: It just works
Reviews.Author: Matthew Wentz
Reviews.Content: Great picture, all internet connectivity works (just not under certain circumstances).I had the tv connected with an cat 6 cable, because the bandwidth is a little better than wireless.  However, when I connected a new computer to the same router, either the TV or the computer would not be able to get a signal.  When the ethernet was disconnected from the tv, and it was running on wireless, then all is fine, but buffering takes more time with the streaming apps.  apparently weird network problems and certain routers are known for the vizio tvs?

Reviews.Title: Great TV when will they stop the Smart Tv's?
Reviews.Author: Josef Holzer "Josef Holzer"
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV, I'm blown away with the picture tv quality! But the internet apps have a Lang in responding! The App need more Apps such as cabe providers. I use a antenna and the only thing I miss is the full TV guide on screen! I can't seem to get the FM App to play, but it could be my broadband! I can't believe Vizio is forcing people to have a broadband connection! And course they are going to stop broadcasting through in antenna!

Reviews.Title: I buy it again!
Reviews.Author: Roslyn Shapiro
Reviews.Content: Love this TV!  It was easy to hook up, the picture is clear and I realy like the small remote.  The box had a hole in it when I received it, but there was no damage due to the packaging.  I would definitely buy another.

Reviews.Title: great smart tv
Reviews.Author: Ronda Edwards
Reviews.Content: Great tv nice view easy to use wonderful internet options. Fits perfect on a medium heighth stand...perfect for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price!
Reviews.Author: SiobhanO'Kelly "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: I love my Vizio Smart tv (I replaced a dumb tv with it) and am so impressed with all it does! The picture and colors are great on the display.  I'm very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: josey
Reviews.Content: tv was exactly what we were looking for in the space it was needed. very happy so far with this model

Reviews.Title: Smart TV for Me
Reviews.Author: Delores C.
Reviews.Content: Love this smart TV.  Has many features.  In fact I am still discovering. I am a heavy user of Netfix and online streaming of movies offered by Amazon to my video library.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: epepster "Edie Pepe"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product. The wifi feature is wonderful. Picture clear, sound good. Works in a smaller room. Set up very easy.

Reviews.Title: A great television for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ricky
Reviews.Content: I have the television in my room. It is extremely thin. Installation and set up were easy. The waiting time for the TV to start when you push the power button is about 6-8 seconds. The smart features are great although there isn't that many  apps to get for your TV. I mostly use Facebook, Twitter, Netflix and YouTube. But I'm sure you'll find more apps you'll like such as Pandora, Poker, ETC..I don't have the TV mounted on the wall so I won't review that. The television arrived within a few days after I ordered. It is very light not sure by how much. I bought a 3 year warranty just in case I have any problems so I'll see how it goes. Overall great TV. Get this one if you are on a tight budget.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Char Levy
Reviews.Content: Super easy to set up, prompt delivery, great picture. Really pleased with my purchase, definitely feel like the qualityexceeds the value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Frank H. Nickel III
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this tv, picture is great and setup was easy.  I would buy it again without a doubt

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: jarrett sitton
Reviews.Content: If you want a descent sized tv for a good price I recommend this tv good picture quality and sounds great, might pick up a remote with a keyboard for vizio tvs will help a lot with searching Netflix and getting on facebook and twitter.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: ChenXiao
Reviews.Content: the reason that i bought it is i needed a tv to play ps3, it is very good. very thin.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Napo
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV. The menu is very easy to understand and has many options and utilities. Only one issue, sometimes it has poor wi-fi reception even when other devices work fine using the same wi-fi network.

Reviews.Title: Go for it!!!
Reviews.Author: Nishant Khanapurkar
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV for just under 300 bucks....the image quality contrast etc. is all gr8....I would recommend this TV to anyone looking under 300 bucks...

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with WiFi performance
Reviews.Author: Jaz
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV with the intention of mainly using it for streaming.  The menus have too many layers - have to click through too many just to get to the same options you always use.  If you pause a video and turn off the TV, you have to navigate your way back to it through the multiple layers (unlike with a Roku box and a regular TV).  Once in the app (Hulu, Amazon, YouTube etc.), the loading often hangs and the video can be choppy at the beginning.  Tested it against my Roku box to make sure it wasn't the internet connection.  I think I'm sticking with the Roku.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Angel Sanchez
Reviews.Content: this is the perfect tv for a bedroom, its great for gaming and hd movies and shows. worth the price.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: julie physer
Reviews.Content: my grandson loved it I got it for him to take to college and he wanted a smart tv . the price was great

Reviews.Title: New tv for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Mary P. Meehan
Reviews.Content: Good picture.  Share and clear. Would recommend this to others.  It's my second vizio tv and may buy another larger.

Reviews.Title: Normally I don't write reviews this early
Reviews.Author: Larry Deshner
Reviews.Content: But the tv was suppose to have a mar on it otherwise works wonderfully ....I can find the mar the set is brandnew so how I'm I suppose to review this? "with a big smile " I'm a vizio fan from way back the set works great and the shipping was fast these guys are on my good list thanks

Reviews.Title: Good value, good picture, Great features
Reviews.Author: John A "Jack"
Reviews.Content: it seems to be a good value, it has a good picture & the "smart" Netflix, Amazon, etc access from the TV is very convenient. It's a little slow to come on & the remote would be better if it had a qwerty keyboard attached

Reviews.Title: perfect price and perfect buy
Reviews.Author: C. Carmichael "Chris92071"
Reviews.Content: This is my second TV from Amazon and third Vizio.Pro:Easy set upGreat pictureGood internet applicationsmultiple HDMI inputscomposite and other inputsVGA for computerCon:Delivery box is the TV carton! Make sure you are there for delivery.Great value, and a nice smart TV. No need for 1080 for a 29-inch TV; the 720 looks great.Speaker system is "OK"; but an optical or analog output to a sound bar or a Dolby 5.1 or 7.1 makes this GREAT.Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for its price range
Reviews.Author: Packers
Reviews.Content: So i just got this TV on 39". The assembly was very easy and took me less than 10 min to get this baby assembled and get hooked up to internet. The sound quality in my opinion was pretty decent for a built in speaker. The picture quality was pretty good. I just had an RCA antenna and the local HD channel were very crisp and clear.One of the sole purpose for getting a smart TV was so that I can watch Netflix and rent movies from Amazon, and what happens they both don't work. With frustration mounting up, finally me and my wife got it figured out and the problem was with firmware. Apparently the TV came with firmware 2.04 and was not compatible with Netflix and Amazon apps. After the firmware upgrade they both started working like charm.It was good 4 hours troubleshooting and figured it should not be this hard, i mean come on.Overall, I liked its pictured quality and the sound and that is all I care.

Reviews.Title: A lot of TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Brian H. Watts "Brian and Brenda Watts"
Reviews.Content: Love it. The picture is awesome, the sound is fine, all ports work. I have not found any of the warnings in the other reviews to pertain to the set I received, thank goodness. :-)

Reviews.Title: Great Value for the Money
Reviews.Author: NG02001
Reviews.Content: This TV is such a great value. The only gripe I have with it is not being able to adjust the 120Hz refresh rate. Other than that it's beautiful and I love all the apps!

Reviews.Title: Vizio smart LED TV
Reviews.Author: Dolores A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Vizio is a very good HD TV and we have 4 of them in various sizes. The only problem they have is that they are slow to start up. Be sure to check the reflective quality on the screen because the ones with a glossy surface are impossible to watch in the daytime.  This one has a great screen.

Reviews.Title: Arrived broken
Reviews.Author: Raymond DeLaurier
Reviews.Content: I may have liked this TV had it actually worked. When I set it up, all it did was flash lights. It did not work at all. This is the 2nd TV that I bought online that arrived destroyed supposedly by UPS.  I've learned the lesson. Repackaging and shipping back is always a problem, plus the refund takes a lot longer than getting the money for the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, APPS/onscreen NAV, not so good.
Reviews.Author: Imperator
Reviews.Content: First one I received the screen was smashed in. I mean SMASHED, shards of glass got in my hand when I pulled it out.I submitted a return and got a new one in 2 days.  The picture is decent and it connected to my WIFI easily.  The only con I have is that the on screen keyboard is in alphabetical order vs. the standard QWERTY which is annoying.  Maybe this can be changed, I haven't done much research.I don't use the in TV apps all that much, they are a bit clunky and not the easiest to navigate or find content.  I have a media center PC that I built, so I most likely will not use them.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: J.P.
Reviews.Content: We don't even have this TV hooked up to cable.  We bought it exclusively to use Hulu Plus, Amazon Prime, etc.  In general we are happy with it given we no longer have to hook our laptop up with a cable.  The apps are numerous and even include some I have never heard of.  However, they don't always load quickly and the navigation within the given apps is a bit cumbersome.  The picture is clear and the sound is good.  Overall, we like it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: Purchased for college student. Great picture, great size,and good price. Perfect for a dorm room or for a second tv.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 29" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: drewsmom
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an updated tv to replace one of those bulky old ones, but the new one had to fit into a bedroom cabinet space.  This Vizio fit the bill exactly.  The features of this tv, including wifi built-in, are impressive for the price on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Gary Daily
Reviews.Content: Great TV, easy set up, and I love the WIFI. The picture is clear and the best part is it was delivered fast.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Shawn Blank
Reviews.Content: Everything about this TV is fantastic. The quality of the picture is great, and the speakers sound fine. It's easy to assemble and stands sturdy on its base.It worked well out of the box and I haven't had any trouble yet.

Reviews.Title: Guest Room
Reviews.Author: Carlos Bermudez
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV to mount on our wall and it has a great picture.  The apps are a little outdated and occasionally has trouble streaming but all in all we are very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Could have been 5 stars - BUT!
Reviews.Author: John ChiTown
Reviews.Content: This would have been my 4th Vizio TV but had to return it because it arrived with defective components.The picture was great and the set was easy to set up. As stated I probably would have given it 5 stars (Value for Price) but for some defective parts. One of the 3 HDMI ports was dead, the over the air antenna connection produced a flicker signal and kept getting a Can Not Connect to Netflix message, so I had to request a return pick-up.I have read that that the Netflix issue has occurred on quite a few sets but could be corrected with a software fix - however because of the antenna & dead HDMI return was the only option. Glad I purchased from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: SR
Reviews.Content: This TV has good quality picture and is easy to use. It's perfect for the price. I would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: ceiba
Reviews.Content: I just bought this 47 in. TV for my living room, and I just love it, it has great color, and good APPS. When I'm watching TV I can write in face book or tweet someone all at the same time without missing the program that I'm watching.

Reviews.Title: TV is OK--Amazon app isn't
Reviews.Author: mikestuff
Reviews.Content: The Vizio smart tv is a good product and I would probably recommend it as it is a good value.  The "smart" part is less impressive.  I have used Roku to stream video for a few years and pretty much expected the apps to work in a similar fashion.  The Netflix app goes to a full screen and you navigate it the same way you would on a Roku device.  The Amazon Prime app is absolutely terrible.  The whole selection screen occupies only the left part of the screen and there is no way I can find to browse any categories other than Movies.  You see about 12 at a time and you have to scroll down to select or move to the next screen.  Another 12 possibilities.  I'm seriously thinking about adding a Roku device to my "smart" tv which kind of defeats the purpose.

Reviews.Title: Loaded with features.
Reviews.Author: Clarendon West "trini-man"
Reviews.Content: This is the ideal TV for a small room, like a dorm room. The WiFi feature alone makes it a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great picture! Amazing streaming. A1 quality TV!
Reviews.Author: KarinH
Reviews.Content: Wow was I surprised ar the quality of this TV! Only $198? And a smart TV to boot? Was expecting much but am just thrilled. Excellent picture quality and i love the menu functions that allow precise adjustments. The built-in wifi amazing as well. So simple to access my netflix and amazon prime and bam! I am streaming. We are planning to get a larger set same brand an style for family room.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: amgardner
Reviews.Content: we are novice at TV knowledge.. but this one fit our budget, and compared to the antique TV we replaced with this one,it is amazing!  I love the built in apps.  Easy to use for the technologically challenged!  (like me!)

Reviews.Title: love the Vizio so far
Reviews.Author: P. Vega
Reviews.Content: We had a Phillips first but love the quality of the Vizio and picture/sound much better.  I have a smaller Vizio and was always happy with it. I just hope it will last us just fine because the box looked like it was not handled very well, especially for electronics.  It had several visual damages (the box).  They need to protect the screen on the inside of the box better as well, it had no Styrofoam in front of it at all.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO
Reviews.Author: A. Scaglione
Reviews.Content: Generally satisfied with the product.  A little disappointed in the picture as I was comparing it with a model on display at a "brick and mortar" store.  But for the price, it was a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Love this T.V.
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Great reviews won me over on this. Could not find it cheaper. Although I've seem many refurbs of this model. I gave in to it. Once it is hooked up to the internet it may glich (remote un responsive for about 20 minutes) leave it on and don't turn it off it will reset itself. Read on a forum that it needed a firware upgrade from Vizio. After that, all is working just fine. Adjusted the picture controls to my taste and all seems to be smooth. The only reason for 4 stars and not 5 is Vizio cheap 1 year warrenty. It forces you to think that if they really are behind the product why not 2 or 3 years. I could take 2 year parts and 1 year labor.P.S. Needed a simple remote to keep the kids out of the Smart TV content. Went to $ Tree and got the 1 dollar special so no code for the Vizio on the paperwork. I found out it is code:100 works like a champ with basic functions. Hope this helps someone out.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: SCGirl
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our room. The picture is bright, crisp and clear. The apps are great. We can rent new releases from Amazon Prime in seconds!

Reviews.Title: Fine TV for the $$
Reviews.Author: Joseph Calabrese
Reviews.Content: Very Good in every way..The Brightness, Color, Contrast, Clarity...All crisp.!!!...All Smart TV Features are great as well !!! I did opt for the querty keyboard/Remote for an extra $15 and now the TV is even a better value !!! Nice work to all at VIZIO !!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: KathrynR
Reviews.Content: I have always been a fan of VIZIO Televisions since our family first purchased one for my dad a few years ago. My brother has compromised eye sight and this TV was a great buy for him. He had a Samsung and it was damaged when he moved and the pic quality got worse and worse. When this came up for sale, I jumped on it for him and gave it to him as a present. Thanks for such a wonderful product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Flat Panel TV!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Crazybob
Reviews.Content: Picture is just awesome at 1080i and super awesome when I plug my notebook PC at a full 1080p and get on the internet with a wireless keyboard from Logitech that Amazon sells! It comes with great apps like Netflix, Facebook, Twitter and many more free apps through the Yahoo app store. Internet connection is either WiFi or Direct Connect. I use Direct Connect since I have an extra Ethernet port on my Cable Router. USB port so you can plug in your USB flash drive and play MP3's MP4 video and JPEG photo's. One downside on video's, it does not support FLV so you have to convert.I have the 39" model.You are for sure getting your money's worth with this one. I would recommend it!Bob

Reviews.Title: Yippee
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Awesome. Tv. Who would've guessed this lil tv would do so well. It is sharp and responsive. Best money I've spent

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: Ed Karaskevicus
Reviews.Content: I love Vizio product but disappointed in this purchase.  Color is not as crisp as a 42 inch that I purchased at the same time.  Does not sit level in the stand.  Does have good sound and HD quality.  no manual was included

Reviews.Title: Smart Tv
Reviews.Author: Mrs Bolton
Reviews.Content: Excellent product so far, purchased 2 Within a 6 month period.. Love the price as well..afordable for this economy..very satisfied...

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Armando (cayr21)
Reviews.Content: I bought it for less than $500 and the quality is good, a bit slow when you turn it on but it offers you a great quality of image and the applications running there like netflix or youtube are really nice.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: eileen hunt
Reviews.Content: The TV is awesome--it is just the right size for us and the price was great. The Smart TV allows me to watch Netflix and see all my shows is great color and sound. I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants a great television!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice for a very good TV at a Good Price
Reviews.Author: Dr D B
Reviews.Content: Very good TV with lots of features at an excellent price,  We reviewed several TVs and reviews prior to purchasing several Vizio TVs for both personal use and for TVs in a new church building.

Reviews.Title: It's hard to stay ahead of the curve
Reviews.Author: Stephanie P. Warren
Reviews.Content: Smart  anything is the way to go.  Easy to operate and all features worked exceptionally well. Excellent picture and sound and resolution.  Works just right for bedroom dresser and viewing 10ft away from bed. Great value from Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Blake Shinpaugh
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the picture quality of this TV.  Great value for the money.  Would recommend Vizio to anyone in the market for a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Sloan
Reviews.Content: I bought this after being tired of watching my Netflix and playing PS3 on a 21.5" monitor. This TV is beautiful. Great wifi speed, great picture, sound, and overall quality. I love the fact it has HDMI and Composite video so you can play your oldschool consoles too! The only thing I wish it had was backlighting on the remote, as it is hard to see in the dark. Other than that, great TV!

Reviews.Title: Great, while it worked...
Reviews.Author: utahphil
Reviews.Content: It is always hard to write a review when something simply dies.  But alas, this is what happened on the 32" Vizio I bought.  I have an older 55" Vizio downstairs which has been great for about two years now.  When our upstairs tv died, I thought this would be a great option because of it's built in wireless networking.The tv installed easily and I was able to have it up on the wall in a few minutes.  It used the same screws that my other tv used.  I had it on and running quickly.  I did wish that its hdmi inputs were all on the bottom (one was on the left side and one on bottom) but it was working just fine.  Picture was nice and the wireless link was easy to install.  I did wish it would allow for push button network connection rather than having to type in the long password which was frustrating on the remote.  However, the networking started right up and we could watch Amazon and Netflix streaming easily.Fast forward, six days later and the backlight failed.  No more picture.  Just audio.  After reading some more reviews, this appears to be a somewhat known problem with some of the Vizio's.  So, the tv is already back on its way to Amazon.  The tv would have been a keeper if it would have kept working.  However, the reviews stating that Vizio is aware of this problem due to a bad batch of chips was enough for me to spend the extra and get a Samsung Smart tv.  With known quantities of defective products out there, I would rather avoid the risk and just getting something different.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 29" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement TV for an older analog set.  It has exceeded our expectations.  Excellent picture and sound.  I would recommend this tv for anyone needing a tv for a small room or RV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I needed this specific size to fit into the area in my living room. It works great and I really Love that I can connect my 2 Tb western digital external hard drive and the tv pulls it to play music, video, and pictures.Pro: USB connection, Ethernet port, smart apps.Cons: As all HD Channels give a significant lag when changing channels.All in All, I love it and will be buying more VIZIO tvs.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Sue Poyner
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for a Smart TV. I like having just one remote to access Netflix and TV stations (I bought a separate antenae). The TV has a great picture and is perfect for my workout room- not super big but enough to keep me entertained while working out.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The picture is great and having it internet connected right out of the box is awesome. I do have to say the sound isnt real good but ill get a sound bar or some type of speaker setup for it at some point. Other than that no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy set-up
Reviews.Author: PR Martin
Reviews.Content: I had this TV unboxed and watching Netflix in less than an hour even though I had never used a smart TV or HDTV before.  It has good color and is easy to view in our room that has 4 floor-to-ceiling windows in it.  I have only connected a DVR to the TV so far, but I plan to connect a DVD player later.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what is said it was
Reviews.Author: Curt S. Hayes
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a TV for our elliptical. Good picture / sound, light and easily mountable. Onboard wifi works great and all the built in services (Netflix/Amazon etc) work as advertised. Very happy and would recommend for the right purpose.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, good sound.
Reviews.Author: ann m. trask
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound are good, which we appreciate. I like the slim lines, too. Its just the size we need.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just as expected! Perfect picture and easy to set up. Should have many years of service since it is a Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Superior Product
Reviews.Author: Icelandic Horse Owner
Reviews.Content: My house was hit by lightening and I needed to replace my TV set. Since I already had a Vizio it was an easy purchase. Great Picture I can't say enough good things about it.

Reviews.Title: Very happy!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Nelson
Reviews.Content: For the price, I'm very happy with this tv. I wish they explained how to type letters in the pass code (you press ok twice and a keyboard appears), but other than that, it was very easy to set up. My daughter is already watching her favorite shows on Netflix and I'm going to cancel my cable!

Reviews.Title: Over the treadmill.....
Reviews.Author: Christopher P. Tighe "bismarckcpt"
Reviews.Content: Great product...easy to use....I do have an issue with the apps....Amazon prime apps should give you access to your watchlist...which it does not.....Netflix does.....other than that, great product

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: louannfd1
Reviews.Content: I really like the Vizio Smart TV, it is just the right size for our camper. And when not in the camper it is being used as a camera monitor for security cameras around the house.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: aftrans
Reviews.Content: First, I must confess that I'd rather have a TV larger than 39" but the area where it was to go wouldn't allow anything larger. The TV arrived and was easy to take out of the box and attach the stand with the provided screws. I hooked up my cable box and DVR player, turned on the TV and was done. The picture was great and interfacing the TV with my wireless network was simple. Also, adapting the TV with my Amazon prime and Pandora accounts was easy as well. Although, I've only had the TV for nine days now, I'm really impressed so far.

Reviews.Title: It's a good tv
Reviews.Author: Kendra
Reviews.Content: I sincerely like it, it's the not the greatest tv in the world, but the price is really good. The only thing i dont like is that i dont know if it has a web browser, i cant find it, so if someone can help me with that that would be awesome. Everything else is great, i love netflix and amazon prime. Overall it's a nice tv, i would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: WOW!  Impressive
Reviews.Author: J. Nalberczinski
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace smaller tube type Sony still working fine.  The picture and sound are better than expected.  We use this on the kitchen counter top and the stand lets it lean back a bit so if you're up close the pic is distorted.  A straight up stand would be a better option for viewing from a kitchen table.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Kirkland
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture.  Easy to set up and use, even for electronically challenged person like me.  I live in a rural area without great internet service. At first I was able to stream movies with no problems.  Then there started to be a good bit of buffering.
