I finally bought lower level Roku and can stream without a problem, although it is no longer HD. However, with a 32 inch screen there is not that much difference.

Reviews.Title: great tv!
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: I bough my tv used and i was a little scared I was going to get it and have something wrong with it, but Ive had it for a month now and i love it! not a scratch on it ! It looks brand new!

Reviews.Title: No help for remote qwerty
Reviews.Author: Charles Stern
Reviews.Content: set works perfectly. But I bought a qwerty keyboard remote for the E390i-A1 and it came without amy model no. and no manual or instructions. How can i get any help?  cstern  cstern11223@gmail.com

Reviews.Title: it's perfect
Reviews.Author: Rui L.
Reviews.Content: It has built-in wireless network, so this TV can easily connect to internet and you can enjoy tons of free video or music. That's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: George Robertson
Reviews.Content: I actually had to take the first one back after (1) week. The TV starting making a "siren" noise effect and then the screen went blank. The second unit has been great....very nice TV for the money

Reviews.Title: Instructions and connectin
Reviews.Author: Judy Brown
Reviews.Content: The instructions aren't great, but I'm not a technical giant. I had 2 possible connections to make.  The one I chose wasn't right. Though  their help desk is good, they didn't catch my mistake.  I had to call my cable company for on site help.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Easy to set-up, good picture for the price!
Reviews.Author: CPilot "CPilot"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my parents. Very happy with the quality. Good picture for the price compared to other brands, easy to use, and has good sound.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Margie Castillo
Reviews.Content: I love this television!  The picture is absolutely beautiful.  I love the ability to watch Net Flix without having another device.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a smart tv for a small living room or bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Merritt Adams
Reviews.Content: I was debating about this TV, because many people said they had issues with sounds.  I have not had any issues with the sound.  It is a great TV, nice picture and good sound.  I have it hooked to apple TV and netflix.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrew Diffenderfer
Reviews.Content: Great image quality, easy to set up and a good overall value.  Highly recommend for small spaces that require a narrow framed TV.  Very clean look.

Reviews.Title: Smart choice on Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Terry Coles
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal, Loved the features, picture very sharp.  I bought 2, one for my daughter in college and one for my bedroom.  l love the Netflix feature, no extra box needed.I considering purchasing another as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: This TV set is very nice for the price. Love the Netflix capability!!!image is very good. No complains at all.

Reviews.Title: My new Vizio
Reviews.Author: Shirley McMahon
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the clarity and the ease of set-up.  The size is smaller than the one I replaced, and fits very well in the room.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i - A0 32 inch 720p 60hz
Reviews.Author: Charles Bohlman
Reviews.Content: had all of the features it had advertised and they were easy to use through my existing WiFi in my home. Picture is good. Sound is good. I wanted Wi Fi because I thought I might be able to use a browser on the TV but alas it does not have one. I may use the Net Flix app but will likely use none of th others although I could see persons of different interests doing so.I bought the refurbished. I could not have known after the box was opened.720p and 60HZ is fine for 32". Save your money until you need a bigger one.

Reviews.Title: Smart tv - worth the investment
Reviews.Author: Emmalani "Emma"
Reviews.Content: Pros: Convenient for online tv or movie viewing (such as net flix, hulu, etc) & checking online stuff,better picture quality than LCD's which I also have Cons: sound quality is not stereo HOWEVER if you connect it to a sound bar / stereo system it may improve sound quality also doesn't turn on or change channel as quickly as other tv's (if you expect immediate results)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ceeloud
Reviews.Content: I love my tv, it came quickly and it is a great value for the price.  I'm not tech savvy but it works great for my purpose which is just regular tv watching.  Also I found that Amazon had the best online price for it.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for the fact it 1080p mainly but when I saw smart TV too I had to get it for the price. Fatastic perfect size for my room and to game on. Sound is eh, but if I want better sound that's what home audio equipment is for.

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Zorah
Reviews.Content: Great tv, HDMI to laptop works great with a belkin cable. Perfect for my dorm, it's really light so I can transport it easily. It looks awesome and works awesome.

Reviews.Title: Works really nice
Reviews.Author: Gildagor
Reviews.Content: Streaming Netflix is awesome on this TV; great purchase for the price :) I would buy another Vizio for my next TV.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv
Reviews.Author: funnynuts63
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves the thing. I can't get her attention away from it now.

Reviews.Title: VIZio
Reviews.Author: James Honeycutt
Reviews.Content: I noticed that the whites were pure! Explain that! There goes anything that might cause the bluish hue to come from size.I tried the Netflix and M-Go buttons located in the top row as well and they worked find. So checking the quick start guide, I was directed to the V.I.A. button to get started with Vizio internet apps.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I had an older LCD TV that finally bit the dust and wasn't sure what to replace it with.  This TV was a great price and looks great as well.  The LED screen is very sharp and I have the additional Smart Apps.  I really don't use them that often as I have a PS3 and Google Chromecast.  Great TV though highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Monkey Boy
Reviews.Content: TPicture quality is very good. I am sure it is not quite as good as a higher end Samsung, but I am happy with it regardless of price. Considering the price of this TV, I am very happy with the performance for the money.The Netflix app works great.The remote is just average.The built in speakers are OK... better than I expected, but not great. I will soon be using an external sound system, but for now the built in speakers are usable.

Reviews.Title: works great for personal TV and monitor
Reviews.Author: ten1426
Reviews.Content: I replaced my 46" LED TV with this personal HDTV, so I can set it up on my desk and use it as an extended PC monitor. It works great for me as I can switch input between PC RGB mode, TV Antenna, HDMI, and AV, etc.The wifi setup is fast and it find the signal right away. I watched netflix often and it's so convenient.Resolution and picture quality is great.I actually bought this from Costco. They had it all sold out and only had a returned unit. I decided to take it, and it works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Gregory Loper
Reviews.Content: The quality is impressive compared to my old 32" LCD. The Apps are nice. You can add or remove apps if you don't like or use the ones already installed. The backlight sensor is on auto by default, which made the picture get bright and dark back and forth at first until I shut it off. I don't think it likes the lighting of my room. Just something to be aware of. Overall, it's a great tv.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: remorgan
Reviews.Content: Seems like a good product no problems so far.It has performed as well as I expected it to perform. Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Awesome value
Reviews.Author: SM Garay
Reviews.Content: Great TV and so easy to set up with my prime instant vidieo and Amazon prime account. I do not even need cable!

Reviews.Title: This is a great little TV!
Reviews.Author: K. Arnold
Reviews.Content: I have limited requirements for television and a small space.  I also needed to upgrade from my 27" CT, circa 1993 that finally died after many years of faithful service.  I dumped the local cable and took a package with the phone company and am so impressed with what a television can do in the 21st century!  If you need a lot, read further and get details from the techno geeks, but I have not been sorry for a minute to have purchased this set.  Great picture.  Sound is acceptable. Excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Jepz
Reviews.Content: I would say that for the price range it was in and all the features that has, this a tv worth your money.  The wi-fi and the built in apps are great and worked perfectly and easy to use.  I had a day of trouble with the remote control that made me thought of returning, gladly, after some cable plugging and pulling, somehow it got fixed. - I'd say by the way things went, the back panel is a bit sensitive and kind of fragile.. not sure if remote control wirings are close to it or somehow connected but as far as I remember, remote control suddenly became significantly lagging after connecting the coaxial cable (even after couple of soft reset and a hard reset).  In the end, after connecting another cable and disconnecting the coaxial cable, it worked perfectly from then on - coincidental?.. I don't know.  Anyway, as far as video quality, yes it's got great and vivid colors but if you see somebody write about significant change in color quality at an angle, that is totally true!  But then again, how much did you pay it for? For me the pro's still outweigh the cons - it's a great tv for the price!

Reviews.Title: Best deal on the Internet
Reviews.Author: Frugal Freddie
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a Smart HDTV and this is the best deal I have ever seen.  I look at other sites but none can compare to an AMAZONE DEAL

Reviews.Title: Smart quality at a good price!
Reviews.Author: greg  johnson
Reviews.Content: I wanted a  TV for my office small enough to fit on my executive size desk. This fit perfectly. I also has all the built ins and inputs to connect to my computer.  As of now it is hooked up to straight cable and with the tuner I receive all channels except premium. The remote is fast and smooth much better than the Insignia 24" I bought for my kitchen a year ago. That set is LED 1080p too but the controls are so slow and no last channel jump button and that is frustrating.  This VIZIO has no such cliches.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: D.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my small home office. The TV is located within five feet of the modem. I have had no problems with Netflex or the Internet. I subscribe to Direct TV and must use the Direct TV control and the TV control to change functions. This has not been an issue. The picture is good and the TV was very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Abbers
Reviews.Content: I love this TV for my bedroom.  I canceled cable and this TV was perfect to pull in Netflix and Amazon Prime and all the other things it brings in.  It was a piece of cake to set up and I am not technologically savvy at all.

Reviews.Title: Nice smaller Model
Reviews.Author: Dan Hoppe
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, and the Smart TV features work great. I think once most people try the Smart TV's, they will see what a great enhancement it is to cable, satellite or local networks. You don't even need a DVR anymore.

Reviews.Title: New Vizio E series is super!!!!
Reviews.Author: R. Schunk
Reviews.Content: Day before yesterday I picked up a Vizio E series 50" tv. It was a step up from an old Emerson HDTV (900.00) and several years old, that started to develop 'burn in' (yes it is possible on an LED), if you pause something for more than a few seconds, turn off the TV, and dead pixels that looked like a tornado from top to bottom center of the screen.So, I opted for the smart features.This is a fantastic TV. After reading some of the earlier reviews I will definitely be 'tweaking' the settings.The picture is SUPER sharp and just blows me away! The controls are simple, menu activation is easy and I especially like the Netflix tie in. I moved my account to 1 disk and unlimited streaming. I'm not sure about the number of movies available but I like the feature.The only gripe I have with the unit is there is NO adjustment for treble/bass on the audio side. It might just be my rather than stellar hearing, but the sound is 'tinny' to me. My wife even commented on it last night. Perhaps I need an additional sound system to fix this minor complaint.5 stars even with the bass/treble complaint.

Reviews.Title: nice tv at a nice price
Reviews.Author: john w burwell
Reviews.Content: bought to use in a spare bedroom setup for grandkids or guests, nice to have built in wifi for Netflix without needing another box or device.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: Raywen
Reviews.Content: I have an older Vizio TV that we love, so I grabbed this TV when my small TV quit. I love the Smart Apps and am very happy with it. It will keep me up with the new world of viewing TV.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV for the money
Reviews.Author: Patty Slater
Reviews.Content: The tv arrived promptly with no damage. The set up was easy with the on screen directions promptingyou on what to do to set up Wi-fi, etc. I am very pleased with the picture quality. I do need to spendsome time seeing what other Apps are available. Netflix is available with the push of a button which makesit easier than using it with our Roku with our other HDTV in the living room.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture...but...
Reviews.Author: Ryeredden
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, but for some reason the volume button does not work sometimes or other buttons for that matter. It's nothing wrong with the controller...Something ells...and every so often the tv will flicker off then off, but that's rare...I would of sent it back to get It replaced or fixed, but where I live it would be to much of a hassle. Other than those things it works and looks great...Im sure I just got a bad one...

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mike Magee
Reviews.Content: Sharp picture, works great in our motor home! We have not used the internet features yet, but are excited to have them available.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the 32 inch for my treadmill
Reviews.Author: Bob "Bob"
Reviews.Content: I mounted this on a floor joist using a ceiling mount. The unit has a great picture, it is very light and the features (WiFi) are amazing for the price. I am posting a picture of the tv on the mount. It works great with my treadmill. I also like the fact that there is analog audio output that I can use for headphones (although it is via RCA stereo outlets rather than a 3.5 mm mini stereo connection)

Reviews.Title: Great patio/screened in porch HDTV
Reviews.Author: miami 1
Reviews.Content: I use DISH and did not want to have another Joey with its wires and stuff so contacted a communications guy who suggested a wireless set up from the "home" Dish DVR.  It works great and the picture is very, very good on this HDTV.  The size screen was perfect for the location and viewing distance.  I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Wynn Bowman
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Vizio and continues to uphold the quality and price that makes it a winner.  Easy installation with no problems.  The WIFi feathure is nice.

Reviews.Title: Love this Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have another Vizio TV and I really like the quality, so I felt confident about buying this one.  I was specifically looking for a TV that would fit under my kitchen cabinets and it does. The picture is crisp and clear. I really like how quickly the channels change. It's been a pet peeve of mine ever since digital TVs appeared on the market. This seems to change much faster. I've had this for quite a while now with no issues whatsoever.  Perfect for the kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for the kids
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: LOVE the remote with a Netflix button! Easy to use and has a ton of options for Amazon, Hulu, Netflix, etc. Great picture, we have had it for 8 months and moved it across the country. It works great!

Reviews.Title: A cheaper TV that is as good as any.
Reviews.Author: Christy
Reviews.Content: Going into TV shopping, my husband and I knew what size we wanted, and that we wanted one with a very slim frame. To make a long story short, going to the store and seeing them all next to each other, of course the Samsungs look better than say the Vizios and the LGs. But once you've finished comparing them all, this TV is pretty great for the price. Our seating is about 15 feet from our TV, which is mounted above our fireplace. Even from a slight angle, the picture is outstanding, (with all the manufacturers settings..we actually haven't changed them, although I notice the saturation could be turned down a bit). We plan on possibly adding a soundbar or surround sound in the future, but even the speakers on this TV are pretty good. We have a PS3 and haven't really used the smartTV functions, although we have plugged in a flash drive to look at pictures, and the menus were easy to navigate. It's nice to know the smartTV functions are there if we want them. This definitely beats paying almost twice as much for a high end name brand TV and the quality seems to be there, we have a smaller Vizio TV and it has held up well and the picture is still very good. I'd definitely recommend this TV to someone looking for a quality picture and nice, sharp looking TV but trying to stay on a tight budget.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E Series 24" LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Love this TV...........picture is great.....the actual viewing size is larger due to a smaller frame.  Especially nice are the apps that are integrated into the TV like Netflix, Amazon and others.  All you have to do is connect the TV to your ISP router wirelessly and you can watch movies, listen to music, etc without having to have a separate box to connect. Set up and the interface is very user friendly too.  I actually have this TV set up to receive just local channels with a Leaf Antenna and can get at least 25 local channels that come in very clear.  They have a lot of sizes but be sure you it is a "Smart" HDTV..

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Portia Carr
Reviews.Content: I paid $548.00 for this 47 inch smart tv and the picture is excellent, and great features. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my daughters room. She loves it. We don't even have it connected to directv. We just use it to stream amazon prime, Netflix and watch blu-ray's on. The picture quality is fantastic and it was very easy to set up. I will probably buy another one for my other daughters room.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the value!
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: The price is right!  At this pricing point, this TV is a great value.  We use it as our main TV, and the quality is great.  We use the apps for Amazon Video and Netflix, and couldn't be happier with the interface and the picture quality while streaming these services.  The setup was easy and within 5 minutes we were watching our new TV.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Extremely satisfied with this television. Great size at an affordable cost. I have seen better quality televisions, but at this price point this LED has exceeded expectations.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV!
Reviews.Author: A. Baker
Reviews.Content: This LED TV is very bright, with vibrant colors and crisp pictures, but is also very energy-efficient.  I no longer feel guilty about having the TV on all day while I am either sick, and thus wanting to do nothing, or when I am cleaning, because I know it is using little energy.I have used Amazon Prime Instant Videos extensively with this television, and have not had any issues with connectivity or with the TV dropping the wireless signal.  Accessing Amazon, Netflix, and M-Go is extremely easy with this TV; there is a button across the top of the remote for each.  One simply has to push the button and search for the video/topic one wants.The remote control is fairly self-explanatory, but I do wish it had a QWERTY keyboard to make it easier and faster to use the "Smart" features of the television.  The on-screen keyboard is not difficult to use, but does take more time to use than would a QWERTY keyboard.Setting up this TV takes about five minutes because everything is easy to locate and access.  Plugging in the cable or antenna is easy (mine is a coax cable), and so is plugging in the HDMI cable for a DVD player.  While I do not have my Wii set up on this television, I can see how easy it would be (the attachments are very accessible).UPDATE, 10.20.13-- I have reduced my rating by one star because of an issue that is arising more and more often now.  When I push the button for Amazon, the TV more often than not just "spins" as it is "loading" Amazon.  It can "spin" for an hour or more before it finally loads.  Pushing exit or turning off the TV and turning it back on doesn't solve the issue.  This is happening more and more often, and it is VERY annoying.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture and good features
Reviews.Author: RayZar
Reviews.Content: Set up the smart tv pretty effortlessly for amazon and Netflix.  THe picture quality is excellent even with a non HDMI cable connection

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: guy with a new tv
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, for the quality and the price was greatAnd this is just to fill the rest of the words

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tv
Reviews.Author: Brittany D. Herndon
Reviews.Content: I love this tv!!! Vizio has been good to me so this is my second one! Once you turn off the ambient sensor the tv really flourishes, I would like to thank those who posted it in their comments.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Television for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Kristyn
Reviews.Content: I received my TV a few weeks ago, and I LOVE it.  It was amazingly easy to set up, and the picture is crisp and clear, with vivid, lifelike colors and high sound quality.  I love the Vizio brand, and I cannot recommend this television enough to anyone looking for a 32" TV.  If you're considering buying it - definitely do it.

Reviews.Title: Picture Fuzzy
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Ghia Jr.
Reviews.Content: I am having problems setting up this unit.  the picture is dull and fuzzy.  I have tried to adjust this out of the set to no avail.  This unit does not stand up to Vizio's standards.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv for the Money
Reviews.Author: Carlos Boeri
Reviews.Content: Great Tv for the Money, the image is good the internet software sometimes is a bit slow, other than that , great product for the price, buy it.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Aws
Reviews.Content: Great color and picture. Love the versatility of smart tv with access to internet movies email etc all on one screen. Great purchase extremely happy with this tv! Amazon shipping is great and no interest for 6 months made this an incredible deal!

Reviews.Title: Good TV, but apps a little slow to start
Reviews.Author: Josh V
Reviews.Content: So I purchased this TV after reading multiple reviews and trying to pick the best TV for the price. I wanted a smart TV (so I could use my PS3 in the man cave) and did not want to purchase a roku or apple tv if i could get most of the same features in one purchase. This is by far the cheapest 47" smart TV on the market! I was like most a little nervous about the apps, as that was the only reason i purchased this particular one. I read the picture needed adjustment, but to be honest I havent touched any screen settings and I think the picture quality out of the box is rather nice. I ran into an issue when it came to the apps though. Like many stated when you cut the tv on (which takes at least 20s to boot up) the apps are slow to pop up. I think it has to establish internet connection each time. After being on for a minute however it works just fine. My issue came when trying to watch a movie. Netflix worked great and loaded faster than i thought it would, but after 10min of viewing it froze and tried to reload and would just freeze. I thought it was just the internet and it was fine so I tried another app. Youtube worked fine and Hulu worked. Tried Netflix again and after 10min it did the same thing. I then tried a long youtube video and oddly enough it froze at 10min and the same with Hulu. So I called vizio and was excited to hear an american voice so that was a plus! After talking with them for an hour and trying multiple steps they still had no idea what was causing it. So we did a restart by holding the power button for 2min with the tv unplugged and on their end they did something with registering my tv on their server again. Since then (crossfingers) it has worked perfectly with no complaints. I will update in a few weeks, but expect good things from this great priced Item! for sure reccommend it!

Reviews.Title: bad utube app??
Reviews.Author: arizona
Reviews.Content: I took a chance and bought [thru amazon] one of the first [e500i-a1] in december 2012. After 7 months of use with this I have tried many of the apps and have used many of the tv functions. No major problems/complaints except for the utube app. It is constantly buffering giving unusable audio/vidio [most of the time]. It does seem to run better at certain times of the day. I have called vizio support several times but they said there is nothing more they can do and suggested it was an utube problem of some sort? I use cox cable with more than enough bandwidth. I have tried it on 2 different modems [at vizio's suggestion I even tried a direct LAN connection to the e500i-a1 from the modem thereby eliminating any router/wifi/cabling/etc problems]. I have tried most of the other vidio apps such as hulu,vudu/etc and all work without problems. The utube app has no picture quality setting for streaming/etc [like when using utube on a computer] so its hard to say what the app does [except its not good]. The utube rev level presently is v1.0.2 and all the utube vidios that I have tried on the e500i-a1 run without problem [at max. quality level setting] on all my 3 computers [even when streaming to all 3 at the same time]. All HD thru the cox cable box work fine. So if anybody has a comment or solution please post any info.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture. Garbage wireless card.
Reviews.Author: tprice5
Reviews.Content: The 'smart' aspect of the tv, in conjunction with the low price point, were what led me to decide on this particular tv.  The picture is gorgeous, ample connections in the back, attractive thin set. The problem is with the wireless (wifi) card inside the device.  It's awful. My tv generally reads around 3 bars of connectivity while it is 10 ft from the router.  All my other devices are picking up full bars and have no issues with connectivity whatsoever whilst this tv struggles. It prevents the apps from loading and causes streaming movies to buffer or pixelate.It's worth noting that my parents ordered the 47 inch version of this tv and the internet works flawlessly on it so YMMV.In retrospect I should've sent the tv back and tried a different one but the hassle of a return and the seemingly (from all the comments) ubiquity of the problem made me believe it would be futile.  I am currently in contact with Vizio about trying to get a replacement wireless card. We'll see how that goes.

Reviews.Title: Buy it.
Reviews.Author: Fat Rabbit
Reviews.Content: Purchased for bedroom TV.  Very pleased.  Nice size, very good resolution, adequate audio.  If this were anyplace but the bedroom I'd install exterior speakers.  Had a little trouble hooking up to DISH network, but not bad.  Good instructions.  Got set up on Wi Fi and then Netflix with no trouble at all.  On screen menu is quite easy to understand.  USB for flash drive is a nice plus.  I don't believe you could find a better television for the price.

Reviews.Title: Full of features
Reviews.Author: William B.
Reviews.Content: This TV has it all....excellent picture quality, digital tuner, wireless internet to view YouTube, Netflix, etc.Connecting to a router requires patience but worked well, even when wireless distance is over 100 feet.

Reviews.Title: If only it would connect to any website
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: It would replace my need for streaming on my computers entirely.  It is a great TV for and excellent price!  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!!!
Reviews.Author: luv 2 paint
Reviews.Content: We received this in 24 hours and set it up in a short time and was watching a great picture in no time.  This is a great TV.  Since it is a smart TV it is very easty to operate it.  I would highly recomment it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Paulette
Reviews.Content: This is easy to set up and I like that it connects to Netflix and Amazon Instant Videos with just a touch of the button.

Reviews.Title: Lemon out of the box
Reviews.Author: Matt Rea
Reviews.Content: We have an older 46" VIZIO in our family room that I am reasonably pleased with, except for the fact that the remote has stopped working. Anyway, I was looking for something in the 40" range for another room, and this looked like a good value. I purchased my TV at Best buy (479.00) and after unboxing, setup, and about 15 minutes of use,  the TV froze. The remote wouldn't work, even the physical buttons on the TV did not work and I had to unplug / replug the power cord. Not a good start, but I was willing to give it another chance. After setting up netflix, amazon, etc., the TV froze again. Same problem, same solution - unplug/replug the power cord. After it came back online, I tried to see if there was a firmware update or system update pending, but after about 3 clicks into the Settings menu, it did the same thing. Needless to say, I'm taking back this lemon, and I guess I will try my luck with another brand.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Alexis Meyer
Reviews.Content: Pros: Too many to listCons: VESA 100 x 100 doesn't fit in the center for APTMM2B Flush tilt mount.Some of the apps are redundant. Had to buy a powerline apdapter to stream movies on hulu and netflix b/c wifi signal can be dropped if in dead zone or too far from main router, which leads to buffering, etc.Overall, great TV and sound for second room once hooked up correctly!

Reviews.Title: No watchlist, ... !!!!
Reviews.Author: 2rain
Reviews.Content: No Watchlist, when Amazon addresses the "your video library" and the "watchlist", it doesn't have the "watchlist", it has the "your video library" section. It would be great if you could import a file from the "watchlist" to "your video library", so there is a collection of videos in the "your video library" format.You need to do that Amazon... instead of selling smart tvs that don't recognize the new feature "WATCHLIST"...you should call it dumb tvsI just wanted to warn people this doesn't have the watchlist, it has the lame "YOUR VIDEO LIBRARY" ... I wrote a couple of times about this, and I ordered a Smart TV only to find out its a dumb tv

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Leigh
Reviews.Content: I am in the process of determining if I can cut the cord on my cable company.  I have a Roku in a guest bedroom and have taken advantage of the Amazon Prime streaming feature. I didn't want the clutter of the Roku box since I bought this as a second TV in my bedroom.  Paired with Amazon Prime, it has shown me I do not need the cable.  The TV is very clear and seems to work well using the wireless in another room,  My only issue is the time it takes to load everything up and also to search for movies or TV shows.  I have solved the problem by searching for shows on my computer and keeping a list in the bedroom.  That way I only have to type in the name and the show comes up.  Great price and the discount for Prime members was a real plus.

Reviews.Title: A bit early, but . . .
Reviews.Author: BobbyB
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace a 42" model I sent back when I realized this larger set would work in the space I had available.  I have only been using it for a few days; but so far everything seems AOK.  I have no immediate plans to use any of the internet-friendly features, so I cannot speak as to how they might perform.  I bought this item, primarily because I have other Vizio products that perform very well.I had no need to get a sound bar with this set, because it is hooked up to my home speaker system and has all the reinforcement it could ever need for sound.  That said, I was pleasantly surprised when without any help from my home speakers this set put out more sound than I ever imagined it might.  It's a bit thin on the low end, like every other set with skinny, elliptical down-facing speakers.  But it cranks out more sound than I need for my living room, so I give it 5 stars there.One feature I really like about Vizios is that in addition to the optical sound out, there are two RCA jacks for analog sound out.  Digital (optical) sound out is the highest quality; but I've never seen a set that has optical sound out "variable" along with the volume you choose for the set--even muting the set won't mute the volume going out optically, because it's essentially copied before it ever enters the set for processing.  So it's fixed at full volume out to whatever awaits it.Vizios (maybe others) allow selection of the analog out as either fixed or variable.  If you select "variable" for the analog out this means that any speakers (or headphones) hooked to that output will go up and down in volume along with the speakers on the set as you vary the set's volume.  And you can use both outputs simultaneously without diminishing the output from either one.I don't need that feature on this set due to its being in my living room; but I use it on  a smaller Vizio in my bedroom.  I have a Vizio sound bar that has separate remote adjustability for overall and bass volume.  That sound bar (with a separate subwoofer hooked to it) takes it's sound optically.  Then I use a couple of small, left-over, powered computer speakers (that face me, not down) driven by the "variable" analog out.  The computer speakers are directly below the set.  The sound bar is lower still, and the subwoofer is on the floor.  This combination, with some adjusting by program, really makes it seem like all the sound is coming directly from the set.  This is overkill for my bedroom but would work nicely in a living room much larger than mine, if needed.So, it's a bit early, but so far I'd really give a 4.5 for this one, maybe 5 later.  I just wish I had room for a bigger one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Carey
Reviews.Content: TV works great. I would recommend it to anyone. Great picture and easy internet access. So far so good. We love Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: As of this review's writing, this TV seems to be the best LED deal out there money-wise, for the screen size.  I'll break it up into construction, picture, and user interface.The build quality seems to be good, and the thin edge is nice because there's not a whole lot of "dead space" on your wall.  One ding against it is that although is has enough space for about 4 USB ports, there's only one USB input on the TV.  It also looks like it's USB 2.0 and not 3.0.  Oh well, it's a small issue.  The stand is solid, though I have mine wall mounted.  There is an on indicator light that is useful without being glaring, and you can always turn it off if desired.  The remote is basic and does not have a qwerty keyboard, which IMO every smart TV should have.  Using arrow keys to select letters on an on-screen keypad is a pain.  I will probably order a vizio remote with a keyboard and see if it works with this TV.  The speakers have surprisingly good sound quality to my ears, though I am not very picky.Picture quality out of the box seems to be decent with the presets, though I'd still suggest you get a calibration disc at minimum to get the best picture quality out of it.  The screen is gloss finish, so glare can be an issue depending on outside light.  I can't personally tell the quality difference between this and a friend's sony, though I suppose it comes down to personal preference.A quick word on the 120hz issue - most inputs to your TV, such as blu-ray players, game consoles, and cable, will not put out more than 60hz to your TV (frames per second, if you will).  You can't display more detail than what comes from the source material.  So basically, 120hz might help reduce blur and judder (might), but it won't add any extra detail.  The only system currently able to push more than 60hz is a high-end PC, which depending on the graphics card and application can go way above 60.  In short, don't let hz be a deciding factor, especially as many movies and other things were meant to be seen at a slower refresh rate.  I would have gone with 60hz myself except that those were actually slightly more expensive than the 120hz TVs were.As to user interface, this is the one area where the budget side of the TV becomes noticeable.  It's a serviceable UI no doubt, but it lacks the same ease of use and speed that higher-end TVs have.  The app selection seems to be OK.  You can set up multiple users if desired, with passwords and avatars.  Settings and controls are generally easy enough to find.  The onscreen manual is useful, though I still wish a full paper manual was included.  Setup was simple and it found my wireless network with no issues.In summary, if you are looking for a good-quality TV at a reasonable price, this is a good way to go.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: This TV was so easy to install and set up. The remote works like the ones I have always used- No shaking, no jumping curser or other oddities like some of the ultra tech models that wear their users out.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great set
Reviews.Author: Gabe G
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and the Smart features are great.  Amazon Prime and Netflix streaming are flawless.  The only minor gripe I have is that the wireless adapter isn't as good as it could be.  I have a Roku 3 box that worked just fine with my router while sitting next to the TV, but the Vizio only got 1-2 bars and had streaming glitches and errors.  I updated to a newer and more powerful wireless router (ASUS RT-N66U Dual-Band Wireless-N900 Gigabit Router) and now everything is perfect.  This is my second Vizio Smart LED, and I highly recommend these sets.

Reviews.Title: sons birthday present
Reviews.Author: shannon
Reviews.Content: My son loves his new tv! hge likes to watch videos on u tube and this tv is easy to operate!

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The display is good, and the narrow bezel makes it no larger than our previous 23" Sony.  I was surprised that there are no controls on the set itself, everything is done via the remote.  I would like a few more inputs, and especially miss S-video, but that's more because of our particular installation in a motorhome and our lacking any HD devices.  The built in WiFi makes watching movies from Amazon (and other sources) simple with no extra cabling needed.  It would be nice if it would allow streaming across our home network, however.

Reviews.Title: Pleased!
Reviews.Author: Suzie1961
Reviews.Content: We are really enjoying our vizio TV. Love the Netflix on it. So easy to use. Picture is amazing. Sound is clear.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for The $
Reviews.Author: HSRTPMAN
Reviews.Content: Ive had this TV now for a few months and it has been a good addition to my household, especially for the price. It is an internet TV but I dont use any of those features. The sound on it is lacking could have been a lot better but all in all its a good TV.

Reviews.Title: I really like it
Reviews.Author: MarkP
Reviews.Content: Not a huge screen but perfect for a small room, connection to wireless network was no problem, consider external speakers if you have fine audio tastes

Reviews.Title: very nice for the money
Reviews.Author: MarkP
Reviews.Content: picture is fine, no problems setting this thing up on the wireless network, interface for the apps is not bad

Reviews.Title: Good for best price
Reviews.Author: Ram
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to setup. I love to watch youtube directly. HDMI works fine with my Laptop and blackberry playbook. Good picture and sound quality. Overall Best for best price.

Reviews.Title: Connectivity issues
Reviews.Author: keeks
Reviews.Content: I'm having serious problems getting this thing to stay connected, and have spent more hours than I care to talking to tech support at both my service provider and Vizio with no result.  We added a wired connection recently, but now we have a wire that crosses the entire room (kind of beside the point).  The remote has been iffy as well, doesn't seem to pick up the signal about half the time.

Reviews.Title: Love my new TV, set it up myself in under an hour
Reviews.Author: Sherry  in South Bend
Reviews.Content: I am a 60-something grandma, yet  I found this TV easy to handle (not at all heavy) and a snap to set up, even though I am not a computer or electronics whiz. Don't be intimidated by all the features on this TV - they have made it so easy, it walks you right through the steps, and before you know it, you're watching a beautiful picture on your new TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This TV has great sound and video and is extremely light and easy to setup and use.  If Vizio is able to get an HBOGo App this TV would be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: G. Spaeth
Reviews.Content: The slimness of the LED is great.  It's very light for a 29" TV.  I bought it just for NetFlix.  At first, NetFlix and Amazon would not work, and I called Vizio and Netflix a few times, one blaming the other.  In the end, either they fixed it, or it would have simply started working.  I think the trick is to let is sit powered on and connected to internet for a day or two.  Not sure why, but hey it works now :)

Reviews.Title: Great...Awesome TV!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: JosephN
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a refurbished unit and I'm completely satisfied. Also paid about 25% less than new. At that price, how could I ask for anything more than what this TV offers? Picture is awesome and the internet feature is so cool. It's used as a second TV in our basement entertainment room. I haven't heard any complaints form the Xbox users in our household. I will soon wire up the HDMI to my satellite tuner. I've been mostly using the DTV antenna and internet. If I have any issues, I'll be sure to update this review. I do have a wired connection available but the wireless seems to work better and is more responsive. Not sure if it's something with the TV or not. The sound is so much better than the other LG 47" LED that I have in use. Many settings to customize the picture or sound. AWESOME TV AT A AWESOME PRICE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: The Vizio TV is great.
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: The whole family has enjoyed this so much.  It is a much better size and picture for our family room viewing.  Great for movies.

Reviews.Title: A great second (or third) TV
Reviews.Author: Rock of Ages
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for an upstairs den where I wanted a TV, but not a video black hole that consumed the whole space. Size (32") is good for a smaller viewing area. Video quality is good. Wireless connected to the home network without a hitch. The user interface for internet streaming is a little clunky in comparison to other TVs, but still real workable. At under $300 bucks, an excellent 'smart' HDTV value.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, awesome value
Reviews.Author: Andrew K
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a 42" LG and the difference has been like night and day. The picture quality of this backlit Vizio is far better than the edge-lit LG. Colors on the Vizio screen are more vivid, blacks are nice and deep, and the contrast is more defined. Setting up the Vizio took maybe ten minutes, including setting up the wifi connection. Because of the thin bezel, the 47" Vizio is just a little bit larger than my old 42" set. I haven't played with the Smart TV apps much but they seem to work fine, and the TV has been able to play every video file I have on the iOmega hard drive connected to its USB port.The only minor negatives I can find with this set are that the screen is very shiny and reflective, and the remote is a bit cheap. Other than that, this is an excellent TV and probably the best value I've seen yet for a 1080p, 120Hz set.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV for the price,
Reviews.Author: Lena "Lena"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture, as clear as my 1080 48" TV which is a Toshiba.  Things to need to know if you want to connect to your wireless network, make sure you use WPA PSK as your protected access mode.  If you use WPA alone it will not connect to your wireless network.  I could only make it connect the first time by enabling Guest access with no protection.  But that is way too dangerous, so I shut that one down.  I checked on line and found the answer was WPA PSK, as soon as I changed to that.  Perfect connection and beautiful picture.  I am confident I could not find another smart TV, at this size, with this picture at the price I paid from Amazon.  Very happy with this product.  As a side note when I called Vizio for help they answered the phone right away, they sound like they are based in US.  Representative thought you would have to connect without protected access, it worked but it's dangerous.  She referred me to Cablevision which did not have the answer either.  But the point is they did pick up the phone and try to help.  That is way better than most service calls on products.

Reviews.Title: This TV is great
Reviews.Author: jbuf5
Reviews.Content: The TV has great color and sound. You cannot beat the price for a quality smart TV. Buy you will like it.....

Reviews.Title: Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: J. R. Capo
Reviews.Content: Great Smart TV.  The apps and slim size are the main reason I purchased this model.  I use it mostly to stream Netflix. Good picture and good volume.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Tyler Giffel
Reviews.Content: Pros:-Great price, especially for its size-The smart TV functionality is much quicker than I expected; especially Netflix.  It was also a snap to set up.-The picture is great-The sound is much better than I expected-I really like how thin the bezel is.-4 HDMI ports.Cons:-No VGA port (PC)-The blacks could be a bit better, but I haven't taken the time to adjust the picture yetAll in all, I would definitely recommend this TV.  The lack of a VGA port is really the only thing I'm not happy about.

Reviews.Title: Will recommend to friends
Reviews.Author: ROBERT WILBERTON
Reviews.Content: This tv was a gift to my daughter, and I had to the opportunity to see it play.  It has and excellent picture.

Reviews.Title: Good set.
Reviews.Author: DD "Texans Fan"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit for my kitchen. Unfortunately my TV is connected via a coaxial cable and not HDMI, therefore I do not get the 1080p content and therefore the picture is not as crisp. I do like the fact that I can connect to Netflix or YouTube directly on my TV and when I do the picture quality is very good. The 24" screen is okay for my kitchen, but I do regret not getting a 30" screen. Overall it is a good product. I did purchase an additional 3 years of warranty - just in case.So, if you are looking for a TV to fit small area, this is the product to get. The price was a factor when I was searching web for a 1080p set.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV!
Reviews.Author: Michael Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Very light weight! Mounted on wall with Cheetah mount. Using this exclusively as a wireless TV, no cable.Apps are easy to install....and remove!....lol! . Streaming is great from a Cisco E2500 router on the first floor. The TV shows wireless signal strength in the upper right corner when displaying app menu, much like a tablet.Sound is good for a bedroom set, plus it has a sleep timer, which works great when I remember to set it!

Reviews.Title: Great! should a got a 42"
Reviews.Author: james philbrick
Reviews.Content: Quality product. Well made and easy to set up. Could use a little more room to access cable connections, cables. and connectors are required to be bent at a serious angle to make the connections (not good if you'r the cable). Good product, easy to setup, and has plenty of inputs for anything you might want or need to connect to a TV.

Reviews.Title: fine TV, confusing set-up
Reviews.Author: Craig A
Reviews.Content: This TV has a  good picture from a straight-on view, works very well with netflix via an internet connection, and the sound is decent - better than I expected.  Initial set-up was a bit confusing, but Vizio support walked me through it.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: Gayle M Butler
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the purchase. Has all the features I wanted and perfect size. Vizio -Great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT SHARPNESS IN PICTURE!  SUPER BLACK BLACKS, AND INSANE BRIGHT WHITES!!!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Crenshaw
Reviews.Content: I HAVE STUDIED THESE TVS FOR QUITE SOME TIME.  I ACTUALLY BOUGHT THIS VIZIO LED TV TO REPLACE MY SONY BRAVIA LCD TV.  WOW AM I GLAD I MADE THE SWITCH!  UNBELIEVABLE PICTURE SHARPNESS, AND THE COLORS ARE AS VIVID AS ANY OF THE OTHER $2,000 PLUS TVS I HAVE LOOKED AT.  YOU DEFINATELY CAN'T GO WRONG WITH THIS TV.  GREAT VALUE, GREAT QUALITY.  WHAT MORE CAN YOU ASK FOR????

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Justino Franco Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my daughter for her birthday. It has a great picture and the smart features are awesome. She loves it and it made her day.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: kelsar
Reviews.Content: I updated from a Vizio 37 inch Razor Edge TV with smart dimming with 120hz which was/is an excellent TV.  This TV is almost as good, the 120hz is a 120hz EFFECTIVE rate since the TV software does some things with the motion to appear to be 120hz but I think I can tell a slight difference.  The picture quality is very close to the 37 inch but for the price it is a very good deal.  Paid the same for this 47 inch TV as I did for the 37 inch before, a little over $600.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Peter W.
Reviews.Content: Bought it because of the price and name. Smaller then my old Polaroid 26" but this one has wireless and uses way less electricity. Set up was easy if you followed the screen prompts. Sound is fair bur a little tinny. Delivery was fast with free shipping. I am a happy camper.I ordered it here at Amazon, really great price: http://amzn.to/1505ZUY

Reviews.Title: Wifi TV very good
Reviews.Author: Nelson Ramirez
Reviews.Content: excellent picture performance, I'm happy with this TV .. the only thing I do not like .. videos yuotube not going well, blocked and can not see the videos ...vizio must make improvements in this part ..

Reviews.Title: Good quality TV
Reviews.Author: Julie B. Sheffield
Reviews.Content: We use this in our kitchen.  It sits up high on a shelf in a cabinet.  Did not work well for us with the stand b/c the stand makes it tilt backward a bit, being already high up, this was a bad angle for viewing.  I got an articulating arm so we can rotate it and also tilt it down.  Down it's perfect.  Big improvement over the old tube TV we had in there.

Reviews.Title: For the price, it can't be beat.....
Reviews.Author: Montybuck
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kitchen to replace a 19 inch LCD. I mainly wanted the internet connection.  It was a easy setup.  Connected instantly with my router and had netlix on in 5 minutes.  The only drawback was the speakers. They really are bad.  I eventually bought a cheap pair of computer speakers from Best Buy.  They only cost $14 because they were an open box special.  Plugged them into the headphones out on the tv and I was all set to go.  Sound was good, much better than the speakers on the tv. Picture quality is good to very good.  All things considered, I'd recommend this Vizio to anyone.  For the price, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: info for mac airport users -- connecting the VIZIO
Reviews.Author: O. Kerscher "oliverk241"
Reviews.Content: The TV would NOT connect to my mac airport extreme router out of the box.  After spending some time on the phone with a VIZIO rep I was advised to change the password setting from WEP to WPA on my router.  I was not happy about that but I ended up updating the firm software on my airport router (pretty straight forward using airport utility) and then changing my password style from WEP to WPA/WPA2 personal.  After that I tried to reconnect and it worked right away.  I wish that VIZIO would make it a bit easier bc I know plenty of people who would have returned this TV for this silly reason.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: will
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my RV it has worked great with smart tv technology we can stream movies or stream music all on the same tv without having to run other equipment.

Reviews.Title: Great Value, slim and lightweight
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Well worth the money, great picture quality I would highly recommend this product to anyone considering purchasing a tv at a reasonable price

Reviews.Title: About surfing the web
Reviews.Author: joe3456 "joe"
Reviews.Content: I bought it. It is a nice TV as a TV. It also connects to WiFi to get signal from internet instead using cable which is an option. This following section describes how it connects to teh web.  VIZIO is providing you with "targeted aps" to connect to many specific websites such as Hulu, Yahoo, Netflix, and many more but not unrestricted browser. HTHOkay now that I used it more, it definitely has problem with its wireless link as some other ppl said.  The wireless worked on and off. The TV would say "signal lost". I measured the distance from my wireless router to the TV and it was 5ft (1m 50cm). It is to be noted that wireless computers in this household work perfectly 15 ft from the router. The TV wireless has a problem. I am removing 1 star to make it just 4.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Jani
Reviews.Content: I used my Amazon Prime and was amazed on how quickly I received my TV.  Have not had a problem with even though this is being used in my granddaughters' bedroom (where children can be rough).

Reviews.Title: Great Little Set!
Reviews.Author: M. Martin
Reviews.Content: I use it in my motorhome bedroom on a wall mount I already had. Fits and works well. Light weight but still has good sound. I've directly plug it into Internet via cable. Works well. Love only having one remote for TV and Internet apps like Netflicks.

Reviews.Title: Good bargin and features
Reviews.Author: Danny Osterweil
Reviews.Content: The TV has a nice picture, decent speakers, and some nice built in apps. I just use it for Netflix pretty much or hooking up a laptop. I wish there was a more robust app ecosystem and that the controls and layout were a little more intuitive, but overall I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: A good product for the price
Reviews.Author: R. Wray "richwh"
Reviews.Content: The wireless is a bit unreliable, but that could be where it is in my house (although no other devices seem to have an issue in that room)Other than that, I'd recommend for an inexpensive TV

Reviews.Title: utter rip off
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Chiedu
Reviews.Content: I just had this TV delivered to me and the screen shows like it's black and whitish in color. Its like there's a white veil in front of the screen. How do I get my money back? I made the mistake of not reading reviews before I purchased it. It's been shipped to Nigeria, returning it may not be an option. I feel shamefully cheated! :(  :(

Reviews.Title: OK!
Reviews.Author: David Prunkard
Reviews.Content: It's a little slow downloading. Hard to figure it all out but pretty happy with it. Wish there a way to view more of the free tv that I can get on my computer.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV wi fie works great
Reviews.Author: Desmond Hannon
Reviews.Content: Good picture jest the wright size for the space. we had a party of twenty watch the Lax finials everyone enjoyed the picture

Reviews.Title: Really Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Jones
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my rv and really like the wi-fi part of it i would totally recomend thisKen J

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: philip callahan
Reviews.Content: Good picture and sound. The remote is small and the key labels are hard to see.  It could be larger for older people.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: nizzly
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my MIL and she loves it!  No more tube TV for korean dramas!!!  We had it shipped to her on the other side of the country & it arrived as expected.

Reviews.Title: My first Vizio
Reviews.Author: M.Ishigan
Reviews.Content: Bought it because of the price and name. Smaller then my old Polaroid 26" but this one has wireless and uses way less electricity. Set up was easy if you followed the screen prompts. Sound is fair bur a little tinny. Delivery was fast with free shipping. I am a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the price
Reviews.Author: Derek Orr
Reviews.Content: I just bought my first hdtv and love it! The picture is awesome, sound is alright, and the apps are cool!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Vicki M. Railsback "Vic"
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV.  I think if you need a TV for the Bedroom, this will please you!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Chris Pahnlick
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy and a great picture.  Can't beat this TV for the price!  I would recommend this TV to friends looking to buy a smaller smart TV.

Reviews.Title: dont understand the bad reviews..
Reviews.Author: Rian R vanderMaden
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for 2 weeks and I'm very satisfied with the performance thus far. Believe me, paying less than 290.00 (which included free shipping and for some reason no sales tax was added) The picture has been crystal clear, sound quality is good (did purchase SONY sound bar system at the same time with the money I saved) Set-up was ridiculously easy (in my bedroom) and sha-zam! Apps have worked great so far, no problem with Netflix. Vizio was suppose to introduce the M series by the first quarter of the year, here it is almost June so lost my patience and took chance on the E series, no disappointments (but damn, when are they coming out with the M series)

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Gibson
Reviews.Content: It does everything I want, just sometimes we fight about when I want it done.It takes quite a bit of my bandwidth but the internet access is awesome. Just every once in a while netflix just turns off and it goes back to the TV portion. Very odd. But otherwise, love it.

Reviews.Title: not so smart tv
Reviews.Author: terry thompson
Reviews.Content: This TV works OK. Picture is clear, sound is above average, so far, but the internet is very, very, very slow. it connects less than 10% of the time. i have phones, ipods, ipads, kindles, etc., all connect with no problems, the vizio TV on the other hand needs nothing else connected to my wireless router to work. in the dead of night it works OK, netflix is pretty fast with little buffering. if i try watching netflix or hulu and start using my ipad, the tv will continually buffer. Ive checked router, no problem there. with TV plugged directly to router it works better but not much

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV for the price against the competition
Reviews.Author: MediaBaron
Reviews.Content: I viewed this VIZIO on the wall of TVs at Walmart where I could watch it side-by-side against a Sony, LG, etc. The image quality was about equal but the important thing that blew me away that isn't mentioned on all the reviews online is that the VIZIO actually showed MORE image on the screen than the other brands.If you look carefully at the other HDTVs at your local store notice that the other brands actually crop the image like old-school overscan crop of a CRT TV. I'm not spending money on a new HDTV that crops the image. In fact the older VIZIO that this model replaced for me also cropped the image.The audio is pretty good, though the speakers face straight down. I don't like the remote control, they flipped the channel/volume rocker position from my older VIZIO control (dumb) and the buttons all feel the same. There is scant instructions that come with this model so some features are a mystery, guess I have to go online to find a fuller manual. Buttons also feel hard to press as they are almost flush with the remote control. Otherwise is good HDTV. I'll see how well built this is as the one it replaces crapped out with the onscreen menu going crazy.

Reviews.Title: Solid TV - you get what you pay for, though
Reviews.Author: mescooby422
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice TV.  I have AT&T; UVerse, and the picture and sound quality are decent.  I give this three stars only because the picture quality really could be better.  I have two Samsung TVs in my house and the difference is night and day between the picture quality of the Vizio and the Samsungs .  If this is the only TV in your house/the only TV you will watch at home, you won't notice and will think the picture quality is great!A couple weird things I have noticed:-when watching Netflix, sometimes there is a weird blurry bar at the bottom of the screen, almost like the picture is too small for the screen and the TV will add some colors in to blend it in.  It's not that noticeable, but it is there.-I finally found some color/picture calibration settings for the TV that I like after googling and finding some suggested calibration settings.  When you switch from cable box TV viewing to Netflix - the TV switches to different calibration settings - and the picture is darker/not as good.I personally won't buy another Vizio, I'll shell out a couple hundred dollars more for a Samsung.  If you're looking for a bargain, though, this is your TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Dennis R. Baginski "Rivethead"
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV for about a month now and I must say that it has exceeded my expectations.  After some tweaking (I found settings on the avs forums), the picture is stunning.  The sound quality is also just fine (I know lots of people find fault with this, but I don't - at level 15-18 it's plenty loud enough for our large living room).  The one thing that I did not know about (but was worried about) was screen glare.  The TV is in a VERY bright room and I'm happy to report that glare hasn't been a huge issue.  It's not a matte screen like my other TV (Samsung 630 series), but it's also not a true glossy screen like a LOT of competitors.The faults:  the remote feels very cheap and the tv takes 15-20 seconds to turn on.The unknowns:  the internet stuff - wife said she can connect fine, but amazon.com had some issues streaming.  I'll look into it, but it hasn't been a priority for us.I purchased this for a very good price (it went up $100 a day after I purchased) and in terms of bang-for-buck this TV has been great.

Reviews.Title: SUPER NICE BUT...........
Reviews.Author: Henery Bosch
Reviews.Content: I have just purchased  VIZIO E320I for my birthday and never was able to light it off before sending it back to Amazon, The problem that I had is while installing the cable  (COAX) to the back of the TV it broke off from the back of the TV. Well it was no problem when I called Amazon and told them what happened and promptly sent another on its way. I strongly urge that you use a push on co-ax rather than a screw on if you want to avoid breaking the fitting off the TV.  I really think its a design flaw that will repeat returns.  Moving On , I could not have been more pleased with the Picture, The sound and the features and subscriptions from Amazon Prime, Truly a Smart TV . Many other accessories are available such as a sound bar with wireless woofer, a Keyboard for Internet and FaceBook and the movies  and news and TV programs. I may consider dropping my TV programs from Comcast and use an analog converter for local and ISP for all other programs on HDTV trough Amazon. Just saying!  � �

Reviews.Title: Great set
Reviews.Author: Lawrence J. Brown
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv set for the price.  First set came damaged.  Contacted seller.  Response was slightly slow but very agreeable.  Sent me a label to return and immediately sent out a new set.  Turnaround time from 1st contact about damage to receiving new set was about 1 week.  New set worked perfectly - easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for price
Reviews.Author: T. H. Kepley
Reviews.Content: Nice bargain priced Smart TV.  However, I do find that it does not seem very "substantial" .  The stand is a bit lite and weak, but still seems to hold up fine is unit is located in a stable location and not bumped around.  Also, the Wi-Fi could not pick up my home signal back in my bedroom, but iPhones and iPads are able to get the signal.  But I must admit that the signal is weaker back there.  However, the reception for Wi-Fi is obviously not a strong as that in my other devices.  Finally, it seems like the TV takes a bit longer to start up when turned on than other models.  Again, not a big deal given the price, but just not as substantial as other TV's that I own.Otherwise, the TV works fine and meets my needs at a terrific price point.

Reviews.Title: Perfect HDTV for us
Reviews.Author: Brigit M DuBois
Reviews.Content: A friend recommended this HDTV and he was right: this was exactly what we needed and at a great price.  The picture quality is great, the setup was easy and the features are simple but cover all our needs.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 47" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Steve Fenton
Reviews.Content: Pro: Great TV for the price. very good quality picture and sound, easy setupCon: Wish the remote was larger with bigger buttons

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Donald L. Reibsome "figuremaniac"
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived within 3 days of being ordered and took a matter of minutes to setup when taken out of the box.  The picture and sound are fantastic.  You will not be disappointed with the tv.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i-A0 32 inch
Reviews.Author: Dr. Terry L. Singer
Reviews.Content: Works right out of the box and very easy to set up. Great picture. Doesn't seem to be affected by any sun glare on the back porch. It's a good buy.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: NebraskaBurger
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!  The apps work great, and I am especially in love with the quick and easy access to Netflix!  The picture is pretty good, I wouldn't say that it's like THE BEST because obviously it's not going to be at this price.  But it's FINE.  This TV with internet is a STEAL at the price compared to what a Samsung or other name brand will cost you.We did have problems with the colors having weird grainy lines between light/dark - but we discovered that it was NOT the TV - it was a faulty HDMI cable!

Reviews.Title: Really like the picture and space saving size, but am having a little trouble with getting it to work with other devices...
Reviews.Author: John Doe
Reviews.Content: I have plugged everything in correctly and can't get the sound to work.  I did place a call the VIZIO help center and they quickly and easily fixed another problem I was having (although it was at the end of their call-in day and the rep. seemed rushed).  Will call in again and am sure they will be able to figure out what is going wrong with this compatibility problem.Also, our entertainment unit was built to accommodate only a 42" flat screen or smaller (which was the largest screen available at the time).  Because of its sleek design, this 50" inch screen fits perfectly.Read other reviews about delayed turn on time - can't understand why that is a problem.  So you wait a few extra seconds to start watching TV.  If that's really a "problem" with the TV, suggest watching less TV.Bottom line:  Great picture; for us, infinitely better than the 42" plasma it replaced (and does not run nearly as hot as the plasma).  For the cost (which because of American Express reward points, the out of pocket cost was even less), this is a great TV.  I would definitely buy another VIZIO TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: William3000
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is very good. Design is very good. Features are excellent. Price is amazing.This unit looks like it cost at least double. If you are into labels, then go buy a Sony or Samsung sticker and slap it over the Vizio label and call it a day. Then send me a message and I will give you my address to sent me a thank you gift for saving you at least $1000.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: dawn rissmeyer
Reviews.Content: awesome deal once we got one that worked, excellent value and has internet access, really useable for the kitchen, very pleased

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Candido Martinez Jr.
Reviews.Content: The TV is what I expected. It had everything that I was looking for and the price was just perfect. No regrets. Thank you for Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great perfect size TV for internet TV viewing
Reviews.Author: Flipp "Flipp"
Reviews.Content: We use this TV in a room that is used for watching TV when we have many guests over, and it is also a work out room when on the tread mill. We dont have it hooked up to any satellite or cable at all. We just use internet TV, watch some YouTube and we have Amazon Prime to pick some shows and movies off of. So you can hang this thing on any wall where you dont even need any hook ups, just an outlet to plug it in and if you have wireless internet, you are good to go

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use as a monitor and play movies from amazon as well.It is everything that I expected, beautiful picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: one of the best purchases ive made off of amazon, got here exactly on time and no damage done to it. this tv has been a dream, and the internet ready feature is the best part about it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the money
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Choma
Reviews.Content: This is my second television from Vizio that I have purchased.  My living room currently has a 47 inch model, and this 32 inch model was purchased for my home office.  The display is very nice; however, the Samsung television it replaced did seem to be a bit sharper that the Vizio.  This model includes built-in WiFi for easy access to the Internet apps.  So far, no issues encountered from an operational standpoint.  Out-of-the-box and up and running in 15 minutes, including setup on my home network.  Amazingly lightweight and easy to handle for a 32 inch model.  I would not hesitate to buy a Vizio television, especially since Vizio pricing seems to be below most of its competitors.  Both this model, and my first Vizio bought over 2 years ago have been reliable.

Reviews.Title: Ok tv
Reviews.Author: Dawit T Gebru
Reviews.Content: I liked the idea of having a tv with wifi built on it so that we can watch YouTube videos and movies over the Internet.this is a nice tv, good size for the bedroom.it fulfilled all the needs, the only drawback for me is that, when putting a search word for a YouTube video, it is so time consuming and there should have been a better and faster way. Have to point and click each word from the screen with the remote.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: christine famiano
Reviews.Content: Very happy and satisfied with the color and picture. Would highly recommend this TV, although have notdownload any apps yet for review but from the time spent so far great quality picture with true color.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: BwsmithAtl
Reviews.Content: In a ten-star system, it would be a nine for the price. A third HDMI input would be really nice. Having just one on the back makes it tough to maintain a clean look when you have to use the one on the side of the TV. Yup, there are inexpensive switchers right here on Amazon. The "smart" aspect is OK. With specific regard to Amazon streaming, I like my Roku better because I can access my Prime platylist. Can't for the life of me find it on the TV. Netflix is fine, and the real bonus for you other Roku people is the YouTube access. Its interface is a little clunky IF you like to access videos on your own YouTube channel. No list view; just one-to-the-next based on upload date. Still like the TV!

Reviews.Title: Very good product for the price
Reviews.Author: JIANHUA PAN
Reviews.Content: The pic is very good. Not used its wifi connection yet. Sound is also good.Good to have in the house as a secondary tv.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Lucia E.
Reviews.Content: First off, shipping was SUPER fast. I ordered this TV May7th and chose the free super saver shipping. The morning of May 8th, I got a call that my TV was at my apartment. Just WOW. It was very easy to set up...Comcast guy was doing the installation that same day and got everything perfect. The wifi works wonderfully - been streaming netflix ALL DAY. It is a bit of an annoyance to use the virtual keyboard since the remote is not a qwerty remote, but most things only have to be set up initially then it's smooth and easy sailing from there. Some reviews mention that the TV doesn't last that long, but we'll see. Fingers crossed.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and internet connectivity
Reviews.Author: txbucky
Reviews.Content: Small footprint and easy to set up.  Picture is sharp and sound isn't bad for such a small unit.  A lot of features for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the buck
Reviews.Author: P. Bump
Reviews.Content: The picture is clear and sharp and the sound is good.  Only thing I don't care for is when changing between HD and standard channels, it takes a few seconds.  Other than that it is a great television.

Reviews.Title: Just As Advertised
Reviews.Author: ReviewMaster
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently bought this TV for our bedroom. We went with the 720 because our bed is about 15 feet away from the TV, so the pixilation isn't as important. The installation is beyond easy and the apps begin downloading as soon as you activate any of them (which you do by hitting a button on the remote). If you're looking for a reasonably priced TV with a clean HD picture and WiFi, I would definitely recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: The product Lived up to all I wanted to be
Reviews.Author: Jay Markus
Reviews.Content: I had researched all type models and found this model was the best. I  use it in my bed room and the picture is bright and sound is good. If I have to buy another one I would do it..

Reviews.Title: Had to Return First One
Reviews.Author: S Martin
Reviews.Content: Loved the ease of set up, the quick delivery, the quality of picture although the time it takes to come on is very slow.However, soon realized there was an occasional popping sound which raised the red flag.  Few days later, the sound was gone.Have to say Amazon treated me great.  Took one phone call to have another TV there very next day.  This one works fine.  Hasn't been very long though.  Taking wait and see attitude.

Reviews.Title: Tevelision
Reviews.Author: Bill Hicks
Reviews.Content: Had it shipped to my parents house, and then brought it home to hook up over the weekend. When I took it out of the box, I thought I could see a hairline crack in the display, and it turned out I was right.  There was a large circular crack in the LCD.  Luckily there are very few pieces and it was easy to take apart/put together.This was my first return so I watched the "returning defective stuff" video.  Printed out the return label and went over to a USPS store.I got multiple emails from Amazon over the next 24 hours.  1 that the replacement was already being sent, and then another email shortly after with the very quick (overnight) arrival of the replacement.As sad it was to set the thing up to see the large crack, I have to say that was the best possible return experience I could have imagined.  I'm happy with the TV.  Currently just using it to watch on-line apps content.  There's not a terribly large amount, but the "TED" app that lets you watch TED talks is a favorite.  The picture is great and the sound in this room is great.  Would definitely buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: John Smith
Reviews.Content: I've always refused to buy an LCD / LED TV for anyone because plasma has always been better.When I first turned this TV on, I was pretty unhappy - the picture looked poor. The blacks were abysmal. I wanted my plasma back.After tweaking the picture settings, this TV looks EXCELLENT. Blacks are great.Pros: Great picture. Amazing for the price. Very low power consumption. Apps work great, not slow like I expected. Even the adaptive brightness (ambient light sensor) works flawlessly. I usually turn it off because its been horrible in the last 2 TVs I tried it on.Cons:Sound quality is poor.Plastic bezel looks cheap on the sides / back, but the front bezel looks VERY nice, so not really a big deal.No keyboard built into the remote, but you can purchase one separately.Considering the price, features, and picture quality I'm still giving it 5 stars. External speakers are a good idea.

Reviews.Title: it is good if you can wait for it start
Reviews.Author: Suzuki918
Reviews.Content: other than very slow to start, I like it.Both AV are very nice. The color and picture quality are very good too,

Reviews.Title: worth the price
Reviews.Author: H.
Reviews.Content: the TV came out of the box ready to directly connect to the modem for netflix. very nice thin frame around the screen. the picture and colors could be sharper, but for the price it's very adequate, i'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: time tested
Reviews.Author: CW in California "Charlie T"
Reviews.Content: Best value with the specs I needed. Great color, easy to navigate the smart features. Sound is great. I waited 6 months until posting my review to make sure I was satisfied. I love the Smart internet features.brightness, sharpness, and fast processing of movement. From 7-10 feet away it is perfect. Up close like 3-4 feet you will notice he difference in processing compared to the 240hz more expensive models. But for the price , it can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: vizioAO-320i
Reviews.Author: raviram
