Reviews.Content: i bought this tv from amazon 4 months ago for my bedroom.i am from guyana S.A.the picture quality is excellent.netflix works great.sorry we cannot get hulu and amazon videos(out of U.S.A.region)every thing else works great ,also the price is excellent(290.00)the remote is tinny and no backlight but after a time u get the feel.i wrote vizio to ask if i can replace the remote with a qwerty one.unfortunately they said no.all in all a great tv for a great price.i hope it lasts as long as my other samsung tv's

Reviews.Title: Netflix hangs otherwise works fine.
Reviews.Author: Terrence Nixa
Reviews.Content: Using this TV with antenna to watch network HD stations and it works fine. The remote is kind of touchy and you have to point it right at the TV but other than that I have no complaints. Netflix hangs on occasion which is annoying.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price
Reviews.Author: kc
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the bedroom. Exactly what I was looking for.  I saw other reviews about a sleep timer, so had been nervous but it has one.  First time with tv with Internet. Still getting used to it - forget we have it!  We have a roku in the other room but would definitely think about a smaller Vizio with Internet for kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Love it overall. My product review - good and could be improved comments.
Reviews.Author: Much Agape
Reviews.Content: I bought this Tv for my bedroom. The picture is clear and beautiful. The sound is excellent.Great price. The remote is small, doesn't have a sleep button.

Reviews.Title: Superior
Reviews.Author: Regina D. Hulse "red"
Reviews.Content: Best damn tv ever, good picture, nice features, does everything I wanted.  I recommend this to anyone searching for a great HDTV!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Carolyn J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: My older VIZIO was having problems that could have been repaired according to VIZIO.  However the price of this model was good and I could have a replacement almost immediately - Amazon's delivery time is awesome!  This TV was easy to install with good directions to connecting to my cable box.

Reviews.Title: I do like it
Reviews.Author: Fred Keese
Reviews.Content: I especially like the ease with which this smart tv receives Netflix beamed to it from a distant room. Being used to traditional old style tv format I am sometimes unhappy with the distortions that seem to come with hdtv widescreen format. Overall, though, a screaming buy as one reviewer wrote.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Larry Maronde
Reviews.Content: Like the picture quality and also the built in WiFi.  Watch Netfilx alot and streams in really well. I have it wall mounted and is very easy to watch.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable performance and slow apps
Reviews.Author: S. Goodwin
Reviews.Content: It's rare that I buy a product with such great reviews and have a bad experience with it, but this TV was pretty awful. Despite our top of the line Linksys wireless router, this TV constantly lost connectivity, sometimes in the middle of watching. This was not an issue of poor wireless signal because all the other iPads, iPhones, laptops, in the same room showed strong signal and worked fine on Netflix while this TV showed no connectivity. It was intermittent.One time while watching a show on Netflix, the TV actually powered off. No idea why. No one was touching the remote.The remote is not backlit, which makes it a pain to use in the dark if this is going to be your bedroom TV.I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Anniversary gift to my folks
Reviews.Author: Henry Mena
Reviews.Content: My folks had a 32" TV in their bedroom, but my father was having difficulty with the picture size. The setup was easy, picture and sound are great.  The TV faces a large window in the bedroom and so I was concerned for the glare that would come from that window onto the screen, but that has not proven to be an issue. I love the small edged frame.  The interface for using the SMART options are easy to navigate for my folks who are not very tech savvy.  Not heavy at all. My folks are very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: roy h. swartz
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, both for features and price. It was easy tos et up, and the picture settings allow customized viewing. The sound sytaem is OK, but we hooked it up to our surround system. Seems pointless to have HDTV with ordinary sound, so get a sound bar or surround to make it a real movie theater experience.

Reviews.Title: Love how this TV looks
Reviews.Author: locos85
Reviews.Content: I have had this for a few days now.  I upgraded from a 5 year old Toshiba Regza 42 inch.You have to mess with the picture settings to get this tv to look great.The standard factory settings look pretty dull,  I was scared for a second because of this.  Why make factory setting look bad? Who knowsAfter messing with the settings this TV looks incredible.  Crisp colors!!The sound is standard for a flat screen. I have hooked up an optical audio cable to my receiver.According to my receiver and my ears, it is passin 5.1 audo through to my receiver which is great.

Reviews.Title: Remote fails
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: The set up was easy and the size/features are great for a bedroom TV but the remote either fails or the TV isn't recognizing the remote. I take the batteries out and try again to no avail.  Then magically the TV turns off.  It's like there's a 30 second delay or something.  Highly annoying, especially when laid up post surgery.  I need to look up some fixes but they may be hard to implement since I can't get out of bed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: i purchased this for my girlfriend as her birthday present, the picture is really good i have no complaints so far

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great apps, ok sound
Reviews.Author: Jeff B
Reviews.Content: Tis why I gave it a 4 out of 5.  TV looks great, and without having a Roku box or Xbox, awesome alternative to getting your Netflix.  However, the only thing I did not like about the TV was that the sound wasn't the best.  Not terrible, but compared to an older styled TV with sweet built in speakers, the Vizio just couldn't hold it's ground.Would buy it again for a friend or family member, though, if they needed a smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Cicabel
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in great condition. Though it took a bit to work out how the controls were and everything, I've decided I love this TV.

Reviews.Title: great tv great price
Reviews.Author: junior javier figueroa
Reviews.Content: Got this tv for my baby girls room. And its an awsome tv looks very nice and is super lite.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i-AO 32 inch
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Dickson
Reviews.Content: For the price it is well worth it.  Price aside the TV is not terribly stable.  You can pick it up in one hand so needs to be stabilized or you can easily knock it over.  Aside of that I paid the price and it's above my expectations.

Reviews.Title: great tv set and thank amazon.com
Reviews.Author: cuisinart cuisinart
Reviews.Content: i ordered this tv set and it had  a loose screw in the body of the tv set i can hear it rattling arround like a babys rattleups did a lousy job at shipping i think sometimes ups dribbles the tv and slamdunks it  like a basket balli told amazon the first tv was broken they sent out  a new one and paid for the shipping and handling of the first tv setthe second one came so fast it shocked me and they rapidly picked up the first tv set  i think amazon.com is a great companythey make sure their merchandise does not arrive brokeni am happy with the second tv set  federal express delivered the second tv  iam talking about this sony visio e3201 A0i am happy with the second tv it works fine  i only wish the remote has a keyboard on the other side to type in stuff to search fori am thrilled after the second tv came and came so fast  a person has to use the on screen  keyboardthis set is for my niehgbor she is visually impared and it maybe hard to  use  on screen text  i may ask  this companyif i can specail order a remote controll with a typewriter keyboard on the bottom

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!
Reviews.Author: April Harrell
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV ($298) for my exercise room, planning to not have the direct TV hooked up, just using the Visio Apps (we are Amazon Prime fans) and I love it. The sound is awesome, the wireless connectivity rocks, even when my boy is playing video games on another TV. No complaints!

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Edgar Esparza Lopez "ege"
Reviews.Content: this is a good tv for a room,cause is not big and its not really small so it works great,good price too...

Reviews.Title: Great value, great picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Tony Tiger"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Visio tv in the house and right now I wouldn't buy any other brand. The built in wireless and internet aps are really handy. I didn't even hook it up to our cable since we use it in the bedroom to stream Netflix and Amazon Prime. You can even put movies on a thumb drive and insert it into the USB port to play. I would have given it a 5 but they seem to have cheapened up the remote a bit and the directional buttons don't seem as sturdy as the remote for my 55" Visio.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Murphey
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a great TV for the price. The picture is great (I adjusted the settings per CNET's recommendations) and the widgets are very cool. It does take a little long to start up but that isn't a big deal.

Reviews.Title: great television
Reviews.Author: mbh
Reviews.Content: We love this TV, great picture quality.  So nice to be able to watch netflix instantly, love the "smart" TV!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Linda J
Reviews.Content: This is my first LED and I am very happy with it. Love that I can watch HULU Plus & Netflix. Will eventually put this one in the playroom and put a larger Vizio in the living room.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Larry Everett
Reviews.Content: 720 P was better than I thought TV app are great I use netflix and amazon with 4G phone verizon

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Yen4Truth "Yen4Truth"
Reviews.Content: I love this television. The sound is great, picture wonderful. As mentioned in other reviews the quality of the remote is no where near the quality of the tv. The buttons are spongy, it is small. All round one of the worst remotes I've used-ever. Luckily, I bought a ROKU with this purchase with an outstanding remote that allows me to override this difficulty most of the time. Get the TV. It is great.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: R. Gillis
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my small home office. Surprising very nice picture for the price. A breeze to install and set up. I do not use the TV sound since I have it hooked up to my receiver and speakers. I would buy mother in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Charlene
Reviews.Content: Great price! Wifi tv is awesome!!! Remote sucks- Definitely need Qwerty remote- But- Love the TV. Great picture- Like anything- don't expect great sound from it though. That's extra! ;) But, still, I would recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Clarity and Color
Reviews.Author: R. Charles Perry
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for my son, he uses it mainly to play war vidio games, and loves it. I am amazed at the clarity and true to life color.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Coloradogirl2013
Reviews.Content: I think this is a good value for a tv of this size and type.  I am using it in my workout room.  The sound is pretty blah though, so I hooked it up the some external speakers....now I can rock out during my workouts.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO 32in tv  HD
Reviews.Author: goofyone
Reviews.Content: I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO EVERYONE.GOOD PICTURE AND SOUND.GOOD VALUE FOR THE MONEY.CAME WELL PACKED TOOLOVE IT!!!!!

Reviews.Title: WiFi Feature a Real Plus
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Gillett
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great but the WiFi feature allows us to stream movies and TV shows at any time in HD and as a Prime Amazon member we get lots of movies for free.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Kathleen K. Lepper
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Great deal....works very well for my 86 year old mother.  Had it up and running in about 10 minutes.  Just right size for room.  Love the "smart" options.  Made for one happy Great-Grandma to see all the great-grandkids pictures on Facebook!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: robbyrob
Reviews.Content: My daughter needed a TV for her room and we decided to get this one. She can not be happier, internet, apps, netflix, amazon prime, I mean this little guy has it all. Highly recommend for anyone who is wondering if they should get this.

Reviews.Title: Good Price and Quality for the Visio 55" SMART TV
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: So far the Visio is working great.  The setup only took a few minutes to connect the TV to the home wireless and the SMART feature works well.  I also connected the TV the to AT&T; Uverse service with HDMI and the picture is outstanding. The audio is an issue probably due to the ATT uverse but by changing a a few buttons involving the uverse remote the problem went away.  I found out about this fix by googling the problem.  The audio is not a Visio issue because when we used a DVD the TV's audio worked fine.  The ATT Uverse is also great!!Pro - all of the aboveCon - None yet

Reviews.Title: What a change up!  Very nice picture, works well for me, and looks damn good.
Reviews.Author: Frank G. Russell "Russ Russell"
Reviews.Content: Maybe I'm not making a good comparison, but this television is head and shoulders better than the older Samsung that it just replaced.  Of course, the older Samsung was just an LCD, and this is an LED, and the resolution is still 720p, but the image is anything but the same.  Vivid picture and good sound.  I'm totally happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: Chris Hessler
Reviews.Content: Literally the best bang for your buck. Not a huge fan of the remote. But I am very satisfied! Love vizio!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Quality Product
Reviews.Author: lorihicks
Reviews.Content: My first flat screen purchase and I am so pleased.  I was looking for clear picture quality and this television definitely does that.  I love the smart tv features wherein I can watch my Netflix and Hulu Plus, nothing is better than this.  If you are trying to decide between this television and a larger model that is not a smart tv, go with this one, the picture may not be as big, but you can't beat the picture quality and the features that it offers for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love my new HDTV
Reviews.Author: ki rio
Reviews.Content: The set up was so easy! I quickly could connect it to my wireless system--it was just too easy! I like to sound and the picture very much. It is much better quality than the previous HDTV I owned, which was not a VIZIO brand, but just had given out after many hours of use. This is an improvement right out of the box in picture and sound and ease of set up.

Reviews.Title: Works great with Xbox 360
Reviews.Author: M. Jagendorf
Reviews.Content: I bought this solely to hook up my Xbox 360 to, and it works perfectly fine, and was incredibly easy to set up. It has no trouble with fast-paced action games.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Aldric
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased for my two teenage boys who share a room. One has XBOX and one has PS3, they both like the quality of the graphics. The wifi feature works perfect...the entertainment possibilities are endless..

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: LRB "Lemuel R Brinkley"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife after her TV went out.We already have one VIZIO set in our den.This one just as good and would buy again.I know there are better quality TV's on the marketbut for my money VIZIO is a great buy. I will saythe 120Hz are even better if you want to pay a little more.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Klp
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for my bedroom. It should come with a remote with keyboard on the back as it is a smart TV and would make set up easier

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: teddie simms
Reviews.Content: got this for my 13 year old grandson he loves it, says that the picture is much clearer than his smaller tv and has netfix,hulu plus, amazon and others already set up

Reviews.Title: WiFi isn't reliable. Consider another option
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tv if you just want to watch regular programming.  The WiFi is not reliable as other reviews have reported.  I use other wireless devices in the same room with no trouble but consistently have issues loading amazon instant programming.  If you are looking at this for the smart tv option, consider another option.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: bmore
Reviews.Content: Seems smaller than 32 in. But it functions well  for the price. Experienced Netflix freezing the whole TV itself. Had to unplug for it to do anything. Good sound not the best but OK for price. Great picture tho. Very crisp and warm in color.vizio is definitely the best off brand company I will buy a TV from.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Lchristensen
Reviews.Content: I had been searching for a new TV for my bedroom and I compared several before deciding on the Vizio E320i-A0 I love the picture and the slim bezel it looks huge in my bedroom anything larger would have been overwhelming and I love the fact that I can Stream directly to my tv wirelessly. It did take a few minutes figuring out how to get the WiFi to talk to my modem but I love the fact if I want to watch something on Amazon or Netflix its just a button away. The picture is beautiful on this tv and I have heard some say the sound isnt that stellar but I havent noticed. I do agree the Remote could be a bit bigger but if thats the only thing that bothers me I think I can live with it. I highly recommend this Television if you are looking for a nice size TV for your bedroom or gameroom.

Reviews.Title: Vizio smart tv 32"
Reviews.Author: Frizz
Reviews.Content: Easy to work with it . I order this one to check the quality and guess what , i think to buy a bigger one!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J.DeMille
Reviews.Content: I looked up what the best 32" TV's were online and this one came up constantly. We received  this TV a few weeks ago and so far I have really liked it! The picture and sound quality is really great. It has the cool features because it is a smart TV, but it would be even cooler if I could customize it even more with emails and my fantasy team etc. Overall a good TV for the price, I don't give it 5 stars because the remote controller is not that great and every time I turn on the TV I have to pick the input source for some reason. This could be a mistake on my part though I guess.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO SMART TV
Reviews.Author: Esther M.K.
Reviews.Content: This television is WAY better than the much more costly, option rich Samsung 5300 that I bought and returned prior to getting this one... but it doesn't hold a candle to the SONY Bravia that I'm replacing, which was an absolute joy to watch.  (Unfortunately, after only three years, the pixels on the Bravia mysteriously started blowing up).  My biggest complaint is the shiny screen, which they all seem to be installing these days.  WHY???  I have no use for these screens, and will avoid them at all cost in the future.  This TV is almost un-watchable in the morning due to the GLARE from my sky lights and reflections from other light sources."Smart TV"?  Well, it'll get you by in a pinch.  I don't care for it much.  I'm glad I've got it, (I've got bragging rights) but I very rarely use it, as I have a hard time seeing the menu.  The remote control is a complete joke.  Small, poorly thought out piece of junk.  But for under $300.00 what does one expect?!?I have no issues with the sound quality, even though others have complained.  Good thing, as I don't seem to be able to get my sound bar to work with this thing.  I like the slim, sleek design of this TV.  It takes up very little space.  For my needs, the layout, quality and number of inputs works well.  An extra USB hub would have been nice so that I could keep my keyboard (not included) plugged in at all times, but hey.  The initial set-up was easy as well.Bottom line:  Want an inexpensive "smart" TV?  This fits the bill for sure.  Do I miss the PICTURE quality of my SONY?  You bet!  Will I buy another SONY?  Probably not, but this is my second Vizio....

Reviews.Title: Vizio's are worth your time to investigate and purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have two of these televisions and I love the fact that they are so easy to install.  The colors are wonderful and they are good for bedroom tvs. I love the fact that my subscriptions are easy and I don't have to worry about my kids accessing something they aren't supposed to.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Knudson
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!  I decided to purchase a new TV to update from one I've had for about 13 years.  I was looking for a 32 inch.  I researched a bunch of them online, and decided to go with this one because it was the only smart tv in that size I found, and it was a great price.  All of the other tv's I saw only had built in wifi on larger size tv's.  It was super easy to set up with my wifi and cable. The picture looks great! And I did not need an hdmi cable.

Reviews.Title: not dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Ryan "Bones"
Reviews.Content: this tv does the trick, it is a little washed out on the color but unless your really pickey you wont even notice it. Im happy with the purchase reasonably priced and does what it states, plus I look at it this way even though I have devices (xbox,ps3) for the amazon and Netflix apps having them on the tv just means less electricity being used, and that's always a bonus.

Reviews.Title: We love this TV!
Reviews.Author: DeeTush
Reviews.Content: We had another brand first and took it back to where we bought it and then we bought this one.  Its got a great picture and we love the smart TV features.

Reviews.Title: Vizio is offering consumers an economical smart TV for a very reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Charles Sloden
Reviews.Content: Setting up wifi is tedious (typing one letter at time) but this is a very nice TV for the bedroom at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV!
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality! Love that I have the ability to snyc right into Netflix through the tv. Strongly recommend and quite affordable!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Richard L Myerson
Reviews.Content: Picture quality less than expected.Cheap remote control.Poor menu selection especially with the Internet apps.Amazon Prime no watch list.  Pain to find the show you want to watch!

Reviews.Title: TV works
Reviews.Author: Anybody
Reviews.Content: We use the TV for over the air signal.  I have no complaint.  The picture quality is great.  Netflix, Hulu Plus work.  Overall, it's great quality for the money.  Our other LCD LED TV is a Samsung, and frankly I can't really tell the difference in picture quality, but I can tell the difference in product pricing.

Reviews.Title: Everything Was Super Easy
Reviews.Author: Savannah Weatherill
Reviews.Content: The setup was a breeze, as far as scanning channels and setting up both Netflix and Amazon Instant Play, the TV just guides you through it, which is really nice for the not-so-tech-savvy people.Also, the Vizio is very sleek and sharp looking with a thin frame and simple base. It genuinely looks great in any room. Just be sure to re-tighten all screws after connecting the base, it might tilt to one side if the screws aren't tight.So far, the only thing I cannot figure out is how to make the picture fullscreen (meaning without the black on either the top or sides of the picture) without having to change the picture setting to "zoom" or "panoramic" (which can make the picture stretch or seem out of proportion).Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. It is the first TV I have bought and I really enjoyed that it was hassel-free.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: Robin Walker
Reviews.Content: I have another VIZIO TV, which was why I decided to purchase this brand. Both Vizio TV's work just fine and this on had the Wifi, which really makes things much simplier to set up.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Toni Meurlot "flygirl"
Reviews.Content: I've had my TV for about a month and really do love it. The Smart features are great and I also like the quality of the picture.Good buy on Amazon and super fast delivery. Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love my television
Reviews.Author: Renee Tait
Reviews.Content: It was easy to get it working, and I love that it is a smart tv also the sharp color and crisp picture. Love that I can get to nextflix and hulu plus to watch my favorite shows. Did I say it has a great picture. I love my television and I got it a great price...thanks Amazon and Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Managable price and great product!
Reviews.Author: Alex Tejada
Reviews.Content: My first purchase on a smart TV after researching several brands. This Vizio is awesome baby, with a capitol "A". Again for a more advance shoppers probably will say otherwise, however for the amount of time that I watch TV is just fine. Buy one while they still last.

Reviews.Title: Great picture...apps could be more user friendly
Reviews.Author: Jerimiah
Reviews.Content: This was my first smart t.v. so I didn't really know what to expect.  But I've owned other HDTV's before and the picture on this was absolutely beautiful.  My only reason for not giving it a 5 star is I was disappointed by how slow the apps operate and the lack of options on the apps themselves.  That might be because of the way the apps were written by their respective makers.  But for instance the amazon app doesn't let you sort through the free movies you pay for through PRIME by genre.  And Hulu Plus has very limited browsing options.  You can always do searches if you know the exact show you're looking for but the operations are clunky and slow and take a while to process.  While I understand it's not a cell phone its not very much data being transmitted to have a list of movies and a few pictures.  I can put up with some load times for high data HD movies but the awkward slow apps just can make it rather frustrating.  You can spend 30 minutes just looking for something to watch on an app and that's simply a waste of time.In spite of this I'd still give the T.V. a good rating.  It plays movies brilliantly and the sound is much better than you would expect.  The sound is great for average viewing and movies.  But for blockbuster large action films or intense sports I'm going to have to get a sound bar.  It was also very easy to set up and put together in about 5-7 minutes.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Melissa Inlow
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this TV.  It works perfectly and looks great.  The remote is easy to use and you can navigate through the menu fairly easy as well.Its the best tv I've owned. This is my first smart TV, but I would recommend them.

Reviews.Title: *****Great TV for a Great Price*****
Reviews.Author: K. A. Sereduck
Reviews.Content: The biggest downfall of this Vizio Smart TV is the lack of a keyboard; but, you can plug in a USB keyboard and it works for some of the TV Apps. Also, not all video formats are supported when playing from a USB drive, and I have not been able to find a list of supported file types anywhere.All-in-all, a great buy, especially for people who use Netflix or another online video service.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!!
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: Amazing television, especially for the price.  Great quality picture, good sound and the extra features really expand your viewing experience especially if you subscribe to any video service.  I have only owned this for a few months but so far no problems.  I would definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Works as I'd expect!
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen
Reviews.Content: Very light, easy to set up, great picture.  Had to work with the inputs it has built in, but that's also me just getting with the modern times.  No complaints!

Reviews.Title: New VIZIO Models
Reviews.Author: JGRD
Reviews.Content: So far so good after a few days.  I am very impressed with the picture and quality of the fit and finish.  In some ways (not from angles) it looks better than my 40 inch Sony 1080.Set up was so easy, if you want wireless all you need to know is your routers name when it comes up in a list and it's code.  The stand was easy to set up and the wrench needed was provided.  When you power it on, it starts up quickly.  You are only about 5 or 6 seconds to a picture each time it powers on.  The remote feels great in my hand and has a button on it to go right to netflix and others.  The screen looks really nice with the thin frame.  It is upstairs from my verizon router and it picks up the wireless signal full strength.If you are worried about $$, this was a great value and It was fun watching the garbage truck crush my old CRT TV this morning.

Reviews.Title: perfect performance
Reviews.Author: NURETTIN
Reviews.Content: Although its a cheap tv its applications works very well. Especially netflix and youtube videos. However, you need a fast internet connection because when you use laptop, its connection speed may decrease. Actually this is not about Vizio tv.As a conclusion image and sound quality is fine, price is cheap.

Reviews.Title: Good Value, User-Friendly
Reviews.Author: Michael "Carolina Yankee"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Menu navigation is fairly intuitive. Be forewarned that the on-board audio is poor and best connected to an external system. Also, other than one optical-out connection, there is only one conventional audit output connection (3.5mm mini-plug). Very good value overall.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: We have two visio smart TVs, a 70 in and a 32in for our bedroom. The only problem we have had is the smaller TV seemed to have a faulty stand that didn't hold our TV solidly upright and we were constantly having to adjust it when it tipped to one side. Just recently we opened our bedroom windows and one strong breeze was all it took to tip our TV completely off the stand resulting in a cracked screen, visio wont repair or exchange the TV now even with our extra warranty and to add insult to injury their operator was really quite rude. Will not bemaking any future purchases to visio based soely on their customer service(or lack thereof) in the future.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING DEAL
Reviews.Author: kRyS "SYd"
Reviews.Content: Best Price Excellent Product and fast shipping.  No regrets with this purchaseVery happy with the quality and Vizio is my new favorite

Reviews.Title: solid tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: good product slow to start upgood image qualitymenus a bit hokeyvery good value x x x x

Reviews.Title: Nice TV/Nice Price
Reviews.Author: jmw1209
Reviews.Content: The Visio E500i-A1, 50" was an upgrade from my six year old 40" Samsung LCD. I used Amazon Prime next-day shipping for 3.99 and it arrived in less than 24hrs! I liked it out of the box, great price, easy setup(wifi-cable)and has plenty of HDMI inputs. The Amazon and Netflix buttons on the remote control are a nice feature.  Picture and sound are great.  It's a little thicker than most tv's I was considering, but not a problem as it's not a wall mount.(never had a wall mount,probably fine for that too)  The tv has many picture settings making it easy to find the one perfect for what you're watching.  Very pleased after a few days of watching.

Reviews.Title: An Okay TV
Reviews.Author: t otoole
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our living room, but to be quite frank, it sounded so awful (tinny) that we moved it to the guest room.  It sounds much better in a smaller room.The picture quality is okay, but nothing spectacular.  There is no comparison with our Samsung (of course, there is a bit of a price difference).I was disappointed that I can't get Acorn TV on the Vizio.  We have Roku and Roku seems to have more programming available than does the Vizio smart TV.  There does not seem to be a way to add apps other than what is provided.We really haven't tried using this TV for more than a TV and Netflix.  We dumped our expensive satellite television for basic cable.  Other than news, most of what we watch is on Netflix and Roku.It will be fine for the guest room which doubles as a project room, but I can't say that this is more than an "okay" TV.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Douglas
Reviews.Content: We were a bit afraid of purchasing a TV over the internet, but after shopping around this was the best deal. So happy we did as it came on time, in great shape, & as expected! Great picture & addition of sound bar makes a Family movie night Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Very good picture, especially for the money.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Allen
Reviews.Content: Cheap price for all the apps. Lots of connections on the television. For the money it's hard to beat. WOOT

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: robert stemm
Reviews.Content: this is a very good tv and set up is easy good picture and sound.  the online feature is great. I would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: nice TV..cheap remote
Reviews.Author: M Knight "M.Knight"
Reviews.Content: similiar to other reviews .. good TV for the money but can't believe how cheap the remote is.  Overall happy with decision to buy - I really like the Yahoo widget and available apps.

Reviews.Title: Keyboard for Vizio E320i-A0
Reviews.Author: Leonard W. MacAruso Sr. "Len"
Reviews.Content: Has anyone tried a wired or wireless keyboard with this tv. If so please leave details and models you have tried and got working for all to read. REMOTE IS horrible!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!
Reviews.Author: L Mic "Circles"
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about this one! Price was right, picture is great and the smart tv is amazing! No issues with this one and this is my 2nd Vizio and I think this will be my brand from now on.

Reviews.Title: nice picture, can't watch Hulu for more than 40 minutes
Reviews.Author: Daniel E. Linfield "timeLapse"
Reviews.Content: This TV looks great and is easy to set up. My biggest problem is that Hulu frequently starts to stutter and is unwatchable. I restart the TV and get a few more minutes but it starts to stutter again. I switch over to my old TV with Roku and Hulu works fine. If Vizio can fix the Hulu app, this would be a great value.Update (November 1 2013): The Hulu app on this TV was never fixed. I don't imagine Vizio has any incentive to fix it. I had to use my Roku box for this TV so that I can use Hulu. So I am spending extra money to get functionality that the TV should already have.I contacted Vizio support and they said they were working on it but had no estimate for when it would be fixed.You would be better off buying a different brand smart TV or buying a non-smart TV and using a Roku, Google, Apple or other streaming box.

Reviews.Title: Great TV system
Reviews.Author: David Coffey
Reviews.Content: I reaaly found this TV to be everything I expected and more, great picture and just great all around. Recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: I love Vizio
Reviews.Author: Angela M. Dioca
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th Vizio product. I bought this TV to upgrade the 26" one in my bedroom. I absolutely love it!! The only thing that I don't like is that it takes about 45 seconds to actually turn on. I know that is due to the wireless connection but other than that I would buy this TV again!! Great buy for the $$ and the apps are great!

Reviews.Title: work fine
Reviews.Author: suxiaoxiao
Reviews.Content: the picture looks nice, it is easy to use, for a kitchen unit, it functions as what we would like to see

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Marrian Stinson
Reviews.Content: I love this TV for the price and what it can do! It just like the smart phone and I can watch NeXT flick and others outside of my cable company-great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Don Burdsall
Reviews.Content: I am not a big TV watcher these days, and I gave up my dish last year to go to an antenna, but the picture and flexibility of this smart TV is amazing.  I love it and for the money, it was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and exactly what you're buying
Reviews.Author: Anonchick
Reviews.Content: Got the tv in 2 days, which is pretty speedy. Set up was really simple and compared to the 32in I had before, the difference is great! Perfect size (not to big or too small) and easy hook up to my PS3.I recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mr. Welch
Reviews.Content: great price, speedy shipping. excellent tv, very good picture, apps are a plus, highly recommend for someone to purchase if you dont want to spend 2000 on a higher brand name smart tv. great purchase

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: ILEANA BUCKELEW
Reviews.Content: Cute, super light, big, beautiful. I use it as a room tv and it is perfect. Love that it is Internet ready, no more cables running all over to watch movies. Perfect size and price.  Go for it!

Reviews.Title: great!  works fine, looks good, tech support good.
Reviews.Author: xxx
Reviews.Content: seems fine. However, I have run into all kinds of problems with trying to get service and the cost increases associated with changing to hd service.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Seamus McGrady
Reviews.Content: Got it for my bedroom and it is the perfect size, great clarity, love the smart tv options...glad I checked out Consumer Reports to get their ratings which have been on line all the time for me - including this TV.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: great tv just wish i could watch the cw and abc family on through the website or that my laptop would link to it through usb

Reviews.Title: Great TV, wireless is buggy
Reviews.Author: D. Polk
Reviews.Content: We can't get this TV to reliably connect to our Asus wifi router in the house.  It needs constant setup from scratch to work.  Just turning the TV on usually results in no Internet connectivity.  Very frustrating.Either way, GREAT TV for the money.  Gorgeous picture, good sound, lightweight and good looking.  No complaints about the TV part of the TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Built in wifi with all the apps. Slim. Bright with true blacks. Perfect for ourSons bedroom. Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jerri L. Law
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV. Got it for my bedroom and its perfect. Only complaint is sometimes when I turn it on, the volume doesn't come on and I have to turn it back off and then back on and the volume is back. Not sure what is up with that, but its a minor hassle for a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Tim McDermott
Reviews.Content: It has a far better picture the 8 year old Sony DLP it replaced.Set up was a snap and I am enjoying the many features of the "Smart TV".

Reviews.Title: Pleased with quality.
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with this purchased. I researched many televisions before purchasing. The deciding factor for me was that it was WiFi ready. I love being able to just flip on Netflix... The packaging was good and set-up easy...even for this non-technical girl!  The base was easy to assemble and had all the appropriate tools. The only thing that is and adjustment for me is the sound. This is the first TV I bought in 13 years...so I just need to adjust. I will be hooking up external sound system though.Great purchase for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for small room
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Johnson "Jan"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because of the reviews it got and mainly because a relative bought it for a small bedroom and really liked it.It was easy to set up and has a great picture and the price was great.  We put it in a small bedroom also.  It comes with hardware to mount on the wall which our relative did but we put ours on a cabinet with the stand that came with it.  We hooked it up to our Dish Network and it was all set to go in a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: jamie rzeszowski
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this tv last night.  Everything was great exceot when i view in wide screen or panaramic, you can see a slight portion of the bottom of the screen on the top.  Is this a defect or just a normal setting of the tv.

Reviews.Title: Lucky Find
Reviews.Author: EmperorWatcher
Reviews.Content: I hadn't considered a smart tv, since we have equipped all of ours with Roku boxes. We happened on a floor model at 25%+ off and jumped at the chance. I haven't regretted the move in the slightest.I'm sure there are subtleties and superior sets with higher picture quality available, but you'll be hard-pressed to find a better buy with this set's feature set.I still haven't figured out how to configure certain aspects of the "Smart" capabilities, but between the onboard apps, the Roku and accessibility to PlayOn, it is very hard not to be very satisfied with this TV.BTW: Picture quality is quite good, and the sound isn't half bad either, for such small speakers.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: D. Curiel
Reviews.Content: overall is a good tv, a little slow at turning on, but otherwise functions well. it is easy to mount

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Enzo
Reviews.Content: Picture is Awesome.I bought two for the kids room and  Hooked up the HDMI cable. Never would know it's 780p.They love going on Netflix and watching movies.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: reviewmire
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality. I have a 47" 1080p that has a better picture, but this tv is great for the money. Great online apps. Built in tuner, easy to set up, good audio, slim frame, thin, great wifi range, great hd tv/video quality. Very good value.

Reviews.Title: picture quality great
Reviews.Author: chops
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great, sound quality is very good, Only minor complaint is that the remote buttons are not so nice but otherwise a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Mauriem Mananga "Mauriem"
Reviews.Content: This product is so amazing.  The pictures are perfect, the softwares are up to date the remote is perfect fit for the TV There is nothing on this product that will not amaze.  Great job VIZIO.

Reviews.Title: black background
Reviews.Author: Bruce P. Coleman
Reviews.Content: Black background appears gray which tends to wash out the crisp color that you want in a picture! Automatic picture formats dont seem to help!

Reviews.Title: Love my Vizio
Reviews.Author: Nevwashaz
Reviews.Content: TV is awesome, smart tv is the way to go, setting it up was way easy, I never have internet connection problems, so much easier than streaming Netflix and Hulu on my Xbox. Picture quality is amazing too. Very satisfied with this order from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: geezer
Reviews.Content: Great Picture, Good Sound. No User manual.  "Manual is on board," and it is left up to the consumer to discover, and figure out how to use it.  All in all, I love the set.

Reviews.Title: That's the way to watch TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Gulla "Forest Quilter"
Reviews.Content: We own several Vizio TVs and have found that they are easy to set up and install.  Would definely buy another.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: nicknack81
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Vizio has to be one of my favorite brands. Prices are reasonable and great product. Good buy

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: David Earley
Reviews.Content: fast delivery, easy setup, great picture.  I would recommend this product.  Like the features on this TV.  Connected to my computer with no problem

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Cara's mom
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this TV for her bedroom and she loves it.  Its very easy to navigate, (she's 9),  and it picked up our WiFi signal right away.  Looks great in her room and is a nice size.  A couple times, we've had minor technical issues, but if I unplug the TV and then plug it back in, everything to works again.  Also, the specifications on the directions say it won't play off a hard drive, but ours does which is an added bonus since we have lots of movies stored on a external hard drive.  Definitely a great price for a TV with so many features!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J. M. Ruddy
Reviews.Content: Love this tv, well worth every penny.  I got it set up perfectly and the screen is phenomenal.  Best tv of its size.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: Gene Signoretti
Reviews.Content: I looked around at many "smart" tv sets.  After deciding what I really needed I bought this Vizio.  It looks great, works without a hitch, and was easy to set up.  I just found a comparison in a magazine and the Vizio was placed third.  The other sets cost $700 and $450.  The sound quality was an issue.  I have no problem with the sound when watching most shows and when I watch a movie, the set is connected to a 725 watt sound system.  The only person complaining about the sound would most likely be my neighbor.  The connection to my wi-fi was perfect.  There is some set up that you must do, but it's fairly easy.  At a price of less than $300..delivered I think Zizio hit the target here.  Now I know why they are one of the top sellers...great value.  The service and shipping from Amazon was ,as always, top shelf.

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: fyz
Reviews.Content: Definitely good choice! Picture quality is very nice when you compare it with the same kind of products. Also, it was easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I'm happy with my smart tv. It work well and picture is fine. It was easy to set up. I've read a lot of reviews before deciding on this smart tv.I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Ill Only Buy Vizio
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Love it, Vizio Rocks, these guys know there stuff . They could improve on the remote but the TV itself is awesome ....

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: john miller
Reviews.Content: def worth the wait AWESOME TV. GREAT CUST SER WITH VIZIO. RECOMMEND TO EVERYONE. BEST TV ON THE MARKET !!!

Reviews.Title: Feature rich, good picture, but some technical glitches
Reviews.Author: dePDX
Reviews.Content: For a TV of this price, the picture looked very nice and the list of features is impressive. Had it worked consistently, it would warrant a 4/5 I don't know whether the issues we had are specific to this TV or problems with this model.Pro:-Features-Picture/price point-Physical appearanceCon:-Sound didn't come on with TV a couple of times-Picture size was not stable when streaming or through DVD. The bottom of the picture would periodically shift about 10mm up and down. Once you notice the movement, it is very annoying.-Hardware/navigation/startup were slow and would crash/lock occasionally. Had to unplug the power to reset.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!!
Reviews.Author: Luna
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my new TV! It has nice applications, easy netflix button...and I bought a HDI cable to watch free streaming channels from my computer. It also has a USB, so you can see movies from there, too. The sound is really nice, the quality of the picture great...the only thing is that it looked slimmer from the back than it really is. I was afraid that 32-inch would be too small, but somehow this 32-inch is really big! It found my wi-fi super easy.I live in a studio and it fits perfectly! If you need a great TV for a small price, buy this, nothing is better!

Reviews.Title: well worth the money
Reviews.Author: joe merritt
Reviews.Content: every thing works just fine. wish the remote was a little larger.but happy with product and the price. would and have recomended it

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: R. Gibby
Reviews.Content: I bought these for Christmas presents for my children.  They have really enjoyed them.  The TVs have a great picture with excellent color.  While they are a 720p, they are only a 32 inch set so you don't notice the resolution difference.

Reviews.Title: Okay so far
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Delivery was great, the TV arrived intact.Set up was easy.Performance so far is good.  I have not tried the internet services yet.Occasionally when I turn it on, there is no audio.  I simply cycle the switch, and things are fine.The warm up period is about 16 seconds, the same or less as other TVs I have used.I was hoping to use internet TV, but there is no browser option, only the paid network options, as far as I have found.There is no button or method to look at future programming, such as I can do on other HD TV devices.  You can only use the guide to see what is playing currently on the channel you are watching.The different color and audio settings are nice; you can find one that fits your taste and situation.

Reviews.Title: great find! we love it
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, having our first smart TV is fun, we watch Netflix now seamlessly. No disc in the mail, what else is in queue? I agree with one comment we read before buying. Setting it up was a bit difficult especially with the tiny buttons on the remote. We struggled trying to find how to get the keyboard to come up like on a phone so we could type in a password that was numeric and also had letters. No real clear directions we found. But we eventually figured it out. Our netflix is a clearer picture than our cable though which is odd.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Daniel R. Grant
Reviews.Content: Great picture @ a great price, but WAIT!!!  It's a Smart TV and can access the internet! " AN Awsome VALUE"!!!

Reviews.Title: Picture quality was poor
Reviews.Author: RDE
Reviews.Content: Possible faulty TV. Returned TV to look at other TV . We have two other vizio they  have great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Amazon Instant Video app needs updating
Reviews.Author: Botch N Cobble "Botch & Cobble"
Reviews.Content: Overall we are satisfied with the TV, but the Vizio VIA for Amazon Instant Video needs to be updated to include personal lists and larger selection of available videos. When compared to the Amazon Instant Video app on on the Roku the Vizio app is very disappointing. I find myself watching more Netflix.Had I known the limitations of the Vizio Amazon app I would have purchased a non-smart TV and a Roku.The only other issue we have: occasionally there is no sound when the TV is turned on, but turning it off and on again corrects the problem.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Virginia Ferrell "Babyfufinu"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited about my new vizio smart tv.  It was very easy to set up.  Great picture and sound.  I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: vizio tv with apps
Reviews.Author: james harmon
Reviews.Content: fantastic allowed me too cut off dish to save money.i am enjoying the technology allow me access to unlimited video

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Dana M. Miller "dmm"
Reviews.Content: I like the picture, sound, and functionality of this tv. I watch most of my tv from internet services like Netflix so I love the built-in buttons in the remote for that.The only thing is the 32 inch seems a little small.

Reviews.Title: vizio tv
Reviews.Author: Printguy
Reviews.Content: the tv is very good, but the remote control is hard to use.  It does not sync with my Cablevision remote control

Reviews.Title: Like the TV but the backlight went out within a day of it arriving.
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Good features and picture for the price. Backlight went out and was replaced by Vizio under warranty and has been working great for a few months now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Satisfied Grandpa
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the bedroom and couldn't be happier.  We've had it a few years and no problems at all.  The picture is excellent.  The remote is easy to use and functions well.  We don't have cable.  The TV is attached to a roof antenna system that's driving three other TVs, including one old analog TV through a digital-to-analog converter box.  There is never a problem with signal strength or picture breakup.  Would definitely recommend Vizio for any room in the house.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: mlDIGITAL
Reviews.Content: It's a great product. Very excellent price. Excellent service. There is nothing negative to say about it. Amazon fulfillment was great. Connected to amazon prime video in no time...now I get to watch old movies at the drop of a dime ;)

Reviews.Title: 1st Smart Tv
Reviews.Author: Brittany D. Herndon
Reviews.Content: The tv is excellent for the price, easy setup. This is my first smart tv, it is my bedroom tv. Netflix instantly pops up great picture I have only had it a few days.  Everything I wanted and more.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love.
Reviews.Author: Estee
Reviews.Content: It's my second smart TV and this one simply does it all. I've had it for two months now and it still amazes me whether I'm watching Netflix or sending a tweet. It's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed!
Reviews.Author: J Cissell "Joe"
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect TV for our Daughter's room.  The picture is outstanding for 720p!  She loves to use the APPs to access the YouTube channel.  The HD videos on the site look so good on the TV.  In the YouTube app, you can also pair the TV with a mobile device and control the YouTube channel via your ipod or ipad.  Very cool.  We also use the TV to stream video files from our home PC / network via TVersity.This is our 3rd VIZIO and we continue to be impressed with their quality and features.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i-AO 32"  Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Harold G. Turner
Reviews.Content: Although I would have preferred 1080p, 120hz at the same price, this HDTV has performed very well.  Picture is good.  I am having trouble dialing in the colors to suit me, but they are good.  The sound quality is very good.  And, it is easy to transition to the internet features on the TV.  Good buy at a fair price of $280.00.  Happy with this Amazon.com purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, great value
Reviews.Author: Devin P. Turk "BandMan"
Reviews.Content: First off, Vizio makes a great quality product. Secondly, they make them affordable and are very competitive with other brands.

Reviews.Title: great tv. and easu to set up
Reviews.Author: Stephamie
Reviews.Content: easy to set up and work.  Great Picture and sound. easy to work remote controll and i really like it

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT VALUE IN A MID SIZE SMART TV
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: FIRST REACTION (Update follows below):  This was my first smart TV.  I bought it along with a vizio sound bar (reconditioned) for fifty dollars and an extra vizio universal remote to control the TV and sound bar (nine dollars).  So for a total outlay of about 350 I have a very satisfactory system with crisp video (720 is fine for 32 inch) and fine sound.  It took three minutes to connect to hte internet by WIFI and about the same time to set up the sound bar and link both to the universal remote.I don't see any other smart & soundbar combo at anywhere near this price point.A good package for frugal shoppersFEBRUARY UPDATE  After a couple of months' use I continue to think this is an excellent value.  Again, I recommend adding a (reconditioned) Vizio soundbar for about 50 bucks and getting a Vizio universal remote to control everything for about ten bucks.  The soundbar completely overcomes the complaints others have had about lackluster sound.  With the bar, faint conversation is crisp and clear and dramatic sountrack material and music are vivid and powerful.  The 20 second delay for picture startup seemed odd at first, but I don't even think about it anymore.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv would highly recommend .
Reviews.Author: Melinda S
Reviews.Content: Set up was a breeze with on screen guide.  Is slow to turn on but not a big deal.  Very good picture.

Reviews.Title: Great price, mostly great tv
Reviews.Author: Ms. T
Reviews.Content: This tv is a great tv for the price, it is replacing the older vizio e320va which was a regular lcd hdtv that ended up having a wiimote sail into the screen.  I prefer the picture on the older non-led tv better - the colors seem more realistic and the viewing angle is better.  I guess that is thing with LED tv's - to me, the colors seem over saturated. and this tv out of the box, for some reason was calibrated with the blue turned up much too high but I love the energy efficiency of LED so I guess I can learn to love it.  after two software updates and a lot of tinkering with the color/contrast/brightness I did end up with a pleasing picture - however, the viewing angle is rather poor on this - when viewing from the side, it is still visible, but colors seem especially blue at that angle but i can live with it - my kids don't even notice it, so maybe i am just picky that way.  The best thing about this tv is the Smart function - the apps are great and responsive and it's wifi connectivity also works great connecting to a router one floor and several walls away.  Streaming via netflix, amazon instant and vudu is flawless - no stutters, no lags - i really couldn't ask for that part of it to be any better. MGo app says is still under development, but with netflix, amazon instant, vudu and pandora, I'm not sure it's even necessary. Overall, for this price I really like this tv and it's internet apps.  You almost don't even need a cable box with all that.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, remote too small
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J. Hayes
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with picture and smart TV selections.  Would have given 5 stars if the remote was easier to use. If it were a little larger it would be much more convenient.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Starter TV
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This is my first foray into the world of HDTV (using it as a bedroom TV) and I can honestly say that I am happy as can be with this purchase. I love how the ports are set up on the side, and the quality of the picture is exactly what I was hoping for. The built-in apps are pretty neat, especially the Netflix app which has a fantastic user interface. The TV itself is very light weight and balances great on the stand that it comes with. The only thing that I really don't care for is the remote, which has very small buttons and is almost impossible to use in the dark because the buttons aren't lit. However, I can't bring myself to take points off for that. Certainly worth the price and then some.

Reviews.Title: Just what we wanted!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "crazy mom"
Reviews.Content: Been wanting a 32" for our bedroom.  Looked at some at WalMart but they didn't have any in stock.  Found this and it was not only the perfect price but that it was a smart tv was awesome.  Came a day earlier than was supposed to and was set up easily and quickly.  Works great and the picture is really nice.  Love to be able to watch Netflix, had a RCA box to recieve before but that was so slow and the remote never worked right.  But having it through the tv like this is slick!

Reviews.Title: It fooled......
Reviews.Author: Richie
Reviews.Content: I was not expecting a great tv for this price but I was fooled. The picture is not only fantastic but the sound is great.The extra hdmi is good and the unit does go on the Internet very fast. There was no problem connecting to my wireless network, in fact it was very easy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: C Harris
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV on black Friday and received a crazy good deal. It shipped within a week or two and arrived without any damages. My husband complains that you can sometimes see black lines across the screen, but we did some research and this seems to be an issue with all LCD TVs of this size. I have great vision but can't see the lines myself, or else I'm not looking for them. Either way, we are very satisfied with this purchase and would recommend Vizio to anyone looking for an affordable and quality TV.

Reviews.Title: My Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Deborah A. Morseth "Cheapskate"
Reviews.Content: I had trouble with my beautiful big screen tv, twice on the fritz.  I would not spend more money fixing it, so for the same  $300 it would cost to fix it again, I bought this tv.  I gave up the big screen and beautiful 1080p picture for the smart tv option. Love streaming from netflix.  Every thing very easy.  Only part I dislike is the tiny, and I mean tiny, buttons on the remote.  Very hard to hit. But I have the money for the bigger screen in my bank for emergencies.  So I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Pam Woolford
Reviews.Content: works great, was a present for my daughter.  No problems with getting on the internet, she and her husband love it.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "a601mom"
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on time and as advertised.  Very simple to set up andalthough I have not had time to explore the internet capabilities, that also looks very simple.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: S. Smith
Reviews.Content: This TV is unbelievable !  Super easy set up !  Picture is grand ! For the price I paid, very nice !

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product at an unbeatable price and Amazon Prime just sweetened the deal
Reviews.Author: Forehunter
Reviews.Content: I was really happy to find this deal the day after Christmas.  This TV had all the things that I was looking for and at a price that I couldn't believe.  Prime had it here in two days and out of the box it looked great.  There's no magic to hooking up the TV and the setup was easy.  The picture is sharp and the colors are vivid.  Some of my friends have much more expensive TVs, but their performance does not justify the difference in price.  I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Renee Musicus "Shoe Lover"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great price!  Recommend it to anyone.  $648 was unbelievable price! Love the smart TV.  Now I can get rid of FIOS and watch Hulu plus without commercials!

Reviews.Title: Vizio Smart 50 / Sony CT150
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Both these items were great buys and on sale.  Read reviews and sound reviews said sound not good from tv so I ordered Sony sound bar.  The tv sound was good but sound bar made it 3 times better.  In fact we are using it not only for football games and movies but for regular tv.  Both items excellent choices.  If your not using Prime shipping, you should be.  Started Prime i  October and it has been super plus the benefits to watch tv shows is an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: It was a great deal and picture quality is excellent.  Quick and easy setup too.  Just wish there was a better explanation of all the "smart" capabilities in the literature.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E320i-A0 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Alana, IL
Reviews.Content: We haven't had a television for four years, so the move to a Smart TV was a little daunting. Easy setup and interface made the learning curve a whole lot less steep.

Reviews.Title: This TV is absolutely wonderful.
Reviews.Author: Candy Cooper
Reviews.Content: Two years ago I bought a 26" Viore HD TV and thought I'd gotten the best deal. Well, apparently I was wrong. I found this smart TV for just $40 more, and it being a Vizio is just amazing. The picture quality is absolutely mind blowing. The sound quality is top rate. And it found my internet and hooked right up to it. The hardest thing for me to figure out was how to register the TV with Amazon Prime. It took all of five minutes. I'm hooked. Vizio it is for me from now on. 32" is as big as I want to go for the bedroom. But in the living room I think I want to go to at least 42" or even 50".

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: kebells
Reviews.Content: I'd been looking for a Vizio, similar to the larger version I have in my livingroom, that has the netflix/internet apps; it's a great tv. I'm beyond pleased with it.  And, this is the best price I could find anywhere. Great picture, sound, and internet apps.  Also, it arrived quickly!  I've had it for over a month and still love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Haseena
Reviews.Content: Love my tv..works great..beautiful picture..and the apps on it work amazingly and its so easy to setup! Def recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture quality!
Reviews.Author: Kathy MacGray
Reviews.Content: This is my second Vizio TV, my first purchase was a 37".  Was very impressed with the picture quality and sound.  Controls fairly easy to use.  Good value for the money.  Better picture than some more popular 'name' brands

Reviews.Title: great for price
Reviews.Author: capafp
Reviews.Content: Works well. Easy to setup and use. Picture isn't awesome but for the price it is perfect for secondary TV in bedroom. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Execlent picture and quality
Reviews.Author: parsop
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup for Cable, Satalite and Wifi,Picture quality with HD and Blue ray very good average for no HD cable

Reviews.Title: Vizio 50
Reviews.Author: T. Reed
Reviews.Content: I had spent years trying to decide which HD to buy, and waiting for my 35" crt to quite. This Vizio had the features I wanted and the price was unbeatable. This TV has features that will keep this household entertained for years.  I Love It

Reviews.Title: value for money product
Reviews.Author: Rajagopalan Shivakumar "shiva"
Reviews.Content: value for money item, comes with good features, light weight, easy to install and optimal size for a10x20 bedroom viewing

Reviews.Title: Vizio smart TV
Reviews.Author: Sundara Krishnamurthy Tatigari
Reviews.Content: it is good product and still need to explore all features.As of now it is working good and meeting our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Met expectation
Reviews.Author: Shrikanth Krupanandan
Reviews.Content: Smart TV and my kids love it. Have been watching TV whenever they want to. Perfect for the bedroom. Sound quality is also great.

Reviews.Title: 5 star for the $..we'll see about longrun
Reviews.Author: david keith
Reviews.Content: an inexpensive 32 in tv that has everything of the more expensive brands, a great picture for 720 p.  .long term? we will see. I have heard a lot of negative input about reliability and breaking down so I got extended warranty but....for now I made a friend really happy with a new Wi-Fi  with apps television for her and her kids.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lori Rice
Reviews.Content: I have been holding out on buying a flat screen TV until the prices were better and waiting for my old TV to die. Well the prices came down before the old TV died. I have always liked the VIZIO TV because everytime I walked by one in the store the picture was always so sharp and the color seemed true. Now they have come out with the SMART TV so this was my year. I love this TV for the reasons stated above and ease of use. Now I just hope it lasts.

Reviews.Title: Awsome!
Reviews.Author: Barbara J Agramonte
Reviews.Content: Great Picture! Hooked up my own speakers for a better sound. Very happy with all aspects of this TV. Well worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Jennie F. Watson "bubba"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a tv like this for quite a while.  The Vizo 32" was everything I needed and a price I could afford.  It is a superior quality item at a price I could justify.  I am pleased with all the Amazon purchases I have made.  Jen in Charlotte

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: mega
Reviews.Content: so far its good.I did notice that sometime when TV starts up it does not have audio and i need to restart the tv.however its good low budget smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Picture at a great price
Reviews.Author: irondaddy
Reviews.Content: wifi capable, beautiful picture, and all for a great price.  this tv is well worth a look for anyone.  The images are crisp, the colors are vibrant and deep.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Earl Stillwagon
Reviews.Content: I would purchase another one in a second if needed. Great picture, very clear, worth the money. If your thinking of buying a 32 inch, this is the one that I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Remote/TV buttons unresponsive
Reviews.Author: slimpie "thundercat600"
Reviews.Content: This E470i is my first Vizio TV. Great price (paid $559 for a brand new one, not refurbished) and decent video/audio quality. However, after 1 week the TV locked up (both the remote and buttons on left of TV were unresponsive). Unplugging the TV solves it temporarily which indicates the problem is likely with buggy firmware.If you google "Vizio buttons not responding" you will find many similar issues dating back to 2008. Clearly this is a generic issue with Vizio TVs that they do not consider a large enough issue to properly fix. I am sending this one back and hope to have better luck with Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Oh so unhappy!!
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: This was my second Vizio Smart TV.  The first was easy to set up, but this one is definitely bad.  It would connect to the internet (wired or wireless) but the Connection Test always gave a "Download Unavailable" result.  Vizio shipped me a new one but it has the same problem.  Neither one works with the ethernet cable on the current TV I have.  I'm so disappointed since the Vizio picture is so great!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in VIZIO
Reviews.Author: bayoubob
Reviews.Content: Settings didn't alter the dark and dingy picture. Defective. Returned it the very next day. I wanted to buy a domestic product, and had heard nothing but praise for Vizio. Too bad. I replaced it with a Samsung Smart TV which proved to be a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV!
Reviews.Author: Bob in Texas
Reviews.Content: We are using it in our workout room at home.  Good picture quality, especially in the brightly lit room.  The best part of this TV is the built in WIFI.  This allows us to place the TV where it was needed without having to worry about running cable.  We do not have cable or Satellite at home and watch TV through Netflix mostly.  The Vizio has a great menu of online options for video!

Reviews.Title: Broken and Vizio doesn't care
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: The coax connection for the tv is very poorly made and isn't secured to the chassis at all. It is only soldered weakly to the internal board. When I bought the tv the signal would go in and out and I thought it was due to running a long cable. Turns out the cable input was broken. When I called vizio after discovering the problem, they told me I had waited too long to call, even though the tv was still under warranty. They couldn't tell me how long was too long. Kept telling me that physical damage, even if it broken inside the box, isn't their problem. Very bad experience.

Reviews.Title: smart feature is a waste of money
Reviews.Author: C. Staniewicz "Desert Dog"
Reviews.Content: I bought my Vizio through Walmart because it was on sale, included free shipping and could be returned directly to the store if I encountered any problems.The TV itself is a good value for the money.  It's got a GREAT picture, but as many people have said, has a disappointing sound system.  This can easily be corrected by adding a sound board or hooking the set up through your current stereo system.The "Smart" TV is really a waste of money.  If you think you will have a web browser, YOU WON'T.  You must go through the apps listed on the TV.  But, there's another problem.  When using these apps, you go into a different part of the site.  For example on hulu, you can find a lot of old series that you can watch without charge through your computer.  But, when you use your app on the TV, you are prompted to join hulu and don't get access to any of the free stuff they offer.The same held true with YouTube.  When I went through my computer and put in a musician's name, over 100 videos came up to choose from.  But, when I entered the same info from the app on my TV, only 20 videos came up.This isn't the fault of the TV, I have to admit.  In a few years when technology catches up with itself, the smart feature may work better.  In the meantime, you get TONS more programming to watch by hooking this TV up to your computer instead.I need to replace another TV and I would absolutely buy a VIZIO again, but NOT with the SMART feature.  Save your money or use it more effectively by increasing the size of your screen or buying a good sound board, or even going with Roku (same problems but many more apps for less than you pay for the SMART feature.

Reviews.Title: Flawed by Design
Reviews.Author: LisaRCT
Reviews.Content: Called Vizio because TV could not connect to WiFi even though laptop, tablet and cell could connect fine. I was told I was too far away because TV must be within 15' of the Router. Fifteen feet? Really??So you must have a router in the same room or right next door otherwise you need to run a CAT5 cable. Since my router is in the living room and the TV was purchased for the bedroom the WiFi is useless.This should be clearly stated on the package as this has severely limited usability.In my mind if my other devices can connect there is no excuse for this TV not to. So, if you want a WiFi ready TV, this is not for you.

Reviews.Title: Not as smart as it should be
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV because we liked the idea of being able to connect to Hulu and Netflix without needing a separate player. Well, scratch that idea. It took 20 minutes to get Netflix to work the first time after calling tech support, and after that? Constant loading problems with every App. We know we have a good signal in the room the TV is in, so there are definitely wireless card issues with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Not as great as the reviews make it sound
Reviews.Author: Nicole Furi
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv based on the reviews here and on other sites. I am not impressed with it after a month or so. The picture is not especially clear, the sound sucks, but the worst part is that the internet connection rarely ever works. I can access Netflix on other devices ie. my laptop just fine, but nine times out of ten am not able to get it on this tv. I don't know if there is any way to improve the connection but I have not found one yet. Since I bought this tv for the "smart tv" aspects I find this very annoying.

Reviews.Title: bad wifi, no HD channels
Reviews.Author: Raymond J Visser
Reviews.Content: Bought this from another store. I am not stupid when it comes to electronics but I had to call tech support to set up.  WiFi antanne is so weak it can't pick up the router sitting next to a computer with excellent reception.  NOthing on it anyway.Picture is good on standard basic cable but doesn't recieve Comcast's higher HD channels and the picture isn't as good on the cable box. My LG did recieve HD channels without the HD box.  TV is going back

Reviews.Title: Love what I got for the price.
Reviews.Author: Kinga Brown
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an afordable smart TV so I could watch Netflix. This TV was easy to program and set to watch netflix. I love the picture quality and sound. I'm a hard of hearing person and I usually have to have my TV quite loud not because I can't hear the sound but because the quality and clearness of sound is not good enough for me to understand speech. This TV has great sound quality and now I don't have to put up volume too high to understand it. I love it and I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: not what it seems to be...UPDATE.
Reviews.Author: L. JOURNELL "bULLETT"
Reviews.Content: so i  needed a new tv and was excited about getting a 'smart' one with built in wifi so i could get rid of my roku and other streaming devices...delivered quickly and set up was ridiculously simple. very light tv and basic instructions were clear and precise.but onto the three stars : this tv requires me to change the security settings on our router in order for the 'smart' aspect to work. it wont work with regular name and password like all devices in this house run on...i called them and i need to reduce the security in order to get a signal...i live in a house where i share wifi with others and certainly dont feel like asking them to lower their security just so i can stream this tv which advertises itsself as 'smart' in the first place....so the technology just isnt there yet at this certain price point...i have zero prob using my roku though so whatever....but def. important for others to know...the tv itsself is great. picture is remarkable. i use external speakers so cant say about sound. the remote was great and i feel the tv alone is certainly worth the price i paid...recommended as a tv, NOT as your only source for wifi though.UPDATE: seriously have to go down to one star for the P.O.S....the fact the wifi doesnt work was actually cool with me, but steadily the pic has been getting a white line across the top of the screen, supremely annoying...BUT last night was the end for me...during a movie the hdmi port decided it didnt want to work. just no mas para ti. had to switch it up to the other....and then the sound started cracking....i turned it off, just called AMAZON, and they are cool with returning this thing TOMMOROW.i cannot recommend this tv at all....and seriously the picture was decent but in the end...its a extremely cheap tv.....save your money and upgrade to a Samsung like i am. GOOD LUCK.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Lisa in CT
Reviews.Content: After looking at what seems like every TV out there, I finally settled on this one. It's our first flat screen tv, so we're still getting used to the size.It was easy to set up. It's very light & easy to move. The picture is very good. It was much easier to adjust than a Samsung we originally bought & returned because it was impossible to adjust the picture to an acceptable looking one. This one was MUCH easier to adjust! It's not the best, but it is the best in my price range. For another $500 you can get an excellent picture! LOL!The remote is the only downfall. It feels cheap & flimsy. Ours broke right away & I had to buy another from amazon. I wasn't packing up the whole TV to go back to the store for a remote.I would definitely recommend this TV for the "under $1000" price range.

Reviews.Title: Good TV but came with really cheap remote.
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: I was really excited to own my first large screen tv, this was a pretty good buy. I do notice it gets a little pexelly with some movies and some screens, but all in all I cant complain too much.
