This television got mixed reviews, and if you dig deep enough, it actually got horrible reviews.  Although it’s not obvious, it’s true.  Here are my issues:1. Picture quality is abysmal.  I tried adjusting all of the picture settings and was unable to get the picture to look satisfactory, let alone good.  The whites are washed out, there is very little contrast, and the most frustrating thing is the flickering backlight.  I played with all of the settings, and was unable to stop the backlight from flickering.  My seven year old Sharp Aquos looked better than this tv.  The picture actually changed several times during a tv show in one specific scene. Imaging you’re watching a show which has an eight or nine minute scene, with the same camera angle, etc, this screen would change colors, quality, and would flicker constantly.  It was very aggravating and frustrating.  No setting or tweaking would fix this problem.  It’s just plain bad.2. The audio output from the built in speakers is a complete joke.  If you don’t have either a sound bar or an external receiver to route the audio through, you’re going to be very disappointed.  How Vizio could let something leave their factory in this condition is beyond me.  It sounds like a broken public address system; absolutely horrible.  If you use a sound bar, it’s ok.3. The boot-up time is ridiculous.  I can’t believe how long it takes for this tv to power up.  I think it takes close to a minute.  That’s unacceptable.  Again, my Sharp wasn’t like that and it was a much older unit.  Even when it powers up, it still take another minute to fully come to life.  Amazing…4. For a “Smart TV,” it’s pretty dumb.  First of all, the setup process was intrusive and time consuming.  I had to enter all types of information into the television to make use of the apps (which is ok I guess, but there was NO keyboard).  It would have been nice to have a qwerty keyboard on the remote instead of the one letter at a time point and scroll. [We’ll get to the remote later]  After the lengthy setup process, I tried the apps.  First and foremost, the processor in this tv needs an upgrade.  There is significant lag time when selecting apps or scrolling between them.  It’s really slow and Vizio should be ashamed.  The user interface is clumsy and disorganized, the apps are slow to respond, and when they do they oftentimes fail to load.  It’s very strange.  It’s as if no thought or planning went into the software design of this television – very disappointing.5. The remote…Ah, the remote.  Garbage is the only word I have for it.  It is small, hard to read, inaccurate (meaning it’s not powerful enough to transmit the signal on the first button push), and lacks quick keys for the sleep timer.  Although it has  a quick key for Amazon video, but since loading it fails almost all of the time, that’s pretty much worthless.  The keys do not glow in the dark nor do they have a built-in backlight.  This was a big letdown.  It feels very cheap in the hand and it’s really subpar considering what other manufacturers are providing.  It’s a toy – nothing more.  I was shocked as how bad the remote was – I mean that…It’s a piece of garbage.I have sent this back and started my research all over again.  I will probably go with a Samsung; but I will do much more research this time.  My recommendation is the following:  Don’t get lured into this television by the low price and feature set.  It’s a complete hoax.  I don’t say this stuff lightly, but we consumers need to know.  You will be disappointed.At the end of the day – you get what your pay for.  I went cheap on this tv and that’s what I got…A cheap tv.  Never again will I skimp on a television.  I am prepared to spend two to three times the amount now.  I guess Vizio is the best advertizing for Samsung and Sharp. They really make you appreciate quality products once you use theirs (Vizio).  Once again, don’t waste your money and time on this tv.  Stay away from it.  Do yourself a favor and spend a few more dollars and get something worthwhile.  This is an inferior product.

Reviews.Title: frustrating tv!  No Amazon Prime Watchlist!
Reviews.Author: WoodL
Reviews.Content: We do not have cable, so rely on Amazon Prime for most of our viewing.  The Amazon Prime Watch List is not accessible on this tv, so you have to find the shows you want to watch on your computer, then manually type them in on the Vizio.  It is a very frustrating experience!  We avoid using this tv because of it.  Netflix, however, is accessible, so I guess we will have to renew our subscription.

Reviews.Title: WiFi is crap on this tv!
Reviews.Author: Brian WIdmyer
Reviews.Content: Can't connect to WiFi ever!  Will never buy a tv made by vizio!  Just bought a Samsung has no problem finding and staying connected to WiFi!  Save your money and buy something else!

Reviews.Title: Screen gets bright and dark by itself.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for its price and the smart capabilities. Set up was pretty simple and the smart features all worked well. My issue is that the screen would gradually go from bright to dark as you were watching it. I tried multiple sources (Netflix, youtube, cable), Same results. I went so far as to relocate this TV next to another and watched the same program on both TV's at the same time. On my Samsung, steady picture brightness, while on this TV at the same time, the brightness was fluctuating. I had to return this TV, it was too maddening to live with.

Reviews.Title: Vizio HDTV
Reviews.Author: Reinaldo
Reviews.Content: its a great smart tv to have has a clear picture I like Netflix and the amazon plus is led

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The tv worked properly for only 1 day.  It then would loose the picture, then at times the picture would return on it's own.  Sometimes when the picture would not return, the only way to turn off the unit was to unplug it.  It made high pitched noises, and crackling sounds....Not only was it not usable, I felt that it was unsafe.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Permanently Lost Customer
Reviews.Author: Nicholas de Lioncourt "</collectivism>"
Reviews.Content: I have uploaded photographs to Amazon to accompany this review (see Amazon feature: customer images). In brief, avoid this model. While many reviews are positive; the probability of your receiving a faulty television is high.I bought the VIZIO E390i-A1 39-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED HDTV for my office and while the "smart" features are indeed limited, I had a spare Roku 3 to supplement the feature set.The first VIZIO television had what I might only describe as a semi-circular "burn" or "dark" band which spanned the entire LED/LCD screen. This only appeared when the television was powered but it was indicative of a soon-to-fail screen.I returned the television and to Amazon's credit, the company reshipped a replacement immediately.The second (replacement) television made a "rattling" sound when I opened the box, the F-connector dropped out. The F-connector is the threaded nub onto which your coax cable is attached. This part should be secure and soldered to a circuit board. Upon inspection, it was apparent that the coax connector is secured to the television by a thin wire. Slighter pressure will break it off the VIZIO chassis.I have uploaded a photograph of that as well.I have no interest in attempting for a third strike, so I have returned both and will now avoid the VIZIO label.This is not unfair to the company since simple Quality Assurance checks would have avoided wasting 2 hours of my time.

Reviews.Title: Don't wait any longer
Reviews.Author: Irene Ward
Reviews.Content: I hit a home run when i purchased this TV!I loved the screen size ,the picture quality,and the sound,Iwatch a lot of sports and the clarity and crispness of the picture biew me away.I couldn't believe I was able to set the controls for what sport I was watching-golf ,football, baseball-all this for a great price,And Amazon is a great help in setting up and any questions you may have .Prime also enhanced the shopping experience.

Reviews.Title: It needs to improve Wi-Fi reception
Reviews.Author: E. Castejon-Lara
Reviews.Content: This TV has a very good screen image, but its Wi-Fi reception is not only low (freezes when charging) but also incomplete. It cannot receive Wi-Fi signal above channel 11.

Reviews.Title: No HBOGo - beware
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: I purchased this model specifically for the "smart" apps. You can stream through Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, etc but I didn't realize that you couldn't use HBOGo. That's kind of annoying for me, so just an FYI if you are interested in the streaming services offered.

Reviews.Title: I'm going to have to buy a Roku for my "Smart" TV?!?
Reviews.Author: Malinda
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get this TV. My other TV, a samsung, has a Roku (nothing wrong with that cause my Roku always works) but I wanted to try a "Smart TV".What's right:The TV looks nice and has a good picture qualityWhat's wrong:I can never get my smart tv apps working properly, the one I use primarily is Netflix, I have to always test my wireless connection and even when the download speed is registering fine I still can not get it up and running.The TV or remote freezes, it gets to the point that I can not even shut the TV down, I have to go over and unplug it...very frustrating.So, since this is always an issue and I didn't pay too much for the TV, instead of returning it, I may break down and purchase a Roku for my Smart TV.....super ironic!

Reviews.Title: Decent but would have paid more for a better product
Reviews.Author: Loren Robert LaGesse
Reviews.Content: Aside from recieving one broken television prior to getting an undamaged one I would consider this product to be all-around very average.  Sound quality is okay, as is picture clarity.  I struggled getting to a decent picture/color setting and still don't like the results.  I don't consider myself to be extraordinarliy tech savy but I've spent hours goofing around with backlight, color, contrast, and resolution settings.  I'll get it dialed in on CBS and get a completely different result on ABC or FOX.  My previous 42" LCD RCA had far richer color and didn't seem to change near as much one channel to another.Smart functions are nothing to write home about.  I like having the weather forecast at a few clicks of the remote but rarely use it.  Perhaps purchasing the qwerty keyboard or remote will change my mind regarding that feature.I'll probably keep it until I move my old 42" out of the garge and into a bedroom or something, then it will be in the garage and a better, major name brand TV will be replacing it in my living room.My advise; spend a bit more for a better TV.  I wish I had.

Reviews.Title: Its good and bad
Reviews.Author: R. King "ryno13800"
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this tv about a week ago. It is true that colors are not significantly bright. I would say that the tv is not as good as a Samsung, but the price is almost $200 less. Some commercials, movies, tv shows look very good, but others can look a little grainy. For example, just watched the oscars. The background around the host at times was a little grainy. I did watch the 2nd Batman (Dark Knight) on blu-ray and this looked pretty good. I would love to give it 5 stars, but it is not that good.

Reviews.Title: Made overseas, circuit boards coated with anticorrosive material which smells like there might be an electrical burning problem.
Reviews.Author: jdh "jack"
Reviews.Content: Vizio safety rep. reports that smell will go away after a few weeks depending on usage.  Mine is still smelling  and it has been over a month. HD pix is good, and set was easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality.
Reviews.Author: Noel V.
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV. I've looked at a bunch at Target and Walmart and what I kept in mind when making the decision to buy one was 1080p 120 Hz. I didn't want to deal with the picture lag on action scenes. This TV is great! Though it lags when looking from the side ,you would have to be on the extreme left or right of the television to notice it. I swear it looked almost 3d the details were so clear. I would recommend a sound system because the 2 speakers are just too weak. I love that it has Amazon.com and Netflix and YouTube among others for the apps. It loaded my accounts up with no problems. I wish there was a better way to enter in a search for videos and movies than the keypad and remote, it takes so long and I have to log into my Yahoo account every time I turn on my TV. It even tells you if the movie is HD or SD on the upper left if you want it to. I got this TV for the picture quality and it delivered. I'm very happy with my choice.

Reviews.Title: finally a tv that really does what it says
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: ALL of the internet settings work properly.  Nice colors, and nice settings.  I have it in the living room right now, as I am wainting for the bigger version to arrive.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Tamara Dokos
Reviews.Content: I received the item very quickly and it was nicely packaged! My mom is absolutely going to love it for Christmas :)) Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Terrible Smart TV Implementation
Reviews.Author: HFK1000 "HFK1000"
Reviews.Content: Bought this from Sam's because of the Smart TV capability.  Big mistake.  Smart TV menus and utilities load very slowly, and the TV regularly locks up.  The remote is tiny and the buttons are too stiff.  Perhaps I got a lemon:  doesn't matter, it's now back in the car and I'm about to take it back to Sams to exchange it for the Samsung I should have bought in the first place, along with a Roku.

Reviews.Title: Remotes don't work.  Not once.
Reviews.Author: MJG
Reviews.Content: I would highly advise anyone reading this to seek elsewhere for a TV.  Buy a Samsung or Sony.  While the TV itself works, it is nothing spectacular.  It takes a good while to turn on or recognize any input.  The main aggravation, however, is with the remote control.  Straight out of the box the remote did not work.  I attempted all of their "reset" procedures, found both online and through their "customer support".  When that failed, they agreed to send me a replacement.  ANOTHER BRICK.  DOES NOT WORK.  It took them two weeks to get it here, only to find it's worthless.  Too much aggravation for a stupid TV.  Should have bought a Sony, at least they work.  Oh, and universal remotes don't work with Vizio, so forget that option, I've tried.

Reviews.Title: Been great tv
Reviews.Author: Scottie
Reviews.Content: bought for kid for xmas is what it says it is works great...looked for awhile for what offers think this is good amount of tv for price...5 months in still feel deal might purchase more

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom tv.
Reviews.Author: Bph
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for my bedroom, and it has a nice picture. The smart tv apps are nice but the real point is its a 720p 32" TV for under $250.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This TV ROCKS! No need to get an Apple TV cuz it's got its own system for watching web content built right in! Pretty amazing.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present for mom
Reviews.Author: Robby
Reviews.Content: She loves it, although I don't know that she gets the most out of it just watching her game show channel!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Diana Giannotti
Reviews.Content: Love it, purchased this for my Christmas present to my self.  Have really enjoyed all the options and the picture quality is magnificent.  This is a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Piece Of Junk
Reviews.Author: Richard "RP"
Reviews.Content: I knew I should have stuck with Sony and their quality products. This item worked for one day and then would not connect to the internet. At first it was loosing the internet connection but will re-connect after multiple tries. Then it would not re-connect at all. I wish I had went by what I saw in some of the reviews I read before I bought it but it was hoping I was the lucky one.I couldn't even play my Play Station on this system after the first day. It says no signal found and I have the cords plugged in correctly and  it worked the night before. I HATE these cheap Vizio products with a passion. Now i'm stuck with a Vizio Smart Remote that I bought separately but now I don't need. I'm going to order a Sony/Samsung TV as soon as I get of here. I had 2 already but thought I would get a Vizio for one of the smaller rooms and it was cheaper. You get what you pay for!

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV
Reviews.Author: dale martin
Reviews.Content: Great little tv for the price. The smart web feature is perfect! Good picture and easy to navigate and instal.

Reviews.Title: Received Right Product.
Reviews.Author: Lopez
Reviews.Content: I received the wrong product at first and was very disappointed (It was a 40 inch TCL LED HDTV). I contacted the seller and in return received the best customer service on Amazon yet. The seller immediately responded with a solution and an apology.  After returning the item they shipped back to the seller, I received my television within 3 business days.The television is perfect so far. refresh rate is on point. The sound speakers are good as well for action movies. Played video games on it, obviously looks awesome. Overall, its a great t.v. for big bedroom or living room.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Love this TV.  Have one in my bedroom and now put this one in the guest room.  Enjoy having a smartTV in the house. Love the ability to watch movies from other outlets.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: GELLMD "SF Customer"
Reviews.Content: Good quality for the price i paid, clear pictures and resolution, slim easy to transport. Ideal for bedroom or small spaces.

Reviews.Title: Nice size for a tiny dorm room
Reviews.Author: Knick Kname "JSH"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter away at school.  She can watch cable TV--at least most channels without also renting a cable box, as well as Netflix, Hulu, or Amazon Prime over the LAN WiFi.  It's small and lightweight, but the screen is plenty big enough to watch in a small room.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Kathy Heimer Knight
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my husband as a gift. He loves it the only thing he wished it had was PIP worked good in his man cave.

Reviews.Title: great price, got it originally in lieu of a ...
Reviews.Author: mohamed
Reviews.Content: great price, got it originally in lieu of a computer monitor. very light weight, decent picture. sound is OK. apps are very limited, but that seems to be a deliberate flaw in "smart" tvs overall to keep roku and apple tv in business.

Reviews.Title: clear image, clear sound, screwed up output sound jacks.
Reviews.Author: Kirk Bailey "-Fnord?"
Reviews.Content: Plugging in the stereo in the living room into the line out kills the speakers on the set in the bedroom- naturally, so does using the headphone output, but this is to be expected. other than that, it's the bomb.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Paul Lockyer "Headhunter"
Reviews.Content: If you're considering a small, relatively inexpensive, flat panel TV this would be a good choice.  In the past year I've purchased this one for my wife's treadmill room and a Samsung for her sewing room.  Both TV's only receive video on our wireless network.  The Samsung seems to update the bloody software almost daily.  The update usually takes a long time.  The Vizio just comes on and allows you watch Netflix or whatever other feed you choose.  The Samsung has slightly better sound and video, but the start-up is maddening.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Todd C. Young
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my mother, whose previous LCD has finally decided to go to that great electronics farm in the sky. She really likes it. The convenience of having Netflix and Youtube and the other accesses on the tv rather than through her dvd player has been a perk She said it has a great picture, is easy to use, and really likes it (even tho its 2" smaller than the previous one...ahem...)

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: J. A. Munoz
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of the picture, the quality of the light.  Sound could be better, but a sound bar fixed that.

Reviews.Title: Just bought it.
Reviews.Author: N. Feldman
Reviews.Content: So i just bought the TV today from Costco. Same price as listed her but wouldnt have to worry about shipping.The only negative I have found which i have read in other reviews is about the stand. Mine leans a little to the right which is annoying but i'll have a wall mount soon so I wont have to worry for long.I do have a question though.It says its 120hz does that mean all the time or can I switch between 60 and 120? If so how do I do that because after going though the menue I cant see where.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Joan Spinner
Reviews.Content: everything with this TV is great. We are really enjoying it. Why do I have to write more when I've said all I want to?

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Vil
Reviews.Content: these item are very helpful i use them every day to go about my every day life whether, thanks for your service.

Reviews.Title: Normally excellent TV but had plug.
Reviews.Author: gerald runnels
Reviews.Content: It would turn on and only stay on a few seconds then shut off. We sent it back but you were out of stock.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this TV if you want to read the Channel Menu.
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Boyer
Reviews.Content: Vizio evidently thinks the smaller the TV, the small the font for the menu should be.  Doesn't sound like a problem, but when you buy this 24 inch TV, the Channel Number is less than 1/2 an inch tall.  That's less than 2% of the screen height.  Try reading that when you are further than 3 feet from the TV.AND the description of what's on the channel is only 1/4 of an inch.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for small room
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a small bedroom. With the small bezel, it's almost all screen, and is a perfect fit for a 3-ft wide section of my wall. I considered the 24" version, but the size & cost made this the better choice.  The other factor high on my list was internet capability, and Vizio allows me to wirelessly connect to Netflix, Amazon, and Vudu, my three primary streaming channels without any additional components. Netflix is everywhere, but for those using Amazon, choices are limited, and this is a great combination of features & price. Picture is excellent, but sound is a little tinny (to be expected with its small speakers) and the network services are somewhat limited. The power cord is hidden in a self-sticking conduit, making for a neat, unobtrusive installation, using a Monoprice tilt & swivel wall mount. (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001VRIQRK/ref=oh_details_o02_s00_i00?ie=UTF8&psc;=1).Very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but no HDMI Cable
Reviews.Author: Leo J. Noll
Reviews.Content: A very good TV and easy to set up and the HD tops it off. But to get true HD you will have to buy a HDMI cable. I do not understand why a manufacturer would build an HD TV and not provide the necessary HDMI cable to go with it. I recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: COMPARE
Reviews.Author: yardie man "Ja.Pepperman"
Reviews.Content: THE LG SMART SYSTEM ON MY FIFTY FIVE INCH SET IS FAR MORE USER FRIENDLY AND THE MAIN REASON I TRIED THE VIZIO WAS THAT IT HAD MORE AUDIO CONNECTIONS. I AM SOMEWHAT DISSAPPOINTED.IF I HAD BOUGHT LOCAL I WOULD HAVE RETURNED IT.WILL DO SO IN THE FUTURE

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: SR
Reviews.Content: I ordered this 32 inch Vizio TV for the bedroom. It came in less than a week, but when we set it up we saw lines and a grey spot on the screen. We promptly alerted Amazon online that we would be returning it.  They quickly were back in touch and asked if we wanted a refund or a replacement. We opted for a replacement because this was such a good price for this LED Smart TV and were willing to try again.  Amazon was very attentive through email on how sorry they were that the TV was defective. As soon as Amazon was alerted by UPS that the defective TV was shipped, they shipped out the new TV before they received it. The second one came in no time and we quickly set it up.  No problems with this second set.The color and sound are great and we are very happy with our purchase.  Unfortunately, I can not report on any of the smart features as we have yet to use them yet.

Reviews.Title: No memory in the smart TV
Reviews.Author: Laura Genin
Reviews.Content: I don't have cable, just wifi.  When i hook up my roku to the tv it works fine.  But without the memory of the Roku the movies just keep cutting out. and the only way to reconnect is to turn off the power and turn it on to get back into netflix, amazon... whatever.  So skip the smart TV.  other than that, the sound is fine, the picture is great.  good buy for the price, but don't expect much from the antenna or memory

Reviews.Title: GOOD TV
Reviews.Author: hernan valero
Reviews.Content: I think is ok and comfortable ,is easy to drive and is amazing , good tv ,so beautiful ,I RECOMEND

Reviews.Title: Good picture, bad sound
Reviews.Author: John B
Reviews.Content: Box arrived in good shape and the techs in Utah were very responsive but I had to add a range extender to use the "smart" TV although my WiFi router was less than 15 feet away. I had problems connecting my old receiver to the TV. After several calls to Vizio they had me reset the TV. The picture became rather dark. (it was good to start with) and I could not restore it. I later found that I needed a DAC device to connect my receiver; none of the techs recommended this.

Reviews.Title: love it, but....
Reviews.Author: TM
Reviews.Content: The smart TV aspects of this model are difficult to maneuver (or even get to work at all!). I would have been just fine with a 'non-smart' TV. Picture are sound are great tho.

Reviews.Title: SMART TV SMART LIFE!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Montes
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I thought it would be! I watch netflix without any problems and it looks fantastic! Also the TV itself is so pretty. It's a decoration!

Reviews.Title: Best Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Harold L. Ryterski
Reviews.Content: The perfect size for using as a PC monitor.  Plus with internet access I can quickly switch from PC to internet and keep my PC off line. Picture quality is outstanding for viewing movies and the white for reading books and e-mail makes it easy on my eyes.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Montesquieu
Reviews.Content: For the price, I don't think there's a better TV on the market.I expected to use the Apps on the TV more, but frankly, the interface is a bit kludgy. It's a lot easier to stream things from my Xbox 360 or Roku.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture, lousy interface
Reviews.Author: Linda C. Wade
Reviews.Content: Sorely disappoint interface.  Yahoo, and only yahoo.  You will never be able to take full advantage of streaming as long as Vizio ties your apps to yahoo.  You get the big one Hulu, Netflix, MGO tv but try to find Nowhere like programing for news, or install Twonky beam, or the Smithsonian channel.  It isn't going to happen unless Vizio and yahoo get serious about serving the market.  At this point I would have been better off buying a regular HD TV and a roku device.  Oh...AND NO INTERNET BROWSER... pretty neglectful for a wireless ready TV.My solution is probably going to be to buy a roku device to upgrade this TV.  But it was cheap and has a nice picture.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV for the most part.
Reviews.Author: Chaitresh Srinivas
Reviews.Content: But controls freeze once in a while. Remote stops working. Controls on the side of TV stops working. Only way to get out of that state is to pull power cord off power source and put it back. Like I said, happens once in a while and I suspect it happens when accessing apps.And the apps interface is not that great. But I've not seen a TV that has got the apps part done well.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Sharif Sabirov "sharif"
Reviews.Content: I don't know why people insist on splitting hairs when it comes to this TV. It produces amazing image, the sound is great, and it looks very nice. For under $500 this TV is incredible. Sure the remote is a pain in the ass, apps are a bit slow but when it comes to picture quality it's superb. I think people are just spoiled and want everything to be perfect and cheap at the same time. Yeah the first TV that arrived was broken but that's life, stuff happens. I'm enjoying this TV as is out of the box without any tweaks and adjustments, it's as good as they come for the money you're paying. If you're thinking of getting it, just do it you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: 50 in tv
Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: works good,.. as it should. was a gift ,but i  see it often .price not bad .I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: waste of extra
Reviews.Author: Q. dan "Q"
Reviews.Content: the extra thrills are not worth it, terrible user interface, terrible buffering of netflix, etc.  dont waste your time with this, its a great TV but you dont need all the extras with this Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Great value for what you get
Reviews.Author: DH Review
Reviews.Content: I got this tv to replace a TV that was way too small for the space. 42" seem to be the right size. We probably could have gone a bit larger. The picture quality for the room that we have it in is impressive. We have a west facing window that receives plenty of evening sunlight. If you are looking for deep black levels and unlimited viewing angles you will want to stick with the better performing plasma sets. I like the slim profile of the edges and it has a really thin profile.Sound quality is average. You will want to add a sound bar or something else to get higher quality sound. But for my needs It works just fine out the box. My kids usually use this tv and they are only into kids shows (Mickey and The Cat in the Hat look pretty cool on this set). My wife likes it because she can almost see it from the kitchen (like I said earlier we probably could have gone larger).Internet: The Vizio is stocked with all the basics- netflix, amazon, hulu, vudu, etc. the TV sinks well with my iPad and my kids samsung tablet.Connections: 3 hdmi is great. I would have liked 2 component connections as I still have some "old school stuff" that's still in good working condition. If you want more connections you will need to buy a receiver or some other solution...just something to think about.The price was competative considering what I paid for my plasma with all the bells and whistles and I am happy that I bought this TV. As with any purchase you almost have to wait a few months to really write a good review. Having said that I have only had mine for a month, this is my first vivio purchase after buying Panasonic which I LOVE and samsung which I like a lot. I would say this is the second best TV in my house right now...as it should be.This is probably the best rating that I can give an LED TV at this time. It's just hard to compare this TV after whatching my calibrated plasma TV for a year.I did make some adjustments to the set based on some other reviews and it seems to be affective. But as I said earlier, I am not looking for the same performance out of this tv as I expect out of my plasma.

Reviews.Title: Works great in our small livingroom
Reviews.Author: Newtsy
Reviews.Content: After 2 months of research and price comparing, we decided on this smart TV...the set up was SUPER easy with the satellite and DVD/VCR.  We are very happy and can't wait to get a Netflix, Hulu or Amazon account to use the smart features.  I recommend!

Reviews.Title: Not very good
Reviews.Author: David A. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Sound quality is bad and picture quality also suffers.  After my last purchase of a Visio, which is very good, I am disappointed.Dave T

Reviews.Title: picture setting
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: I barely got this TV yesterday and was wondering if any one can help me with the picture settings please

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: gailanne
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful Christmas present. This smart T.V. has an awesome picture on it. My husband commented that the picture looks better than on his LG 50" 1080p. I did have to call Vizio customer support to set up the connecting to internet part since all you get with the T.V. is a basic start up booklet. Had I messed around with it awhile longer I may have figured it out myself. Within minutes the T.V. was set up to start watching my Amazon Prime movies. Amazon Prime has given me the ability to catch up on a few T.V. series I missed, like Parenthood's first 2 seasons.I have had the T.V. up and running about 2 weeks and I watch it everyday. I couldn't be happier and it is a perfect fit for my home office since this is a small room. I would recommend this smart T.V. to anyone. Get the HDMI cable since it really makes the picture crystal clear and the colors are very vivid

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: This TV has the features of my vastly more expensive Sony Bravia and the setup was just as easy.  I was able to calibrate it with the free calibration disc from AVSForums to perform almost exactly as my Sony.  I don't know what else you would want for a TV at this price.

Reviews.Title: Good price for what you get
Reviews.Author: Tasha McDevitt
Reviews.Content: Overall the TV has been a very good buy for me. It is the perfect size for what I needed it for, the smart functions are nice so I do not have to use my PS3/Wii for netflix. I do wish there was a true internet browswer. The only real flaw I have found is that occassionally the color dims for a few moments and then goes back to original brightness. It doesn't happen often, but I do notice it. Otherwise, good sound and graphics, and you can't beat the cost!

Reviews.Title: Nice T.V.
Reviews.Author: Daniel C Rossetti
Reviews.Content: I like the quality of the T.V., but I question whether the "smart" function is necessary (over just using an HDMI to connect it to a computer). The apps are limited, but great for Netflix. There's no web app available which would be very useful.All in all a great tv.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV.... but....
Reviews.Author: Skipjack2001
Reviews.Content: Okay.. bought this TV as a bedroom TV to watch Netflix and such.Out of the box, it's a nice sleek design, lightweight, and mounts on the wall well.  The remote, however, feels like a cheap toy and has this annoying loud "click" to the buttons.Setup was pretty easy... I was excited to find that my logitech wireless keyboard worked in the USB slot!  So, if anyone is struggling with keying in WiFi passwords, or having trouble typing search terms in Netflix, plug in a keyboard.  I have a small logitech that I keep on the night stand next to my bed.The picture looks great.. I used to be a videophile, but this is just a bedroom TV.. so I'm not fiddling with it too much.  The audio sounds a little thin to me... but  I may just be used to my livingroom setup with the 12" subwoofer. ;)The menus on the TV are sluggish... at best.  It takes several seconds after pushing "Netflix" for the app to open up.  Pretty annoying, really.  You would think, after having smart TV's around for so long that someone would have improved on the interface of these things.  The menus seemed laid out for a larger TV, also.. some of the fonts are hard for me to read from 10' away.  I find myself squinting a lot.I was excited to find you can stream media to this thing via a media server on your PC!  Using Universal Media Server ([...]) or something similar, you can stream videos, photos, and music to this TV! Very cool.  Again.. the interface is sluggish... and it's hard to read file names from any significant distance.  Also.. it's finicky about what video codecs it wants to play.  It'll play .avi's just fine, it seems.. but will give me a codec error on some .mp4's but not others... so, I'll have to fiddle with it more to see what works and what doesn't.Overall, I'm happy with it.  It's inexpensive, looks good on my wall, it does what I want.. albeit slowly most of the time.The remote really does suck, though.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Suzy "game gal"
Reviews.Content: We bought it for our kitchen.  The color is outstanding.  The thin design is very good for use on the kitchen cabinet.  We wanted a smart TV and this fits all our needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: Timothy Sost
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality and easy to set up and connect to the internet. The built in speakers aren'r so great but 5 stars none the less. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Super Smart TV
Reviews.Author: steve a
Reviews.Content: Bought it for oldest daughter. She is absolutely amazed by performance. So this is really her review, not mine this time.

Reviews.Title: Good bargain
Reviews.Author: Mr. Riff "Laid back..."
Reviews.Content: I shopped comparable TVs and decided to buy this one because:1. I have another Vizio and love it2. Wifi3. After an Amazon prime discount of $20, it was almost as cheap as other comparable specs (39-40 inches, 120 hz, 1080p) from lesser known brands (Element and others)After using it for a month, I have no regrets.  Great picture and functionality!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good product so far
Reviews.Author: James Holloway
Reviews.Content: For a lower priced smart TV, this is a pretty good product.  We have honestly had only one issue and that the TV's ability to receive the wireless internet signal is a little weak.  In the bedroom we put the unit in, other products have no issue streaming videos from Amazon or Netflix, but this TV will almost always stop and buffer for a minute before restarting were it paused.  I guess it is just a cheap (relative to more expensive smart TV's) receiver.  Other than that, the picture is good and the unit is pretty easy to use.  It serves the purpose that we needed it for pretty well.  I doubt I would buy this in a larger size for my home's primary TV, but for a child's bedroom it is very good.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: CKMAGIC
Reviews.Content: I'm not a tech person, but I am happy with this TV so far. I've had it about six months and it seem to work well. The only thing I wish was that the menu items were bigger so you could read them from far away. The picture is nice and large for my bedroom, but I have to get up and get close to read the menu because the letters are small. Not a big deal but just a suggestion.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this TV
Reviews.Author: Dr. P. Sindberg "UltimateWines"
Reviews.Content: Wanted to get a slightly largely TV and one that was not as bulky as our old set.  The Vizio is just right.  And VERY light which makes it super easy to move around.  I also like all the "smart" aspects with Amazon Instant Videos, etc, easy to access.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Celeste Harper
Reviews.Content: This has been my best purchase in a long time. I love the instant access to Netflix and the picture is beautiful. I recommend Vizio  because this is my second purchase and the quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: R. Faulkiner
Reviews.Content: Overall a great television.  The price is good too.  USB port on the back is nice as well.  I would definitely buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Not up to snuff
Reviews.Author: gh
Reviews.Content: Own a 60" and thought that it would be just as slim and with a remote control that has the keypad on the back. The remote it came with does not have that feature and the TV does not have the slim, sleek lines as the 60". Not what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: kendra lee
Reviews.Content: vizio-E-series is a good tv am glad a made this order it's a nice size looks great in my room

Reviews.Title: Nice workout tv
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: It's a great tv to watch while using my treadmill because it has built in wifi and has all these smart apps to choose from and best of all it's 1080p resolution. With the proper stand it sits right in front of my treadmill.

Reviews.Title: Cheap smart tv by a good brand.
Reviews.Author: Jeff Urbanowicz
Reviews.Content: At first, I was worried about the resolution being 720p because ive only owned 1080 flat screens. But, I was in desperate need of a new TV and just went with it. When I first open up the box I noticed that there wasnt a traditional tv stand, but rather a V piece that fits securely on the back of the tv. I was quite nevous of the stability of the tv because I do have nieces and nephews who visit more than twice a week. I tested and tested to stability of it and it seemed to hold up pretty well. The first thing I did was connect the tv to make sure netflix worked and messed around with the different smart options. The remote is very simple, it even has its own Netflix button which most Vizio remotes have. So i watched a movie on Netflix with action, I chose "Expendables 2" The quality wasnt as great as I hoped. So I popped in a blu ray and started watching, and the picture was great. Clear cut lines and good sound quality as well. I put two and two together and realized that the Netflix quality picture wasnt due to the TV but Netflix. All in all, Im about a month in on the product and I think it was a smart buy. Only downside is the tv stand which I found to be halfway decent but would have rather had the traditonal stand with the base.

Reviews.Title: tv was great until...
Reviews.Author: Brandon Hacker
Reviews.Content: tv was great . Great picture great sound easy setup, but when furst turning on noticed a dead pixel right in middle of screen.  Was very upsetting being that this 500 dollar tv already had a black spot right in middle od screen, but I am exxhanging it for the same tv, and hope to recieve a NEW condition tv. If I dont, best believe amazon and its customers will hear about it from me. Amazon has had service from the start tho.

Reviews.Title: Excellent but...........
Reviews.Author: Kenneth R Allison
Reviews.Content: PRO:picture. SMART features, size (for RV)Cons:poor sound, will not act as monitor for Kindle Fire HDX 7".Will a toggle allow the TV as monitor for Kindle Fire-if not, how?

Reviews.Title: Don't buy Vizio
Reviews.Author: MaryJo E.
Reviews.Content: After very limited use(less than two months) the picture quit working but audio still worked. Vizio would not honor the warranty because they said it was purchased from an unauthorized dealer. It was bought through Amazon. I now have a $600.00 radio.

Reviews.Title: T.V.
Reviews.Author: Golfnut
Reviews.Content: Bought this T.V. for my bedroom expecting great things from the Vizio which was the same brand I was replacing.  For starters the color was terrible and my so said something was not right with it.  It could have been damaged in transit or something.  Well after trying to hopefully get it straightened out for a couple of weeks I just had to send it back.  Could have just been a fluke because Vizio is usually a very good brand.  Money was refunded and I ended up buying a 40" Samsung

Reviews.Title: Confirming "LIPSYNC" issues reported below; extremely annoying.
Reviews.Author: name not provided "none"
Reviews.Content: Mounted on wall in my workout room, in front of treadmill. Wonderful for that purpose, as my requirements in this use are moderate.»»»BUT ....BIG DEAL FOR ME: same "LIPSYNC" issues reported below; extremely annoying during "talking heads" programs. Have to recalibrate frequently, sometimes even between different channels during same time period.Never encounted this before, but real "sand in your shoe" issue after only 2 weeks, even tho happy content with other performance, but this is a"fatal flaw" issue for me. Going back after only 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture with worthless apps
Reviews.Author: Michael Collard
Reviews.Content: The vizio 42 inch has a great picture at a great price. The problem is the apps are very buggy. When running netflix (or Amazon Video or Hulu) it seems to overload the cpu on the tv, and basic tv functions stop working - e.g. the volume button no longer works, or trying to change the imputs will no longer work. Maybe I have a bad tv, but once you use the apps the whole tv slows down. - Kind of like running too many programs on my pc. If you are able to use another device for streaming services, and just pretend this is a regular tv without any smart apps, then everything will be good to go. I give it four stars as it comes in around the same price as a tv without smart apps.ProsGreat Picture3 HDMI imputsSlim designConsSpeakers face away from the viewer (not much of a problem as you usually have a soundsystem set up for a tv like this one.Apps work, but frequently freeze the tv, or makes the tv slow down.

Reviews.Title: Not thrilled
Reviews.Author: linda ball
Reviews.Content: Was not thrilled with the pic quality and sound quality. Have not used other features as of yet. Wish I had spent a bit more to get a better tv

Reviews.Title: Tv problem
Reviews.Author: Kim J.
Reviews.Content: The tv keep turning of by it self n it logs on apps really slow.  No impress when I have seven kids trying to keep them entertained with a show on Netflix or something.

Reviews.Title: good tv... terrible shipping!
Reviews.Author: Chelsey A Ennis
Reviews.Content: The actual tv is great for the price... no complaints there.Unfortunately, when the tv was delivered, I was at work. I assumed that I would have to sign for the tv but, to my surprise, it was left unattended on my porch. Now, I live in Michigan, and it is the winter, so the temps were below freezing and there was snow. The box was just left there in a pile of snow on my front porch. Thankfully, I live in a good neighborhood, because the large vizio flat screen tv printings on the box, were clearly visible from the street. Someone else could of easily gotten a very good tv for free from my porch!Like I said, I am happy with the tv (for its cost and quality), but was furious to find my pricey purchase left outside in the snow for anyone to take. Hopefully shipping guidelines can be set for future customers.

Reviews.Title: Nice little tv
Reviews.Author: Leslie J Mullins
Reviews.Content: The picture is great. The features are numerous and the cost was reasonable. I'm very pleased. This is an excellent purchase for a smaller room.

Reviews.Title: Nice smart tv at a great price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for the kitchen to replace a very old 1st generation tv with only component input and the right speaker had gone out a few years back.  The Vizio E241i-A1 24-inch 1080p tv has a much sharper, brighter, and more colorful picture than the old Magnavox, the HDMI input allows for 1080p viewing of Directv channels, and the smart applications connect wirelessly to all our favorite apps including Amazon Prime and Netflix.Would have given this tv a 5 star rating but there are two major drawbacks.  1) I'm concerned the stand is somewhat unstable and a little bump may send the tv face forward off the counter and onto the floor.  Took some clear packing tape to secure the stand to the Directv box on which it sites.  2) The wireless capability appears to be somewhat weak.  While watching a movie or show via Amazon Prime or Netflix, it tends to buffer to the extent it becomes a little annoying.  The wireless router is on one end of the house and the tv sits in the kitchen smack dab in the middle of the house.  We have a Roku HD on the complete opposite side of the house to the router and it never buffers.  We certainly don't live in a mansion so the connectivity issue is somewhat disappointing.Another note.  The first Vizion I received had a stuck pixel.  I called Amazon technical support and was told to run pixel fixer from YouTube.  I ran it twice for a total of 18 hours but the pixel remained stuck (glowed continuous green).  Went online to find other helpful tips (rub it with a warm washcloth, tap it lightly) but nothing worked.  Called Amazon back and they had a replacement in the mail the same day with 1-day air delivery.  This tv is perfect with zero stuck pixels.  Thank you Amazon for such fantastic customer service!!!

Reviews.Title: TV is nice, nice view and nice sound, HD is very good
Reviews.Author: Ana C. De Lugo
Reviews.Content: I am agree with my purchase, probably TV remore control could be better, finishing on TV colud be improve and the base of TV set too.

Reviews.Title: Multiple problems
Reviews.Author: A. triantis "NSG Student"
Reviews.Content: Had multiple problems with this tv right out off the box.  First the frame had to be snapped into place.  Then we tried to establish a wifi connection much to our dismay whilst the signal was excellent, tv could not connect to amazon prime.  Then the picture kept getting light and dark. The list goes on an on.  I'm upset I used my points for this purchase and am not sure if I will get them back!  Stay away from this tv

Reviews.Title: Very happy over all with purchase
Reviews.Author: Eliab Mendoza
Reviews.Content: The remote is basic. Needs to be more sturdy. Feel like it will break easily. Tv is nice. Good picture

Reviews.Title: Nice TV ... not so great sound
Reviews.Author: Ed Lohrer e3_prog "progressive music fan"
Reviews.Content: The picture is very good on this HDTV, and I love the apps.It was pretty easy to connect to my wireless router, even though the router is on the 2nd floor and the TV is in the basement, I rarely get any kind of delay in the streaming apps.Unfortunately, the sound quality on this model is below average, so if you're not planning of adding external speakers and sound quality is a priority, then you should think twice about this model.Fortunately for me, I bought this model to mount on the wall to watch when I'm on my treadmill, and I use headphones, and the sound is good in the headphones.Overall ... great picture and Apps for the price, but only if you have external speakers or using headphones.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my bedroom
Reviews.Author: StrongJ
Reviews.Content: Just received my Vizio E-Series yesterday. I absolutely love it. Light weight, and Compact just right for my bedroom. Satisified!

Reviews.Title: Great when it decides to work
Reviews.Author: lorrie
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Vizio E500i-50-inch 1080 120Hz LED Smart HDTV from Sam's Club (online, on Black Friday) for $498. The picture is great...no complaints there. My problem stems from it's glitchy internet connection. Sometimes it will get disconnected for no reason at all. This sucks when I'm in the middle of watching a movie. My modem and my router are located right next to the tv...so the signal strength is not the issue. I found that by turning the tv off then back on again works most of the time to reestablishing the lost connection, but other times I have to re-enter the ip address manually all over again. Also an issue... when I'm browsing through movie selections on Amazon instant videos, I run into uploading problems...instead of movie selections being displayed I get blank pages. Another problem I'm facing...some channels are constantly losing it's picture...it looks like a distorted computerized mess.  Occasionally the audio would go out of sync with HDMI. I've only had this tv for less then a week and I have had problems with it every single day. I plan on keeping it because returning it would be a pain, and I do love the crystal clear picture, but I wouldn't suggest anyone buying it for it's Smart Tv features.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Frank Martin
Reviews.Content: Love my TV the only thing I can ask is where do you get 42" of TV when its not that big

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: james p yancy
Reviews.Content: Great buyShame it doesn't have a web browser and the remote feels like a child's toy.Apart from that great tv

Reviews.Title: Vizio 32inch LED Smart HDTV TV
Reviews.Author: elias conde
Reviews.Content: This is a Christmas gift for my daughter but I did connect to make sure it works and it looked very nice, the colors were very sharp. I have three other Vizio TV's and I love the price and how they look and how dependable they have been, so I expect my daughters gift will be appreciated by her.

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture
Reviews.Author: Lee Steffan
Reviews.Content: We wanted a new TV for my Mom's apartment and this size was perfect.  I was actually surprised (in a great way) at the picture quality.  It is very clear.  Also, this TV was very quick and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: M. Roer
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and operate. Good picture and good features. The only thing I would have preferred would have been a different frame color. I do not like black.

Reviews.Title: TV is possibly Broken
Reviews.Author: Jessica W.
Reviews.Content: I called Vizio. I opened a case #. The remote that was given to me does not come with the TV. The TV turns on and off constantly and the Wifi setup is not working, cannot find network. Vizio worked with me to restore to original settings and recommended a company to come out and fix it. The seller will not contact me.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Diane Wright
Reviews.Content: When turning on or off I have to stand in front of the tv for the remote to connect. This feature is on the very end of the tv and should be in the middle.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value. VIZIO Smart HDTV the best way to go.
Reviews.Author: ezboomer
Reviews.Content: The best thing about VIZIO is that they provide all the media input and output ports for most video and audio preferences at a pricethat is well below what other brands would provide in an HDTV of this size. You would have to buy a much larger flat screen to getwhat VIZIO has on even their smaller flat screens. The Internet apps and built -in WiFi are definite pluses. As I am a prime memberit made a lot of sense to get this flat screen. In less than 3 min. the set was registered with Amazon and I was watching a PrimeInstant Video by way of WiFi. For those interested in NetFlix and M-GO they have their own button on the remote with Amazon. Sowith a push of a button you choices appear right on the screen for you to choose. And there are plenty of other apps you can register for. Read the specs on the Amazon page for this flat screen and you'll see the value for the price. Arrived in 2 days as promised and in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: 8th TV
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I like VIzio allot there a great TV's this one is so thin and lite and was able to mount it on the wall by myself my old tv needed 2 people to do it

Reviews.Title: I miss you
Reviews.Author: gatorgrad
Reviews.Content: Love the picture. high end for low price. was upset you cant use the internet or things like Watchespn of HBOGO, just netflix and amazon prime apps. most apps are worthless. Cool gadget, great picture. thought it was stupid that the old school cable input was vertical made it hard to get in tight. but who uses that anymore? ultimately i returned for a cheaper LG model ( i am a student and saved 100 bucks) but you should not do what I did, this tv is worth the extra dollars.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Darrell Ferreter "sandy"
Reviews.Content: Works well, easy set up and wonderful support.  Not much luck with Netflix,  but that could be a wifi issue

Reviews.Title: Good set
Reviews.Author: Boss Man
Reviews.Content: One nice little TV set. Terrific picture and sound. Has just about enough tech to keep the kids happy. Not state of the art but a solid unit at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E32Oi-AO  IS FANTASTIC !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carioca08 "CreativeBella"
Reviews.Content: FANTASTIC TELEVIZION EXPERIENCE !!!!Love, love, love, love it. Easy to install ! I had to buy another router for bigger range, the older D-Linkdidn't do it I couldn't  get the wireless signal at ALL.Instead buying a booster for the old D-Link router I ordered an upgradewith a D-Link Xtreme N+300 Gigabit (it is for larger space range I highly recommend this router). My Vizio is 35 feet away from where the router is and it gets all 5bars signal with this new router, the  image/picture  on the HD channels are fantastic and after I pushing the "wide" button on the remoteto  regulate each channel picture it was worth the 15 minutes spent on it. What a picture! The HD chnls arejust like "live" image, you can see every pore in people's face, unbelievable.!!!!!The internet features are AWESOME !!!! A breeze to set up !I already had my subscription for Netflix on my computer, so I clicked the "V" button on the middle of the remote and all thefeatures comes up on the screen you use the arrows to pull the one you want to the left corner then it lights up, you click okand that feature opens up. In this case I got to the Netflix, it  gives you a space (just click for the "on-screen keyboard")for you to enter (type it) your email and password and voila ! Your acct it is ON the tv, too. !!!!! LOOOOOOOVE MY NEW TOY !!!!!!!!  A holiday 2013 gift to myself , and I am very soooo happyI did buy the Vizio  E32Oi-AO. I highly recommend it !

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: William S. Duff
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv locally as I needed it right away and am very happy.  Good picture and the two small speakers are much better than I expected from this size TV.  The only downsides are only one HDMI port and it takes a bit longer to turn on than some of my other TVs.  Neither are a big deal to me.  It did connect to the internet as soon as I entered my password, but I've not really tried any of the specific internet choices.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Creighton "Gary A. Creighton"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this TV. I add-in my Laptop with an Etekcity Video VGA to HDMI 1080P Converter/Adapter which lets me use my Laptop through the TV. Never use the Internet features, though. Very sharp screen. Tends to crash in the middle of videos when I use the 'Plug a USB Flash Drive in and watch MPG movies' feature.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E420i-A0 Review
Reviews.Author: dfrerking
Reviews.Content: Excellent reception. Great picture.  Easy to set up. Terrific price! So far, so good.  I highly recommend it to anyone who's looking for a value in a Smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Lou "Amazon Shopper"
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  TV has nice picture and sound quality.  Wish the remote lit up but you get the feel of it pretty quick to use in the dark.  It fit perfectly in the space I planned for it.  Sill learning about smart features.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jeramie King
Reviews.Content: This review is for the E500i-A1. It seems the reviews on Amazon are for a mix of models under this one. I wish Amazon could fix this because it made it difficult to choose a TV.The E500i-A1 has so far been great! The only gripe I have so far is, the Netflix app seems to log me out from time to time.

Reviews.Title: Picture is decent to good.
Reviews.Author: Richard G "Richard G."
Reviews.Content: Picture is decent to good.  Can't get the Smart features to connect with my router.  Altogether a good set in that size and the price was right.  I don't care for the fact that it tilts back from verticle on it's stand.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for price.
Reviews.Author: SS Sally
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV based on reviews and price. Use for extra room where kids are locked for quiet moments. ;) It works well and has great apps. Used other reviewers suggestions for settings, which helped a lot. Settings out of box where very greenish and dim. Only bad thing is it has a hard time picking up the wifi signal. I have purchased a wifi repeater, hopefully it helps. Our LG, which is the same distance from the router does not have a hard time picking it up. Connected quickly to Comcast, Blu-Ray and Wii.

Reviews.Title: Great Extra TV.
Reviews.Author: pm
Reviews.Content: Great picture and a good price. Good WiFi reception. Second Vizio TV I bought. Perfect extra TV for little gamers!

Reviews.Title: Search for the a good quality, brand name, internet ready TV at a good price.
Reviews.Author: Zodia "ciao bella"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this television.  Needed a small TV for the kitchen, so had to find something internet ready.  Good quality for the money. I get to watch the news and movies while I am preparing dinner.

Reviews.Title: Great for a Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Justice
Reviews.Content: Beautifully, clear picture. Great sound. I bought this as a monitor for my husband's computer. He is very pleased with it. Would not recommend it for an everyday TV, unless it was for a guest or child's bedroom because of the size, but I would purchase this brand in a bigger model for my living room.

Reviews.Title: As advertised.
Reviews.Author: Pete Murray
Reviews.Content: Arrived as scheduled.Picture is very good even without cable/satellite.Easy to set up.It's a good deal.  ..

Reviews.Title: great 47 tv's
Reviews.Author: MIAMI305
Reviews.Content: great amazing tv ...has lots of extras you cant go wrong .  bought 2 of these in 47 "  great all around.

Reviews.Title: The price was right on this tv.
Reviews.Author: HFC
Reviews.Content: This tv is more high-tech than the Sony I had to replace, but also flimsy, and my husband says the picture isn't as good as our Sony.  However, we couldn't find an inch or so wider screen in a Sony, so we settled on this 42" which is as large as the space we have for it will accommodate.

Reviews.Title: This is a "first impressions" review based on 24 hours of ownership.
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This TV was the first of "modern" HD TVs that my family has owned.  We were very surprised at its ease of setup.  The TV has excellent sound by itself.  I absolutely love the YouTube app, as I can stream videos in HD on the huge screen.  The only issue we have had was a bit a audio problems the first morning after setting it up.  The TV ended up synchronizing itself and worked as it should, but it was odd to see a brand new TV not playing sound and then "resetting" itself to end up working.

Reviews.Title: Great size and price for secondary TV.
Reviews.Author: R. ORourke
Reviews.Content: Great size and price for secondary TV. Color and sound are fine. Love the Amazon Prime Instant Video and Netflix options.

Reviews.Title: Great valur
Reviews.Author: Niall Coldrick "many surprises"
Reviews.Content: As advertised. Great picture, light weight set that looks great - great value for the price. Would strongly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, good price
Reviews.Author: Arne Green
Reviews.Content: My first HDTV of this size. We have only had it for a couple of weeks, but love it so far.

Reviews.Title: Not so "smart"
Reviews.Author: A. Lindsey "A."
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because the sale price was too good to pass up. Overall we are happy, but the WiFi streaming is junk. I can get Wifi to work on every device in every part of the house - except the smart TV. So, I am not thrilled with the "smart" features. The picture is good and, for the price I paid, I have no other complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Ej Swa
Reviews.Content: The 33 inch VIZIO smart television is wonderful. It has a great picture, nice size, simple to set up and use, and an  awesome price!

Reviews.Title: Affordable, Great Quality and Sound
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I've never had a vizio before, but I'm a convert now. We currently have a 55" LG in the living room and this in the bedroom, and man talk about quality AND price! The smart TV is great and allows us to have an all in one system without spending a fortune. I was nervous about getting a 720 60z but it's able to keep up with a PS3, movies and everything we've thrown at it and not blink an eye.If 1080p isn't a must, this is one heck of a television

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: ReformingWoman "cool dat!"
Reviews.Content: Three issues with this Smart TV caused me to return it to Amazon:1. Had to re-enter my wireless network key every time I turned on the TV.2. Lost network connection during use when other devices in close proximity had no issue with network signal.3. TV randomly powered off while in use.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price, apps leave some room for improvement
Reviews.Author: S. Spence
Reviews.Content: No complaints about the TV: Easy to set up, no hiccups so far after 6 months, but the built-in apps aren't the best quality. Also some latency between the squishy-buttoned remote and the TV. Still thewirecutter.com's pick for small TV more than 6 months after I picked it up. Recommended. [...]

Reviews.Title: vizio 50 inch tv
Reviews.Author: H
Reviews.Content: I like it a lot.  The colors are fine for me at the factory default setting after the firmware update to address this issue.  Sports are really goo to watch on this set.

Reviews.Title: 50" Vizio
Reviews.Author: C. Reeves "Bargain Seeker"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Flat screen for my husband birthday and he absolutely loves it.  Love the crisp and sharp look of the picture.  This is our second Vizio.  He has one in his man cave.  This one was placed in his music studio.  I would recommend this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this TV
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV in July. The wireless worked fine for about three months then stopped. I called Vizio  4 times to try to get it working again. They had me do a reboot, it didn't work. Then I was told to change some of the settings.That did not work. Vizio blamed it on my wireless router, although it previously worked on the TV and I was not having a problem with other wireless devices on my network, including my laptop and another media streaming device. Their solution to my problem was I would have to hardwire the TV to my modem. If you are looking for a Smart TV look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: "Problems" are usually caused by mis-setting the menu options
Reviews.Author: Pamela P
Reviews.Content: Wanted a 1080p 120Hz TV that would fit the width of our entertainment center opening. Spent many hours reading all previous Amazon (& other) reviews before buying it. Even called Vizio to ask for solutions BEFORE buying it! Perhaps reviewers with problems attempted to correct their (mainly screen cutting off, sound, picture or WiFi) issues themselves without contacting Vizio for help?? So far this TV is FABULOUS! Yes, there are soooo many choices for the picture & sound that at first you might not be 100% satisfied! Read other reviews for helpful settings or keep trying until you love them!...TV itself luckily has matte screen, not glossy, & picture quality is amazing. Plenty of connections in back for our needs; you can use splitters if you need more. Using Roku2 box for now, so haven't tried WiFi or any Vizio Apps. Added our own Polk speakers using Audio Out from TV to our stereo receiver- add this to the TV's "Surround Sound" option & you'll feel like you're in a concert hall! A BIG plus is that Vizio Customer Support is open 7 days a week! Last, think positive!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed TV purchase.
Reviews.Author: boatman
Reviews.Content: Picture clarity & brightness was very disappointing.  A much older LED TV from another manufacturer is much brighter with better color overall.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Gary Yu
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  It has a great picture and sound.  It fits nicely in the area that I wanted.  Smart Apps are ok (not bad, not great).  Definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Hillis Haygood II
Reviews.Content: The TV is excellent. I was pleasantly surprised by the amount of features the TV possessed. It will work nicely for my child.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our application
Reviews.Author: drfixer
Reviews.Content: 42 inch is exactly the right size for our bedroom. The ability to connect to our network is the topping on the cake.  As always, Amazon comes through.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Nick McCraw
Reviews.Content: I was afraid that 720 would be poor quality compared to 1080 that I a used to. In a TV this small, 720 and 1080 are almost indistiguishable. The WIFI works alright but its not the best... it cuts out after an hour of watching. I would not recommend this TV if you are dependant on WIFI for your media needs

Reviews.Title: Vizio 50 inch 120hz
Reviews.Author: surprise guy
Reviews.Content: It's ok but I don't have enough control over the audio output. The sound sounds garbled. The picture quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Regret this purchase
Reviews.Author: James Blackman
Reviews.Content: Not the most convenient tv to operate.  Poor location for the electric eye. Smart tv at times totally stops working, Better off buying a non smart tv and using a roku.

Reviews.Title: Good TV. Not as smart as I thought it would be...
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I didn't have the highest expectations for this TV, so I really am pleased with it, but I was thinking it would be a little smarter than it is. I have an Android phone. This TV has a USB port. I thought that I could access (at LEAST) my music through a regular USB cord, but that is not the case. It doesn't even recognize that something is plugged in. I thought the TV would be more like a light version of a PC. Aside from not being able to use my phone with it unless I get a MediaLink HD or an HDMI to USB cord, it is a good TV. It has some interesting features and is a SUPER easy set up. I like the little remote that comes with it. The remote also comes with batteries.The quality is great with both picture and sound. The TV itself is sleek and lightweight.We have it hooked up to our Vizio BluRay player, so that instantly gave us a ton more channels, ability to use USB to my phone to access music, and we can play DVD's and BluRays. The hook up was super easy as well. Just had to re-sign in to stuff like Netflix and Pandora.I would recommend this TV, but I would also recommend having a Roku, video game system (Wii/Xbox/PS3) or Blu Ray player hooked up to it.

Reviews.Title: Does it all and the price is right
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My only gripe with this smart TV is that it does not have an auto-brightness feature.  We have it in a bright sunny kitchen and we have to change the brightness manually as the room goes from light to dark.

Reviews.Title: I can see the extremely high resolution image on the cracked screen, which is just perfect.
Reviews.Author: harrison Zhao
Reviews.Content: Cracked screen is not a problem, amazon will give you a new free one. What a nice day!!! 2 more words?

Reviews.Title: Totally satisfied
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Murphy
Reviews.Content: When I saw this item advertised as refurbished, I was afraid to take a chance.  But decided to take the plunge after I spoke to a few friends.  I was pleasantly surprised! This is an excellent TV! It was advertised as out of the box, but it is in mint condition! I cannot hardly leave the house because I am watching this TV! One of the best investments I ever made for a refurbished item!

Reviews.Title: Vizio E470i-A0 47-inch 1080p 120Hz LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: nathan overcash
Reviews.Content: This tv is exactly what I expected, from reading all the previous reviews from other owners. The picture is perfect. However, the sound is about what you would expect from a flat screen tv. Once you are used to listening to a conventional tv, its hard to get used to flat screen tv sounds. It's not a bad sound quality-just one you have to get accustomed to. I would recommend this tv and would probably purchase it again. Actually, I would most likely buy a larger screen(bigger is better).

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Westmore
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased for my Grand Daughters entry into college.  She has reported that it is working fine and that she loves it.  It was of course purchased for its cost and is just the size for a college dorm.

Reviews.Title: Worth the cost
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, sound is not great but I expected that.  Can't beat this Smart TV for under $200.  Perfect for a small to medium sized bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Remote is VERY cheap, but otherwise a nice set
Reviews.Author: Farm Mom of 8
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the kids room and they love it. The tv has a good picture. I wish the stand was a tad sturdier - but in a teens room it is fine. My only complaint is that the remote is extremely thin, cheap plastic. Getting dropped once on the hardwood floor cracked it. It still works fine, but a heavier plastic would have been nice.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Balasenthilkumar
Reviews.Content: I didn't expect that in this rate it will give me quality and features, remote and TV had YouTube app and really useful, cheap high quality smart tv

Reviews.Title: Great wifi set
Reviews.Author: Dozz
Reviews.Content: It's used in my master bathroom, I watch news in the morning and wife watches while taking candle light bath.

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: Barry Jackson
Reviews.Content: my wife and I saw a hhgreg ad for a hdtv.  after looking in to it and research we came across this tv and VERY happy with it.  the picture is awesome.  Smart tv technology is so cool.  You will not regret this TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: the tv that does everything
Reviews.Author: Timothy S Halpern
Reviews.Content: love my smart tv because of all the features, it can get online wirelessly. and I can watch my blockbuster upstairs where there is no ethernet line. I also like the vizio brand, I have always liked that brand.

Reviews.Title: Nice  TV considering its price.
Reviews.Author: murphy
Reviews.Content: For what i need it for this fits the bill nicely. while its not 1080p  it is a nice TV for a bedroom.  Seems to work well. i have had no problems so far. I have had it for 4  months now, and  no issues.

Reviews.Title: Great Cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Ricky R. Elton
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure what everyone's problem with this TV is. But I bought mine from Amazon Warehouse that was used with 'Minor Cosmetic Damage' and it's a fantastic TV. I got it $100 cheaper and I can't even find any damage to it. At first I didn't want a smart TV, but now I love it. I love using it for Pandora and Netflix. My only problem with the TV is I can't find the absolute best settings for it that I like. It'll take some work, but other than that I enjoy it. Some people claim this TV is not true 120Hz, I can't comment on that because I have yet to watch an action Blu-Ray, but I think it is a good TV for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Rocks
Reviews.Author: DJM "sunshine2"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Vizio television I have purchased through Amazon.  I am just as happy with this one as the last.  The shipping was prompt, and my tv was packaged as if it were just down the street for the delivery.  Clean, well protected and ON TIME!  I appreciate the capabilities of this product for us older folks who don't always have an easy time with new instructions for each new piece of technology!  It is easy to use, the picture is fabulous, the size was perfect for us and it weighs next to nothing!  (So glad to get rid of that huge old tv)  I can stream from my computer and of course enjoy my Amazon Prime Instant Videos!  The addition of Pandora makes hubby happy and it sounds better than my computer does!  Very pleased with our purchase!

Reviews.Title: vizio is my favorit
Reviews.Author: Witchi1313
Reviews.Content: I love this TV, no more cable or satellite required with the easy to use app interface.  Great picture too and light az a feather.

Reviews.Title: vizio 32 inch
Reviews.Author: lizzytish
Reviews.Content: Love it!. Beautiful clear picture and sound. Easy to set up. I'll be watching more TV than ever! I'm very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price.
Reviews.Author: jrock635
Reviews.Content: I've put off replacing my 27" Sony Wega tube tv for years now. Basically, I got tired of carrying it when I move.I picked up this tv, and the Square Trade warranty, for just over $320. Netflix, Hulu Plus, Amazon Prime, Crackle - all built-in. When I first connect to the web, it is a little slow - it tries to update all of the apps installed. We don't have cable, so this works out well - we've been streaming everything off of my PS3. I added a Mohu Leaf antenna, the picture quality is phenomenal.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV except for Start Up Time
Reviews.Author: T. Allen
Reviews.Content: I don't mind a delay in the time between hitting the power button and seeing a picture but 20 secs is a little too long. Old analog TVs start faster! Other than that it seems to be good so far but have only had it installed 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy, Great TV
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Warmbier-ramp
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my office. It is a tremendous value being that it is a smart TV with 1080p. Works great and nice picture. Bought with Amazon Prime for free delivery and bought a  high value Cheetah Mount too.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: debbie pine
Reviews.Content: I love this tv.  It has an excellent picture for the price.  We are enjoying watching commercial free movies on the smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Waited a long time to write review. We LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: anthony Hanick
Reviews.Content: We love our TV. We got it in February and have not had a single problem. Everything works great and the Amazon Prime videos and netflix come in very HD. We really can't fault the TV for any reason. It was a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Have had only a week & it has been great
Reviews.Author: roark "hotcook"
Reviews.Content: Great TV, BUT, delivery of set leaves a great deal to be desired.  It wazs delivered on date promised and on time.  HOWEVER, we are in our 80's and are accustomed to having UPS and USPS ring our doorbell and wait until we arrive at the door to t5ell them where we would like them to put heavy pa ckages in our house.  The Arizona heat and our inability to lift heavy objects, you know.  They have always been very accommodating and courteous.  HOWEVER, this delivery was by FEDEX and the two men who delivered the TV rang the door bell and wearrived at the door to see the TV on our front porch with both ends of package smashed and the men walking rapidly to their truck and driving off in a swift manner.  We purchase ALOT of merchandise from Amazon over several years & are disappointed to report this extreme dissatisfaction with one of their carriers. We hope some accommodation can be made to us.  Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV functions don't Work
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Vizio said it was Centurylinks Problem and Centurylink said it was Vizio's problem.  After numerous calls to both tech supports Vizio agreed to send someone out to replace wireless card (even though direct Ethernet connection didn't work either).
