Let me be clear - you cannot look stuff up on the web.Totally, utterly lame.It's going back - and I'm buying a Sony that has web browser functionality.

Reviews.Title: MISLEADING REVIEWS
Reviews.Author: P. Wolf
Reviews.Content: I clicked to see the reviews  for the VIZIO E-Series E241i-A1 "24-Inch"  1080p 60Hz LED Smart HDTV (tilted base) and all the reviews under read reviews are for bigger model Vizio smart tv's.  Reading all the how to configure reviews apply to larger different Vizios.  I am not finding what I need in generic reviews for Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Vizio HD Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Maxuel Andrade
Reviews.Content: I bought a VIZIO HD SMART TV on August 2012 and one year latter my TV got problems with image and making a loud and weird sound. I tried to contact the Costco store and the Vizio company for technical support, but they did not help to solve these issues. I kept calling them for 2 days and nothing was done to fix it. I have a very expensive Vizio TV in my apartment as a decoration device now. Thanks a lot!

Reviews.Title: I think I got a bad one!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I waited what felt like forever for this tv set. I have other vizio's in my home so I knew I'd like the brand. But after receiving it little things started happening. I don't know if something happened when it was shipped to me but I'm seeing purple spots at random moments on my screen. I thought it was the setting, so I've changed the color. That still did nothing to help. I'm so mad, because I just wasted almost $700 on a tv that has issues. I don't think I'll ever order anything this big through amazon or online period. I have purchased other things but this is the last time I'll purchase a tv. If anyone knows how to get rid of these purple spots let me know...Thanks! :(

Reviews.Title: poorly designed user interface
Reviews.Author: Jonah Probell "Jonah Probell"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality on this TV is good and the sound is adequate, but the user interface has the following deficiencies:* the television is slow to turn on such that one might think it necessary to push the power button a second time* navigating to Netflix requires several menu choices and button pushes that are not intuitive to a first-time user of the TV* the television is slow to respond to button pushes, making the user wonder if the button push had an effect* the remote control has many buttons and their function for each mode of operation is unclearI have returned the television after a few days.

Reviews.Title: Buy something else.
Reviews.Author: DG
Reviews.Content: Always Freezes. I guess you get what you pay for.I stopped using the Smart TV and got another ROKU instead ans this Vizio kept loosing the network connection and freezing up while playing Netflix and HULU +

Reviews.Title: Wireless, what wireless?
Reviews.Author: blumobean
Reviews.Content: Imagine this, you are sitting in the room where the brand new TV is located. In front of you is an older laptop, just to the right of the brand new TV. The old laptop is streaming Netflix at very good quality, it loaded Netflix and started streaming "Walking Dead" in just a few seconds. The brand new Vizio E241i-A1 has been set up and it shows your wireless signal at 3 bars out of 5, yet the brand new TV will not connect to anything. The laptop when tested at Speedtest.net results in a download speed of 6Mbps, not great but that speed will stream Netflix. You then say to yourself, I have a problem that tech support can resolve. Vizio has USA based support and very generous hours of operation. You then call the toll free number and after a reasonable wait you are connected with a very nice person who is eager to help. After explaining your dilemma, the very nice person explains to you how you just got screwed. The very nice person tells you that your brand new TV has very, very weak wifi capabilities and that the router has to be very, very close. You can not believe what the very nice person just told you, so you say "the laptop plays Netflix fine" and "the brand new TV shows 3 bars". The very nice person states again "very weak wifi". The very nice person is so nice that they even commiserate with you over how crappy your brand new TV is.UPDATE: I do not know what happened, but wireless is now working with no changes on my part. When I look at download speed of TV it is much less than the old laptop, therefore I can only assume that wireless is weak on TV. It will stream HD movie from Amazon Prime and picture is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: You would have to be crazy to buy this from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Conrad B. Senior
Reviews.Content: I read all the 1 star review and it seems clear there are junk Visio TV's being sold through Amazon with poor warranty service.The solution is to buy from Costco and pay $29 for and extended warranty--take the warranty up to 3 years for TV's under $500.Then if the TV craps out, you take it back for another one--no shipping involved.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Alivia
Reviews.Content: I am obsessed with my new tv!!!!It is all that I wanted and more. Must have!Thank you very much,Alivia

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Lindamae
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical when the box was delivered damaged in the corner. We hooked it up and noticed that there were two halo lights coming in from the top and bottom of the right corners. Unfortunately when I went to retrieve the box I had just tossed in the trash someone had already taken it and I had to purchase a new box at the additional cost of ten dollars, not to  mention driving to find a mail source. I have this TV in a 24" and love it but this had to be sent back and I replaced it with another Vizio that I bought at another place so I wouldn't be without a TV for a long period of time. FedEx should be more careful with the handling of products.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed, For a smart tv it is kinda clunky.
Reviews.Author: DDP
Reviews.Content: I consider Vizio an off brand and it does live up to that. The software is clunky and not very slick at all. The software on my Blu-Ray player is fifty times better than the software on this tv. Professional software developers are supposed to designed this stuff. Must be same people that developed the government health care web site.  I will never purchase a Vizio again. Software from the 90's at best.

Reviews.Title: not too smart
Reviews.Author: Robert A Rissolo
Reviews.Content: I really like my TV. I thought a smart TV would let me see internet stuff like facebook. Or let me view home pictures that are on a network drive. Can't do either. Not too smart

Reviews.Title: PERFECT FOR MY KIDS ROOMS
Reviews.Author: Matthew T. Mcclung
Reviews.Content: SET UP WAS EASY. PERFECT SIZE FOR KIDS ROOMS. WISH THERE WAS A WAY FOR THEM TO CONNECT THEM WITH THEIR KINDELS TO USE AS A REMOTE WITH AN APP.

Reviews.Title: Good TV not 120 Hz but worth the purchase
Reviews.Author: A. Simonton
Reviews.Content: Pros:Clear, crisp pictureGood app choicesCons:Not 120 HZ refresh rate...I've seen true 120 hz refresh rate and this isn't it.Since the speakers are, technically, behind the TV sound isn't excellent.  Bought a soundbar to help that as I am sometimes hard of hearing.GUI for applications are not most up-to-date (not sure if this is an agreement with the vendors or what?)Overall: For the price I like the Vizios, it is the second I have in the house and they are both well used.  Very difficult to beat for the price and even with the additions I have made to setup the cost is still under.

Reviews.Title: Picture color is very bad......i was surprised to see the television color
Reviews.Author: Md E. Hossain
Reviews.Content: Picture color is very bad......i was surprised to see the television colorTrust me, i dont like it, & i m not going to buy vizio product any more

Reviews.Title: Good TV (BUT)....
Reviews.Author: GrandM
Reviews.Content: So the TV is not a bad buy for the price but I am consulting an Attorney on what consumer rights I may have since only Americans can get the VizioPrime membership. How could that be when we all spend our money the same way?

Reviews.Title: Received defective item
Reviews.Author: Cris
Reviews.Content: I set this tv up only to find that when I put it on there was a red vertical line down the left side of the screen.  Returned the tv and received a prompt refund.  Bought a samsung instead.

Reviews.Title: Dosen't last
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for about 2 years.  It is really a good TV for about that long, and then the left side of the picture went much darker then the right.  I mean there is a noticeable line right down the middle of the picture.  I adjusted the brightness and contrast, but then the right side is to bright.  I contacted Vizio, and they pretty much said I need a new one.  Out of warranty, of course.  Don't get me wrong, I loved this set for 2 years, but then, I guess you get what you pay for.  If you want a TV that will last 2 years, this is the set for you, but if your in it for the "Long Haul" spend a little more money and get something with more quality.

Reviews.Title: still product testing, all good so far
Reviews.Author: Teri Watson "i am Amazon"
Reviews.Content: i must be searching for LED-HDTV for almost a year. my main thing is i don't like to be tied to a contract cable service cuz i want to be flexible and move out anytime. since my ATT Uverse internet is sufficient and fast, i have been watching Hulu free TV, so why bother for cable svc? i tried buying TV 2x. the first was a 32 Insignia, easy to set up, cheap at $200. but figured too small. then after returning it, i bought a 40in Toshiba. it took 2 days, still i was getting crazy just setting it up..no manual came with it. i plugged in Shrek, the picture was all pink, then after tinkering on cables at the back, it all became black and white. it got returned! not as user friendly as i hoped it to be.now after reading you all's reviews, i got convinced!i would start with delivery, it was UPS, arrived when i expected, box has a slash on the side but didn't penetrate the content.price is cheap for that size! wow!, 4 HDMI ports? wow! all i did was plug the power cord, then played on the remote control. set up was a breeze. all i know Menu is always a bestfriend, i don't need a manual or anything, this is easy to figure! i've been product testing for 3 days now. been watching Amazon Instant Videos, plugged xbox 360 and been playing. i set it to "movie" or "game" as modes so not to tinker on any other configuration. it's sitting in my living room near the glass door, so no, i can't see the difference if it's supposed to have that excellent black contrast or vivid colors, sound is ok, but bc im not particular w/ those. MY ONLY COMPLAIN IS THE SCREWS OF THE BASE = TOO SHORT!!! the metal base weight is sufficient to balance such dimension, but to think only 3 short screws that hook them together??, what were they thinking designing it this way?? im afraid i cant place it in my regular TV rack, in fact it's still sitting on the floor, as im afraid it may fall in the floor once placed up there. and i dont like wall mounting either. this is it for now, i dunno how long Amazon refreshes its Instant free videos? or is this like im gonna be watching all them in a month or is there a fresh supply of new free videos periodically?also i purchased the square trade 4 yr warranty,thanks, hope this helps!

Reviews.Title: Horrible WiFi - Look Elsewhere if that is Critical
Reviews.Author: jayk
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the sole purpose of using it in a room w/o cable - so that I could stream to it using its built in WiFi and Smart Apps.  Needless to say over the last 6-8 months its WiFi has worked maybe 1/3 of the time.  It constantly kicks out/off and needs to be restarted.  its a rare occurrence when we can get through a 1/2 hour show w/o that happening.  I would def look elsewhere if WiFi is a key component you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: HBOGO NO GO
Reviews.Author: Joe Boswell
Reviews.Content: Received this TV yesterday.  I was going to put it in my motorhome.  Streaming video was importantt so we could get programming services like HBOGO via wireless.  For whatever reason the TV is locked down to Yahoo apps and they do not have HBOGO.  Nor can you go anywhere else like GooglePlay store to get other apps.  The remote comes with 3 prominent buttons for Amazon, Netflix and M-GO these work fine.  The picture quality looks good after a little tweaking.However, if you like to control you own apps and install what YOU want instead of what they think you should have, let them know or go elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: It's not as good as Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Brooklyn at heart "brooklyn"
Reviews.Content: The television sounded like a great deal for the price, however, I also bought a Samsung and I see a huge difference in the picture quality. Samsung is crisper. Also there's a thin line at the top of the screen that should not be there. It's a very thin line of snow. There are times when I turn the television on and I get no picture, just sound.

Reviews.Title: WRONG TV SHIPPED.
Reviews.Author: Gary B. Hulbert
Reviews.Content: I PLACED THIS ORDER AS THIS TV SEEMED TO HAVE EVERYTHING I WANTED.  BUT THE PICTURE WAS NOT AS GOOD AS MY DYNEX 32" 60HZ TV.  BOTH THE ORDER AND SHIPPER INDICATE THAT THIS TV WAS EQUIPPED WITH 120HZ.  I BECAME MORE SUSPICIOUS AS TIME WENT ON.  I CHECKED THE ID ON THE BACK OF THE SET AND IT IS LABELED 50/60HZ.I HAVE TV SERIAL # LATKOCAN 4900288.  SOMETHING IS WRONG HERE AND I WANT SATISFACTION.  MY PHONE IS 850 - 424 - 7040,  I WOULD APPRECIATE TALKING TO A SERVICE MANAGER ABOUT THIS SITUATION.THANKS - G HULBERT

Reviews.Title: Damaged Product
Reviews.Author: Samaiyah
Reviews.Content: I received the tv twice and both times they were damaged .I was looking forward to this tv because it was such a great price .I order a lot of products from amazon and this was my worse experience .I am now looking for a refund .This has been going on for over a month .

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: john "beer man"
Reviews.Content: i love it the best i love itgood good good good good good good good goood good good good good

Reviews.Title: Two TVs had been returned back to Amazon in the period of four days...
Reviews.Author: FV
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately cannot say anything about TV itself - had not have a chance to see any pictures.The first item arrived with the big hole on the side of the box, damaged white wrapper and scratches on the TV itself and was immediately.sent back. The replacement TV arrived the next day. The only problem was the blank screen. Called VIZIO tech support - useless waste of time, AMAZON tech support was much more helpful but we could not bring TV back to life. The second unit was sent back as well.My compliments to Amazon for handling all of this commotion but I would stay away from VIZIO products.

Reviews.Title: Slow piece of crap
Reviews.Author: R. Lasseter
Reviews.Content: If you think you're going to watch any streaming videos on this thing, guess again. It's a slow piece of s*** and won't play anything right. This is the worst piece of garbage I ever wasted my money on. Returning asap.

Reviews.Title: Bad choice
Reviews.Author: David Penny
Reviews.Content: Limited Functionality compared to competitors that didn't manifest itself until delivery.  Locked up between "smart" and cable at least once a day requiring restart.  Vizio's tech support talked down to me as if I was either child or senile.  Sent it back and got an LG for $50 more that has a better picture, is more reliable, and more functional.  Haven't called tech support yet, but if I do, there is no way they could be any worse than Vizio's.  Stay away from this product.

Reviews.Title: Horrible sound
Reviews.Author: Trina
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item based on the reviews, boy was I ever disappointed.  The sound quality was beyond pathetic and sounded like it was coming from an echo chamber, even after following one reviewers advice on what to do.....The wide screen image was distorted and the TV had so many settings, I had to do research on the internet just to figure out what are the best settings to use, which weren't that helpful to be honest.  I specifically purchased this product because it was manufactured in the United States....what a horrendous mistake.  My advice....save all your packaging material until you are 100% sure you want to keep a sub-par product.

Reviews.Title: Broken Screen
Reviews.Author: michael ching
Reviews.Content: We were so excited to get our TV.  Shipping was fast, and setup was easy.  I went to turn the set on, and when the TV did turn on, the screen was SHATTERED!  So sad, but customer service was great, and we'll be getting a full refund.  The two stars are for Amazon's superior customer service!

Reviews.Title: Don't Ignore This Fact
Reviews.Author: Gordie
Reviews.Content: I have my television connected to a Comcast Digital Cable Box.  It takes 24 seconds (yes, I timed it) from the time you press the remote control 'on' button to the time when you have both a picture and sound.  Sometimes it's not a big deal.  However, it's what I don't like about this set and it's worth knocking off 2 stars for this review. Had I realized how much this bugs me, I never would have bought this set.Not since the late 60's/early 70's have I seen a television that takes this long to turn on.  Once it's on it's fine, so you'll probably ignore this review, but if you do buy it, you'll remember this review and say to yourself "That guy was right, this is lame.  I should have found a better T.V."

Reviews.Title: Extra Extra!!!
Reviews.Author: Eugene Hankerson
Reviews.Content: The tv had a problem powering on and was not at all worth the money. Also I just purchased a train set that did not have all the parts and pieces.

Reviews.Title: Not a good idea to buy TVs online
Reviews.Author: Corey Doman
Reviews.Content: I recieved item broken and not working. Not really a review on the actual item but that's all I can actually say about it

Reviews.Title: Get the Samsung
Reviews.Author: AbCab
Reviews.Content: It takes a long time for it to pick up the orders you are giving it. I wish it would have been easier to understand.

Reviews.Title: Vizio has bad customer service
Reviews.Author: JustPetThePuppy
Reviews.Content: I bought my Vizio TV on a Friday to watch some football games that weekend. It is currently Monday and the TV still does not work.....Attempts to channel scan did not work. I thought it was the coaxial cable or my room so I changed the cable and moved the TV to a different room where another TV was set up working properly. Still did not work. Called Vizio and after an hour they concluded that the TV was bad. The best offer they could do through them would be to replace it in 10 days. I opted to go back to the store. So I exchanged it for the same model since over the phone they told me that they have a very low failure rate. Long store short, the second TV did not work either and had the same problem. I had IT look at the TV and they diagnosed the TV to be bad. After several hours on the phone with Vizio they acknowledged another bad TV...and did NOTHING about it. They were clearly not prepared to handle a bad customer service scenario like mine. They only offered another 10 day replacement and did nothing to keep me as a customer. After 2 TV, obviously not going back with Vizio.

Reviews.Title: :(speakers are horrible stay away at all costs
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: The speakers are horrible. They rattle at medium volume setting out of the box. Stay away at all cost save your money

Reviews.Title: Returned. Too much to ask for in a very inexpensive TV
Reviews.Author: Lee Bolen
Reviews.Content: Would not connect to wifi network and support was no help.Returned to Amazon.Picture was poor and off axis picture was not viewable.Spend a little more and get what you want.

Reviews.Title: Can You Say Pix-u-lated
Reviews.Author: Lucas Cross
Reviews.Content: I bought this thing based on a lot of the reviews. People who said it has a good picture like a Samsung lied or they are stupid one or the other. Anyways I bought for football season and football games look like sh  ut your mouth. I would not recommend this TV for big sports fans. It looks good on cartoons but I'm in my 30s and really don't want to watch cartoons. My HD channels look pretty good and my lap top looks good as well as the blue ray. Just football games look bad so that's why I give it a 3 star. If you can afford It Get one of the $800 and up TVS. I wish I would have, and don't trust the brilliant American peoples 5 star reviews. I Know now a TV is a get what you pay for deal.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: mother of pearl
Reviews.Content: I don't watch TV a lot, so I figured it was best to buy a cheap one. Well, I've had it for 9 months and now it just stopped working. And when it did, all interfaces, especially navigation in external sources (i.e. computer, external hard drive etc.) is not only not user friendly, it seems like it has been designed to be as time consuming and slow as possible. SLOW being the key word here.Do yourself a favor, pay a little more and buy a product you'll enjoy and that will last more than 9 months.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality no good
Reviews.Author: very very disappointed!
Reviews.Content: When I compare it to my Sony tv the picture quality is not that great.  Everything else is ok about it but the picture quality no good. If you care about picture quality buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Great TV but disappointed I have to purchase TV shows...
Reviews.Author: Readhead13
Reviews.Content: Because they are in HD instead of standard. Which sucks. Not at all happy about that. I already buy plenty of TV shows, I would like to watch some for free. I guess it's back to the computer for those. Bummer.

Reviews.Title: Television stinks (literally).
Reviews.Author: Jerry Hargrove
Reviews.Content: Burning plastic smell for two weeks. Returned and bought a Panasonic plasma from Walmart. Reviews on Amazon were great for this television but if you search the internet there are many, many bad reviews about Vizio models smelling...

Reviews.Title: Wrong TV
Reviews.Author: tricia Stock
Reviews.Content: I received the Vizio E470-AO 47in, and spent time downloading the manual and searching the menu for the Smart TV option. Amazon sent me the wrong TV and it does not have the little i after the 470. I have thrown away the box and hooked up the tv and now have the cheaper version of the TV I purchased. It is past the date and I cannot return it. Buyer Beware

Reviews.Title: Color display
Reviews.Author: eld
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV 2 weeks ago, plugged it into my Tivo box, colors were dull and unacceptable. Compared it to my LG (same size, same price range). Tried all color adjustments but could never bring it to an acceptable level. Called Vizio, sent them screen pictures, the response was - we can't see anything wrong! what a customer service! all i asked for was a TV replacement, they refuse.Will return to Amazon, will NEVER even consider Vizio, regardless of price.

Reviews.Title: Youtube App a total disaster
Reviews.Author: Jeo "Jep"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV as a gift to myself.to be fair,  the TV itself is fine as a commodity should be. I don't expect anything unusual.I bought this product just because it has Youtube.However, the Youtube is a total disaster in every aspect of an application on devices.1. The playlist and subcriptions has no sub folders. There is no link to common functions such as "related video", "Search History",  "Recently Watched", to name only a few. Vizio just pulls all my playlists and subcriptions together without allowing me to browse and choose what I want to watch.  Isn't that what playlists and subscriptions are used for?  I don't think it is that hard to design something like what is on google.2. Connection to Youtube is very slow and it has an uploading icon in the middle of the TV screen even though the video is already playing.  At first I thought it is my internet connection.I did 2 tests to see if it is indeed Vizio's app problem.First, I tested with Amazon Instant video and Netflix. They all work as they are supposed to. My ISP is Comcast at speed of 20mb/s. so it is not connection problem, it is Vizio problem.Second, I tested Youbube connection with 2 other devices at home: WD streamer and Roku players. Youtube worked perfectly on both devicesBased those  very disappointing points,  1 star is the best I can do. Hopefully Vizio engineers will improve soon.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: R. dixon
Reviews.Content: This TV does not need 1 star.I got this TV in DEC. 2 weeks later the color would look like it was very dark can not even see the people and now it will play great for a while then go back to dark picture where the tv is not good.And the remote they give you is very small the keyboard is very small and when you key any more.1. they need a better2. I do not need a smart tv3. My 77 year mom can not see the tini remote.has anyone has these problem.thanks

Reviews.Title: The Remote Sucks
Reviews.Author: Barry H.
Reviews.Content: ViZEO is getting one star because of their remote...Sure I can add my DVD player to the TV but (so what) the freaking remote can't operate it....I have to use the DVC players remote to control the dvd player....Sure I can add my 2nd Comcast cable box to the TV but (so what) the freaking remote can't change channels....I have to use the Comcast secondary remote to change channels...I don't know, if you going to make a SMART TV then make the remote smart enough to handle the other devices!!!

Reviews.Title: $58.00 Shipping??
Reviews.Author: Eaglestar
Reviews.Content: Gotta be kidding me.  They want to pop me $58.00 and some change for shipping????  Nope, I got a 42 inch Vizio from Wally World for $448 rather than this 39 inch for $438, NOOOO shipping and both are smart TVs.  Will go tomorrow and pick it up.  No waiting.  Absurd shipping fees

Reviews.Title: wouldn't recommend
Reviews.Author: mo sye
Reviews.Content: Hardly a smart tv. Not slim at all, I made a mistake and spent less and got less bang for my buck.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Stone River
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this! I've only had it for four months and I'm already having problems. The remote and manual controls do not work. I google this problem and found many other people have had the same problem with Vizio TVs

Reviews.Title: No Power Cord and No Help from Vizio
Reviews.Author: Audrey M
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV while my home was under construction so the contractor could build a niche in the wall to hold it.  They measured the TV, but then it sat in the box for two months while construction was completed.  I just went to install the TV and there was no power cord in the box.  Vizio support kept me on the phone for 45 minutes; told me I would have to buy a cord since it was more than 30 days after purchase, and couldn't tell me how much the cord cost or what its model number was so I could try to buy it locally.  TV is very attractive in its niche, but only as an expensive decoration.

Reviews.Title: broke in 6 months
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: we purchased this TV in March, it arrived the first week of april...it broke 10/2/13.  Now we can't get it fixed because there is not a way to email the invoice to Vizio and Amazon will not take it back because it has been 30 days.  If you buy this TV, keep your invoice!  There is a one year warranty but it will take at least 2 days for someone to come out and fix it...if it can be fixed. I will NEVER buy a Vizio again....and never buy ANY electronics from Amazon. I am extremely disappointed in all aspects of this purchase.

Reviews.Title: A lemon.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time -- Friday at 2:30.  We spent the next seven hours setting it up and on the phone with tech support.  They ultimately decided that the set had to be replaced because the picture was either half dark or there was none -- a blank screen.  They scheduled a replacement service call but could not tell us when it would be.  The timeframe they guessed would be between ten and twenty business days.  We contacted Amazon and were very happy to learn their return policy.  We arranged to return it and we've bought another TV -- from Amazon (a Samsung).

Reviews.Title: How can my review be helping your clients
Reviews.Author: Shirley Roemeling
Reviews.Content: If you have completely read my review, how can this be helping other clients who are interested in this TV.  I said nothing about the TV, just that it is no longer on Amazon Prime's acceptable list.  Are these responses bogus?I bought the TV so I could become a member of Amazon Prime, this TV was approved to work with Amazon Prime movies when purchased.  By the time I received it it was off the approved list and no one will give me a straight answer as to why it in less than 1 week it was taken off the list.  I am still waiting and still no answer.  It has been over a month.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy from this company!
Reviews.Author: Deborah L Jaeger
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV to be shipped to my freight forwarder in Miami to be forwarded onto to me in the Cayman Islands. I received and unpacked the TV only to find that the screen was completely cracked from 2 points of impact. The TV was packaged in a box with 4 pieces of styrofoam on the corners and a thin covering over the whole TV itself. THERE WAS ABSOLUTELY NOTHING BETWEEN THE SCREEN AND BOX TO PROTECT THE SCREEN! This, however, is not the problem. I had insurance thru my freight forwarder to cover the cost of the TV, shipping, duty and port charges. I will be out nothing except for the next 60 days.The company was quick to try and solve my problem meaning I could ship the TV back to them and receive another. Shipping back is not an option as I'd be out another $200 for that. I told them I had insurance and would not be shipping the TV back to them but rather I had another request from them in good faith for the inconvenience I had suffered. I offered to buy another TV from them on the promise from them that the TV would be packaged properly so I wouldn't have to go thru this again and I'd have the TV I wanted. They were going to make money twice from me and all they had to do was package it properly! I even offered, in writing, to void the warranty by having them repackage the TV once it was sent to them from their supplier. I offered to pay for additional packaging. This is where the problem no lies with this company. They see where I'll be reimbursed by the insurance company and they feel they have no obligation to satisfy me as a customer because it would inconvenience them. I suspect that they are just a few people in an office that brokers the purchases between Amazon and the buyers. They never touch the merchandise. You aren't satisfied? Send it back to the manufacturers and they broker the sale of another piece of merchandise. They do not care whatsoever about customer service.If I could give this company zero stars, I would. DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THEM. I was a faithful Amazon customer and due to the fact that Amazon uses this company, I will never buy anything from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 32" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: waldacott22
Reviews.Content: Well first of all I would love to write a wonderful review about this product, I pulled it out of the box and was impressed from the start. Unfortunately, as soon as I plugged in the TV and the screen lit up the entire screen was filled with cracks.  I know it is not Amazon's fault but I am extremely disappointed that at some point during the shipping this would happen. Be wary. Maybe buying a TV at the store is the best option.

Reviews.Title: Service Bad, could not connect WIF, Manager rude I
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Monfette "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Vizio service manager rude and could not fix problem after I was on phone 3 times and over 3 hours. They wanted me to run a cable to connect direct to modem (50ft TV was mounted on wall down stairs) I said thats why I bought TV with wifi so I would have to hard wire it. There customer service said they would not help me if I would not do this. I explained that I have two other sets with wifi connected and they work ok and laptop connects down stairs but manager still would not reconsider. Returned set to Amazon (GREAT RETURN POLICY). I bought differnt brand TV and bought a blueray dvd player with wifi and it worked great.

Reviews.Title: Am returning this item
Reviews.Author: HGW
Reviews.Content: I bought a Visio several years back and have been very pleased with it.Visio generally has an excellent reputation and actually manufactures in the U.S.A. (not sure if they still do).However, on this particular model, which I got from Costco, for $499 plus $35 tax, picture quality struck me as mediocre.Also,there seems to be a manufacturing defect: when I connect the co-axial receptacle on the Visio to the co-axial receptacle on my VCR (or on my cable box) I do not get any signal. Most users would just use one of the 3 HDMI ports. But in my case I want to connect my ancient but nice VCR to the Visio, using the co-ax connection.The install process was disgustingly difficult because I had to use the remote to type information, using the arrow keys on the remote to select each letter from an onscreen virtual keyboard. I actually developed a pain in my right hand doing this.Then I had a brainwave and plugged a regular USB keyboard into the USB port on the side of the TV and abracadabra, the install process became 99% easier.Suggestion to manufacturer:  Visio should include with the packaging materials the suggestion that to make the installation process super easy, the customer has the option of using a USB keyboard.On my prior Visio TV purchase, there was no install menuing at all. You just plugged things in, and it worked! But on this later model being reviewed here, you get extra bells and extra whistles via menuing, such as the labeling of each input, so that when you go to select which input to use, you do not see a rather unhelpful label like "HDMI3", and instead see the name of whatever device you have attached to the HDMI3 port: for example I have attached a Roku to HDMI3, and then used the keyboard to manually rename HDMI3 to Roku. And many other useful niceties.So anyway, I shall pack this beastie up, and return it to Costco.FEBRUARY 18: As temporary replacement of the TV reviewed above, I took from our bedroom a Visio VX32L, manufactured in 2006, and made an interesting discovery.That 7 year old set, a flat panel HD TV, gave very much better playback of old DVDs  than did the brand new E401 reviewed above, while using an 8 year old Sony DVD changer.  This applied to the 5 wire component video connection, and even more so to the 3 wire composite video connection.

Reviews.Title: TV bought from amazon
Reviews.Author: Raenel
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv last June. I didn't hook it up until about March 11, 2014. After hooking it up I discovered that it doesn't work. Vizio company said the screen was cracked and it is not covered under warranty. Therefore I have a $650.00 television that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: TV was broke out of box and never worked!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey hoy
Reviews.Content: the TV I received was cracked because I couldn't even use it.I couldn't even turn it on and it just doesn't work, when it came straight out the box. I I'm very disappointed I wish I could get a replacement for it.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Paris "rabid reader"
Reviews.Content: I had to return this item because the picture was too dark and nothing we would do, would lighten it.  I immediately notified Amazon and the sent out a new one,  but the same problem is still there.

Reviews.Title: Defective, Horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I installed my new Tv today and picture quality is horrible! You can't look at the Tv past 10 degree angle without the colors changing and Tv becoming blurry.  I called customer service and they stated this is "normal".  BS!  I saw this same Tv at BestBuy and the quality was completely different. Mine is obviously defective!  Staff at customer service is horrible and not helpful!  They gave me cookie-cutter answers and assured me that this is normal. lol  If this is normal then Vizio is crap!  I am returning the Tv immediately!  I had a similar problem with Vizio 5 years ago with a different Tv,,,  I guess I didn't learn my lesson.  Shame on me!

Reviews.Title: I'm not very happy
Reviews.Author: Carole Ann Camp
Reviews.Content: First, there is ridge at the edge of the computer that digs into my lap. It is very uncomfortable as a "LAP" top.Second, It does crazy things. The screen is always flipping around to different screens. I can't even figure out how it is happening.Third, the screen changes size from 25% to 250% view randomly and often without cause.It's difficult to tell whether the problems is the computer or Windows 8. I've been using computers for 40 years and this one baffles me. I've thought about sending it back. But I really don't want to go through another steep learning curve.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO DOES NOT HONOR WARRANTIES!!
Reviews.Author: J. C. Miletich
Reviews.Content: The coax post broke off my 3 month old tv while I was changing antennas. Vizio will not honor the warranty.  This product is crap & I would never buy any of their cheap crap again.

Reviews.Title: First impression
Reviews.Author: Eva Nena Reilley-Gamboa
Reviews.Content: So far I dislike this. I haven't been able to get any of the apps to work. They work on my Wii but not on this TV.The remote control for this is very cheap and hard to use.The picture is great though.I will most likely get a friend to look at it to see if I can at least get the apps working. If I cannot I'm returning this.

Reviews.Title: I am not happy with you.
Reviews.Author: Moges
Reviews.Content: Although the item is the one I choose you got me the wrong remote. I was expecting to have the one which I can use it as a keyboard  to set up and doing TV browsing. This greatly undermines my expectation . The remote should not be something I buy separately but just because you want me pay for it. This is not a good business idea especially for you guys doing online business. Credibility and genuineness can only retain your market share.

Reviews.Title: dissapointing
Reviews.Author: patsyt
Reviews.Content: usually when I buy on Amazon I am delighted with the results..so I took a chance and wanted to suprise my son with a new TV..consulted people,found one, and ordered it with free prime shipping!It came pretty fast,the box was fine,but after my son plugged it in there were dozens of tiny cracks in the screen(50" screen).Contacted Amazon,who then contacted the seller,who then contacted me to let me know that it will be 7 to 10 days for the manufacturer to let them know to let me know how to return it..not sure at this point if I will return it for a replacment or just a refundand go somewhere else for purchase..will depend on what hapens next.I know things happen,but would really like this resolved sooner than later..will update as it goes along.most of the reviews for this seller were good,maybe not so much with electronics??

Reviews.Title: ARRIVED BROKEN
Reviews.Author: julia poynor
Reviews.Content: 1ST TV ARRIVED WITH CRACKED SCREEN.  Totally unpacked and set up, turned it on and nothing on screen but veins running everywhere.  Called amazon, they insisted had to pick it up BEFORE shipping another.  Received 2nd tv.  This one was WORSE!!!!!.  Removed from box, looks like a refurbished tv.  Corner cracked and missing screws for base. Turn on TV and screen is cracked again!!!!!!. Now Amazon will not refund my money without picking up the 2nd tv. Have Direct TV coming in 2 days to hook up GEnie and NO TV!!!!!!  I AM DONE WITH AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Terrible picture quality, slow speeds
Reviews.Author: D. Gombos
Reviews.Content: After reading mostly positive reviews on this product I decided to take a chance and purchase.  After setting it up to a full-HD cable box the picture was HORRIBLE.  Watching basketball terrible... the image was grainy and the motion was not good at all.Thought I could adjust the TV settings but nothing would let me do it.  The menu was slow to load (in addition to the TV taking "forever" (about 5 seconds) to turn on.If I saw this TV in store I would NOT even consider it.**Edit** I decided to come back and expand on my negative experience with this TV, as it still frustrates me that Vizio is selling this hunk of junk.  I've seen many Vizios in person and was very impressed.  Don't know what happened to this one.And now that I really think about it, the 5-second turn-on time should be more like 15 seconds, as another person commented.  Why so long??I work in the special events industry where picture quality is very important to me as we show videos and live streams regularly for weddings, bar/bat mitzvahs, galas, etc...I bought a Samsung 6 series for $75 more (not a Smart TV- not a big deal for me, though) and couldn't be happier.  Unbelievable picture for the price.  My brother has an 8 series but was about $1,200- now that picture is amazing...but for my use the 6 series is PREFECT.

Reviews.Title: Item Defective
Reviews.Author: Yarman
Reviews.Content: This item was supposed to be a Christmas gift.  It showed up with no visible damage or poor handling to the box, however when opened the top of the TV fram was separated from the screen and there is a white glow on that part of the picture (particularly noticeable on darker shows and scenes).Obviously there are quality control issues with this product.

Reviews.Title: lasted 45 seconds
Reviews.Author: ricke
Reviews.Content: I received this tv and unpacked it, started to set up the tv, I never even got through the set up menu before the tv went dark blue and nothing would come back up. I called vizio and they were pretty helpfull, they ordered a replacement tv for me. They did not have the same model as I had purchased so they gave me a free up grade, that tv is working great so far. so based upon my experience with the original model I can only give it a 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Select another brand.
Reviews.Author: Dennis L Oberer
Reviews.Content: First one came with a damaged screen....had a white line running through it. Returned to Amazon. 2nd one came and I could NOT get the color right nor the brightness correct. Colors were way too overpowered; peoples faces were bright red and football fields were nearly black/green. Fully 1/3 of the backgrounds were so darkly shaded that you could not see the pictures. Yes I tried the trouble shooting line...got a female that was asking questions and then looking the answers up on her screen. Forget it. I returned the 2nd one and have given up  on this brand. So.....dont buy one unless you want to be disappointed. Vizio has gone WAY down in quality recently it seems.05 DEC 2013Well I ordered a replacement tv...Samsung model UN32EH4003F from Amazon on the 2nd and it arrived today the 5th. Set up in about 10 minutes and picture and sound are LIGHT YEARS better than that junk Vizio.

Reviews.Title: damaged in shipping!

Reviews.Content: dont know if this was done with Amazon or with UPS....but got the tv, hooked it up....and there were tons of lines in it and one of the corners of the screen was white (pixels).called and Amazon is making it right...without much fuss.you would think people handling objects like tv's would be careful with them.  sort of makes you leary of buying electronics that are fragile through Amazon/UPS

Reviews.Content: I was told by the manufacturer that I would be able to get the 1080P with the right hook up to the cable connection to our box, with out HD. Which is not so. Reviews.Content: Are the manufacturers of this TV that insane to place the speakers on the back of the TV !!!??? VIZIO!! Reviews.Content: poor customer service, defective television would do nothing to resolve problem. They sold a television but lost a customer. Vizio sucks!

Reviews.Content: I got a 39" smart TV but broken out of box. Very disappointed. Box looked OK but crack in screen. This was a Vizio problem and not a distributor problem.

Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival
Reviews.Author: aocruz
Reviews.Content: I lifted the top part of the box during unpacking to notice the screen shattered and being held together by the protective sheet layer.  I did not even have to unpack the tv entirely to see that product was already dead on arrival.I was very disappointed that I returned the product the same day at local UPS store and went ahead to the major electronic store to buy product that had the same price.  This made me think ... why bother any more with purchasing TV or large products in Amazon when electronic stores now have them for the same price.  The only benefit I see is not paying the sales tax.  But after needing to repack and return I rather pay the sales tax and avoid the hassle again.

Reviews.Title: THE TV ARRIVED WITH A BROKEN GLASS
Reviews.Author: John M. Sherman
Reviews.Content: THE TV ARRIVED WITH A BROKEN GLASS.DID NOT OPEN BOX UNTIL AFTER THE DATE TO RETURN.MY FAULT BUT LIVE AND LEARN.WOULD NOT BUY AGAIN BECAUSE CARE WASNOT TAKEN TO ENSURE GLASS WOULD NOT BREAK.

Reviews.Title: Complex, and a defective unit
Reviews.Author: Lamplighter "Ray out west"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV simply to get a larger screen in my TV cabinet.  The reason I gave a low rating is that the Vizio TV I Replaced on the exact same cable connection, detected an entirely different range of digital channels and a variety of analog channels, which the VIZIO E320i-A0 did not.  It did not detect a single analog channel, whereas the previous TV on that cable did.  That is, the E320i-A0 failed to detect anything like the same channel lineup that the previous TV did, which is a VA26L, and the other two Vizio TVs in this house on the same cable also detect this same array. I reconnected the VA26DL and it and the other two TVs continue to operate on that same array of channels. Since all Vizio TVs have digital and analog tuners, I can only conclude that I had a defective unit. For what it's worth, from long experience I know that I must and I do torque the coaxial connection to a good secure fit, and the only difference in performance is the E320i-A0 TV.The Internet capability is of marginal use to me, as I have an Apple TV which gives me great flexibility. I anticipated more ease-of-use with Internet capable TV, and found that besides the lack of functionality that I have described, the Internet function was cumbersome and far less flexible than my use of Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Vizio hides the facts
Reviews.Author: P. Holding
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV at Walmart as that was the only place I could find it. It was on the wall with other TVs that were listed as 1080p. I thought it was 1080p as well;especially as it was a smart tv I assumed good picture quality would be part of the package. I checked the box at the store & did not see that information but took it on faith. When I turned it on, there was noticeable pixellation. So I checked the box again for info re: 720 or 1080...nothing. I looked at all the paperwork it came with...nothing. I finally had to go online to get the info & discovered it was 720p.Very disappointed. Due to circumstances I was unable to return it. Consumers have a right to know what they are buying ON THE PRODUCT. "720p/60Hz" should ALWAYS be labeled clearly on the box. Shame on VIZIO for trying to hide the facts from consumers. "Buyer Beware" is more true for some manufacturers then others.

Reviews.Title: lovely
Reviews.Author: B. Henry "movie nut"
Reviews.Content: OMG, I love my tv !!!  It is so much better than I was really expecting ! I have never owned anything VIZIO, wasn't sure what to expect ? But I love this tv, would recommend this to everyone !!!!  The picture is so clear and the set-up was very easy.

Reviews.Title: Bordering on useless
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: You freighted the TV to me in Australia. It arrived on January 16.I discovered it was made for the USA which has 110V power. In Australia we have 240V power. To deal with this issue I purchased a 240V-110V step down transformer on Ebay which I waited 8 days to receive. I managed to get the TV to turn on.I then find that that it has a tuner that only accepts signals broadcast to the USA's ATSC standard. It does not have a dual band tuner.In Australia we broadcast to the DVB-T standard. The TV cannot therefore receive TV signals here.The TV is therefore useless to use for its intended purpose.I am not able to return it as I disposed of the packaging before I discovered the issue with the tuner, In addition, I am not in a position to find the time during work hours to package it alternatively and then get it to a postal service..I'm therefore left with an ornament, a situation that need not have occurred if you'd noticed it was being freighted to Australia.

Reviews.Title: Don't even have the TV yet, but...
Reviews.Author: Jinnylou
Reviews.Content: I pay a lot of money for "Prime" service so I can get Two Day delivery. This is the second time that Amazon has released merchandise to FedEx and they have delivered late. This unit was for a good friend and she is disappointed, "Disappointment" runs downhill and I am upset with Amazon for allowing this. With Best Buy's new price guarantee I could have had the unit already in her living room. My next TV will come from Best Buy.

Reviews.Content: disapointed in actual size of TV.i were look for actual size to be 50 inches in true measurement,it should not say 50inch.when it's not actally 50inches
